GSP33brssgo1u:4: yamiha kāruṇikaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'pyarisahodara āpa mahatpadam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6: śrīgauryā sakalārthadaṃ nijapadāmbhojena muktipradaṃ prauḍhaṃ vighnavanaṃ harantamanaghaṃ śrīḍhuṇḍhituṇḍāsinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:12: śrīśaṅkaraṃ bhāṣyakṛtaṃ praṇamya vyāsaṃ hariṃ sūtrakṛtaṃ ca vacmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:17: iti śramo me saphalo gaṅgāṃ rathyodakaṃ yathā //7 //
GSP33brssgo1u:29: sati cānantaryārthatve yathā dharmajijñāsā pūrvavṛttaṃ vedādhyayanaṃ niyamenāpekṣata evaṃ brahmajijñāsāpi yatpūrvavṛttaṃ niyamenāpekṣate tadvaktavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:41: iha tu bhūtaṃ brahma jijñāsyaṃ nityatvānna puruṣavyāpāratantram /
GSP33brssgo1u:43: yā hi codanā dharmasya lakṣaṇaṃ sā svaviṣaye niyuñjānaiva puruṣamavabodhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:52: teṣu hi satsu prāgapi dharmajijñāsāyā ūrdhvaṃ ca śakyate brahmajijñāsituṃ jñātuṃ ca na viparyaye /
GSP33brssgo1u:55: yasmādveda evāgnihotrādīnāṃ śreyaḥsādhanānāmanityaphalatāṃ darśayati- 'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate' (chāndo.8.1.6) ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:56: tathā brahmavijñānādapi paraṃ puruṣārthaṃ darśayati- 'brahmavidāpnoti param' ityādiḥ (taitti.2.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:64: nanu śeṣaṣaṣṭhīparigrahe 'pi brahmaṇo jijñāsākarmatvaṃ na virudhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:66: evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇaḥ karmatvamutsṛjya sāmānyadvāreṇa parokṣaṃ karmatvaṃ kalpayato vyartha prayāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:71: tasminpradhāne jijñāsākarmaṇi parigṛhīte yairjijñāsitairvinā brahma jijñāsitaṃ na bhavati tānyarthākṣiptānyeveti na pṛthaksūtrayitavyāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:72: yathā rājāsau gacchatītyukte saparivārasya rājño gamanamuktaṃ bhavati tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:98: yadi hi nātmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ syāt sarvo loko nāhamasmīti pratīyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:100: yadi tarhi loke brahmātmatvena prasiddhamasti tato jñātamevetyajijñāsyatvaṃ punarāpannam / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:102: dehamātraṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭamātmeti prakṛtā janā laukāyatikāśca pratipannāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:110: asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvāktiriti kecit /
GSP33brssgo1u:115: FN: adhikaraṇamiti- viṣayaḥ saṃdehaḥ saṃgatiḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ siddhānta ityekaikamadhikaraṇaṃ pañcāvayavaṃ jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:117: brahmaṇo hi nivṛttāvaraṇatvena phalarūpatvaṃ tajjñānopayogitayā caturthisamāsa eṣitavyaḥ 'caturthī tadarthe' ityādineti kecit /
GSP33brssgo1u:131: vaidikānāṃ purāṇādiprādhānyaṃ vā nirasyata iti vastugatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:132: tatra kaścidiha janmani janmāntare vānuṣṭitayajñādibhirnitāntavimalasvānto 'sya śravaṇavidheḥ ko viṣayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:136: taṃ jijñāsumupalabhamāno bhagavānbādarāyaṇastadanubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ śravaṇātmakaśāstrārambhaprayojakaṃ nyāyena nirṇetumidaṃ sūtraṃ racayāñcakāra 'athāto brahmajijñāsā'iti //
GSP33brssgo1u:138: tathāhi-'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:139: śrutyā 'yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ'iti nyāyavatyā 'na jāyate mṛyate vā vipaścit''yo vai
GSP33brssgo1u:140: bhūmā tadamṛtamato 'nyadārtam'ityādi śrutyā ca bhūmātmā nityastato 'nyadanityamajñānasvarūpamiti viveko labhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:141: karmaṇā kṛṣyādinā citaḥ saṃpāditaḥ sasyādilokaḥ-bhogya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:143: 'parīkṣya lokānkarmacitānbrāhmaṇo nirvedamāyānnāstyakṛtaḥ kṛtena''ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati'ityādiśrutyānātmamātre dehendriyādisakalapadārthajāte vairāgyaṃ labhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:145: akṛto mokṣaḥ kṛtena karmaṇā nāstīti karmatatphalebhyo vairāgyaṃ prāpnuyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:146: 'śānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhitaḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet'iti śrutyā śamādiṣaṭkaṃ labhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:149: 'na sa punarāvartate'iti svayañjyotirānandātmakamokṣasya nityatvaśrutyā mumukṣā labhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:152: tathā 'śrotavyaḥ'ityatra pratyayārthasya niyogasya prakṛtyartho vicāro viṣayaḥ vicārasya vedāntā viṣaya iti śakyaṃ jñātum,
GSP33brssgo1u:169: tāsāmadhikāryādiśrutīnāṃ svārthe tātparyanirṇāyakanyāyasūtrābhāve kiṃ vivekādiviśeṣaṇavānadhikārī utānyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:176: yeṣāṃ mate śravaṇe vidhirnāsti teṣāmavihitaśravaṇe 'dhikāryādinirṇayānapekṣaṇātsūtraṃ vyarthamityāpatatītyalaṃ prasaṅgena //
GSP33brssgo1u:180: 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi'ityādiśrutīnāṃ sarvātmatvādispaṣṭabrahmaliḍgānāṃ viṣayādau samanvayokteḥ pādasaṃgatiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:185: tatra prathamapādasya spaṣṭabrahmaliḍgānāṃ śrutīnāṃ samanvayaḥ prameyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:191: tatra nāhaṃ brahmeti bhedagrāhipratyakṣeṇa kartṛtvākartṛtvādiviruddhadharmavattvaliḍgakānumānena ca virodhena brahmātmanoraikyasya viṣayasyāsaṃbhavāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:197: tathā ca brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtrasya śrautor'thaḥ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:217: atra pūrvapakṣe bandhasya satyatvena jñānādanivṛtterupāyāntarasādhyā muktiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:219: iti sarvaṃ manasi nidhāya brahmasūtrāṇi vyākhyātukāmo bhagavān bhāṣyakāraḥ sūtreṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:228: satyarajate idaṃ rajatamityadhiṣṭhānasāmānyāropyaviśeṣayoraikyapramāhitasaṃskārajanyo dṛṣṭa ityatrāpyātmānyanātmāhaṅkārādhyāse pūrvapramā vācyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:234: iti matvā hetubhūtaṃ virodhaṃ vastutaḥ pratītito vyavahārataśca sādhayati-yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:235: na ca 'pratyayottarapadayośca'iti sūtreṇa 'pratyayecottarapade ca parato yuṣmadasmadormaparyantasya tvamādeśau staḥ'iti vidhānāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:236: tvadīyaṃ madīyaṃ tvatputro matputra itivat 'tvanmatpratyayagocarayoḥ'iti syāditi vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:243: na hyahaṅkārādyanātmano yūyamiti pratyayavipayatvamastīti cet na /
GSP33brssgo1u:249: yadyapyahaṅkārādirapi tadyogyastathāpi cidātmanaḥ sakāśādatyantabhedasiddhyarthaṃ yuṣmatpratyayayogya ityucyate // //
GSP33brssgo1u:252: tathā ca yuṣmajasmadoḥ svārthe prayujyamānayoreva tvamādeśaniyamo na lākṣaṇikayoḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:254: atra śabdalakṣakayoriva cinmātrajaḍamātralakṣakayorapi na tvamādeśo lakṣakatvāviśeṣāt iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:255: yadi tayoḥ śabdabodhakatve satyeva tvamādeśābhāva ityanena sūtreṇa jñāpitaṃ tadāsminbhāṣye yuṣmatpadena yuṣmacchabdajanyapratyayayogyaḥ parāgartho
GSP33brssgo1u:257: tathā ca lakṣyatāvacchedakatayā śabdo 'pi bodhyata iti na tvamādeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:262: ata evedamasmatpratyayagocarayoriti vaktavye 'pīdaṃśabdo 'smadarthe loke vede ca bahuśaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:265: ayamahamasmīti ca prayogadarśanānnāsmacchabdavirodhīti matvā yuṣmacchabdaḥ prayuktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:267: etena cetanavācitvādasmacchabdaḥ pūrvaṃ prayoktavyaḥ 'abhyarhitaṃ pūrva'iti nyāyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:268: 'tyadādīni sarvaurnityam'iti sūtreṇa vihita ekaśeṣaśca syāditi nirastam /
GSP33brssgo1u:271: vṛddhāstu 'yuṣmadarthādanātmano niṣkṛṣya śuddhasya ciddhātoropāpavādanyāyena grahaṇaṃ dyotayitumādau yuṣmadgrahaṇaṃ'ityāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:279: ahaṃ brahmeti vyavahāragocara iti tridhā virodhaḥ sphuṭīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:281: te eva pratyayau ca tau gocarau ceti yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarau,
GSP33brssgo1u:283: aikyāsaṃbhave 'pi śuklo ghaṭa itivattādātmayaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-viṣayaviṣayiṇoriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:286: te eva pratyayaśca gocaraśceti vā vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:287: atra pratyayagocarapadābhyāmātmanātmanoḥ pratyakparāgbhāve cidacittvaṃ heturuktastatra hetumāha-viṣayaviṣayiṇoriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:293: cidacittvena grāhyagrāhakatvena ca virodhāttamaḥprakāśavadaikyasya tādātmyasya vānupapattau satyāṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:296: itaratra dharmyantare itareṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvaḥ saṃsargastasyānupapattiritityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:297: na hi dharmiṇoḥ saṃsargaṃ vinā dharmāṇāṃ vinimayo asti /
GSP33brssgo1u:300: nanvātmānātmanostādātmyasya taddharmasaṃsargasya cābhāve 'pyadhyāsaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha--ityata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:301: ityuktarītyā tādātmyādyabhāvena tatpramāyā abhāvādataḥ pramājanyasaṃskārasyādhyāsahetorabhāvāt 'adhyāso mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ'ityanvayaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:307: ahamitipratyayayogyatvaṃ buddhyāderapyastīti matvā tata ātmānaṃ vivecayati--viṣayaṇīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:317: athavā yadātmano mukhyaṃ sarvāntaratvarūpaṃ pratyaktvaṃ pratītatvaṃ brahmāsmīti vyavahāragocaratvaṃ coktvaṃ tadasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:323: dvitīye tu pakṣe tadasiddhirityātmano mukhyaṃ pratyaktvādi yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:330: dehaṃ jānāmīti dehāhaṅkārayorviṣayaviṣayitve 'pi manuṣyo 'hamityabhedādhyāsavadātmāhaṅkārāyorapyabhedādhyāsaḥ syādityata āha--cidātmaka iti
GSP33brssgo1u:331: tayorjāḍyālpatvābhyāṃ sādṛśyādadhyāse 'pi cidātmanyanavacchinne jaḍālpāhaṅkārādernādhyāsa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:336: ato buddhyādeḥ pratibhāsataḥ pratyaktve 'pi parāktvādikaṃ mukhyameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:337: yuṣmatparāktaccāsau pratiyata iti pratyayaścāsau kartṛtvādivyavahāragocaraśca tasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:346: caitanyātmanā viṣayiṇastaddharmāṇāṃ ca yo 'haṅkārādau viṣaye 'dhyāsaḥ sa mithyeti nāstīti bhavituṃ yuktam,
GSP33brssgo1u:354: taduktaṃ ṭīkāyāṃ-'ānando viṣayānubhavo nityatvaṃ ceti santi dharmā apṛthaktve 'pi caitanyatvāt pṛthagivāvabhāsante'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:356: ahaṃ karomīti pratīterarthasya cādhyāsatvāyogātpramātvaṃ satyatvaṃ ca ahaṃ nara iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasya gauṇatvamiti matamāstheyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:357: tathā ca bandhasya satyatayā jñānānnivṛttirūpaphalāsaṃbhavādbaddhamuktayorjīvabrahmaṇoraikyāyogena viṣayāsaṃbhavāt śāstraṃ nārambhaṇīyamiti pūrvapakṣabhāṣyatātparyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:365: na cedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kartṛtvādau prameti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:368: na ca jyeṣṭhapratyakṣavirodhādāgamajñānasyaiva bādha iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:372: kiñca jyeṣṭhatvaṃ pūrvabhāvitvaṃ vā āgamajñānaṃ pratyupajīvyatvaṃ vā?
GSP33brssgo1u:378: yattu kṣaṇikayāgasya śrutibalātkālāntarabhāviphalahetutvavat 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ'iti śrutibalātsatyasyāpi jñānānnivṛttisaṃbhavādadhyāsavarṇanaṃ vyarthamiti, tanna /
GSP33brssgo1u:382: na ca setudarśanātsatyasya pāpasya nāśarśanānnāyogyatāniścayā iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:386: kiṃ ca jñānaikanivartyasya kiṃ nāma satyatvam,
GSP33brssgo1u:403: tayoratyantaṃ bhinnayoritaretarabhedāgraheṇānyonyasmin anyonyatādātmyaṃ anyonyadharmāṃśca vyatyāsenādhyasya lokavyavahāra iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:406: na ca dharmitādātmyādhyāse dharmādhyāsasiddheḥ 'dharmāṃśca'iti vyarthamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:409: satyamanidaṃ caitanyaṃ tasyānātmani saṃsargamātrādhyāso na svarūpasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:410: anṛtaṃyuṣmadarthaḥ tasya svarūpato 'pyadhyāsāttayormithunīkaraṇamadhyāsa iti na śūnyatetyarthaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:411: nanvadhyāsamithunīkaraṇalokavyavahāraśabdānāmekārthatve 'dhyasya midhunīkṛtyeti pūrvakālatvavāciktvāpratyayādeśasya lyapaḥ kathaṃ prayoga iti
GSP33brssgo1u:413: tatra pūrvapūrvādhyāsasyottarottarādhyāsaṃ prati saṃskāradvārā pūrvakālatvena hetutvadyotanārthaṃ lyapaḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:422: na ca pūrvapramājanya eva saṃskāro heturiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:426: mithyā ca tadajñānaṃ ca mithyājñānaṃ tannimittamupādānaṃ yasya sa tannimittaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:437: yadvā ajñānaṃ jñānābhāva iti śaṅkānirāsārthaṃ mithyāpadam /
GSP33brssgo1u:439: jñānenecchāprāgabhāvaḥ sākṣānnivartyata iti vadantaṃ prati mithyātve satītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:452: nanu dehātmanostādātmyameva saṃsarga iti tayoḥ ko bheda iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:456: evaṃ sāmagrīsattvādanubhavasattvādadhyāso 'stītyato brahmātmaikye virodhābhāvena viṣayaprayojanayoḥ sattvāt śāstramārambhaṇīyamiti siddhāntabhāṣyatātparyam
GSP33brssgo1u:457: evañca sūtreṇārthātsūcite viṣayaprayojane pratipādya taddhetumadhyāsaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃbhāvanāpramāṇaiḥ sādhayituṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchati--āheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:460: asya śāstrasya tattvanirṇayapradhānatvena vādakathātvadyotanārthaṃ āheti paroktiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:468: tathāhi avabhāsyata ityavabhāso rajatādyarthaḥ tasyāyogyamadhikaraṇaṃ paratrapadārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:474: pūrvaṃ svābhāvavati bhūtale paścādānīto ghaṭo bhātīti ghaṭe 'tivyāptinirāsāya svasaṃsṛjyamāna iti padam,
GSP33brssgo1u:475: tena svābhāvakāle pratiyogisaṃsargasya vidyamānatocyate iti nātivyāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:480: na ca smaryamāṇasatyarajatasyaiva paratra śuktāvavabhāsyatvenādhyastatvoktiriti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:482: smaryate iti smṛtiḥ satyarajatādiḥ tasya rūpamiva rūpamasyeti smṛtirūpaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:495: evaṃ ca doṣasaṃprayogasaṃskārabalācchuktyādau rajatamutapannamastīti paratrāvabhāsyatvalakṣamamupapannamiti smṛtirūpapūrvadṛṣṭapadābhyāmupapādim
GSP33brssgo1u:501: tathā ca pramāṇājanyajñānaviṣayatve sati pūrvadṛṣṭajātīyatvaṃ prātītikādhyāsalakṣaṇaṃ tābhyāmuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:503: tatra smaryamāṇagaṅgādau abhinavaghaṭe cātivyāptinirāsāya pramāṇetyādi padadvayamityāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:504: tatrārthādhyāse smaryamāṇasadṛśaḥ paratra pūrvadarśanādavabhāsyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:505: jñānādhyāse tu smṛtisadṛśaḥ paratra pūrvadarśanādavabhāsa iti vākyaṃ yojanīyamiti saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:507: 'pi paratra parāvabhāsa iti lakṣaṇe saṃvādyuktibhiḥ satyādhiṣṭhāne mithyārthāvabhāsasiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:508: sarvatantrasiddhānta idaṃ lakṣaṇamiti matvā anyathātmakhyātivādinormatamāha-taṃ keciditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:509: kecidanyathākhyātivādino 'nyatra śuktyādāvanyadharmasya svāvayavadharmasya deśāntarastharūpyāderadhyāsa iti vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:513: yatra yasyādhyāso lokasiddhastayorarthayostaddhiyośca bhedāgrahe sati tanmūlo bhramaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:518: tasyaivādhiṣṭhānasya śuktyāderviparītadharmatvakalpanāṃ viparīto viruddho dharmo yasya tadbhāvastasya rajatāderatyantāsataḥ kalpanāmācakṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:521: śuktāvaparokṣasya rajatasya deśāntare buddhau vā sattvāyogāt śūnyatve pratyakṣatvāyogāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:533: yatrāparokṣādhyāsādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ tatrendriyasaṃyuktatvaṃ viṣayatvaṃ ceti vyāptiḥ śuktyādau dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo1u:535: pratīci pūrṇa indriyāgrāhye viṣayasyāhaṅkārādestaddharmāṇāṃ cādhyāsaḥ kathamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:539: idaṃpratyayānarhasya pratyagātmano 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate'ityādi śrutimanusṛtya tvamaviṣayatvaṃ bravīṣi /
GSP33brssgo1u:550: asmadarthacidātmā pratibimbitatyena yatra pratīyate so 'smatpratyayo 'haṅkārastatra bhāsamānatvāditi vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:551: na cādhyāse sati bhāsamānatvaṃ tasminsati sa iti parasparāśraya iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:564: bālā avivekinaḥ talamindranīlakaṭāhakalpaṃ nabho malinaṃ pitamityevamaparokṣamadhyasyanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:570: nanu brahmajñānanāśyatvena sūtritāmavidyāṃ hitvā adhyāsaḥ kimiti varṇyata ityata āha-tametamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:574: tathāpi kāraṇāvidyāṃ tyaktvā kāryāvidyā kimiti varṇyate tatrāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:576: mūlāvidyayāḥ saṣuptāvanarthatvādarśanāt kāryātmanā tasyā anarthatvajñāpanārthaṃ tadvarṇanamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:579: taṃ varṇitamevaṃ sākṣipratyakṣasidhyaṃ puraskṛtya hetuṃ kṛtvā laukikaḥ karmaśāstrīyo mokṣaśāstrīyaśceti trividho vyavahāraḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:582: evaṃ vyavahārahetutvenādhyāse pratyakṣasiddhe 'pi pramāṇāntaraṃ pṛcchati--kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:583: avidyāvānahamityadhyāsavānātmā pramātā sa viṣaya āśrayo yeṣāṃ tāni avidyāvadviṣayāṇīti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:585: yadyapi pratyakṣaṃ tathāpi punarapi kathaṃ kenapramāṇenāvidyāvadviṣayatvamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:596: anena liṅgena kāraṇatayādhyāsaḥ sidhyati vyavahārarūpakāryānupapatyā veti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:597: nanu manuṣyatvādijātimati dehe 'hamityābhimānamātrādvyavahāraḥ sidhyatu kimindriyādiṣu mamābhimānenetyāśaṅkyāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:600: tathā ca pratyakṣaliṅgādiprayukto yo vyavahāro draṣṭā anumātā śrotāhamityādirūpaḥ sa indriyādīni mamatāspadānyagṛhītvā na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:601: yadvā tāni mamatvenānupādāyayo vyavahāraḥ sa neti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:602: pūrvatrānupādānāsaṃbhavakriyayoreko vyavahāraḥ kartā iti ktvāpratyayaḥ sādhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:605: indriyādiṣu mametyadhyāsabhāve 'ndhāderiva draṣṭṛtvādivyavahāro na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:609: nanvastvātmanā saṃyuktaṃ śarīraṃ teṣāmāśrayaḥ kimadhyāsenetyatrāha-na cānadhyastātmabhāveneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:612: ādhyāsika eva dehātmanoḥ saṃbandho na saṃyogādiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:615: na ca suṣuptau pramātṛtvāpattiḥ karaṇoparamāditi tatrāha-na caitasminniti /
GSP33brssgo1u:617: pramā yadi nityacinmātraṃ tarhyāśrayatvāyogaḥ karaṇavaiyarthyaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:622: tadāśrayatvamasaṅgasyātmano vṛttimanmanastādātmyādhyāsaṃ vinā na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:625: tarhyātmanaḥ pramātṛtvaṃ māstu iti vadantaṃ pratyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:638: kiṃ vidvattvaṃ brahmāsmīti sākṣātkāraḥ uta yauktikamātmānātmabhedajñānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:639: ādye bādhitādhyāsānuvṛttyā vyavahāra ithi samanvayasūtre vakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:641: vivekināmapi vyavahārakāle paśvādibhiraviśeṣāt adhyāsavattvena tulyatvādvyavahāro 'dhyāsakārya iti yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:644: tatra saṃgrahavākyaṃ vyākurvan dṛṣṭānte hetuṃ sphuṭayati-yathāhīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:660: nāpi pareṣāmetatpratyatraṃ ataḥ sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭānta iti netyāha-paśvādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:665: taiḥ paścādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ vyavahāravattvaṃ tasya darśanādvivekināmapyayaṃ vyavahāraḥ samāna iti niścīyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:668: tasyādhyāsasya kāla eva kālo yasya sa tatkālaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:674: tarhi kathaṃ vaidikakarmaṇo 'dhyāsajanyatvasiddhirityāśaṅkya kiṃ tatra dehānyātmadhīmātramapekṣitamuta,
GSP33brssgo1u:678: kṣutpipāsādigrasto jātiviśeṣavānahaṃ saṃsārīti jñānaṃ karmaṇyapekṣitaṃ na tadviparītātmatattvajñānaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:683: 'brāhmaṇo yajeta''na ha vai snātvā bhikṣeta''aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhyaṇamupanayīta' 'kṛṣṇakeśo
GSP33brssgo1u:685: evamadhyāse pramāṇasiddhe 'pi kasya kutrādhyāsa iti jijñāsāyāṃ tamudāhartuṃ lakṣaṇaṃ smārayati-adhyaso nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:687: tallakṣaṇaṃ yathā spaṣṭaṃ bhavati tathodāhriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:693: kṛśatvādidharmavato dehāderātmani tādātmyena kalpitatvāttaddharmāḥ sākṣādātmanyadhyastā iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:717: taduktaṃ bhagavadgītāsu-'na rūpamasyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādirna ca saṃpratiṣṭhā'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:719: mithyā māyā tayā pratīyata iti pratyayaḥ kāryaprapañcaḥ tatpratītiścetyevaṃsvarūpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:725: kartṛtvādyanarthahetoradhyāsasya samūlasyātyantikanāśo mokṣaḥ sa kenetyata āha-ātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:731: arthāttadvicārātmakaśāstrasyāpi te eva viṣayaprayojane iti jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:732: nanu vedānteṣu prāṇādyupāstīnāṃ bhānādātmaikyameva teṣāmartha iti kathamityata āha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:735: tannivāsī śārīrako jīvastasya brahmatvavicāro mīmāṃsā tasyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:742: avagatārthā eva vedāntā ityavyavahitaviṣayābhāvānnārambha iti prāpte brūte-vedānteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:744: yadi vidhireva vedārthaḥ syāttadā sarvajño bādarāyaṇo brahmajijñāsāṃ na brūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:746: ato brahmaṇo jijñāsyatvoktyā kenāpi tantreṇānavagatabrahmaparavedāntavicāra ārambhaṇīya iti sūtrakṛddarśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:751: śāstrārambhasaṃdehe sati athaśabdasyānantaryārthakatvoktyā adhikāriṇaṃ sādhayati-tatrāthaśabda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:755: sūtre yathā athaśabda ārambhārthakaḥ yogaśāstramārabhyata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:756: tadvadatra kiṃ na syādityata āha-nādhikārārtha iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:758: ādye 'thaśabdasyārambhārthatve brahmajñānecchārabhyata iti sūtrārthaḥ syāt sa cāsaṃgataḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:760: nahi pratyathikaraṇaṃ icchā kriyate kintu tayā vicāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:765: vākyārtho vicārakartavyatā na hi tatra maṅgalasya kartṛtvādinānvayo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:766: nanu sūtrakṛtā śāstrādau maṅgalaṃ kāryamityathaśabdaḥ pratyukta iti cet satyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:767: na tasyārtho maṅgalaṃ kintu ca tacchravaṇamuccāraṇaṃ ca maṅgalakṛtyaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:775: atha mataṃ prapañcaḥ satya ityatra pūrvaprakṛtārthāduttarārthasyārthāstaratvārtho 'thaśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:778: brahmajijñāsāyāḥ pūrvaṃ arthaviśeṣaḥ prakṛto nāsti yasmāttasyā arthāntaratvamathaśabdenocyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:781: yadi phalasya jijñāsāpadoktakartavyavicārasya hetutvena yatpūrvaṃ prakṛtaṃ tadapekṣāstītyapekṣābalātprakṛtahetumākṣipya tator'thāntaratvamucyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:789: tasminnukte satyarthāntaratvaṃ na vācyaṃ jñānatvādvaiphalyācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:790: phalasya vicārasya pūrvaprakṛtahetvapekṣāyā balādyadarthāntaratvaṃ tasyānantāryabhedāt na pṛthagathaśabdārthatvamityadhyāhṛtya bhāṣyaṃ yojanīyam
GSP33brssgo1u:791: yadvā pūrvaprakṛter'the 'pekṣā yasyā arthāntaratāyāstasyāḥ phalaṃ jñānaṃ taddvārānantaryāvyatirekāttajjñāne tasyāḥ jñānatonatarbhāvānnāthaśabdārthatetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:793: yanniyamena pūrvavṛttaṃ pūrvabhāvi asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ puṣkalākāraṇamiti yāvat,
GSP33brssgo1u:795: nanvastu dharmavicāra iva brahmavicāre 'pi vedādhyayanaṃ puṣkalakāraṇamityāha-svādhyāyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:797: nanu saṃyogapṛthaktvanyāyena 'yajñena dānena'ityādiśrutyā 'yajñādikarmāṇi jñānāya vidhīyante'iti sarvāpekṣādhikaraṇe vakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:798: tathā ca pūrvatantreṇa tadavabodhaḥ puṣkalakāraṇamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:801: tadarthastu-ekasya karmaṇa ubhayārthatve 'nekaphalasaṃbandhe saṃyogaḥ ubhayasaṃbandhabodhakaṃ vākyaṃ tasya pṛthaktvaṃ bhedaḥ sa hetuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:802: tataśacātrāpi jyotiṣṭomādikarmaṇāṃ svargādiphalakālāmapi 'yajñena dānena'ityādi vacanāt jñānārthatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:804: ayamāśayaḥ--na tāvat pūrvatantrasthaṃ nyāyasahasraṃ brahmajñāne tadvicāre vā puṣkalaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:819: avadānānāmānantaryaniyamaḥ kramo yathāthaśabdārthastasya vivakṣitatvāt na tatheha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:828: yathā apāṃ praṇayanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsāṅgamāśritya 'godohanena paśukāmasya'iti vihitasya godohanasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:829: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta'iti darśātyuttarakāle vihitasya somayāgasya darśādyadhikṛtādhikāratvaṃ teṣāmekakartṛkatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:830: tataścaikaprayogavacanagṛhītānāṃ teṣāṃ yugapadanuṣṭhānasaṃbhavāt kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyādibhirhi kramo bodhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:832: nanu 'brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gahī bhavet gṛhādvanī bhūtvā pravrajecca'iti śrutyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:839: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi janmāntarakṛtakarmabhiḥ śuddhaṃ cittaṃ tadā brahmacaryādeva saṃnyasyabrahma jijñāsitavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:840: yadā na śuddhamiti rāgeṇa jñāyate tadā gṛhī bhavet,
GSP33brssgo1u:850: dvādaśādhyāyānāṃ caikadharmajijñāsyakānāṃ kramavattayoḥ kramo vivakṣita iti kramārtho 'thaśabda ityaśaṅkyāha-phaleti /
GSP33brssgo1u:853: yathā vā kāmacikitsātantrayorjijñāsyabhedānna kramāpekṣā tadvanmīmāṃsayorna kramāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:855: viṣayābhimukhyenodetītyabhyudayo viṣayādhīnaṃ sukhaṃ svargādikaṃ tacca dharmajñānahetormīmāṃsayāḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:856: na kevalaṃ phalasya svarūpato bhedaḥ kintu hetuto 'pītyāha-tacceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:859: brahmajñānaṃ ca svotpattivyatiriktamanuṣṭhānaṃ nāpekṣata ityāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:860: svarūpato hetutaśca phalabhedānna samuccaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:880: lakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādivākyaṃ hi svaviṣaye dharme yāgādikaraṇasvargādiphalakabhāvanārūpe
GSP33brssgo1u:881: phalahetuyāgādigocaraniyoge vā hitasādhane yāgādau vā puruṣaṃ pravartayadevāvabodhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:882: 'ayamātmā brahma'ityādi tvamarthaṃ kevalamaprapañcaṃ brahma bodhayatveva na pravartayati viṣayābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:884: brahmacodanayā puruṣo 'vabodhe na pravartata ityatra hetuṃ pūrvavākyenāha-avabodhasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:885: svajanyajñāne svayaṃ pramāṇaṃ na pravartakamityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:893: evamathaśabdasyārthāntarāsaṃbhavāt ānantaryavācitve sati tadavadhitvena puṣkalakāraṇaṃ vaktavyamityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:898: laukikavyāpārāt manasa uparamaḥ śamaḥ bāhyakaraṇānāmuparamo damaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:909: 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtam'ityādiśrutyā karmaphalasya nityatvena tato vairāgyasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:912: tato mumukṣāsaṃbhava ityākṣepaparihārārtho 'taḥśabdaḥ taṃ vyācaṣṭe-ataḥśabda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:917: tasmāt 'ato 'nyadārtam'iti śrutyā anātmamātrasyānityatvavivekāt vairāgyalābha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:923: sutravākyapūraṇārthamadhyāhṛtakartavyapadānvayārthaṃ brahmajijñāsāpadena vicāraṃ lakṣayituṃ tasya svābhimatasamāsakathanenāvayavārthaṃ darśayati-bahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:924: nanu dharmāya jijñāsā itivat brahmaṇe jijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:930: yathā svargasyecchā ityukte svargasya phalatvaṃ labhate tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:931: ata eva 'dharmajijñāsā'ityatrāpi 'sā hi tasya jñātumicchā'iti icchāṃ gṛhītvā ṣaṣṭhīsamāso darśitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:932: vicāralakṣaṇāyāṃ tu vicārasya kleśātmakatayā prathamaṃ phalākāṅkṣatvāt dharmāya jijñāse caturthasamāsa uktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:933: tathā vṛttikārairbrahmaṇe jijñāsā ityuktaṃ cedastu jñānatvena brahmaṇaḥ phalatvāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:935: nanu 'brahmakṣatramidaṃ brahma āyāti brahma svayambhūrbrahma prajāpatiḥ'iti śrutiṣu loke ca brāhmaṇatvajātau jīve vede kamalāsane ca brahmaśabdaḥ prayujyata ityāśaṅkāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:942: icchāyā viṣayajñānajanyatvācca prathamāpekṣitaṃ karmaiva ṣaṣṭhyā vācyaṃ na śeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:943: nanu pramāṇādikamanyadeva tatkarmāstu brahma tu śeṣitayā saṃbadhyatāṃ tatrāha-jijñāsyāntareti /
GSP33brssgo1u:944: śrutaṃ karma tyaktvānyadaśrutaṃ kalpayan 'piṇḍamutsṛjya karaṃ leḍhi'iti nyāyamanusaratīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:947: ṣaṣṭhyā saṃvandhamātraṃ pratītamapi viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ sakarmakakriyāsaṃnidhānāt karmatve paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:950: kṛdantasya yoge vihitaṃ prathamāpekṣitaṃ ca karmatvaṃ tyaktvā parokṣamaśābdaṃ kalpayata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:953: tatra yāni brahmāśritāni lakṣaṇapramāṇayuktijñānasādhanaphalāni teṣāmapi vicāraḥ pratijñāto bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:955: karmaṇiṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu brahmakarmaka eva vicāraḥ pratijñāto bhavatītyabhisaṃdhinā śeṣaṣaṣṭhītyucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:957: brahmatatsaṃbandhināṃ sarveṣāṃ vicārapratijñānamarthaḥ phalaṃ yasya tattvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:959: sūtreṇa mukhataḥ pradhānasya brahmaṇo vicāre pratijñāte sati tadupakaraṇānāṃ vicārasyārthikapratijñāyā uditatvādityāha siddhāntī-na pradhāneti
GSP33brssgo1u:964: nanvanavagate vastunīcchāyā adarśanāt tasyā mūlaṃ viṣayajñānaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:969: mūlaṃ tvāpātajñānamityadhunā vakṣyata iti phalamūlajñānayorbhedānna jijñāsānupapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:971: tatprāptiḥ phalamiti bhedāt karma eva phalamityuktaṃ tatrāha-phaleti /
GSP33brssgo1u:972: kriyāntare tayorbhede 'pi icchāyāḥ phalaviṣayatvāt karmaiva phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:974: jñānaṃ vṛttiḥ avagatistatphalaṃ iti bheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:981: athātaśabdābhyāmadhikāriṇaḥ sādhitattvāttena brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya ityarthaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:987: athajñātaṃ kenāpi tarhi taduddeśena vicāraḥ kartuṃ na śakyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:989: tathā ca buddhāvanārūḍhasya vicārātmakaśāstreṇa vedānteśca pratipādanāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:990: tatpratipādyatvarūpaḥ saṃbandho nāstīti jñānānutpatteḥ phalamapi nāstītyanārabhyaṃ śāstramityarthaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:995: na ca 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'iti śrutyā seti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:996: brahmapadasya loke saṃgatigrahābhāvena tadghaṭitavākyasyābodhakatvādityāśaṅkyabrahmapadavyutpatyā prathamaṃ tasya nirguṇasya saguṇasya ca prasiddhirityāha-brahmaśabdasya hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:997: asyārthaḥ-śrutau sūtre ca brahmapadasya prayogānyathānupapattyā kaścidartho 'stīti jñāyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:1003: niravadhikamahatvaṃ cāntavattvādidoṣavatve sarvajñatvādiguṇahīnatve ca na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:1005: ato bṛṃhaṇādbrahmeti vyutpatyā deśakālavastutaḥ paricchedābhāvarūpaṃ nityatvaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1011: jñeyasya kāryasya vā pariśeṣe 'lpatvaprasaṅgena sarvajñatvasya sarvakāryaśaktimattvasya ca lābhāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1015: ahamasmīti na pratyetīti na kintu pratyetyeva /
GSP33brssgo1u:1018: ātmanaḥ śūnyasya pratītau ahaṃ nāsmīti loko jānīyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1024: yathā idaṃ rajatamiti vastutaḥ śuktiprasiddhistadvat ahamasmīti sattvacaitanyarūpatvasāmānyena
GSP33brssgo1u:1025: vastuto brahmaṇaḥ prasiddhiḥ neyaṃ pūrṇānandabrahmatvarūpaviśeṣagocarā vādināṃ vivādābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1026: na hi śuktitvaviśeṣadarśane sati rajataṃ raṅgamanyadveti vipratipattirasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1027: ato vipratipattyanyathānupapatyā sāmānyataḥ prasiddhāvapi viśeṣasyājñātatvādviṣayādisiddhiriti siddhāntayati na ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1028: sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ svatmani saccitpūrṇādipadavācyabhedāt kalpita iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1033: kimātmā dehādirūpaḥ uta tadbhinna iti vipratipattikoṭitvena dehendriyamanobuddhiśūnyānyuktva
GSP33brssgo1u:1035: na veti vivādakoṭitvena yogimatamāha-asti tadvyatirikta īśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1036: niratiśayatvaṃ gṛhītvā īśvaraḥ sarvajñatvādisaṃpanna iti yogino vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1038: bhokturjīvasyākartuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ sa īśvara ātmāsvarūpamiti vedāntino vadantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1040: vipratipattīnāṃ prapañco nirāsaśca vivaraṇopanyāsena darśitaḥ sukhabodhāyetīhoparamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1041: tatra yuktivākyāśrayaḥ siddhāntinaḥ jīvo brahmaiva ātmatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1057: nanu santu vipratipattayastathāpi yasya yanmate śraddhā tadāśrayaṇāttasyasvārthaḥ setsyati kiṃ brahmavicārārambheṇetyata āha-tatrāvicāryeti
GSP33brssgo1u:1063: ki tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ caureṇātmāpahāriṇā //
GSP33brssgo1u:1065: ataḥ sarveṣāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ niśreyasaphalāya vedāntavicāraḥ kartavya itisūtrārthamupasaṃharati-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1068: vedāntāvirodhino ye tarkāstantrāntarasthāstānyupakaraṇāni yasyāḥ sā niśreyasāyārabhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1069: nanu sūtre vicāravācipadābhāvāttadārambhaḥ kathaṃ sūtrārtha ityata āha-brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1070: brahmajñānecchoktidvārā vicāraṃ lakṣayitvā tatkartavyatāṃ bravītīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1073: nanvidaṃ sūtraṃ śāstrādbahiḥ sthitvā śāstramārambhayati antarbhūtvā vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1080: ucyate-śravaṇavidhinā ārabdamidaṃ śāstraṃ śāstrāntargatameva śāstrārambhaṃ pratipādayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1097: yata iti kāraṇanirdeśaḥ asya jagato nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasyānekakartṛbhoktṛsaṃyuktasya
GSP33brssgo1u:1100: anyeṣāmapi bhāvavikārāṇāṃ triṣvevāntarbhāva iti janmasthitināśānāmiha grahaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1101: yāskaparipaṭhitānāṃ tu 'jāyate 'sti' ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe teṣāṃ jagataḥ sthitkāle saṃbhāvyamānatvānmūlakāraṇādutpattisthitināśāṃ jagato na gṛhītāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:1102: tanmā śaṅkīti yotpattirbrahmastatraiva sthitiḥ pralayaśca ta eva gṛhyante //
GSP33brssgo1u:1103: na yathoktaviśeṣaṇasya jagato yathoktaviśeṣaṇamīśvaraṃ muktvānyataḥ pradhānādacetanādaṇubhyo 'bhāvātsaṃsāriṇo vā utpattyādi saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyam
GSP33brssgo1u:1111: satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣu jagato janmādikāraṇavādiṣu tadarthagrahaṇadārḍhāyānumānamapi vedāntavākyāvirodhi pramāṇaṃ bhavanna nivāryate,
GSP33brssgo1u:1116: na dharmajijñāsāyāmiva śrutyādayo 'nubhavādayaśca yathāsaṃbhavamiha pramāṇaṃ anubhavāvasānatvādbhūtavastuviṣayatvācca brahmajñānasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:1117: kartavye hi viṣaye nānubhavāpekṣāstīti śrutyādīnāmeva prāmāṇyaṃ syātpuruṣādhīnātmalābhatvācca kartavyasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:1118: kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śakyaṃ laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca karma,
GSP33brssgo1u:1127: natu vastvevaṃ naivamasti nāstīti vā vikalpyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1131: nahi sthāṇāvekasmisthāṇurvā puruṣo 'nyo veti tattvajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1138: nanu bhūtavastutve brahmaṇaḥ pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvameveti vedāntavākyavicāraṇānarthikaiva prāptā / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:1144: kāryamātrameva tu gṛhyamāṇaṃ kiṃ brahmaṇā saṃbaddhaṃ kimanyena kenacidvā saṃbaddhamiti na śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1157: tasya ca nirṇayavākyam- 'ānandāddhyeva khalvimāni bhūtāni jāyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:1161: FN: 'idaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiñca' iti pratyakṣam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1162: prathamasūtreṇa śāstrārambhamupapādya śāstramārabhamāṇaḥ pūrvottarādhikaraṇayoḥ saṃgatiṃ vaktuṃ vṛttaṃ kīrtayati-brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1164: brahmaṇo vicāryatvoktvā arthāt pramāṇādi vicārāṇāṃ pratijñātatve 'pi brahmapramāṇaṃ vinā kartumaśakyatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1170: lakṣaṇadyotivedāntānāṃ spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ lakṣye brahmaṇi samanvayokteḥ śrutiśāstrādhyāyapādasaṃgatayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1171: tathā hi-'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante'ityādi vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1172: tatkiṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ na veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1173: tatra pūrvapakṣe brahmasvarūpasiddhyā muktyasiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1174: yadyapyākṣepasaṃgatau pūrvādhikaraṇaphalameva phalamiti kṛtvā pṛthaṅna vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1175: taduktam-'ākṣepe cāpavāde ca prāsyāṃ lakṣaṇa karmaṇi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1176: prayojanaṃ na vaktavyaṃ yacca kṛtvā pravartate'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1178: yatra pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntena parvapakṣaḥ tatrāpavādikī saṃgatiḥ prāptistadarthā cintā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1181: na ca jagadupādānatve sati kartṛtvaṃ lakṣaṇamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1183: na ca śrautasya brahmaṇaḥ śrutyaiva lakṣaṇasiddheḥ kimanumāneneti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1184: anumānasya śrutyanugrāhakatvena tadabhāve tadvirodhe vā śrutyarthāsiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1185: na ca jagatkartṛtvamupādānatvaṃ vā pratyekaṃ lakṣaṇamastviti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1191: atra adyapi jagajjanmasthitilayakāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyate tathāpyagre 'prakṛtiśca'-ityadhikaraṇe
GSP33brssgo1u:1192: tatkāraṇatvaṃ na kartṛtvamātraṃ kintu kartṛtvopādānatvobhayarūpatvamiti vakṣyamāṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1194: nanu jijñāsyanirguṇabrahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ kathaṃ lakṣaṇamiti ucyate-yathā rajataṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1195: śukterlakṣaṇaṃ yadrajataṃ sā śuktiriti tathā yajjagatkāraṇaṃ tadbrahmeti kalpitaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1199: yathā citragordevadattasya citrā gāvaḥ tadvadatrāpi janmādīti napuṃsakaikavacanadyotitasya samāhārasya janmasthitibhaṅgasya janma viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1200: tathā ca janmanaḥ samāsārthaikadeśasya guṇatvena saṃvijñānaṃ yasmin bahuvrīhau sa tadguṇasaṃvijñāna ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1203: ato janmasthitibhaṅgairnirūpitāni trīṇi kāraṇatvāni militānyeva lakṣaṇamiti matvā sūtre samāhāro dyotita iti dhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1206: mūlaśrutyā vastugatyā cāditvaṃ jñātvā tadapekṣya sūtrakṛtā janmana ādityamuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1208: viyadādijagato nityatvāt na janmādisaṃbandha ityata āhaḥ-ṣaṣṭhīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1210: nanu jagato janmādervā brahmasaṃbandhābhāvānna lakṣaṇatvamityāśaṅkya tatkāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇamiti pañcamyarthamāha-yata itīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1211: yacchabdena satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ ānandarūpaṃ vastūcyate 'ānandāddhyeva'iti nirṇītatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1215: yathā kumbhakāraḥ prathamaṃ kumbhaśabdābhedenāvikalpitaṃ pṛthubudhnodarākārasvarūpaṃ buddhāvālikhya tadātmanā kumbhaṃ vyākaroti-bahiḥ prakaṭayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:1216: tathā paramakāraṇamapi svetsitanāmarūpātmanā vyākarotītyanumīyata iti matvāha-nāmarūpābhyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1223: 'yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvam'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti“iti śrutyā sthūlasūkṣmadehopādhidvārā jīvānāṃ kāryatvena jaganmadhyapātitvānna jagatkāraṇatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:1225: pratiniyatāni vyavasthitāni deśakālanimittāni yeṣāṃ kriyāphalānāṃ tadāśrayasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1229: tathā ca yathā sevāphalaṃ deśādyabhijñadātṛkaṃ tathā karmaphalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1232: nanvanyepi vṛddhipariṇāmadayo bhāvavikārāḥ santīti kimiti janmādityāditipadena na gṛhyante tatrāha-anyeṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1239: vinaśyati'iti yāskamunivākyaṃ etatsūtramūlaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-yāsketi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1240: yāskamuniḥ kila mahābhūtānāmutpannānāṃ sthitikāle bhautikeṣu pratyakṣeṇa janmādiṣaṭkamupalabhya niruktavākyaṃ cakāra /
GSP33brssgo1u:1241: tanmūlīkṛtya janmādiṣaṭkakāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sūtrārtha iti grahaṇe sūtrakṛtā brahmalakṣaṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1242: na saṃgṛhītaṃ kintu mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇamuktamiti śaṅkā syāt sā mā bhūtiti ye śrutyuktā
GSP33brssgo1u:1244: yadi niruktasyāpi śrutirmūlamiti mahābhūtajanmādijanmādikamarthastarhi sā śrutireva sūtrasya mūlamastu,
GSP33brssgo1u:1246: yadi jagato brahmātiriktaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt tadā brahmalakṣaṇasya tatrātivyāptyādidoṣaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1247: atastannirāsāya lakṣaṇasūtreṇa brahma vinā jagajjanmādikaṃ na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:1251: nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtatyetyādināṃ ca caturṇāṃ jagadviśeṣaṇānāṃ vyākhyānāvasare pradhānaśūnyayoḥ saṃsāriṇaśca nirāso darśitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1255: svabhāvādeva vicitraṃ jagaditi lokāyatastaṃ pratyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1257: kiṃ svayameva svasya heturiti svabhāva uta kāraṇānapekṣatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1261: teṣāṃ kāryārthibhirupādīyamānatvāt kāryasya kāraṇānapekṣatvaṃ na yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1262: anepekṣatve dhānyārthināṃ bhūviśeṣe varṣādikāle bījādinimitte ca pravṛttirna syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1263: pūrvoktasarvajñatvādiviśeṣaṇakamīśvaraṃ muktvā jagata utpatyādikaṃ na saṃbhavatīti bhāṣyeṇa kartāraṃ vinā kāryaṃ nāstīti vyatireka uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1265: etadeva vyāptijñānaṃ jagati pakṣe kartāraṃ sādhayat sarvajñeśvaraṃ sādhayati kiṃ śrutyeti tārkikāṇāṃ bhrāntimupanyasyati-etadeveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1266: etadevānumānameva sādhanaṃ na śrutiriti manyanta iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1267: athavā etadvyāptijñānameva śrutyanugrāhakayuktimātratvenāsmatsaṃmataṃ sadanumānaṃ svatantramiti manyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1276: tathāhi-aṅkurādau tāvajjīvaḥ kartā na bhavati jīvādbhinnasya ghaṭavadacetanatvaniyamādanyaḥ kartā nāstyeveti vyatirekaniścayāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1284: yadi śrutīnāṃ svatantramānatvaṃ na syāttarhi 'tattu samanvayāt'ityādinā tāsāṃ tātparyaṃ sūtrakṛnna vicārayet,
GSP33brssgo1u:1285: tasmāduttarasūtrāṇāṃ śrutivicārārthatvāt janmādisūtre 'pi śrutireva svātantryeṇa vicāryate nānumānamiti pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1290: vākyasya tadarthasyaca vicārādyadhyavasānaṃ tātparyaniścayaḥ prameyasaṃbhavaniścayaśca tena jātā brahmāvagatirmuktaye bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1300: yathā kaścit gandhāradeśebhyaścorairanyatrāraṇye baddhanetra eva tyaktaḥ kenacinmuktabandhastaduktamārgagrahaṇasamarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:1301: paṇḍitaḥ svayaṃ tarkakuśalo medhāvī svadeśāneva prāpnuyāt evamevehāvidyākāmādibhiḥsvarūpānandātprācyāvyāsminnaraṇye
GSP33brssgo1u:1302: saṃsāre kṣiptaḥ kenaciddayāparavaśenācāryeṇa nāsi tvaṃ saṃsārī kintu 'tatvamasi'ityupadiṣṭasvarūpaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:1309: jijñāsye dharma iva jijñāsye brahmaṇīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1313: muktyarthaṃ brahmajñānasya śābdasya sākṣātkārāvasānatvāpekṣaṇāt pratyagbhūtasiddhabrahmagocaratvena sākṣātkāraphalakatvasaṃbhavāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1315: dharme tu nityaparokṣe sādhye sākṣātkārasyānapekṣitatvādasaṃbhavācca śrutyā nirṇayamātramanuṣṭhānāyāpekṣitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1316: liṅgādayastu śrutyantararbhūtā eva śrutirdvārā nirṇayopayogitvenāpekṣyante na mananādayaḥ anupayogādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1322: yathā aindrāgnyādaya iṣṭayo daśa krameṇa paṭhitāḥ daśamantrāśca 'indrāgnī rocanā divi'ityādyāḥ tatra prathameṣṭhau prathamamantrasya viniyoga ityādyūhanīyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1324: yathādhvaryavasaṃjñakānāṃ mantrāṇāmādhvaryavasaṃjñake karmaṇi viniyoga iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1330: tatra yadi vedārthatvamātreṇa brahmaṇo dharmeṇa sāmyaṃ tvayocyeta tarhi kṛtisādhyatvaṃ vidhiniṣedhavikalpotsargāpavādāśca brahmaṇi dharmavat syuriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1332: puruṣakṛtyadhīnā ātmalābha utpattiryasya tadbhāvācca dharme śrutyādīnāmeva prāmāṇyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1337: tadvaddharmasya kartumakartuṃ śakyatvamuktvā anyathākartuṃ śakyatvamāha-udita iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1339: vidhipratiṣedhāśca vikalpādayaśca dharme sādhye yer'thavantaḥ sāvakāśa bhavanti te brahmaṇyapi syurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1354: nanu vastunyapi ātmādau vādināmasti nāstītyādivikalpā dṛśyante tatrāha-vikalpanāstviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1355: astitvādikoṭismaraṇaṃ puruṣabuddhistanmūlā manaḥspanditamātrāḥ saṃśayaviparyayavikalpā na pramārūpā ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1356: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-dharmo hi yathā yathā jñāyate tathā tathā kartuṃ śakyate iti yathāśāstraṃ puruṣabuddhyapekṣā vikalpāḥ sarve pramārūpā eva bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:1357: tatsāmyena brahmaṇyapi sarve vikalpā yathārthāḥ syuriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1359: yadi siddhavastujñānamapi sādhyajñānavatpuruṣabuddhimapekṣya jāyeta tadā siddhe vikalpā yathārthāḥ syuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1360: na siddhavastujñānaṃ pauruṣaṃ kiṃ tarhi pramāṇavastujanyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1361: tathā ca vastuna ekarūpatvādekameva jñānaṃ pramā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1364: sthāṇurevetyavadhāraṇe siddhe sarvevikalpā yathārthā na bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1370: siddher'the jñānapramātvasya vastvadhīnatve sati brahmajñānamapi vastujanyameva yathārthaṃ na puruṣatantraṃ bhūtārthaviṣatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1372: ataḥ sādhyer'the sarve vikalpāḥ puntantrā na siddher'the iti vailakṣaṇyāt na dharmasāmyaṃ brāhmaṇa iti mananādyapekṣā siddheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1379: siddhārthe tasyā amānatvena tadvicārasya niṣphalatvāditi śaṅkate-nānviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1380: pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvameva prāptamiti kṛtvā pramāṇāntarasyaiva vicāraprāptāviti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1382: kiṃ yatkāryaṃ tadbrahmajamityanumānaṃ brahmasādhakaṃ kiṃ vā yatkāryaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1388: indriyāgrāhyatve 'pi vyāptigrahaḥ kiṃ na syādataāha-sati hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1390: idaṃ kāryaṃ brahmajamiti vyāptipratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇo 'tīndriyatvānna saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1391: dvitīye kāraṇasiddhāvapi kāraṇasya brahmatvaṃ śrutiṃ vinā jñātumaśakyamityāha--kāryamātramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1392: saṃbandhaṃ kṛtaṃ yasmāt śrutimantareṇa jagatkāraṇaṃ brahmeti niścayālābhastasmāt tallābhāya śrutireva prādhānyena vicāraṇīyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1393: anumānaṃ tūpādānatvādisāmānyadvārā mṛdādivat brāhmaṇaḥ svakāryātmakatvādiśrautārthasaṃbhāvanārthaṃ guṇatayā vicāryamityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi
GSP33brssgo1u:1395: iha brahmaṇi lakṣaṇārthatvena vicārayitumiṣṭaṃ vākyaṃ kimityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1396: atra hi prathamasūtre viśiṣṭādhikāriṇo brahmavicāraṃ pratijñāya brahmajñātukāmāsya dvitīyasūtre lakṣaṇamucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1397: tathaiva śrutāvapi mumukṣorbrahmajñātukāmasya jagatkāraṇatvopalakṣaṇānuvādena brahma jñāpyata iti śrautārthakramānusāritvaṃ sūtrasya darśayituṃ sopakramaṃvākyaṃ paṭhati-bhṛguriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1402: yadekaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadbrahmeti vā yatkāraṇaṃ tadekaṃ bahmeti vā mahāvākyamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1403: kiṃ tarhi svarūpalakṣaṇamityāśaṅkya vākyaśeṣānnirṇito yataḥśabdārthaḥ satyajñānānanda ityāha--tasya ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1404: 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ' 'tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma'ityādi śākhāntarīyavākyānyapyasya viṣaya ityāha-anyānyapīti
GSP33brssgo1u:1406: tadevaṃ sarvāsu śākhāsu lakṣaṇadvayavākyāni jijñāsye brahmaṇi samanvitāni,
GSP33brssgo1u:1413: mahata ṛgvedādeḥ śāstrasyānekavidyāsthānopabṛṃhitasya pradīpavatsarvārthāvadyotinaḥ sarvajñakalpasya yoniḥ kāraṇaṃbrahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:1416: yathā vyākaraṇādi pāṇinyāderjñeyaikadeśārthamapi sa tato 'pyadhikataravijñāna iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssgo1u:1422: tasya mahato bhūtasya niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktimattvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1423: athavā yathokta ṛgvedādiśāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ pramāṇamasya brahmaṇo yathāvatsvarūpādhigame /
GSP33brssgo1u:1425: śāstramudāhṛtaṃ pūrvasūtre- 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1427: yāvatā pūrvasūtra evaivañjātīyakaṃ śāstramudāharatā śāstrayonitvaṃ brahmaṇo darśitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1428: ucyate- tatra pūrvasūtrākṣareṇa spaṣṭaṃ śāstrasyānupādānājjanmādi kevalamanumānamupanyastamityāśaṅkyeta tāmāśaṅkāṃ nirvartayitumidaṃ sūtraṃ pravavṛte śāstrayonitvāditi // 3 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:1430: purāṇāni sṛṣṭyādipratipādakavākyāni parakṛtipurākalparūpānarthavādāṃśca prādhānyenopabṛṃhayanti prasaṅgādadvaitabhāgaṃ karmabhāgaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:1436: vyākaraṇaṃ tāvadasminnarthe idaṃ padaṃ sādhviti padārthānvyākaroti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1437: niruktaṃ teṣu teṣu padeṣu yaugikamarthaṃ pradarśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1439: jyotiṣaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ jayeddetāmāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajetetyādinopāttaṃ kālaviśeṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1440: tathāca tattaddeśavyākhyānāya bahavo maharṣayaḥ purāṇādinibandhapraṇetāro yatra pravṛttāstasya mahattvaṃ vyaktameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:1455: yadvā vedasya nityatvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvahetutā nāstītyākṣepasaṃgatyā vedahetutvamucyate 'asya mahato bhūtasya niśvasitametadyadṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo 'tharvāṅgirasaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:1456: iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ tatkiṃ vedahetutvena brahmaṇaḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sādhayati uta na sādhayati iti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1457: tatra vyākaraṇādivadvedasya pauruṣeyatve mūlapramāṇasāpekṣatvenāprāmāṇyāpātānna sādhayatīti pūrvapakṣe jagaddhetoścetanatvātsiddhiḥ phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1459: asya vedāntavākyasya spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgasya vedakartari samanvayokteḥ śrutiśāstrādhyāyapādasaṃgatayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1466: yadvā yathā adhyetāraḥ pūrvakramaṃ jñātvā vedaṃ kurvanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:1468: vedarāśiṃ tadarthāṃśca yugapajjānanneva karotīti na vedasya pauruṣeyatā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1469: yatra hyarthajñānapūrvakaṃ vākyajñānaṃ vākyasṛṣṭau kāraṇaṃ tatra pauruṣeyatā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1471: ato vedakartā vedamiva tadarthamapi svasaṃbaddhaṃ nāntarīyakatayā janātīti sarvajña iti siddhāntayati-śāstreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1473: brahma sarvajñaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ ca iti saṃgatidvayānusāreṇa sūtrayojanāmabhipretya padāni vyācaṣṭe--mahata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1478: purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsādharmaśāstrāṇi śikṣākalpavyākaraṇaniruktacchandojyotiṣāṇi ṣaḍaṅgāni iti daśa vidyāsthānāni vedārthajñānahetavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1480: anena manvādibhiḥ parigṛhītatvena vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1483: nanu sarvajñasya yo guṇaḥ sarvārthajñānaśaktimatvaṃ vedasya tadanvitatve 'pi tadyoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ kuta ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1484: upādāne tacchaktiṃ vinā kārye tadayogādvedopādānasya sarvajñatvam,
GSP33brssgo1u:1494: atraiṣā yojanā--yadyacchāstraṃ yasmādāptātsaṃbhavati sa tataḥ śāstrādadhikārthajñāna
GSP33brssgo1u:1495: iti prasiddhaṃ yathā śabdasādhutvādirjñeyaikadeśor'tho yasya tadapi vyākaraṇādi pāṇinyāderadhikārthajñātsaṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1498: saṃbhavaḥ tasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktimatvaṃ ceti kimu vaktavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1501: atrānumānena 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ 'iti śrutyuktasarvajñatvadārḍhyāya pāṇinyādivadvedakartari adikārthajñānasattāmātraṃ sādhyate na tvarthajñānasya vedahetutvaṃ niḥśvasitaśrutivirodhāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1503: iyān viśeṣaḥ--adhyetā parāpekṣaḥ īśvarastu svakṛtavedānupūrvīsvayameva smṛtyā tathaiva
GSP33brssgo1u:1508: 'taṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣam'iti śrutirbrahmaṇo vedaikavedyatvaṃ brūte na veti śaṃśaye,
GSP33brssgo1u:1509: kāryaliṅgenaivalāghavāt karturekasya sarvajñasya brahmaṇaḥ siddherna brūte iti prāpte vedapramāṇakatvāt brahmaṇo na pramāṇāntaravedyatvamiti siddhāntayati--śāstrayonitvāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1512: atra pūrvapakṣe anumānasyaiva vicāryatāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte vedāntānāmiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1535: ata eva 'so 'rodīt' ityevamādināmānarthakyaṃ mā bhūditi 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvātstutyarthena vidhinā syuḥ' /
GSP33brssgo1u:1537: mantrāṇāṃ ca 'iṣe tvā' ityādīnāṃ kriyātatsādhanābhidhāyitvena karmasamavāyitvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1538: na Dvacidapi vedavākyānāṃ vidhisaṃsparśamantareṇārthavattā dṛṣṭopapannā vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1539: na ca pariniṣṭhite vastusvarūpe vidhiḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:1548: tatteṣu vedavākyeṣu bhūtānāṃ siddārthapratipādakavākyānāṃ kriyārthena kriyāpratipādakavākyena 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1550: tathāca nindyatvādyarthapūraṇenānvaye kṛte kriyāparatvasiddhyā prāmāṇyaṃ siddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:1554: tadbrahma sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti jagadutpatti sthitilayakāraṇaṃ vedāntaśāstrādevāvagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1556: sarveṣu hi vedānteṣu vākyāni tātparyeṇaitasyārthasya pratipādakatvena samanugatāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:1564: naca tadgatānāṃ padānāṃ brahmasvarūpaviṣaye niścite samanvaye 'vagamyamāner'thāntarakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1580: yadyapyanyatra vedavākyānāṃ vīdhisaṃsparśamantareṇa pramāṇatvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1581: tathāpyātmavijñānasya phalaparyantatvānna tadviṣayasya śāstrasya prāmāṇyaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1585: atrāpare pratyavatiphaṣṭhante- yadyapi śāstrapramāṇakaṃ brahma tathāpi pratipattividhiviṣayataiva śāstreṇa brahma samarpyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1586: yathā yūpāhavahanīyādīnyalaukikānyapi vidhiśaṣatayā śāstreṇa samarpyante tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:1589: tathāhi śāstratātparyavida āhuḥ- 'dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1598: sati ca vidhiparatve yathā svargādikāmasyāgnihotrādisādhanaṃ vidhīyata evamamṛtatvakāmasya brahmajñānaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1599: nanviha jijñāsyavailakṣaṇyamuktam- karmakāṇḍe bhavyo dharmo jijñāsya iha tu bhūtaṃ nityanivṛttaṃ brahma jijñāsyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1608: ityādividhāneṣu satsu ko 'sāvātmā kiṃ tadbrahma ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatsvarūpasamarpaṇena
GSP33brssgo1u:1609: sarve vedāntā upayuktāḥ- 'nityaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvagato nityatṛpto nityāśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvo
GSP33brssgo1u:1615: nanu vastumātrakathane 'pi rajuriyaṃ nāyaṃ sarpa ityādau bhrāntijanitabhītinivartanenārthavattvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1627: śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca karma śrutismṛtisiddhaṃ dharmākhyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1631: tayoścodanālakṣaṇayorarthānarthayordharmādharmayoḥ phale pratyakṣe sukhaduḥkhe śarīravāṅmanobhirevopabhujyamāne viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanye brahmādiṣu sthāvarānteṣu prasiddhe /
GSP33brssgo1u:1640: tathā manuṣyādiṣu nārakasthāvarānteṣu sukhalavaścodanālakṣaṇadharmasādhya eveti gamyate tāratamyena vartamānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1641: tathordhvagateṣvadhogateṣu ca dehavatsu duḥkhatāratamyardānāttaddhetoradharmasya pratiṣedhacodanākṣaṇasya tadanuṣṭhāyināṃ ca tāratamye gamyate
GSP33brssgo1u:1642: evamavidyādidoṣavatāṃ dharmādharmatāratamyanimittaṃ śarīropādānapūrvakaṃ sukhaduḥkhatāratamyanimittaṃ saṃsārarūpaṃ śrutismṛtinyāyaprasiddham
GSP33brssgo1u:1643: tathāca smṛtiḥ- 'na ha vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayorapahatirasti' iti yathāvarṇitaṃ saṃsārarūpamanuvadati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1644: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chāndo. 8.12.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:1650: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati' (kāṭha. 1.2.21)
GSP33brssgo1u:1655: tatra kiñcitpariṇāmi nityaṃ yasminvikriyamāṇe 'pi tadevedamiti buddhirna vihanyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1665: yatra dharmādharmī saha kāryeṇa kālatrayaṃ ca nopāvartete /
GSP33brssgo1u:1674: tatraivaṃ sati yathoktakarmaphaleṣveva tāratamyāvasthiteṣvanityeṣu kaścidatiśayo mokṣa iti prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo1u:1685: ityevamādyāḥ śrutayo brahmavidyānantaraṃ mokṣaṃ darśayantyo madhye kāryāntaraṃ vārayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1688: yathā tiṣṭhangāyatīti tiṣṭhatigāyatyayormadhye tatkartṛkaṃ kāryāntaraṃ nāstīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1689: 'tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā yo 'smākamavidyāyāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ tārayasi' (pra. 6.8)
GSP33brssgo1u:1690: 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi tvaṃ mā bhagavacchokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāndo. 7.1.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:1693: tathācāryapraṇītaṃ nyāyopabṛṃhitaṃ sūtram- 'duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānāmuttarottarāpāye tadanantarāpāyādapavargaḥ' (nyā. sū. 1.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1696: yathā 'anantaṃ vai mano 'nantā viśvedevā anantameva sa tena lokaṃ jayati' (bṛha. 3.1.9) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1701: nāpi viśiṣṭakriyāyoganimittaṃ 'vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ' 'prāṇo vāva saṃvargaḥ' (chāndo. 4.3.1) itivat /
GSP33brssgo1u:1710: iti caivamādīni tadbhāvāpattivacanāni saṃpadādipakṣe na sāmañjasyenopapadyeran /
GSP33brssgo1u:1714: evaṃbhūtasya brahmaṇastaj jñānasya ca na kayācidyuktyā śakyaḥ kāryānupraveśaḥ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1718: 'yenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijānāti taṃ kena vijānīyāt' (bṛha. 2.4.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:1719: tathopāstikriyākarmatvapratiṣedho 'pi bhavati- yadvācānabhyuditaṃ yena vāgabhyudyate ityaviṣayatvaṃ brahmaṇa upanyasya,
GSP33brssgo1u:1720: 'tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate' (kena. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1735: tathā vikāryatve ca tayoḥ pakṣayormokṣasya dhruvamanityatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1746: saṃskāro hi nāma saṃskāryasya guṇādhānena vā syāddoṣāpanayanena vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1751: svātmadharma eva saṃsthirobhīto mokṣaḥ kriyayātmani saṃskriyamāṇe 'bhivyajyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:1752: yathā'darśe nigharṣaṇakriyayā saṃskrayamāṇe bhāsvaratvaṃ dharma iticet / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:1760: nanu dehāśrayayā snānācamanayajñopavītādikayā kriyayā dehī saṃskriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:1763: tayā dehāśrayayā tatsaṃhata eva kaścidavidyayātmatvena parigṛhītaḥ saṃskriyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1764: yathā dehāśrayacikitsānimittena dhātusāmyena tatsaṃhatasya tadabhimānina ārogyaphalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1766: evaṃ snānācamanayajñopavītādinā ahaṃ śuddhaḥ saṃskṛta iti yatra buddhirutpadyate sa saṃskriyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1768: tenaiva hyahaṅkartrāhaṃpratyayaviṣayeṇa pratyayinā sarvāḥ kriyā nirvartyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:1774: karmādhyakṣaḥ sarvabhūtādhivāsaḥ sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaśca' (śvetā. 6.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1777: etau mantrāvanādheyātiśayatāṃ nityaśuddhatāṃ ca brahmaṇo darśayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1780: ato 'nyanmokṣaṃ prati kriyānupraveśadvāraṃ na śakyaṃ kenaciddarśayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1781: tasmāt jñānamekaṃ muktvā kriyāyā gandhamātrasyāpyanupraveśa iha nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1782: nanu jñānaṃ nāma mānasī kriyā / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:1784: kriyā hi nāma sā yatra vastusvarūpanirapekṣaiva codyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:1786: yathā yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ manasā dhyāyedvṣaṭkariṣyan iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1789: dhyānaṃ cintanaṃ yadyapi mānasaṃ tathāpi puruṣeṇa kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1792: pramāṇaṃ ca yathābhūtavastuviṣayamato jñānaṃ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartumaśakyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1805: tatraivaṃ sati yathābhūtabrahmātmaviṣayamapi jñānaṃ na codanātantram /
GSP33brssgo1u:1808: kimarthāni tarhi 'ātmā vāre draṣyavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ' ityādīni vidhicchāyāni vacanāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:1810: yo hi bahirmukhaḥ pravartate puruṣaḥ iṣṭaṃ me bhūyādadaniṣṭaṃ mābhūditi,
GSP33brssgo1u:1812: tamātyantikapuruṣārthavāñchinaṃ svābhāvikakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapravṛttigocarādvimukhīkṛtya pratyagātmasrotastayā pravartayanti 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:1816: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet kena kaṃ vijānīyāt vījñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' (bṛha. 4.5.15)
GSP33brssgo1u:1821: alaṅkāro hyayamasmākaṃ yadbrahmātmāvagatau satyāṃ sarvakartavyatāhāniḥ kṛtakṛtyatā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1828: yadapi kecidāhuḥ- 'pravṛttinivṛttividhitaccheṣavyatirekeṇa kevalavastuvādī vedabhāgo nāsti' iti tanna,
GSP33brssgo1u:1831: nāsau nāsti nādhigamyata iti vā śakyaṃ vaditum,
GSP33brssgo1u:1838: nahyahaṃpratyayaviṣayakartṛvyatirekeṇa tatsākṣī sarvabhūtasthaḥ sama ekaḥ kūṭasthanityaḥ puruṣo vidhikāṇḍe tarkasamaye vā kenacidadhigataḥ sarvasyātmā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1839: ataḥ sa na kenacitpratyākhyātuṃ śakyo vidhiśeṣatvaṃ vā netum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1840: asmatvādeva ca sarveṣāṃ na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1846: tasmāt 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭā sā parā gatiḥ' (kāṭha. 1.3.11)
GSP33brssgo1u:1848: iti caupaniṣadatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ puruṣasyopaniṣatsu prādhānyena prakāśyamānatva upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1849: ato bhūtavastuparo vedabhāgo nāstīti vacanaṃ sāhasamātram /
GSP33brssgo1u:1850: yadapi śāstratātparyavidāmanukramaṇam- 'dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam' ityevamādi,
GSP33brssgo1u:1856: akriyātve 'pi bhūtasya kriyāsādhanatvātkriyārthaṃ eva bhūtopadeśa iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:1861: yadi nāmopadiṣṭaṃ kiṃ tava tena syāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1863: tadavagatyā mithyājñānasya saṃsārahetornivṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ kriyata ityavāśiṣṭamarthavattvaṃ kriyāsādhanavastūpadeśena /
GSP33brssgo1u:1864: apica 'brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ' iti caivamādyā nivṛttirupadiśyate /

GSP33brssgo1u:1883: tadabhimānanivṛttau tadeva mithyājñānanimittaṃ duḥkhabhayādimattvaṃ bhavatīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum /

GSP33brssgo1u:1885: naca kuṇḍalinaḥ kuṇḍalitvābhimānanimittaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva kuṇḍalaviyuktasya kuṇḍalitvābhimānanimittaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1886: taduktaṃ śrutyā- 'ārīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chāndo. 8.12.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1890: na hyātmanaḥ śarīrātmābhimānalakṣaṇaṃ mithyājñānaṃ muktvānyataḥ saśarīratvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1898: na tvātmano dhanadānādivaccharīrādibhiḥ svasvāmisaṃbandhanimittaṃ kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1901: atrāhuḥ- dehādivyatiriktasyātmana ātmīye dehādāvabhimāno gauṇo na mithyeti cenna,
GSP33brssgo1u:1904: yathā kesarādimānākṛtiviśeṣo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siṃhaśabdapratyayabhāṅmukhyo 'nyaḥ prasiddhaḥ tataścānyaḥ puruṣaḥ prāyikaiḥ krauryaśauryādibhiḥ siṃhaguṇaiḥ saṃpannaḥ siddhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1905: tasya puruṣe siṃhaśabdapratyayau gauṇau bhavato nāprasiddhavastubhedasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:1906: tasya tvanyatrānyaśabdapratyayau bhrāntinimittāveva bhavato na gauṇau /
GSP33brssgo1u:1909: tadvaddehādisaṃghāte 'hamiti nirupacāreṇa śabdapratyayāvātmānātmāvivekenotpadyamānau kathaṃ gauṇau śakyau vaditum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1914: tathāca brahmavidviṣayā śrutiḥ- ' tadyathāhinirlvayanī valmīke mṛtā pratyastā śayītaivamevedaṃ śarīraṃ śete /
GSP33brssgo1u:1915: athāyamaśarīro 'mṛtaḥ prāṇo brahmaiva teja eva' (bṛha. 4.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1916: 'sacakṣuracakṣuriva sakarṇo 'karṇa iva savāgavāgiva samanā amanā iva saprāṇo 'prāṇa iva' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:1920: yasya tu yathāpūrvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ nāsāvavagatabrahmātmabhāva ityanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1923: yadi hyavagataṃ brahmānyatra viniyujyeta bhavettadā vidhiśeṣitvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1926: tasmānna pratapattividhiviṣayatayā śāstrapramāṇakatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavatītyataḥ svatantrameva brahma śāstrapramāṇakaṃ vedāntavākyasamanvayāditi siddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:1927: evañca sati 'athāto brahmajijñāsā' iti tadviṣayaḥ pṛthakśāstramārambha upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1929: ārabhyamāṇaṃ caivamārabhyeta - 'athātaḥ pariśiṣṭadharmajijñāseti' ' athātaḥ kratvarthapuruṣārthayorjijñāsā' (jai. 4.1.1) itivat /
GSP33brssgo1u:1930: brahmātmaikyāvagatistvapratijñāteti tadartho yuktaḥ śāstrārambhaḥ- 'athāto brahmajijñāsā' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1931: tasmādahaṃ brahmāsmītyetadavasānā eva sarve viṣayaḥ sarvāṇi cetarāṇi pramāṇāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:1941: FN: pūrvapakṣiṇā kriyāśeṣatayā brahma pratipādyata ityuktaṃ tadvyāvṛttyarthamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1942: pūrṇatayā juhūdvārā kratuśeṣatāvādātmano 'pi jñānadvārā karmaśeṣatvāttadarthā vedāntāstadvidhiśeṣā bhaviṣyantītyāśaṅkyāha tatkeneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1945: yathāvā śrāddhe piṇḍapradānapūjottaraṃ piṇḍānāṃ gaṅgādipravāhe prakṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1955: valkalādivaccittarañjako rāgādikaṣāyo mṛditaḥ kṣālitaḥ vināśito yasya jñānavairāgyābhyāsakṣārajalena tasmai /
GSP33brssgo1u:1965: svātmano dharmānāśrayatve 'pi nityo dharmo mokṣākhyo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyeṇa dharmaśabdaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1973: tathāca - 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssgo1u:1989: ahaṃpratyayaviṣayo yaḥ kartā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātopahito jīvātmā tadvyatirekeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:1997: ahinirlvayanī sarpatvak valmīkādau pratyastā nikṣiptā mṛtā sarpeṇa tyaktābhimānā vartata evamityādyūhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2000: athāta iti tṛtīye śrutyādibhiḥ śeṣaśeṣitve siddhe satyanantaraṃ śeṣiṇaiva śeṣasya prayuktisaṃbhavātkonāma kratave kovā puruṣārtāyeti jijñāsā pravṛttā caturthādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:2007: tathāca lokayātrakāryaṃ sadbrahmāhamiti bodhakāryaṃ- advaitasākṣātkāraśca kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:2012: vedāntāḥ siddhabrahmaparā uta kāryaparā iti niṣphalatvasāpekṣatvayoḥ prasaṅgāprasaṅgābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvasūtre dvitīyavarṇakenākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha--kathaṃ punarityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2018: yato jaiminisūtreṇa śāstrasya vedasya kriyāparatvaṃ darśitamato 'kriyārthatvādvedāntanāmānarthakyaṃ phalavadarthaśūnyatvaṃ prāptamityanvayaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2020: 'codanālakṣaṇor'tho dharmaḥ'iti dvitīyasūtre dharme kārye codanā pramāṇamiti vedaprāmāṇyavyāpakaṃ kāryaparatvamavasitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2021: tatra'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā'ityādyarthavādānāṃ dharme prāmāṇyamasti na veti saṃśaye
GSP33brssgo1u:2022: āmnāyaprāmāṇyasya kriyārthatvena vyāptatvāt arthavādeṣu dharmasyāpratīteḥ akriyārthānāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2024: na cādhyayanavidhyupāttānāṃ niṣphale siddher'the prāmāṇyaṃ yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2027: evaṃ pūrvapakṣe 'pi 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ'iti sūtreṇa siddhāntamāha--kriyāparatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2029: vāyurvai kṣipratamagāminī devatā taddevatākaṃ karma kṣiprameva phalaṃ dāsyati,
GSP33brssgo1u:2030: ityevaṃ vidheyārthānāṃ stutirūpārthena dvāreṇa 'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta'ityādi vidhivākyenaikavākyatvādarthavādāḥ saphalāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2033: na vayaṃ vedāntānāmānarthakyaṃ sādhayāmaḥ kintu loke siddhasya mānābhāvāntaravedyatvānniṣphalatvācca
GSP33brssgo1u:2038: nanu karmaviśeṣamanārabhya prakaraṇāntarādhītānāṃ vedāntānāṃ kathaṃ taccheṣakatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2043: nanu śrutaṃ brahma vihāyāśrutaṃ kāryaparatvaṃ kimarthaṃ vaktavyamiti tatrāha--nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2057: te copādeyasya pravṛttiprayatnakāryasya heyasyanivṛttiprayatnakāryasya jñānābhyāṃ jāyete,
GSP33brssgo1u:2059: tarhi siddhabodhivedavādānāṃ sāphalyaṃ kathasityāśaṅya 'āmnāyasya'ityādisaṃgrahavākyaṃ vivṛṇoti-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2061: 'devairniruddhaḥ so 'gnirarodīt'iti vākyasyāśrujatvena rajatasya nindādvārā 'barhiṣi na deyaṃ'iti sabhalaniṣedhaśeṣatvavat vedāntānāṃ vidhayādiśeṣatvaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2062: nanu teṣāṃ mantravat svātantryamastu nārthavādavadvidhyekavākyatvamityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntāsiddhimāha-mantrāṇāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2063: prathamādhyāye pramāṇalakṣaṇer'thavādacintānantaraṃ mantracintā kṛtā-'iṣe tvā'iti mantre 'chinadmi'ityadhyāhārācchākhācchedanakriyāpratīteḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2064: 'agnirmūrdhā'ityādau ca kriyāsādhanadevatādipratīteḥ mantrāḥ śrutyādibhiḥ kratau viniyuktāḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2065: te kimuccāraṇamātreṇādṛṣṭaṃ kurvantaḥ kratāvupakurvanti uta dṛṣṭenaivārthasmaraṇeneti
GSP33brssgo1u:2075: vedāntānāṃ tu siddhe prāmāṇyaṃ kiṃ na syāditi tatrāha-na kvaciditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2082: tarhi brahmaṇyeva svārthe vidhiḥ kalpyatāṃ kṛtaṃ vedāntānāṃ vidhyanataraśeṣatvenetyata āha--na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2092: tātparyasya samyaktvaṃ akhaṇḍārthaviṣayakatvaṃ sūcayituṃ sam-padaṃ pratijñāntargatameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:2100: prakṛṣṭaprakāśaścandra ityādi lakṣaṇavākyānāṃ loke lakṣaṇayā candrādivyaktimātrapramāhetutvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2102: tathā satyajñānādipadairakhaṇḍaṃ brahma bhātīti na pakṣāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2115: rūpādihīnādvitīyabrahmaṇo mānāntarāyogyatvadapūrvatvamuktam-'atra vāva kila sat somya na nibhālayase'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2117: 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye'iti brahmajñānātphalamuktaṃ viduṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2118: tasya yāvatkālaṃ deho na vimokṣyate tāvadeva dehapātaparyanto vilambaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2123: evaṃ ṣaṅvidhāni tātparyaliṅgāni vyastāni samastāni vā prativedāntaṃ dṛśyanta ityaitareyopakramavākyaṃ paṭhati-ātmā vā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2136: yatpurastātpūrvadigvastujātamidamabrahmeva viduṣāṃ bhāti tadamṛtaṃ brahmaiva vastu ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2139: vedāntānāṃ kāryamevārthaḥ kiṃ na syāditi tatrāha--na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2140: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi tātparyeniścīyamāne kāryārthatvaṃ na yuktaṃ 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ'iti nyāyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2141: yaduktamarthavādanyāyena vedāntānāṃ kartrādistāvakatvamiti tatrāha--na ca teṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2142: teṣāṃ karmaśeṣastāvakatvaṃ na bhāti kintu jñānadvārā karma tatsādhananāśakatvameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:2143: tattatra vidyākāle kaḥ kartā kena karaṇena kaṃ viṣayaṃ paśyet iti śruterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2145: yaduktaṃ siddhatvena mānāntaravedyaṃ brahma na vedārtha iti tatrāha--na ca parīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2149: yadi vedaṃ vinā dharmasyānirṇayānna mānāntaravedyatā tadā brahmaṇyapi tulyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2150: yaccoktaṃ niṣphalatvādbrahma na vedārtha iti tadanūdya pariharati--yattvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2153: yadapyuktam--'upāsanāparatvaṃ vedāntānām'iti tatra kiṃ prāṇapañcāgnyādivākyānāmuta sarveṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2159: ādye, adhyastaguṇavatastasya taccheṣatve 'pi na dvitīya ityāha--natu tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2162: ityekatve jñāte sati heyopādeyaśūnyatayā brahmātmanaḥ phalābhāvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2167: saṃskārotthaṃ tu bhrāntitvena niścite na vidhinimittam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2178: saphalajñānakaraṇatvena vedāntānāṃ svārthe mānatvasiddherna kriyārthakatvaṃ tadvyāpakamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2183: yena vedaprāmāṇyaṃ svasyānumānagamyatvenānyatra kvaciddṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭāntamapekṣeta tadeva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2185: prāmāṇyasaṃśaye tu phalavadajñātābādhitārthatātparyāt prāmāṇyaniścayo na kriyārthatvena /
GSP33brssgo1u:2189: vidhivākyānāmapi phalavadajñātārthatvena prāmāṇyaṃ tattulyaṃ vedāntānāmapīti sthitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2190: evaṃ padānāṃ siddher'the vyutpattimicchatāṃ brahmanāstikānāṃ mataṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2193: saṃprati sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ kāryānvitārthe śaktimicchatāṃ vidhiśeṣatvena pratyagbrahma
GSP33brssgo1u:2194: vedāntairbodhyate na svātantryeṇeti vadatāṃ vṛttikārāṇāṃ matanirāsāya sūtrasya varṇakāntaramārabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2195: tatra vedāntāḥ kimupāsanāvidhiśeṣatvena brahma bodhayanti uta svātantryeṇeti siddhe vyutpattyabhāvabhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha--atrāpara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2200: asyāḥ ko viṣaya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyādivākyairvidhiparaireva brahmasamarpyata ityāha--pratipattīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2203: 'yūpe paśuṃ badhnāti' 'āhavanīye juhoti' 'indraṃ yajeta'iti vidhiṣu ke yūpādaya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ 'yūpaṃ takṣati,
GSP33brssgo1u:2208: mānāntarājñātānyapi śeṣatayocyante na pradhānatveneti na vākyabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2212: vṛddhavyavahāre ca śrotuḥ pravṛttinivṛttī uddiśyāpūrvaprayogo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2214: te ca kāryajñānajanye iti kāryaparatvaṃ śāstrasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:2223: kriyāyā niyogasya jñānadvārā pravartakaṃ vākyaṃ codanetyucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2228: tattatra vede bhūtānāṃ siddhārthaniṣṭhānāṃ padānāṃ kriyārthena kāryavācinā liṅgādipadena samāmnāyaḥ sahoccāraṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2230: kāryānvitārthe śaktāni padāni kāryavācipadena saha padārthasmṛtidvārā kāryameva vākyārthaṃ bodhayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2237: nanu vedānteṣu niyojyasya vidheyasya cādarśanātkathaṃ kāryadhīriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2241: tatra kāṇḍadvaye jijñāsyabhede sati phalavailakṣyaṇyaṃ vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2242: tathā ca na muktiphalāya jñānasya vidheyatā,
GSP33brssgo1u:2246: na ca tarhi saphalaṃ kāryameva vedānateṣvapi jijñāsyamiti tadbhedāsiddhiriti vācyaṃ, iṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2250: 'brahma veda'ityatra brahmabhāvakāmo brahmavedane kuryāditi vidhiḥ pariṇamyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2254: pratyagbrahmopāsanāt 'brahmavidāpnoti param'iti śāstrokto mokṣaḥ svargavallokāprasiddhaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2261: kiñca yadi jñānādeva muktistadā śravaṇajanyajñānāntaraṃ mananādividhirna syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2267: vedāntā na vidhiparāḥ svārthe phalavatve satiniyojyavidhuratvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2279: na kevalaṃ dharmākhyaṃ karma kintu atharmo 'pītyāha--adharmo 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2282: mokṣastu atīndriyoviśokaḥ śarīrādyabhogyo viṣayādyajanyo 'nātmavitsvaprasiddha iti vailakṣaṇyajñānāya pratyakṣādīni viśeṣaṇāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:2289: kiṃ ca sādhanācatuṣṭayasaṃpanna ekarūpa eva mokṣāvidyādhikārī,
GSP33brssgo1u:2291: gamyate na kevalaṃ kiṃ tu prasiddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2306: saṃpatati gacchati asmāllokādamuṃ lokamaneneti saṃpātaḥ karma /
GSP33brssgo1u:2320: tattvato videhaṃ santamātmānaṃ vaiṣayike sukhaduḥkhe naiva spṛśata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2323: nanu priyaṃ nāma vaiṣayikaṃ sukhaṃ tanniṣidhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:2332: tamātmānaṃ jñātvā dhīraḥ san śokopalakṣitaṃ saṃsāraṃ nānubhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2339: nityatve 'pi pariṇāmitayā dharmakāryatvaṃ mokṣasyetyāśaṅkya nityaṃ dvedhā vibhajate--tatra kiñciditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2342: ātmā tu kūṭasthanitya iti na karmasādhya ityāha--idaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2356: kālatrayaṃ ca nopāvartata iti yogyatayā saṃbandhanīyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2363: nanu uktāḥ śrutayo brahmaṇaḥ kūṭasthāsaṅgitvaṃ vadantu,
GSP33brssgo1u:2373: nahi brahmātmaikyaṃ bhedapramāṇe jāgrati vidhiparavākyāllabdhuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2376: athavā mokṣasya niyogāsādhyatve phalitaṃ sūtrārthamāha--ata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2386: yo brahmāhamiti veda sa brahmaiva bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:2387: paraṃ kāraṇamavaraṃ kāryaṃ tadrūpe tadadhiṣṭhāne tasmindṛṣṭe sati asya draṣṭuranārabdhabhalāni karmāṇi naśyanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2391: ajñānahānāt tajjīvākhyaṃ brahma gurūpadeśādātmānameva ahaṃ brahmāsmītyavet viditavat /
GSP33brssgo1u:2394: ahaṃ brahma ityanubhavatastatrānubhavakāle mohaśokau na sati śrutīnāmarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2400: tadbrahmaitatpratyagasmīti paśyan tasmājjñānāt vāmadevo munīndraḥ śuddhaṃ brahma
GSP33brssgo1u:2401: pratipede ha tatra jñāne tiṣṭhan dṛṣṭavānātmamantrān svasya sarvātmatvaprakāśakān
GSP33brssgo1u:2404: brahmadarśanaṃ tu brahmapratipattikriyāyā heturiti vaiṣamyamasti tathāpi 'lakṣaṇahetvoḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2405: kriyāyāḥ'iti sūtreṇa kriyāṃ prati lakṣaṇahetvorarthayorvartamānāddhātoḥ parasya laṭaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2406: śatṛśānacāvādeśau bhavata iti vihitaśatṛpratyayasāmarthyāt tiṣṭhangāyati ityukte
GSP33brssgo1u:2407: tatkartṛkaṃ kāryāntaraṃ madhye nabhātītyetāvatā paśyan pratipede ityasya dṛṣṭāntamāha--yatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2410: ato bodhakā eva vedāntā na vidhāyakā ityāha--tvaṃ hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2411: bhāradvājādayaḥ ṣaḍ ṛṣayaḥ pippalādaṃ guruṃ pādayoḥ praṇamya ūcire--tvaṃ khalvasmākaṃ pitā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2412: yastvamavidyāmahodadheḥ paraṃ punarāvṛttiśūnyaṃ pāraṃ brahma vidyāplavenāsmāṃstārayasi prāpayasi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2417: ātmavicchokaṃ taratīti bhagavattulyebhyo mayā śrutameva hi na dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2420: taṃ śocantaṃ māṃ bhagavāneva jñānaplavena śokasāgarasya paraṃ pāraṃ prāpayatviti
GSP33brssgo1u:2421: nāradenoktaḥ sanatkumārastasmai tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāyanāradāya tamasaḥ śokanidānājñānasya
GSP33brssgo1u:2429: evaṃ pāṭhakrameṇottarottarasya hetunāśānnāśe sati tasya pravṛttirūpahetoranantarasya kāryasya janmano 'pāyāduḥkhadhvaṃsarūpo 'ravargo bhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2431: kathaṃ mokṣaṃ sādhayatītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ mithyājñānanivṛttidvāreṇeti vaktumidaṃ sūtraṃ pravṛttam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2432: tathācca bhinnātmajñānānmuktiṃ vadatsūtraṃ saṃmataṃ cet paramatānujñā syādityata āha--mithyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2433: tattvajñānānmuktirityaṃśe saṃmatiruktā bhedajñānaṃ tu 'yatra hi dvaitamivabhavati'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:2434: śrutyā bhrāntitvāt 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati'iti śrutyā anarthahetutvācca
GSP33brssgo1u:2440: tata utkṛṣṭā viśvedevā apyanantā ityanantatvasāmyāt viśvedevā eva mana iti sampattayānantaphalaprāptirbhavati tathā cetanatvasāmyājjīve brahmābhedaḥ saṃpaditi na cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2443: tathā ahaṃ brahmeti jñānamadhyāso netyāha -na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2445: kriyāviśeṣo viśiṣṭakriyā tathā yogo nimittaṃ yasya dhyānasya tattathā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2447: svāpakāle prāṇo vāgādīnsaṃharatīti saṃhārakriyāyogātsaṃvarga iti dhyānaṃ chāndogye vihitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2449: yathā patnyavekṣitamājyaṃ bhavati iti upāṃśuyājādyaṅgasyājyasya saṃskārakamavekṣaṇaṃ vihitaṃ tathā karmaṇi kartṛtvenāṅgasyātmanaḥ saṃskārārthaṃ brahmajñānaṃ netyāha-nāpyājyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2451: upakramādiliṅgairbrahmātmaikatvavastuni pramitiheturyaḥ samānādhikaraṇavākyānāṃ padaniṣṭhaḥ samanvayastātparyaṃ niścitaṃ tatpīḍyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:2460: uktarītyā siddhabrahmarūpamokṣasya kāryasādhyatvaṃ tajjñānasya niyogaviṣayatvaṃ ca kalpayitumaśakyaṃ kṛtyasādhyatvādityāha-evaṃbhūtasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2465: śābdajñānaṃ vidikriyāśabdārthaḥ-viditaṃ kāryaṃ aviditaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasmādadhi anyadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2466: yenātmanā idaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyaṃ loko jānāti taṃ kena karaṇena jānīyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2469: 'yanmanasā na manute'iti śrutyā loko manasā yadbrahma na jānātītyaviṣayatvamuktvā tadevāvedyaṃ brahma tvaṃ viddhi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2479: yasya brahmāmataṃ caitanyaviṣaya iti niścayastena samyagavagatam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2480: yasya tvajñasya brahma caitanyaviṣaya iti mataṃ sa na veda /
GSP33brssgo1u:2483: ajñānāṃ tu brahma vijñātaṃ dṛśyamiti pakṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2485: anayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na paśyervijñāterbuddhivṛtterniścayarūpāyāḥ sākṣiṇaṃ tathā na viṣayīkuryādityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2486: nanvavidyādinivartakatvena śāstrasya prāmāṇye 'pi nivṛtterāgantukatvānmokṣasyanityatvaṃ syāditi netyāha-ata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2489: utpattivikārāptisaṃskārarūpaṃ caturvidhameva kriyāphalaṃ tadbhinnatvānmokṣasya nopāsanāsādhyatvamityāha-yasya tu ityādinātasmājjñānamekaṃ muktvā ityantena /
GSP33brssgo1u:2490: tathā utpādyatvavat vikāryatve cāpekṣata iti yuktamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2497: yathā vrīhīṇāṃ saṃskāryatvena prokṣaṇāpekṣā tathā mokṣasya netyāha-nāpītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2501: brahmātmasvarūpa eva mokṣo 'nādyavidyāmalākṛta upāsanayā male naṣṭe 'bhivyajyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2508: kriyā hi svāśraye saṃyogādivikāramakurvatī na jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2514: anyakriyayānyo na saṃskriyata ityatra vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2515: ātmano mūlāvidyāpratibimbitatvena gṛhītasya naro 'hamiti bhrāntyā dehatādātmyamāpannasya kriyāśrayatvabhrāntyā saṃskāryatvabhramānna vyabhicāra ityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2521: dehasaṃhatenaivāntaḥkaraṇapratibimbātmanā kartāhamiti bhāsamānena pratyayāḥ kāmādayo manastādātmyādasya santīti pratyayinā kriyāphalaṃ bhujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2523: viśiṣṭasya bhoktṛtvaṃ na kevalasya sākṣiṇa ityatra mānamāha-tayoriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2524: pramātṛsākṣiṇormadhye sattvasaṃsargamātreṇa kalpitakartṛtvādimān pramātā pippalaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte,
GSP33brssgo1u:2525: sa eva śodhitatvenānyaḥ sākṣitayā prakāśata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2528: evaṃ sopādhikasya ciddhātormithyāsaṃskāryatvamuktvā nirupādhikasyāsaṃskāryatve mānamāha-eka iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2531: nanu jīvenāsaṃbandhādbhinnatvādvā devasyābhānaṃ na tu māyāgūhanāditi,
GSP33brssgo1u:2543: nirguṇatvānnirdeṣatvācca guṇo doṣanāśo vā saṃskāro notyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2545: sa eva ātmā pari sarvamagāt vyāptaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2560: tathā ca mokṣe kriyānupraveśo nāstīti vyāhṛtamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2565: yatra viṣaye tadanapekṣayaiva yā codyate tatra sā hi kriyeti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2570: sandhyāṃ devatāmiti caivamādhivākyeṣu yathā yādṛśī dhyānakriyā vastvānapekṣā,
GSP33brssgo1u:2575: dhyānakriyamuktvā tato vailakṣaṇyaṃ jñānasya sphuṭayati-jñānaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2582: nanu pratyakṣajñānasya viṣayajanyatayā tattantratve 'pi śābdabodhasya tadabhāvādvidheyakriyātvamiti netyāha-evaṃ sarveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2588: nanu 'ātmānaṃ paśyeta' 'brahma tvaṃ viddhi' 'ātmā draṣṭavyaḥ'iti vijñāne liṅloṭtavyapratyayā vidhāyatāḥ śrūyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:2590: tasmin jñānarūpaviṣaye vidhayaḥ puruṣaṃ pravartayitumaśaktā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2591: aniyojyaṃ kṛtyasādhyaṃ niyojyaśūnyaṃ vā jñānaṃ tadviṣayakatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2592: mamāyaṃ niyoga iti boddhā niyojyo viṣayaśca vidhernāstīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2602: stutyā ātyantikeṣṭahetutvabhrāntyā yā viṣayeṣu pravṛttirātmaśravaṇādipratibandhikā tannivṛttiphalāni vidhipadānītyāha--svābhāviketi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2611: advitīyādṛśyātmabodhe vidhistapasvī dvaitavanopajīvanaḥ kva stāsyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2613: ayaṃ svayaṃ paramānandaḥ paramātmāhamasmi iti yadi kaścitpuruṣa ātmānaṃ jānīyāttadā kiṃ phalamicchan,
GSP33brssgo1u:2626: na ca pravṛttinivṛttiliṅgābhyāṃ śrotustadhetuṃ kāryabodhamanumāya vaktṛvākyasya kāryaparatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2627: niścitya vākyasthapadānāṃ kāryānvite śaktigrahānna siddhasyāpadārthasya vākyārthatvamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:2628: putraste jāta iti vākyaśrotuḥ piturharṣaliṅgeneṣṭaṃ putrajanmānumāya putrādipadānāṃ siddhe saṃgatigrahāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2631: kiñca brahmaṇo nāstītvādeva kṛtsnavedasya kāryaparatvaṃ uta vedānteṣu tasyābhānāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2636: nāstītvābhāve hetuṃ vedāntamānasiddhatvamuktvā hetvantaramātmatvamāha--sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2638: idaṃ na idaṃ na iti sarvadṛśyaniṣedhena ya ātmā upadiṣṭaḥ sa eṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2641: yaṃ tīrthakārā api na jānanti tasyālaikikatvaṃ kimu vācyamityāha--nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2667: taṃ sakāraṇasūtrasyādhiṣṭhānaṃ puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ he śākalya,
GSP33brssgo1u:2672: vedasya nairarthakye śaṅkite tasyārthavattāparamidaṃ bhāṣyam--dṛṣṭo hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2673: tatra 'phalavadarthāvabodhanam'iti vaktavye dharmavicāraprakramāt 'karmāvabodhanaṃ'ityuktaṃ naitāvatā vedāntānāṃ brahmaparatvanirāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2674: ata eva 'anupalabdher'the tatpramāṇam'iti sūtrakāro dharmasya phalavadajñātatvenaiva vedārthatāṃ darśayati taccāvaśiṣṭaṃ brahmaṇa iti na vṛddhavākyairvirodha ityāha-taddharmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2679: loke pravartakajñānagocaratvena kḷptaṃ yāgādikriyāgatamiṣṭasādhanatvameva na kriyāto
GSP33brssgo1u:2688: iti nyāyena etadabhidheyarāhityaṃ niyamenāṅgīkurvatāṃ 'somena yajeta' 'dadhnā juhoti'ityādi vākyeṣu dadhisomādiśabdānāmarthaśūnyatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2690: kāryātirekeṇa bhavyārthatvena kāryaśeṣatvena dadhyādiśabdo bhūtaṃ vakti cet,
GSP33brssgo1u:2691: tarhi satyādiśadabdaḥ kūṭasthaṃ na vaktītyatra ko hetuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2696: ato bhūtasya kāryādbhinnasya dadhyādeḥ śabdārthatvaṃ labdhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2701: dadhyādeḥ kāryaśeṣatve satyapi śabdena vastumātramevopadiṣṭaṃ na kāryānvayī śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2704: tasya bhūtaviśeṣasya dadhyādeḥ kriyāśeṣatvaṃ phalamuddiśyāṅgīkriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2706: nanu bhūtasya kāryaśeṣatvāṅgīkāre svātantryeṇa kathaṃ śabdārthateti,
GSP33brssgo1u:2708: phalārthaṃ śeṣatvāṅgīkāramātreṇa śabdārthatvabhaṅge nāsti śeṣatvasya śabdārthatāyāmapraveśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2710: yadyapi dadhyādi svato niṣphalamapi kriyādvārā saphalatvādupadiṣṭaṃ tathāpi kūṭasthabrahmavādinaḥ kriyādvārābhāvāt tena dṛṣṭāntena ki phalaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2711: bhūtasya sāphalye kriyaiva dvāramiti na niyamaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2715: dadhyādeḥ kriyādvārā sāphalyaṃ brahmaṇastu svata iti viśeṣe satyapi vedāntānāṃ saphalabhūtārthakatvamātreṇa dadhyādyupadeśasāmyamityanavadyam
GSP33brssgo1u:2724: na ca hananābhāvarūpā nañvācyā nivṛttiḥ kriyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:2730: nanu svabhāvato rāgataḥ prāptena hantyarthenānurāgeṇa nañsaṃbandhena hetunā hananavirodhinī saṃkalpakrīyā bodhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:2733: tathā ca kāryārthakamidaṃ vākyamityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2734: audāsīnyaṃ puruṣasya svarūpaṃ tacca hananakriyānivṛttyupalakṣitaṃ nivṛttyaudāsīnyaṃ hananābhāva iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:2735: tadvyatirekeṇa nañaḥ kriyārthatvaṃ kalpayituṃ na ca śakyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2736: mukhyārthasyābhāvasya nañarthatvasaṃbhave tadvirodhikriyālakṣaṇāyā anyāyyatvāt niṣedhavākyasyāpi kāryārthakatve vidhiniṣekabhedaviplavāpatteśceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2737: nanu tadabhāvavattadanyatadviruddhayorapi nañaḥ śaktiḥ kiṃ na syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2745: dharmaviruddhe vā pāpe brahmaṇādyabhāvasya nañśakyasya saṃbandhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2746: prakṛte ca ākhyātayogānnañ prasajyapratiṣedhaka eva na paryudāsalakṣakaḥ iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2747: yadvā nañaḥ prakṛtyā na saṃbandhaḥ prakṛteḥ pratyayārtho 'saparjanatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2748: pradhānasaṃbandhāccāpradhānānāṃ kintu prakṛtyarthaniṣṭhena pratyayārtheneṣṭasādhanatvena saṃbandho nañaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2749: iṣṭaṃ ca svāpekṣayā balavadaniṣṭānanubandhi yattadeva na tātkālikasukhamātraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2751: tathā ca na 'hantavyaḥ'hananaṃ balavadaniṣṭāsādhanatve sati iṣṭasādhanaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2752: atra ca 'hantavyaḥ'iti hanane viśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvaṃ bhrāntiprāptamanūdya netyabhāvabodhane balavadaniṣṭasādhanaṃ hananamiti buddhirbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:2754: viśeṣaṇaṃ balavadaniṣṭāsādhanatvamiti tadabhāvo balavadaniṣṭasādhanatvaṃ nañarthaṃ iti paryavasannam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2758: buddheḥ kṣaṇikatvāttadabhāve satyaudāsīnyātpracyutirūpā hananādau pravṛttiḥ syāditi,
GSP33brssgo1u:2760: yathāgnirindanaṃ dagdhvā śyāmyati evaṃ sā nañarthābhāvabuddhiḥ hananādāviṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntimūlaṃ rāgendhanaṃ dagdhvaiva śāmyatītyakṣarārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2762: yadvā rāgataḥ prāptā sā kriyā rāganāśe svayameva śāmyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2763: parapakṣe tu hananavirodhikriyā kāryetyukte 'pi hananasyeṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntyanirāsāt pracyutirdurvārā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2770: evamagaurasurā adharma ityādau nāmadhātvarthayuktasya nañaḥ pratiṣedhavācitvāyogāt anyaviruddhalakṣakatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2772: duḥkhābhāvaphalake nañarthe siddhe niṣedhaśāstramānatvavadvedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi mānatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2777: śravaṇajñānamātrātsaṃsārānivṛttāvapi sākṣātkārājjīvata eva muktirdurapahnayeti sadṛṣṭāntamāha-atrocyata ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2781: ātmano dehasaṃbandhasya bhrāntiprayuktatvāttatvadhiyā tannāśarūpamaśarīratvaṃ jīvato yuktamityāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2782: asaṅgātmarūpaṃ tvaśarīratvaṃ tatvadhiyā jīvato vyajyata ityāha-nityamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2789: pūrvadehaśca tatpūrvadehakṛtakarmaṇa iti bījāṅkuravadanāditvānnāyaṃ doṣa ityata āha-andheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2791: na hi bījāṅkuraḥ tato bījāntaraṃ ca yathā pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tadvadātmano dehasaṃbandhaḥ pūrvakarmakṛtaḥ pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2796: svato niṣkriyasyāpi kārakasaṃnidhinā kartṛtvamiti śaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyeṇa nirasyati-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2797: rājādīnāṃ svakrītabhṛtya kartṛtvaṃ yuktaṃ nātmana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2806: prasiddho jñāto vastunorbhedo yena tasya gauṇamukhyajñānāśrayatva prasiddherityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2807: yasya tasya puṃso gauṇau bhavatā ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2814: yadā saṃśayamūlayorna gauṇatvaṃ tadā bhrāntimūlayoḥ kiṃ vācyamityāha-yathā veti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2822: yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ ahinirlvayanī sarpatvak vālmīkādau pratyastā nikṣiptā mṛtā sarpeṇa tyaktābhimānā vartate,
GSP33brssgo1u:2824: atha tathā tvacā nirmuktasarpavadevāyaṃ dehastho 'śarīraḥ viduṣo dehe sarpasya tvacīvābhimānābhāvādaśarīratvādamṛtaḥ prāṇitīti prāṇo jīvannapi
