GSP33brssgo1u:2830: brahmajñānamuddiśya śravaṇavanmanananididhyāsanayorapyavāntaravākyabhedena vidhyaṅgīkārānna brahmaṇo vidhiśeṣatvaṃ uddeśyajñānalabhyatayā prādhānyādityāha-neti
GSP33brssgo1u:2836: yadi jñāne vidhimaṅgīkṛtya vedānatairavagataṃ brahma vidheyajñāne karmakārakatvena viniyujyeta tadā vidhiśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2845: uktarītyā brahmaṇaḥ svātantrye satyeva bhagavato vyāsasya pṛthakśāstrakṛtiryuktā,
GSP33brssgo1u:2850: ato bāhyadharmasya śuddhidvārā mānasopāsanādharmahetutvātpariśiṣṭo mānasadharmo jijñāsya iti sūtraṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2852: tṛtīyādhyāye śrutyādibhiḥśeṣaśeṣitvanirṇayānantaraṃ śeṣiṇāśeṣasya prayogasaṃbhavāt kaḥ kratuśeṣaḥ ko vā puruṣaśeṣaḥ iti vijñāsyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2857: jaimininā brahma na vicāritamiti tajjijñāsyatvasūtraṇaṃ yuktamityarathaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2858: vedāntārthaścedadvaitaṃ tarhi dvaitasāpekṣavidhyādīnāṃ kā gatirityāśaṅkya jñānātprāgeva teṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na paścādityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2862: sadabādhitaṃ brahma pūrvamātmā viṣayānādatta iti sarvasākṣyahamityevaṃbodhe jāte
GSP33brssgo1u:2864: naro 'haṃ kartā mūḍha iti mithyātmābhimānasya ca sarvavyavahārahetorasatve kāryaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2869: jñātavyaparamātmavijñānātprāgevājñānācciddhātorātmānaḥ pramātṛtvaṃ pramātaiva jñātaḥ san pāpmarāgadveṣamaraṇavivarjitaḥ paramātmā syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2870: pramātṛtvasya kalpitatve tadāśritānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāmāṇya kathamityata āha-deheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2871: dehātmatvapratyayaḥ kalpito bhramo 'pi vyavahārāṅgatayā mānatveneṣyate vaidikaiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2873: vedāntānāṃ tu kālatrayābādhyabodhitvāt tatvāvedakaṃ prāmāṇyamiti tu śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2883: evaṃ tāvadvedāntavākyānāṃ brahmātmāvagatiprayojanānāṃ brahmātmani tātparyeṇa samanvitānāmantareṇāpi kāryānupraveśaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2886: sāṃkhyādayastu pariniṣṭhitaṃ vastu pramāṇāntaragamyameveti manyamānāḥ pradhānādīni kāraṇāntarāṇyanumimānāstatparatayaiva vedāntavākyāni yojayanti
GSP33brssgo1u:2887: sarveṣveva vedāntavākyeṣu sṛṣṭiviṣayeṣvanumānenaiva kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ lilakṣayiṣitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2889: kāṇādāstvetebhya eva vākyebhya īśvaraṃ nimittakāraṇamanumimate aṇūṃśca samavāyikāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2891: tatra padavākyapramāṇajñenācāryeṇa vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmāvagatiparatvadarśanāya vākyābhāsayuktābhāsavipratipattayaḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛtya nirākriyante
GSP33brssgo1u:2892: tatra sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānaṃ triguṇamacetanaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti manyamānā āhuḥ- yāni
GSP33brssgo1u:2900: tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñānena kāryakāraṇavantaḥ puruṣāḥ sarvajñā yoginaḥ prasiddhāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2902: na kevalasyākāryakāraṇasya puruṣopalabdhimātrasya sarvajñatvaṃ kiñcijjñatvaṃ vā kalpayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2903: triguṇatvāttu pradhānasya sarvajñānakāraṇabhūtaṃ sattvaṃ pradhānāvasthāyāmapi vidyata iti pradhānasyācetanasyaiva sataḥ sarvajñatvamupacaryate
GSP33brssgo1u:2904: vedāntavākyeṣvavaśyaṃ ca tvayāpi sarvajñaṃ brahmābhyupagacchatā sarvajñānāktimattvenaiva sarvajñatvamupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2905: nahi sarvaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ kurvadeva brahma vartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2906: tathāhi- jñānasya nityatve jñānakriyāṃ prati svātantryaṃ brahmaṇo hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:2912: nāsaṃhatasyaikātmakasya brahmaṇa ityevaṃ prāptaṃ idaṃ sūtramārabhyate- @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:2914: buddhau yaḥ pratibimbaḥ sa tādṛśabimbapūrvakaḥ pratibimbatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2924: na sāṃkhyaparikalpitamacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vedānteṣvāśrayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:2930: (chāndo. 6.2.1) ityupakramya 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tattejo 'sṛjata' (chāndo. 6.2.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2931: tatredaṃśabdavācyaṃ nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ jagatprāgutpatteḥ sadātmanāvadhārya tasyaiva prakṛtasya sacchabdavācyasyekṣaṇapūrvakaṃ tejaḥprabhṛteḥ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:2945: yattūktaṃ sattvadharmeṇa jñānena sarvajñaṃ pradhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:2950: yadi guṇasāmye sati sattvavyapāśrayāṃ jñānāktimāśritya sarvajñaṃ pradhānamucyeta kāmaṃ rajastamovyapāśrayāmapi jñānapratibandhakaśaktimāśritya kiñcijjñamucyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:2957: tathāsati yannimittamīkṣitṛtvaṃ pradhānasya tadeva sarvajñaṃ mukhyaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇamiti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2962: yasya hi sarvaviṣayāvabhāsanakṣamaṃ jñānaṃ nityamasti so 'sarvajña iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:2963: anityatve hi jñānasya kadācijjānāti kadācinnajānātītyasarvajñatvamapi syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2964: nāsau jñānanityatve doṣo 'sti jñānanityatve jñānaviṣayaḥ svātantryavyapadeśo nopapadyata iti cenna,
GSP33brssgo1u:2966: nanu saviturdāhyaprakāśasaṃyoge sati dahati prakāśayatīti vyapadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2967: natu brahmaṇaḥ prāgutpatterjñānakarmasaṃyogo 'stīti viṣamo dṛṣṭāntaḥ / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:2968: asatyapi karmaṇi savitā prakāśata iti kartṛtvavyapadeśadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2969: evamasatyapi jñānakarmaṇi brahmaṇaḥ 'tadaikṣata' iti kartṛtvavyapadeśopapatterna vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2973: tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīye nāmarūpe avyākṛte vyācikīrṣite iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2975: kimu vaktavyaṃ tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhṛtiviṣayaṃ nityajñānaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2979: apicāvidyādimataḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ śarīrādyapekṣā jñānotpattiḥ syānna jñānapratibandhakāraṇarahitasyeśvarasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:2980: mantrau cemāvīśvarasya śarīrādyanapekṣatāmanāvaraṇajñānatāṃ ca darśayataḥ- 'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate
GSP33brssgo1u:2981: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca' (śvetā. 6.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2983: sa vetti vedyaṃ na ca tasyāsti vettā tamāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam' (śvetā. 3.19) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:2991: tatkṛtaśca śabdapratyayavyavahāro lokasya dṛṣṭo ghaṭacchidraṃ karakādicchidramityādirākāśāvyatireke 'pi tatkṛtā cākāśe ghaṭākāśādibhedamithyābuddhirdṛṣṭā
GSP33brssgo1u:2993: dṛśyate cātmana eva sato dehādisaṃghāte 'nātmanyātmatvābhiniveśo mithyābuddhimātreṇa pūrveṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:2997: yathā tu tarkeṇāpi brahmaṇa eva kāraṇatvaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyate na pradhānādīnāṃ tathā prapañcayiṣyati- 'na vilakṣaṇatvādasya'- (bra. 2.1.4)
GSP33brssgo1u:3000: bhavatu siddhe vedāntānāṃ samanvayaḥ tathāpi mānāntarāyoge brahmaṇi śaktigrahāyogāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:3004: ghaṭavat ityanumānagamye triguṇe pradhāne samanvaya ityākṣipantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3006: ata eva pradhānādavanumānopasthite śaktigrahasaṃbhavāt tatparatayā vākyāni yojayantītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3008: śuṅgena liṅgena kāraṇasya svato 'nveṣaṇaṃ darśayanto mānāntarasiddhameva jagatkāraṇaṃ vadantītyāha-sarveṣviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3013: yathā rathādiriti sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānagamyāḥ pradhānapuruṣa saṃyogā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3015: sṛṣṭivākyebhya eva parārthānumānarūpebhyo yatkāryaṃ tadbuddhimatkartṛkamitīśvaraṃ kartāraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3035: trayo guṇā eva pradhānaṃ tasyasāmyavasthā tadabhedapradhānamityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3037: nanu mayā kimiti śaktimatvarūpaṃ gauṇaṃ sarvajñatvamaṅgīkāryamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3039: anityajñānasya pralaye nāśācchaktimatvaṃ vācyaṃ kārakābhāvāccetyāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3049: evaṃ tatsadīkṣitvā ākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tejaḥ sṛṣṭavadityāha-taditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3051: satvākrāntamiti yāvat sa jīvābhinnaḥ paramātmā 'prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3052: vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano annamannādvīryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ karmalokālokeṣu
GSP33brssgo1u:3054: nanu 'ikśitapo dhātunirdeśe'iti kātyāyanasmaraṇādīkṣateriti padena śtibantena dhāturucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3055: tena dhātvarthaṃ īkṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ vyākhyāyata ityaśaṅkya lakṣaṇayetyāha-īkṣiteriticeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3056: 'itikartavyatāvidheryajateḥ pūrvavatvaṃ'iti jaiminisūtre yathā yajatipadena lakṣaṇayā dhātvartho yāga ucyate tadvidihāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3064: saṃprati na kevalajaḍavṛttirjñānaśabdārthaḥ kintu sākṣibodhaviśiṣṭā vṛttirvṛttivyaktabodho vā jñānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3068: nanu sattvavṛttimātreṇa yogināṃ sarvajñatvamuktamityata āha-yogināṃt tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3074: nityasyāpi jñānasya tattadarthopahitatvena brahmasvarūpādbhedaṃ kalpayitvā kāryatvopacārādbrahmaṇastatkartṛtvavyapadeśaḥ sādhuriti sadṛṣṭāntamāha-na pratateti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3077: nanu prakāśaterakarmakatvātsavitā prakāśata iti prayoge 'pi jānāteḥ sakarmakatvātkarmābhāve 'tadaikṣata'ityayuktamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3079: karmāvivakṣāyāmapi prakāśarūpe savitari prakāśata iti kathañcitprakāśakriyāśrayatvena kartṛtvopacāravaccidātmanyapi cidrūpekṣaṇakartṛtvopacārānna vaiṣamyamityuktaṃ pūrvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3084: nanu māyopādhikabimbacinmātrasyeśvarasya kathamīkṣaṇaṃ prati mukhyaṃ kartṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3090: avyākṛte sūkṣmātmanā sthite vyākartuṃ sthūlīkartumiṣṭe ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3091: avyākṛtakāryoparaktacaitanyarūpekṣaṇasya kārakānapekṣatve 'pi vṛttirūpekṣaṇasya kārakaṃ vācyamityāśaṅkyāha-apicāvidyādimata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3092: yathaikasya jñānaṃ tathānyasyāpīti niyamābhāvānmāyino 'śarīrasyāpi janyekṣaṇakārakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3093: nanu yajjanyajñānaṃ taccharīrasādhyamiti vyāptirastītyāśaṅkya śrutibādhamāha-mantrau ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3099: jñānarūpeṇa balena yā sṛṣṭikriyā sā svābhāvikī /
GSP33brssgo1u:3101: jñānasya caitanyasya balaṃ māyāvṛttipratibimbitattvena sphuṭatvaṃ tasya kriyānāma bimbatvena brahmaṇo janakatā jñātṛtāpi svābhāvikīti vārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3123: vastuto dehādibhinnasvaprakāśasyaiva sata ātmano naro 'hamiti bhramodṛṣṭatvāddurapahnavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3124: sa ca mithyābuddhyā mīyata iti mithyābuddhimātreṇa bhrāntisiddhājñānena kalpita iti cakārārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3128: pūrvapūrvabhrāntimātreṇa dṛśyate na ca prameyatayeti vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3134: atrāha- yaduktaṃ nācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagatkāraṇamīkṣitṛtvāditi tadanyathāpyupapadyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3136: yathā pratyāsannapatanatāṃ nadyāḥ kūlasyālakṣya kūlaṃ pipātiṣatītyacetane 'pi kūle cetanavadupacāro dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3137: tadvadacetano 'pi pradhāne pratyāsannasarge cetanavadupacāro bhaviṣyati 'tadaikṣata' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3138: yathā loke kaściccetanaḥ snātvā bhuktvā cāparāhne grāmaṃ rathena gamiṣyāmītīkṣitvānantaraṃ tathaiva niyamena pravartate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3165: iti ca tejo 'bannānāṃ sṛṣṭimuktvā tadeva prakṛtaṃ sadīkṣitṛ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3167: devatāśabdena parāmṛśyāha- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupravaśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' (chāndo. 6.3.2) iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3168: tatra yadi pradhānamacetanaṃ guṇavṛttyekṣitṛ kalpyeta tadeva prakṛtatvātseyaṃ devateti parāmṛśyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:3170: jīvo hi nāma cetanaḥ śarīrādhyakṣaḥ prāṇānāṃ dhārayitā,
GSP33brssgo1u:3174: nācetanasya pradhānasya cetano jīvaḥ svarūpaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3175: atha tu cetanaṃ brahma mukhyamīkṣitṛ parigṛhyate tasya jīvaviṣaya ātmaśabdaprayoga upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3176: tathā 'sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chāndo. 6.14.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:3177: ityatra 'sa ātmā' iti prakṛtaṃ sadaṇimānamātmānamātmaśabdenopadiśya 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti cetanasya śvetaketorātmatvenopadiśati,
GSP33brssgo1u:3185: nanu pradhānasya cetanena kiṃ sāmyaṃ yena gauṇamīkṣaṇamiti tatrāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3190: sā prakṛtā sacchabdavācyā iyamīkṣitrī devatā parokṣā hanta idānīṃ bhūtasṛṣṭyanantaraṃ imāḥ sṛṣṭāstisrastejo 'bannarūpāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3192: anena pūrvakalpānubhūtenajīvenātmanā mama svarūpeṇa tā anupraviśya tāsāṃ bhogyatvāya nāma ca rūpaṃ ca sthūlaṃ kariṣyāmītyaikṣatetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3196: svapakṣe tu bimbapratibimbayorloke bhedasyakalpitatvadarśanājjīvo brāhmaṇaḥ sata ātmeti yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3197: jīvasya sacchabdārthaṃ pratyātmaśabdāt sanna pradhānamityuktvā satau jīvaṃ pratyātmaśabdānna pradhānamiti vidhāntareṇa hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-tatheti
GSP33brssgo1u:3205: kintu tadeva sadabhādhitaṃ sarvātmakaṃ brahmāsīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3212: āptejasodṛgviṣayatvātsṛjyatvānniyamyatvāccācetanatvamīkṣaṇasya mukhyatve bādhakamasti sādhakaṃ ca nāstīti hetoryuktamīkṣaṇasya gauṇatvamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3216: syādetadyadi sata īkṣaṇaṃ mukhyaṃ syāttadeva kuta ityata āha-satastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3222: yathā rājñaḥ sarvārthakāriṇi bhṛtye bhavatyātmaśabdo mamātmā bhadrasena iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3229: FN: anena pūrvasṛṣṭyanubhūtena prāṇadhṛtihetunāmātmanā sadrūpeṇa yathoktā devatāḥ sargānantaraṃ praviśya nāma rūpaṃ ceti vispaṣṭamāsamantātkaravāṇīti parā devatekṣitavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3233: 'sa ātmā' iti prakṛtaṃ sadaṇimānamādāya 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti cetanasya śvetaketormokṣayitavyasya
GSP33brssgo1u:3234: tanniṣṭhamupadiśya 'ācāryavānpuruṣo veda' 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye
GSP33brssgo1u:3237: yadi hyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ tadasīti grāhayenmumukṣuṃ cetanaṃ santamacetano 'sīti tadā viparītavādī śāstraṃ puruṣasyānarthāyetyapramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3239: yadi cājñasya sato mumukṣoracetanamanātmānamātmetyupadiśetpramāṇabhūtaṃ śāstraṃ sa śraddhadhānatayāndhagolāṅgūlanyāyena tadātmadṛṣṭiṃ na parityajet,
GSP33brssgo1u:3242: tasmādyathā svargādyarthino 'gnihotrādisādhanaṃ yathābhūtamupadiśati tathā mumukṣorapi 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti yathābhūtamevātmānamupaduśatīti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3243: evañca sati taptaparaśugrahaṇamokṣadṛṣṭāntena satyābhisandhasya mokṣopadeśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3248: bhṛtye tu svāmibhṛtyabhedasya pratyakṣatvādupapanno gauṇa ātmaśabdo mamātmā bhadrasena iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3249: apica Dvacidgauṇaḥ śabdo dṛṣṭa iti naitāvatā śabdapramāṇaker'tho gauṇī kalpanā nyāyyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:3251: yattūktaṃ cetanācetanayoḥ sādhāraṇa ātmābdaḥ kratujvalanayoriva jyotiḥśabda iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3254: tasmāccetanaviṣaya eva mukhya ātmaśabdaścetanatvopacārādbhūtādiṣu prayujyate bhūtātmendriyātmeti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3255: sādhāraṇatve 'pyātmaśabdasya na prakaraṇamupapadaṃ vā kiñcinniścāyakamantareṇānyataravṛttitā nirdhārayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3258: saṃnihitaścetanaḥ śvetaketuḥ nahi cetanasya śvetaketoracetana ātmā saṃbhavatītyavocāma /
GSP33brssgo1u:3260: jyotiḥśabdo 'pi laukikena prayogeṇa jvalana eva rūḍhor'thavādakalpitena tu jvalanasādṛśyena kratau pravṛtta ityadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3261: athavā pūrvasūtra evātmaśabdaṃ nirastasamastagauṇatvasādhāraṇatvaśaṅkatayā vyākhyāya tataḥ svatantra eva pradhānakāraṇanirākaraṇaheturvyākhyeyaḥ 'tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3264: tadā cetanaṃ santaṃ mumukṣumacetano 'sītibruvacchāstraṃ viparītavādibhūtvā puṃso 'narthāyetikṛtvā syādapramāṇamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3266: 'yathā satyābhisaṃdhastaptaṃ paraśuṃ sa na dahyate 'tha mucyate' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3272: 'athaiṣa jyotiḥ'śrutyā sahasradakṣiṇāke kratau jyotiṣṭome lokaprayogādagnau ca jyotiḥśabdo yathā mukhyastadvadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3273: tasminsatpadārthe niṣṭā abhedajñānaṃ yasya sa sanniṣṭhastasya muktiśravaṇāditi sūtrārthamāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3276: kaścitkila duṣṭātmā mahāraṇyamārge patitamandhaṃ svabandhunagaramaṃ jagamiṣuṃ babhāṣe,
GSP33brssgo1u:3278: sa cāndhaḥ sukhāṃ vāṇīmākarṇya tamāptaṃ matvovāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:3280: yadatra bhavānmāṃ dīnaṃ svābhīṣṭanagaraprāpyasamarthaṃ bhāṣata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3288: ātmajñānābhāve sati vihanyeta mokṣaṃ na prāpnuyāt pratyutānarthaṃ saṃsāraṃ ca prāpnuyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3292: kasyacidāropitacoratvasya satyena taptaṃ paraśuṃ gṛhṇato mokṣo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3293: taddṛṣṭāntena satye brahmaṇi ahamityabhisaṃdhimato mokṣo yathā 'satyābhisaṃdhastaptaṃ paraśuṃ gṛhṇāti sa na dahyate 'tha mucyate'iti śrutyopadiṣṭaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3294: sa upadeśaḥ saṃpatpakṣe na yuktaḥ ityāha-anyatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3296: tasmānmokṣopadeśānmukhye saṃbhavati gauṇatvasyānyāyyatvāccātmaśabdaḥ sati mukhya ityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3302: astuvāvyāpivastūnāṃ sādhāraṇastathāpi tasyātra śrutau pradhānaparatve 'pi niścāyakābhāvānna pradhānavṛttitetyāha-sādhāraṇatve 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3303: cetanavācitve tu prakaraṇaṃ śetaketupadaṃ ca niścāyakamastītyāha-prakṛtaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3309: 'etāni vāva tāni jyotīṃṣi ya etasya stomāḥ'ityarthavādena kalpitaṃ jvalanena sādṛśyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3311: tathā ca jyotīṃṣi stomā asyeti jyotiṣṭoma ityatra jyotiḥśabdo gauṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3312: nanvātmaśabdāditi pūrvasūtra evātmaśabdasya pradhāne gauṇatvasādhāraṇatvaśaṅkānirāsaḥ kartumucitaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3313: mukhyārthasya lāghavenoktisaṃbhave gauṇatvanānārthakatvāśaṅkāyā durbalatvena tannirāsārthaṃ pṛthaksūtrāyāsānapekṣaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3314: tathā ca śaṅkottaratvenāsūtrākhyānaṃ nātīva śobhata ityarucerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3315: nirastā samastā gauṇatvanānārthakatvaśaṅkā yasyātmaśabdasya sa tacchaṅkastasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3317: sata ātmaśabde jīvābhinnatvāditi hetvapekṣayā mokṣopadeśaḥ svatantra eva pradhānakāraṇatvanirāse heturityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brssgo1u:3322: yadyānātmaiva pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ 'sa ātmā tattvamasi' itīhopadiṣṭaṃ syātsa
GSP33brssgo1u:3323: tadupadeśaśravaṇādanātmajñatayā tanniṣṭho mā bhūditi mukhyamātmānamupadidikṣustasya heyatvaṃ brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3324: yathārundhatīṃ didarśayiṣustatsamīpasthāṃ sthūlāṃ tārāmamukhyāṃ prathamamarundhatiti grāhayitvā tāṃ pratyākhyāya paścādarundhatīmeva grāhayati tadvannāyamātmeti brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3332: 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:3333: kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bhavatīti yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3334: vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' /
GSP33brssgo1u:3337: naca sacchabdavācye pradhāne bhogyavargakāraṇe heyatvenāheyatvena vā vijñāte bhoktṛvargo vijñāto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:3340: nanu yathā kaścidarundhatīṃ darśayituṃ nikaṭasthāṃ sthūlāṃ tārāmarundhatītvenopadiśati,
GSP33brssgo1u:3341: tadvadanātmana eva pradhānasya satpadārthasyātmatvopadeśa iti śaṅkate-kutaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3346: vedānadhītyāgataṃ stabdhaṃ putraṃ pitovāca-he putra uta api,
GSP33brssgo1u:3347: ādiśyata ityādeśa upadeśaikalabhyaḥ sdātmā tamapyaprākṣyaḥ gurunikaṭepṛṣṭavānasi,
GSP33brssgo1u:3348: yasya śravaṇena mananena vijñānenānyasya śravaṇādikaṃ bhavatītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3349: nanvanyena jñātena kathamanyadajñātamapi jñātaṃ syāditi putraḥ śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3365: ataḥ kāraṇātiriktasya kāryasvarūpasyābhāvātkāraṇajñānena tajjñānaṃ bhavatīti sthite dārṣṭāntikamāha-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3366: mṛdvadbrahmaiva satyaṃ viyadādivikāro mṛṣeti brahmajñāne sati jñeyaṃ kiñcinnāvaśiṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3367: yadyapi pradhāne jñāte tādātmyādvikārāṇāṃ jñānaṃ bhavati tathāpi na puruṣāṇāṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3374: uta api ādisyata ityādeśastaṃ śāstrācāryoktigamyaṃ vastvaprākṣyaḥ pṛṣṭavānasyācāryam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3375: vācārabhyamāṇamuccāryamāṇaṃ nāmadheyameva vikāro na tu ghaṭaśarāvādināmātirikto mṛdi vikāro vastuto 'sti paramārthato mṛttikaiva tu satyaṃ vastvastīti
GSP33brssgo1u:3377: tadeva sacchabdavācyaṃ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate- 'yatraitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma satā
GSP33brssgo1u:3378: somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati tasmādenaṃ svapitītyācakṣate svaṃ hyapīto
GSP33brssgo1u:3380: eṣā śrutiḥ svapitītyetatpuruṣasya lokaprasiddhaṃ nāma nirvakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3387: sa upādhidvayoparame suṣuptāvasthāmupādhikṛtaviśeṣābhāvātsvātmani pralīna iveti 'svaṃ hyapīto bhavati' ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3388: yathā hṛdayaśabdanirvacanaṃ śrutvā darśitam- 'sa vā eṣa ātmā hṛdi tasyaitadeva niruktaṃ hṛdyayamiti tasmādhṛdayamiti' (chāndo. 8.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3389: yathāvāśanāyodanyāśabdapravṛttimūlaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ- 'āpa eva tadaśitaṃ nayante' 'teja eva tatpītaṃ nayante' (chā. 6. 8. 3,5) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3390: evaṃ svamātmānaṃ sacchabdavācyamapīto bhavatītīmamarthaṃ svapitināmanirvacanena darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3391: naca cetana ātmācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ svarūpatvena pratipadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:3394: śrutyantaraṃ ca - 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' /
GSP33brssgo1u:3396: ato yasminnapyayaḥ sarveṣāṃ cetanānāṃ taccetanaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ na pradhānam // 9 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:3397: FN: yatra suptau puṃsaḥ svapitītyetannāma bhavati tadā puruṣaḥ satā saṃpannastenaikībhūta iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3401: etatsvapanaṃ yathā syāttathā yatra suṣuptau svapitīti nāma bhavati tadā puruṣaḥ satā saṃpanna ekībhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3408: eterdhātorgatyarthasyāpipūrvasya layārthatve 'pi kathaṃ nityasya jīvasya laya ityāśaṅkya upādhilayāditi vaktuṃ jāgratsvapnayorupādhimāha-mana iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3410: tairghaṭādisthūlārthaviśeṣāṇāmātmanā saṃbandhādātmā tānindriyārthānpaśyansthūlaviśeṣeṇa dehenaikyabhrāntimāpanno viśvasaṃjño jāgarti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3411: jāgradvāsanāśrayamanoviśiṣṭaḥ saṃstaijasasaṃjñaḥ svapne vicitravāsanāsahakṛtamāyāpariṇāmānpaśyan 'somya tanmanaḥ'iti śrutisthamanaḥśabdavācyo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3412: sa ātmā sthūlasūkṣmopādhidvayoparame 'haṃ naraḥ karteti viśeṣābhimānābhavāllīna ityupacaryata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3419: idaṃ ca pradhānapakṣe na yuktamityāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3426: yadi tārkikasamaya iva vedānteṣvapi bhinnā kāraṇāvagatirabhaviṣyatkvaciccetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ Dvacidanyadeveti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3430: 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ' (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3434: iti cātmanaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ darśayanti sarve vedāntāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3440: vipratiṣṭheran nānāgatitvena diśo daśāpi prasṛtāḥ syurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3442: tattadvedāntajanyānāmavagatīnāṃ cetanakāraṇaviṣayakatvena sāmānyānnācetanaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti sūtrārthaṃ vyatirekamukhenāha-yadi tārkiketyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:3449: tadanantaraṃ lokyanta iti lokā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3450: nanu vedāntānāṃ svataprāmāṇyatvena pratyakaṃ svārthaniścāyakatvasaṃbhavātkiṃ gatisāmānyenetyata āha-mahacceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3454: evaṃ brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ gatisāmānyaṃ prāmāṇyadārḍhye heturityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brssgo1u:3459: svaśabdenaiva ca sarvajña īśvaro jagataḥ kāraṇamiti śrūyate śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ mantropaniṣadi
GSP33brssgo1u:3460: sarvajñamīśvaraṃ prakṛtya 'sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ' (śve. 6.9) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3466: evamīkṣatyādiliṅgairacetane vedāntānāṃ samanvayaṃ nirasya cetanavācakaśabdenāpi nirasyati-śrutatvācceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3469: 'jñaḥ kālakālo guṇī sarvavidyaḥ'iti sarvajñaṃ parameśvaraṃ prakṛtya 'sa sarvavitkāraṇam'iti śrutatvānnācetanaṃ kāraṇamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3477: teṣāṃ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktirīśvaro jagato janmasthitilayakāraṇamityetasyārthasya pratipādakatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3479: gatisāmānyopanyāsena ca sarve vedāntāścetanakāraṇavādina iti vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3484: 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛha. 4.5.15)
GSP33brssgo1u:3485: 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpaṃ vo vai bhūmā tadamṛtamatha yadalpaṃ tanmartyam' (chāndo. 7.24.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:3491: 'nyūnamanyatsthānaṃ saṃpūrṇamanyat' iti caivaṃ sahasraśo vidyāvidyāviṣayabhedena brahmaṇo dvirūpatāṃ darśayanti vākyāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:3497: eka eva tu paramātmeśvarastaistairguṇaviśeṣairviśiṣṭa upāsyo yadyapi bhavati tathāpi yathāguṇopāsanameva phalāni bhidyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:3498: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruteḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3499: 'yathākraturasmiṃloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati' (chā. 3.14.1) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3500: smṛteśca- 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssgo1u:3501: taṃ tamevaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ //' (gī. 8.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3502: yadyapyeka ātmā sarvabhūteṣu sthāvarajaṅgameṣu gūḍhastathāpi cittopādhiviśeṣatāratamyādātmanaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3507: yatra yatra vibhūtyādyatiśayaḥ sa sa īśvara ityupāsyatayā codyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3508: evamihāpyādityamaṇḍale hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvapāpmodayaliṅgātpara eveti vakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3511: evaṃ sadyomuktikāraṇamapyātmajñānamupādhiviśeṣadvāreṇopadiśyamānamapyavivakṣitopādhisaṃbandhaviśeṣaṃ parāparaviṣayatvena saṃdihyamānaṃ vākyagatiparyālocanayā nirṇetavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3513: evamekamapi brahmāpekṣitopādhisaṃbandhaṃ nirastopādhisaṃbandhaṃ copāsyatvena jñeyatvena ca vedānteṣūpadiśyata iti pradarśayituṃ paro grantha ārabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3514: yacca 'gatisāmānyāt' ityacetanakāraṇanirākaraṇamuktaṃ tadapi vākyāntarāṇi brahmaviṣayāṇi vyācakṣāṇena brahmaviparītakāraṇaniṣedhena prapañcyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:3522: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimihānandamayaśabdena parameva brahmocyate yatprakṛtam 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' (tai. 2.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:3530: iha tu 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ' ityādi śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3531: śārīratvaṃ ca śrūyate- 'tasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3533: tasya pūrvasya vijñānamayasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā ya eṣa ānandamaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3534: naca saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyasaṃspārśo vārayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3540: ānandamayaṃ prastutya 'raso vai saḥ' iti tasyaiva rasatvamuktvocyate- 'rasaṃhyevāyaṃ labdhvā'nandī bhavati' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3546: 'ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān na bibheti kutaścana' (tai. 2.8,9) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3550: evamānandaśabdasya bahukṛtvo brahmaṇyabhyāsādānandamaya ātmā brahmeti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3558: yathārundhatīnidarśane barhvīṣvapi tārāsvamukhyāsvarundhatīṣu darśitāsu yāntyā pradarśyate sā mukhyaivārundhatī bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:3575: sarvavedāntānāṃ kārye pradhānādyacetane ca samanvayanirāsena brahmaparatvaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3578: tatra kasya vākyasya saguṇopāsanāvidhidvārā niguṇe samanvayaḥ kasya vā guṇavivakṣāṃ vinā sākṣādeva brahmaṇi samanvaya ityākāṅkṣaiva kāraṇamityāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3583: yasyāṃ khalvajñānāvasthāyāṃ dvaitamiva kalpitaṃ bhavati tattadetaraḥ sannitaraṃ paśyatīti dṛśyopādhikaṃ vastu bhāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3584: yatra jñānakāle viduṣaḥ sarvaṃ jagadātmamātramabhūttattadā tu kena kaṃ paśyedityākṣepānnirupādhikaṃ tattvaṃ bhāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3585: yatra bhumni niścito vidvān dvitīyaṃ kimapi na vetti so 'dvitīyo bhūmā paramātmā nirguṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3587: yatra saguṇe sthito dvitīyaṃ vetti tadalpaṃ paricchinnaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3591: dhīraḥ paramātmaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā nāmāni ca kṛtvā buddhyādau praviśya jīvasaṃjño vyavaharanyo vartate sa saguṇastaṃ nirguṇatvena vidvānapyamṛto bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3596: añjanaṃ mūlatamaḥsaṃbandho dharmādikaṃ vā tacchūnyaṃ nirañjanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3597: kiñcāmṛtasya mokṣasya svayameva vākyotthavṛttisthatvena paramutkṛṣṭaṃ setuṃ laukikasetuvatprāpakam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3598: yathā dagdhendhano 'nalaḥ śāmyati tamivāvidyāṃ tajjaṃ ca dagdhvā praśāntaṃ nirguṇamātmānaṃ vidyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3606: vidyāviṣayo jñeyaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ satyaṃ avidyāviṣaya upāsyaṃ saguṇatvaṃ kalpitamityavirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3609: teṣāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā jñānaṃ mukhyaṃ phalamiti tadvākyānāmapi mahātātparyaṃ brahmaṇīti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3622: paramātmasvarūpābhede 'pyupādhibhedenopahitopāsyarūpabhedādupāsananāṃ bhede sati phalabheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3623: taṃ paramātmānaṃ yadyadguṇatvena lokā rājānamivopāsate tattadguṇavatvameva teṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3625: iha yādṛśadhyānavān bhavati mṛtvā tādṛśopāsyarūpo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3627: nanu sarvabhūteṣu niratiśayātmana ekatvādupāsyopāsakayostāratamyaśrutayaḥ kathamityāśaṅkya pariharati-yadyapyeka iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3630: tasyātmana ātmānaṃ svarūpamāvistarāṃ prakaṭataraṃ yo veda upāste so 'śnute taditi tarappratyayādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3634: atra sūryāderapi na jīvatvenopāsyatā kintvīśvaratvenetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3638: ityuktvā yatra na vivakṣitaḥ tadvākyaṃ jñeyabrahmaparamiti nirṇayārthamārambha ityāha-evaṃ sadya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3645: teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ vikārā ādhyātmikā dehaprāṇamanobuddhijīvā annamayādayaḥ pañcakośāḥ iti śruteḥ paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3647: ityuktaṃ tarhi mayaṭo vikāre prācurye ca mukhyatvātsaṃśaye vikāraprāyapāṭhādānandādhikāro
GSP33brssgo1u:3648: jīva ānandamaya iti niśacayo 'stīti pratyudāharamasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha kiṃ tāvadityākāṅkṣāpūrvakam-kimiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3667: yadyapi eṣa ākāśaḥ pūrṇaḥ ānandaḥ sākṣiprerako na syāttadā ko vānyāccalet,
GSP33brssgo1u:3671: 'yuvā syātsādhuyuvā'ityādinā vakṣyamāṇā manuṣyayuvānanadamārabhya brahmānandāvasānā eṣā saṃnihitā ānandasya tāratamyamīmāṃsā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3673: mukhyasiddhānte tūpasaṃkramaṇaṃ viduṣaḥ kośānāṃ pratyaṅmātratvena vilāpanamiti jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3677: sarvāntaratvaṃ na śrutamityāśaṅkya tato 'nyasyānuktestasya sarvāntaratvamiti vivṛṇoti-mukhyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3687: vikāraśabdān neti cen na prācuryāt / BBs_1,1.13 /
GSP33brssgo1u:3698: ānandapracuratvaṃ ca brahmaṇo manuṣyatvādārabhyottarasminnuttarasminsthāne śataguṇa ānanda ityuktvā brahmānandasya niratiśayatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3700: vikārārthakamayaṭ śrutisahāya ityāśaṅkya mayaṭaḥ prācurye 'pi vidhānānmaivamityāha-vikāretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3702: taditiprathamāsamarthācchabdātprācuryaviśiṣṭasya prastutasya vacane 'bhidhāne gamyamāne mayaṭpratyayo bhavatīti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3706: atra hyannaṃ pracuramasminnityannaśabdaḥ prathamāvibhaktiśaktastasmānmayaṭ yajñasya prakṛtyarthānnaprācuryavācī dṛśyate na śuddhaprakṛtavacana iti dhyeyam //13//
GSP33brssgo1u:3711: yasmādānandahetutvaṃ brahmaṇo vyapadiśati śrutiḥ- 'eṣa hyevānandayāti' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3713: yo hyanyānānandayati sa pracurānanda iti prasiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3714: yathā loke yo 'nyeṣāṃ dhanikatvamāpādayati sa pracuradhana iti gamyate, tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:3727: yasya vijñānāya 'anyo 'ntara ātmānyo 'ntara ātmā' iti prakrāntaṃ tanmāntravarṇikameva brahmeha gīyate 'anyo 'ntara ātmānandamayaḥ' (tai. 2.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3737: yasmādevaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasmāttanmāntrāvarṇikameva brahmānandamaya iti vākye gīyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3763: tatra prākśarīrādyutpatterabhidhyānaṃ sṛjyamānānāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ sraṣṭuravyatirekaḥ sarvavikārasṛṣṭiśca,
GSP33brssgo1u:3781: tena dehādibhūtasyātmano 'pyātmānanviṣṭo 'nveṣṭavyo 'labdho labdhavyo 'śrutaḥ śrotavyo 'mato mantavyo 'vijñāto vijñātavya ityādibhedavyapadeśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3782: pratiṣidhyata eva tu paramārthataḥ sarvajñātparameśvarādanyo draṣṭā śrotā vā 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' (bṛ. 3.7.23) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3784: yathā māyāvinaścarmakhaḍgadharātsūtreṇākāśamadhirohataḥ sa eva māyāvī paramārtharūpo bhūmiṣṭho 'nyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3794: nanu labdhṛlabdhavyabhāve 'pyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syadata āha-nahi labdhaiveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3798: tarhyātmana evātmanā labhyatvoktibādhaḥ abhedādityāśaṅkya kalpitabhedānna bādha ityāha-tathāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3801: ātmanaḥ svājñānajabhrameṇa dehādyabhinnasya bhedabhrāntyā paramātmano jñeyatvādyuktirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3808: ata īśvarāddraṣṭā jīvo 'nyo nāstīti cejjīvabhedādīśvarasyāpi mithyātvaṃ syādata āha-parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3809: avidyāpratibimbatvena kalpitājjīvāccinmātra īśvaraḥ pṛthagastīti na mithyātvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3813: nanu sūtrabalādbhedaḥ satya ityata āha-īdṛśaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3821: iti kāmayitṛtvanirdeśānnānumānikamapi sāṃkhyaparikalpitamacetanaṃ pradhānamānandamayatvena kāraṇatvena vāpekṣitavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3823: iti nirākṛtamapi pradhānaṃ pūrvasūtrodāhṛtāṃ kāmayitṛtvaśrutimāśritya prasaṅgātpunarnirākriyate gatisāmānyaprapañcanāya // 18 //
GSP33brssgo1u:3830: asminn asya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti / BBs_1,1.19 /
GSP33brssgo1u:3832: yasmādasminnānandamaye prakṛta ātmani pratibuddhasyāsya jīvasya tadyogaṃ śāsti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3836: tadyogaṃ śāsti śāstraṃ- 'yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnadṛśye 'nātmye 'nirukte 'nilayane 'bhayaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vindate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3842: yadā tvetasminnānandamaye nirantaraṃ tādātmyena pratitiṣṭhati tadā saṃsārabhayānnivartata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3846: idaṃ tviha vaktavyam- 'sa vā eṣa puruṣo 'nnarasamayaḥ' /
GSP33brssgo1u:3848: anyo 'ntara ātmā prāṇamayaḥ' tasmāt 'anyo 'ntara ātmā manomayaḥ' tasmāt 'anyo 'ntara ātmā vijñānamayaḥ' (tai. 2.1, 2,3,4)
GSP33brssgo1u:3849: iti ca vikārārthe mayaṭpravāhe satyānandamaya evākasmādardhajaratīyanyāyena kathamiva mayaṭaḥ prācuryarthātvaṃ brahmaviṣayatvaṃ cāśrīyata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3853: tasmāttasmādāntarasyāntarasyānyasyānyasyātmana ucyamānatvāt ānandamayāttu na kaścidanya āntara ātmocyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3856: atrocyate- yadyapyannamayādibhya ivānandamayādanyo 'ntara ātmeti na śrūyate tathāpi nānandamayasya brahmatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3857: yata ānandamayaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate- 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3862: tatra yadbrahma mantravarṇe prakṛtam- 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3868: tatra kathaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svapradhānatvaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:3870: nanvānandamayāvayavatvenāpi brahmaṇi vijñāyamāne na prakṛtatvaṃ hīyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3872: atrocyate- tathā sati tadeva brahmānandamaya ātmāvayavī tadeva ca brahmapucchaṃ pratiṣṭhāvayava ityasāmañjasyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3873: anyataraparigrahe tu yuktaṃ 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatraiva brahmanirdeśa āśrayituṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3876: apica brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā ityuktatvedamucyate- 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3882: brahmaṇa eva bhāvābhāvavedanayorguṇadoṣābhidhānādgamyate 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatra brahmaṇa eva svapradhānatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3886: ānandamayasya pucchatvena nirdiśyate- 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3889: pratiṣṭhā parāyaṇamekanīḍaṃ laukikasyānandajātasya brahmānanda ityetadanena vivakṣyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3893: apica ānandamayasya brahmatve priyādyavayavatvena saviśeṣaṃ brahmābhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3899: apica ānandapracura ityukte duḥkhāstitvamapi gamyate prācuryasya loke pratiyogyalpatvāpekṣatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3923: 'yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt' ityādirbrahmaviṣayaḥ prayogo na tvānandamayābhyāsa ityavagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3927: nanvānandamayasyopasaṃkramitavyasyānnamayādivadbrahmatve sati naiva viduṣo brahmaprāptiphalaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:3931: yato vāco nivartante' ityadinā ca prapañcyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3932: yā tvānandamayasaṃnidhāne 'so 'kāmayata bahusyāṃ prajāyeyeti' iyaṃ śrutirudāhṛtā
GSP33brssgo1u:3933: sā 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityanena saṃnihitatareṇa brahmaṇā saṃbadhyamānā nānandamayasya
GSP33brssgo1u:3938: 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' ityatra puṃliṅgenāpyātmaśabdena brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3939: yā tu bhārgavī vāruṇī vidyā 'ānando brahmeti vyajānāt' iti tasyāṃ mayaḍaśravaṇāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:3941: tasmādaṇumātramapi viśeṣamanāśritya na svata eva priyaśirastvādi brahmaṇa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3944: tasmādannamayādiṣvivānandamaye 'pi vikārārtha eva mayaḍvijñeyo na prācuryārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3945: sūtrāṇi tvevaṃ vyākhyeyāni- 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatra kimānandamayāvayavatvena brahma vivakṣyata uta svapradhānatveneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3946: pucchaśabdādavayavatveneti prāpta ucyate- 'ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt' ānandamaya ātmetyatra 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' iti svapradhānameva brahmopadiśyate, abhyasāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3947: 'asanneva sa bhavati' ityasminnigamanāśloke brahmaṇa eva kevalasyābhyasyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3956: annamayādīnāṃ hi śiraādiṣu pucchāntevavayaveḥṣūkte tvānandamayasyāpi śiraādīnyavayavāntarāṇyuktvāvayavaprāyāpattyā 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'
GSP33brssgo1u:3960: sarvasya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya kāraṇatvena brahma vyapadiśyate- idaṃ sarvamasṛjata /
GSP33brssgo1u:3962: naca kāraṇaṃ sat brahma svavikārasyānandamayasya mukhyayā vṛttyāvayava upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3963: aparāṇyapi sūtrāṇi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pucchavākyanirdiṣṭasyaiva brahmaṇa upapādakāni draṣṭavyāni // 19// @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:3965: anirukte nikṛṣyocyanta iti niruktāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi taiścābhedavarjite,
GSP33brssgo1u:3967: udaramiti ut api aramalpam antaraṃ bhedam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3971: yato yasmāt vācaḥ śaktivṛttyā tamaprakāśyaiva nivartante /
GSP33brssgo1u:3977: asminniti viṣayasaptamī ānandamayaviṣayakaprabodhavato jīvasya tadyogaṃ yasmācchāsti tasmānna pradhānamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3984: abhayaṃ yathā syattathā yadaiva pratiṣṭhāṃ manasaḥ prakṛṣṭāṃ vṛttimeṣa vidvāṃllabhate atha tadaivābhayaṃ brahma prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3985: ut api aramalpamapyantaraṃ bhedaṃ yadaivaiṣa naraḥ paśyati atha tadā tasya bhayamiti yojanā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3987: iha paravyākhyāyāṃ vikārārthake mayaṭibuddhisthe satyakasmātkāraṇaṃ vinā ekaprakaraṇasthasya mayaṭaḥ pūrvaṃ vikārārthakatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3988: ante prācuryārthakatvamityardhajaratīyaṃ kathamiva kena dṛṣṭāntenāśrīyata itīdaṃ vaktavyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3992: kiṃvā vastuto 'pyāntaraṃ brahma na śrūyata iti vikalpya ādyamaṅgīkaroti-atrocyate-yadyapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4004: tatra tātparyaṃ nāstīti vaktuṃ kalpyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4005: evaṃ pucchavākye prakṛtasvapradhānabrahmapare sati na prakṛtahānyādidoṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4012: tatra virodhanirāsāyānyatarasmanvākye brahmasvīkāre pucchavākye brahma svīkāryamityāha-anyatareti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4024: ekaṃ mukhyaṃ nīḍamadhiṣṭhānaṃ sopādānasya jagata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4027: yatra saviśeṣatvaṃ tatra vāṅmanasagocaratvamiti vyāpteratra vyāpakābhāvoktyā nirviśeṣamucyata ityāha-nirviśeṣamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4044: tatsiddhau tannirṇaya iti parasparāśraya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4047: nanu 'sa ya evaṃvit'iti brahmavidaṃ prakramyopasaṃkramaṇavākyena phalaṃ nirdiśyate tattasyābrahmatve na sidhyatīti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4049: jñānena kośānāṃ bādhastaditi siddhānte bādhāvadhipratyagānandalābhor'thādukta uttaraślokena sphuṭīkṛta ityāha-tadapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4056: mayaṭśrutyā sāvayavatvādiliṅgena ca sthānaṃ bādhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4059: pūrvamīkṣateḥ saṃśayābhāvāditi yuktyā prāyapāṭho na niścāyaka ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4069: atra hi prakṛtasya brahmaṇo jñānārthaṃ kośāḥ pakṣitvena kalpyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:4071: tatrānandamayasyāpi avayavāntaroktyanantaraṃ kasmiṃścitpucche vaktavye prakṛtaṃ brahma pucchapadenoktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4075: priyādiviśiṣṭatvākāreṇānandamayasya jīvasya kāryatvāttaṃ prati śeṣatvaṃ brahmaṇo na yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4085: ayamānandamayo brahmarasaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatīti bhedokteśca tasyāpratipādyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4088: kāmyata iti kāmānandaḥ tasya bhṛguvallyāṃ pañcamasya brahmatvadṛṣṭerānandamayasyāpi brahmatvānumānāpekṣā na kārya,
GSP33brssgo1u:4090: bhedavyapadeśāccetsaguṇaṃ brahmātra vedyaṃ syādityāśaṅkyāha-asminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti //19//
GSP33brssgo1u:4091: guhānihitatvena pratīci 'sa ekaḥ'ityupasaṃhṛte pucchāvākyokte brahmaṇyahameva paraṃ brahmeti prabodhavata ānandamayasya 'yadā hi 'iti śāstraṃ brahmabhāvaṃ śāsti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4097: idamāmnāyate- 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate hiraṇyaśmaśrurhiraṇyakeśa
GSP33brssgo1u:4098: āpraṇakhātsarvaṃ eva suvarṇaḥ' 'tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkamevamakṣiṇī tasyoditi
GSP33brssgo1u:4099: nāma sa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya udita udeti ha vai sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyo ya evaṃ veda'
GSP33brssgo1u:4102: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kiṃ vidyākarmātiśayavaśātprāptotkarṣaḥ kaścitsaṃsārī sūryamaṇḍale cakṣuṣi copāsyātvena śrūyate kiṃvā nityasiddhaḥ parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4106: akṣipuruṣe 'pi tadevātideśena prāpyate- 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yadamuṣya rūpam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4112: 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti sve mahimni' (chā. 7.24.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4115: ' sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca' (chāṃ 1.6.8)
GSP33brssgo1u:4117: 'sa eṣa ye caitasmādarvāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ca' ityakṣipuruṣasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:4119: 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssgo1u:4121: tasmānnākṣyādityayorantaḥ parameśvara ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- 'antastaddharmopadeśāt' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4122: 'ya eṣo 'ntarāditye' 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi' iti ca śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvara eva, na saṃsārī /
GSP33brssgo1u:4125: tadyathā- 'tasyoditi nāma' iti śrāvayitvā asyādityapuruṣasya nāma 'sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya uditaḥ' iti sarvapāpmāpagamena nirvakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4126: tadeva ca kṛtanirvacanaṃ nāmākṣipuruṣasyāpyatidiśati- 'yannāma tannāma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4127: sarvapāpmāpagamaśca paramātmana eva śrūyate- 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā' (chāṃ. 8.7.1) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:4128: tathā cākṣuṣe puruṣe 'saivarktatsamāsa tadukthaṃ tadyajustadbrahma' ityṛksamāsādyātmakatāṃ nirdhārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4132: vākprāṇādyātmake cādhyātmamanukramyāha- 'tasyarkca sāma ca geṣṇau' ityadhidaivatam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4133: tathādhyātmamapi- ' yāvamuṣya geṣṇau tau geṣṇau' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4135: tadya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyantyetaṃ te gāyanti tasmātte dhanasanayaḥ' (chā. 1.7.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:4136: iti ca laukikeṣvapi gāneṣvasyaiva gīyamānatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4141: lokakāmeśititṛtvamapi niraṅ kuśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ parameśvaraṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4144: 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssgo1u:4145: sarvabhūtaguṇairyuktaṃ maivaṃ māṃ jñātumarhasi' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4146: apica yatra tu nirastasarvaviśeṣaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpamupadiśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4148: sarvakāraṇattvāttu vikāradharmairapi kaiścidviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvara upāsyatvena nirdiśyate- 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ' (chāṃ 3.14.2) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4159: bhāgo 'tyantatejasvī tattulyaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathātyantadīptimattathāsya devasyākṣiṇī prakṛṣṭadīptimatī,
GSP33brssgo1u:4160: tasya uditīti udita udgataḥ sakāryasarvapāpāspṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4162: amuṣmādādityādūrdhvagā ye lokāsteṣāmīśitā ye ca devānāṃ kāmā bhogāsteṣāṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4172: kapermarkaṭasya āsaḥ pucchabhāgo 'tyantatejasvī tattulyaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā dīptimadevaṃ tasya puruṣasyākṣiṇī,
GSP33brssgo1u:4182: rūpavattvādibahupramāṇavaśājjīvo hiraṇmaya itipūrvadṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvamutsargataḥ siddhanirguṇasamanvayasyāpavādārthaṃ pūrvapakṣayati-saṃsārīti
GSP33brssgo1u:4187: amuṣmādādityādūrdhvagā ye kecana lokāsteṣāmīśvaro devabhogānāṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4188: sa eṣo 'kṣisthaḥ puruṣa etasmādakṣṇo 'dhastanā ye lokāḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4189: ye ca manuṣyakāmā bhogāsteṣāmīśvara iti maryādā śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4193: kiñca jalānāmasaṃkarāya loke vidhārako yathā setuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4202: naca 'na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati'iti śruterādityajīvasyāpi pāpmāsparśitvamiti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4203: śruteradhunā karmānadhikāriṇāṃ devānāṃ kriyamāṇapāpmāsaṃmbandhe tatphalāsparśe vā tātaparyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:4204: teṣāṃ saṃcitapāpābhāve 'kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti 'ityayogātyabhipretyāha--sarvapāpmāpagamaśca paramātmana eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4228: nanu loke rājāno gīyante neśvara ityata āha-yadyaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4232: tadyuktaṃ satvaṃ rajādikaṃ madaṃśa eveti tadgānamīśvarasyaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4238: yatra tūpāsyatvenocyate tatretyadhyāhṛtya sarvakāraṇatvātprāptarūpavatvaṃ 'sarvakarmā'ityādiśrutyā nirdiśyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4246: 'ya āditye tiṣṭhannādityāntaro yamādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya ādityamantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛ. 3.7.9)
GSP33brssgo1u:4248: tatra hi 'ādityādantaro yamādityo na veda' iti vediturādityādvijñānātmano 'ntaryāmī spaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4253: ādityajīvādīśvarasya bhedokteḥ śrutyantare jīvādanya īśvaraḥ siddha iti sūtrārthamāha-astīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4261: tasmātpara evādityādisthānaka udgīthe upāsya iti siddham //21//
GSP33brssgo1u:4266: idamāmananti- 'asya lokasya kā gatirityākāśa iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva
GSP33brssgo1u:4267: samutpadyanta ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yantyākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam' (chāndo. 1.9.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4268: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimākāśaśabdena paraṃ brahmābhidhīyata uta bhūtākāśamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4275: iti 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:4280: kutaḥ, taddhi prasiddhatareṇa prayogeṇa śīghraṃ buddhimārohati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4287: nanu bhūtākāśaparigrahe vākyaśeṣo nopapadyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante' ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4294: tasmādākāśaśabdena bhūtākāśasya grahaṇamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- 'ākāśastalliṅgāt' ākāśaśabdena brahmaṇo grahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4296: parasya hi brahmaṇa idaṃ liṅgam- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4302: tathā 'ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti' iti brahmaliṅgaṃ 'ākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam' iti ca jyāyastvaparāyaṇatve /
GSP33brssgo1u:4303: jyāyastvaṃ hyānāpekṣikaṃ paramātmanyevaikasminnāmnātam- 'jyāyānpṛthivyā jyāyamantarikṣājjyāyāndivo jyāyānebhyo lokebhyaḥ' (chāṃ 3.14.3) iti
GSP33brssgo1u:4305: śrutiśca bhavati- 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma rāterdātuḥ parāyaṇam' (bṛ. 3.9.28) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4308: taṃ cākāśamudgīthe saṃpādyopasaṃharati- 'sa eṣa parovarīyānudgīthaḥ sa eṣo 'nantaḥ' (chāṃ 1.9.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4310: yatpunaruktaṃ bhūtākāśaṃ prasiddhibalena prathamataraṃ pratīyata iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4311: atra brūmaḥ- prathamataraṃ pratītamapi sat vākyaśeṣagatānbrahmaguṇāndṛṣṭvā na parigṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4312: darśitaśca brahmaṇyapyākāśaśabdaḥ- 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:4313: tathākāśaparyāyavācināmapi brahmaṇi prayogo dṛśyate- 'ṛco akṣare parame vyomandevā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ' (ṛ.saṃ 1.164.39)
GSP33brssgo1u:4325: te nāmarūpe yadantarā yasmādanye yasya vā madhye staḥ tannāmarūpāspṛṣṭaṃ brahmeti vākyoṣādatrākāśo brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4334: ṛco ṛgupakṣitāḥ sarve vedā jñāpakāḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4340: asya pṛthvilokasyānyasya ca ka ādhāra iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4348: yatra kalpitatvena madhye sta iti vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4362: dālbhyaśālāvatyau brāhmaṇau rājā ceti traya udgīthavidyākuśalā vicārayāmāsuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4364: tatra svargādāgatābhiradbhirjīvitena prāṇena kriyamāṇodgīthasya svarga eva parāyaṇamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:4365: dālbhyapakṣamapratiṣṭhādoṣeṇa śālāvatyo ninditvā svargasyāpi karmadvārā heturayaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4367: taṃ śālāvatyasya pakṣaṃ 'antavadvai te kila śālāvatyasāma'iti rājā ninditvānantamevākāśaṃ vakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4370: udgītha ākāśa eveti saṃpādanādudgīthasyānantatvādikaṃ na svata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4382: evakārasarvaśabdānugṛhītānantyādibahuliṅgānāmanugrahāya 'tyajedekaṃ kulasyārthe'iti nyāyenaikasyāḥ śruterbādho yukta ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4386: tasya tatparyāyāṇāṃ ca brahmaṇi prayogaprācuryāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4387: akṣare kūṭasthe vyoman vyomni ṛco vedāḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4388: pramāṇatvena yasminnakṣare viśve devā adhiṣṭhitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4389: oṅkāraḥ kaṃ sukhaṃ brahma khaṃ vyāpakamityupāsīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:4393: 'oṃ khaṃ brahma khaṃ purāṇam'iti bṛhadāraṇyakamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4402: udgīthe- 'prastotaryā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā' ityupakramya śrūyate- katamā sā
GSP33brssgo1u:4403: devateti prāṇā iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate
GSP33brssgo1u:4410: ata iha prāṇaśabdena katarasyopādānaṃ yuktamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4414: nanu pūrvavadihāpi talliṅgādbrahmaṇa eva grahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4415: ihāpi vākyaśeṣe bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamanaṃ pārameśvaraṃ karma pratīyate / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:4417: evaṃ hyāmnāyate- 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyete prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ manaḥ sa yadā prabudhyate prāṇadevādhi punarjāyante' (śa.brā. 10.3.3.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:4418: iti. pratyakṣaṃ caitatsvāpakāle prāṇavṛttāvaparilupyamānāyāmindriyavṛttayaḥ parilupyante prabodhakāle ca prādurbhavantīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4419: indriyasāratvācca bhūtānāmaviruddho mukhye prāṇe 'pi bhūtasaṃveśanodgamanavādī vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4422: tatsāmānyācca prāṇasyāpi na brahmatvamityevaṃ prāpte sūtrakāra āha- 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4424: ata eva talliṅgātprāṇaśabdamapi paraṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4425: prāṇasyāpi hi brahmaliṅgasaṃbandhaḥ śrūyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate' (chāṃ 1.115) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4426: prāṇanimittau sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmutpattipralayāvucyamānau prāṇasya brahmatāṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4429: atrocyate- svāpaprabodhayorindriyāṇāmeva kevalānāṃ prāṇāśrayaṃ saṃveśanodgamanaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4431: ihatu sendriyāṇāṃ saśarīrāṇāṃ ca jīvāviṣṭānāṃ bhūtānāṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4432: 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4434: nanu sahāpi viṣayairindriyāṇāṃ svāpaprabodhayoḥ prāṇe 'pyayaṃ prāṇācca prabhavaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4435: śṛṇumaḥ- 'yadā suptaḥsvapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati tadainaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4448: yathā pituḥ piteti prayoge 'nyaḥ pitā ṣaṣṭīnirdiṣṭo 'nyaḥ prathamānirdiṣṭaḥ pituḥ piteti gamyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4449: tadvat 'prāṇasya prāṇam' iti śabdabhedātprasiddhātprāṇādanyaḥ prāṇasya prāṇa iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4450: nahi sa eva tasyeti bhedanirdeśārhe bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4451: yasya ca prakaraṇe yo nirdiśyate nāmāntareṇāpi sa eva tatra prakaraṇī nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4452: yathā jyotiṣṭomādhikāre- 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta' ityatra jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭomaviṣayo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:4453: tathā parasya brahmaṇaḥ prakaraṇe 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo vāyuvikāramātraṃ kathamavagamayet /
GSP33brssgo1u:4456: FN: cākrāyaṇarṣirdhanārthī rājño yajñaṃ gatvovāca- he prastotaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4463: bhūteṣvindriyāṇi sūkṣmatvādbhoktṛsāmīpyācca sārāṇi atasteṣāṃ layodayoktyetareṣāmapi tatsiddheḥ śeṣaghaṭanetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4465: prāṇaḥ paramātmā bandhanamāśrayaḥ svarūpaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4472: tāṃ cedajñātvā mama viduṣo nikaṭe prastoṣyasi mūrdhā te patiṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4479: manaupādhiko jīvaḥ prāṇena brahmaṇā badhyate suṣuptāvekībhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4480: prāṇasya vāyoḥ prāṇaṃprerakaṃ tasya sattāsphūrtipradamātmānaṃ ye viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4488: indriyāṇi liṅgātmarūpāṇi apañcīkṛtabhūtānāṃ sārāṇi teṣāṃ layādyuktyā bhūtānāmapi prāṇe layādisiddheḥ vākyaśeṣopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4490: udgātṛpratihartṛbhyāmudgīthe pratihāre ca kā devateti pṛṣṭena cākrāyaṇenādityo 'nnaṃ ca nirdiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4496: bhavantīti bhūtānīti vyutpatyā yatkiñcidbhavanadharmakaṃ kāryamātraṃ tasya layodayau
GSP33brssgo1u:4497: vāyuvikāre prāṇe na yuktāvityuktvā bhūtaśabdasya rūḍhārthagrahe 'pi layāderbrahmanirṇāyakatvamityāha-yadāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4500: atha yadā suṣupto jīvaḥ prāṇe brahamaṇyekībhavati tadā enaṃ prāṇaṃ saviṣayavāgadayo 'piyantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4501: atra jīvābhannatve sarvalayādhāratvaliṅgānna mukhyaḥ prāṇa ityāha-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4503: ekavākyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣaḥ tasya balaṃ tadgataṃ liṅgaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4504: prāṇamevetyavadhāraṇena sarvabhūtaprakṛtitvaliṅgana ca prāṇapadena tatkāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣyamityāha-tadākāśaśabdasyeveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4511: idamāmananti- 'atha yadataḥ paro jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥpṛṣṭeṣu sarvataḥpṛṣṭeṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥpuruṣe jyotiḥ' (chā. 3.13.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4512: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha jyotiḥśabdenādityādi jyotirabhidhīyate kiṃvā paramātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4518: tamo jyotiriti hīmau śabdau parasparapratidvandvī vīṣayau prasiddhau /
GSP33brssgo1u:4522: nahi rūpādihīnaṃ brahma 'dīpyate' iti mukhyāṃ śrutirmahati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4524: nahi carācarabījasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmakasya dyaurmaryādā yuktā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4525: kāryasya tu jyotiṣaḥ paricchinnasya dyaurmaryādā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4538: sarvatrāpi gamyamānasya jyotiṣaḥ 'paro divaḥ' ityupāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4542: iti ca kaukṣeye jyotiraṣi paraṃ jyotiradhyasyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4548: 'tadetaddṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cepyupāsīta' iti ca śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4554: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam' iti chandonirdeśāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4555: athāpi kathañcitpūrvasminvākye brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ syādevamapi na tasyeha pratyabhijñānamasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4558: atra punaḥ 'paro divo jyotiḥ' iti dyaurmaryādātvena /
GSP33brssgo1u:4559: tasmātprākṛtaṃ jyotiriha grāhyamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ-jyotiriha brahma grāhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4562: pūrvasminhi vākye catuṣpādbrahma nirdiṣṭam- 'tāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4565: tatra yaccatuṣpādo brahmaṇastripādamṛtaṃ dyusaṃbandhirūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tadeveha dyusaṃbandhānnirdiṣṭamiti pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4566: tatparityajya prākṛtaṃ jyotiḥ kalpayataḥ prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriye prasajyeyātām /
GSP33brssgo1u:4570: yattūktam- 'jyotiradīpyate' iti caitau śabdau kārye jyotiṣi prasiddhāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4581: tathā sati brahmaṇo 'pi caitanyarūpasya samastajagadavabhāsahetutvādupapanno jyotiḥśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4582: 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (kau. 2.5.15)
GSP33brssgo1u:4585: yadapyuktaṃ dyumaryādatvaṃ sarvagatasya brahmaṇo nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4586: atrocyate- sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4587: nanuktaṃ niṣpradeśasya brahmaṇaḥ pradeśaviśeṣakalpanā nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4596: auṣṇyaghoṣānumite kaukṣeye kārye jyotiṣyadhyasyamānatvātparamapi divaḥ kāryaṃ jyotireveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4599: 'dṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cetyupāsīta' iti tu pratīkadvārakaṃ dṛṣṭatvaṃ śrutatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4606: yatra tu guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ pratīkaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ vā brahmopadiśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4607: tatra saṃsāragocarāṇyevoccāvacāni phalāni dṛśyante- 'annādo vasudāno vidante vasu ya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 4.4.24)
GSP33brssgo1u:4609: yadyapi na svavākye kiñcijjyotiṣo brahmaliṅgamasti tathāpi pūrvasminvākye dṛśyamānaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4610: taduktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa- 'jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt' iti kathaṃ punarvākyāntaragatena brahmasaṃnidhānena jyotiḥśrutiḥ svaviṣayācchakyā pracyāvayitum
GSP33brssgo1u:4612: 'yadataḥ paro jyotiḥ' iti prathamatarapaṭhitena yacchabdena sarvanāmnā dyusaṃbnandhātpratyabhijñāyamāne
GSP33brssgo1u:4613: pūrvavākyanirdiṣṭe brahmaṇi svasāmārthyena parāmṛṣṭe satyarthājjyotiḥśabdasyāpi brahmaviṣayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4621: tāsāṃ tejobannānāmekaikaṃ dvidhā vibhajya punaścekaikaṃ bhāgaṃ dvedhā kṛtvā svabhāgāditarabhāgayornikṣipya trivṛtkaraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4623: ekatvasāmyādbhūrityasminnakṣare prajāpateḥ śirodṛṣṭiruktā tathātrāpi sārūpyaṃ vācyaṃ anyathādhyāsāsiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4634: kaukṣeyakaṃ hi jyotirjīvabhāvenānupraviṣṭasya paramātmano vikāraḥ jīvābhāve dehasya śaithilyāt jīvataścauṣṇyājjāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4638: vasu hiraṇyaṃ karmaphalaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4639: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmartyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4643: ato divo dyulokātparaḥ parastādyajjyotirdīpyate tadyatadidamiti jāṭharāgnāvadhyasyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4646: viśvasmātprāṇivargādupari sarvasmādbhūrādilokādupari ye lokāsteṣūttameṣu na vidyante uttamā yebhya ityanuttameṣu sarvasaṃsāramaṇḍalātītaṃ paraṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4649: atra svavākye spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgābhāve 'pi 'pādosya'iti pūrvavākye bhūtapādatvaṃ liṅgamastīti pādasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4662: svargādau jātaṃ kiñcidatīndriyaṃ tejo divaḥ parastādasti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4665: dhyānaṃ phalamityāśaṅkya niṣphalasya kvāpi dhyānaṃ nāstītyāha-idamevetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4668: tejo 'bannānāṃ devatānāmekaikaṃ dvidhā vibhajya punaścaikaikaṃ bhāgaṃ dvedhā kṛtvā
GSP33brssgo1u:4670: kiñcātra 'yadataḥ paraḥ'iti yacchabdenānyataḥ prasiddhaṃ dyumaryādatvaṃ dhyānāyānūdyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4674: tasya parigraha upasanārtho na viruddhata ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4679: niṣpradeśasya niravayavasya viśeṣe 'pi divaḥ parastāddedīpyamānabrahmāvayavakalpanā bhāginī yuktā na tvityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4682: yathā ekatvasāmyādbhūritivyāhṛtau prajāpateḥ śirodṛṣṭiḥ śrutā tathā jāṭharāgnāvabrahmatvaṃ ghoṣādiśrutyā prasiddhamiti jaḍajyotiṣṭvaṃ sāmyaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4692: nanu 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'iti pūrvavākyoktaṃ brahmātra jyotiḥpadena gṛhyatāmityāśaṅkyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4699: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam' 'vāgvai gāyatrī' 'yeyaṃ pṛthivī' 'yadidaṃ śarīram'
GSP33brssgo1u:4702: yaduktaṃ tāvān tatparimāṇaḥ sarvaḥ prapañco 'sya gāyatryanugatasya brahmaṇo mahimā vibhūtiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4708: asya puruṣasya divi svaprakāśasvarūpe tripādamṛtaṃ rūpamasti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4711: yathā loke pādātpādatrayamadhikaṃ tathedamadhikamiti bodhanārthaṃ tripādamṛtamityuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4716: iha tu pūrvavākyaprasiddhasya brahmaṇo dyusaṃbandhena pratyabhijñātasya yadarthatvaniśacayādyatpadaikārthakajyotiḥpadasyāpi sa evārtha ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4721: ataḥ prakaraṇājjyotiḥśrutibādho na yukta iti nirastam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4724: yena cetasā caitanyeneddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ sūryastapati prakāśayati taṃ bṛhantamavedavinna manuta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4725: jyotiḥśabdasya kāryajyotiṣyeva śaktirityaṅgīkṛtya kāraṇabrahmalakṣakatvamuktvā brahmaṇyapi śaktimāha-yadveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4726: gāḍhāndhakāre vācaiva jyotiṣā loka āsanādivyavahāraṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4727: ājyaṃ juṣatāṃ pibatāṃ mano jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ bhavati ityājyastutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4728: yathā gacchantamanugacchataḥ svasyāpi gatirasti tathā sarvasya svaniṣṭhaṃ bhānaṃ syādityata āha-tasya bhāseti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4729: tat kālānavacchinnaṃ brahma sūryādijyotiṣāṃ sākṣibhūtamāyuramṛtamiti ca devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4730: yoṣito 'gnitvavat dyumaryādatvādikaṃ dhyānārthaṃ kalpitaṃ brahmaṇo yuktamityāha-atrocyata ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4734: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tathā tathā phalaṃ bhavati'iti śruterityāha-na hīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4735: jñānaphalavadupāstīphalamekarūpaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-yatra hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4738: īśvaro jīvarūpeṇānnamattītyannādaḥ annasyāsamantāddātā vā vasu hiraṇyaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ yo veda sa dhanaṃ vindate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4741: mano vā pratīkaṃ vāco bhūya iti pratīkaviśeṣadhyānaśrutisaṃgrahārthamādyapadam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4744: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4748: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam / BBs_1,1.25 /
GSP33brssgo1u:4749: atha yaduktaṃ pūrvasminnapi vākye na brahmabhihitamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4750: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' (chāṃ. 3.12.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:4756: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' iti gāyatrīmupakramya tāmeva bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākyapramāṇabhedairvyakhyāya
GSP33brssgo1u:4757: 'saiṣā catuṣpādā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī tadetadṛcābhyanuktaṃ tāvānasya mahimā' iti tasyāmeva
GSP33brssgo1u:4760: iti brahmaśabdaḥ so 'pi chandasaḥ prakṛtatvācchandoviṣaya eva 'ya etāmevaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ veda' (chāṃ 3.11.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:4764: 'tathā cetorpaṇanigahāt' tathā gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa tadanugate brahmaṇi cetasor'paṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brahmaṇavākyena nigadyate- 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4769: tathānyatrāpi vikāradvāreṇa brahmaṇa upāsanaṃ dṛśyate- 'etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvaryava etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ' (ai.ā. 3.23.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4772: apara āha- sākṣādeva gāyatrīśabdena brahma pratipādyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4774: yathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādaistathā brahma catuṣpāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4776: tadyathā- 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' ityupakramyāha 'saiṣā virāḍannādi' (chā. 4.3.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4779: FN: ya etāṃ prakṛtāṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ vedarahasyaṃ madhuvidyārūpaṃ veda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmaprāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4781: adhvaryavo yajurvedinaḥ kratau chandogāḥ sāmavedino mahāvrate kratau /
GSP33brssgo1u:4785: pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā daśa santaḥ kṛtamityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4791: vedarahasyabhūtāṃ madhuvidyāmevamuktarītyā yaḥ kaścidveda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmā prāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4792: tathāca vedatvādgāyatryāṃ brahmaśabdo yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4796: naca gāyatryā dhyānārthaṃ sarvātmatvāropa iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4801: etaṃ paramātmānaṃ bahvṛcā ṛgvedino mahatyukthe śastre tadanugatamupāsate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4803: etameva chantogāḥ sāmavedino mahāvrate kratau upāsata ityaitareyake dṛṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4804: gāyatrīśabdo brahmalakṣaka iti vyākhyāya gauṇa ityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4807: pūrvaṃ tūpāsyatayā gāyatrīpadenājahallakṣaṇayā gāyatrībrahmaṇī dve api lakṣite /
GSP33brssgo1u:4810: gāyatrīpadārthaikadeśe gāyatryanugate brahmaṇi pradhāne sarvātmakatvānvayasaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4812: ceto brahmaṇi samarpyate yena sa cetorpaṇo gāyatrīśabdastena brahmaṇa eva nigadādabhidhānāt chandobhidhānamasiddhamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4817: pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā daśasaṃkhyākāḥ santaḥ kṛtamityucyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4818: santi hi kṛtatretādvāparakalisaṃjñakāni catvāri dyutāni krameṇa caturaṅkatryaṅkadvyaṅkaikāṅkāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:4827: evañca daśatvadvārā vāyvādiṣu kṛtatvaṃ virāṭtvaṃ ca dhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4834: ayo dyūtaṃ, kṛtasaṃjño 'yaḥ kṛtāyaḥ sa vijito yena tasmai,
GSP33brssgo1u:4837: evañca sā vāyvādidaśātmikā eṣā kṛtaśabditā virāḍannaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4841: atrāpara āhetyaparapadena gauṇatve svamataṃ neti dyotayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4842: ajahallakṣaṇāpakṣe hi 'vāgvai gāyatrī'iti vāgātmatvaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca iti niruktanāmakatvaṃ ca gāyatryā upādhitvenopāsyatvādupapannataram
GSP33brssgo1u:4852: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayāni hi nirdiśyāha- 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4853: nahi brahmānāśrayaṇe kevalasya chandaso bhūtādayaḥ pādā upapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4859: smṛtiśca brahmaṇa evaṃrūpatāṃ darśayati- 'viṣṭabhyāhamidaṃ kṛtsnamekāṃśena sthito jagat' (bhaga. 10.42) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4861: iti ca nirdeśa evaṃ sati mukhyārtha upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4863: iti ca hṛdayasuṣiṣu brahmapuruṣaśrutirbrahmasaṃbandhitāyāṃ vivakṣitāyāṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4865: tadeva brahma jyotirvākye dyusaṃbandhātpratyabhijñāyamānaṃ parāmṛśyata iti sthitam // 26 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:4866: FN: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇa iti ṣaṭprakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4868: nanu 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'iti prathama gāyatrīśruteḥ kathaṃ lakṣaṇetyāśaṅkya vākyaśeṣagatasarvātmakatvādyanekabalavatpramāṇasaṃvādena
GSP33brssgo1u:4878: hṛdayasya caturdikṣūrdhvaṃ ca pañca suṣayaḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4879: teṣu brahmasthānahṛnnagarasya prāgādidvāreṣu krameṇa prāṇavyānāpānasamānodānāḥ pañcadvārapālā iti dhyānārthaṃ śrutyā kalpitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4880: tatra hṛdayacchidrasthaprāṇeṣu brahmapuruṣatvaśrutirhṛdi gāyatryākhyabrāhmaṇa upāsanāsaṃbandhitāyāṃ brahmaṇo dvārapālatvādbrahmapuruṣā iti saṃbhavatītyāha-pañca brahmeti //26//
GSP33brssgo1u:4883: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt / BBs_1,1.27 /
GSP33brssgo1u:4884: yadapyetaduktaṃ pūrvatra- 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti saptamyā dyaurādhāratvenopadiṣṭā iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4885: punaḥ 'atha yadataḥ paro divaḥ' iti pañcamyā maryādātvena,
GSP33brssgo1u:4890: ubhayasminnapi saptamyante pañcamyante copadeśe na pratyabhijñānaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4891: yathā loke vṛkṣāgrasaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4892: vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātparataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4894: apara āha- yathā loke vṛkṣāgreṇāsaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4895: vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātpurataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4896: evaṃ ca divaḥ paramapi sadbrahma divītyupadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4899: divi diva iti vibhaktibhedātprakṛtapratyabhijñā nāstītyuktaṃ nopakṣaṇīyamityāha-tatparihartavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4905: yathā vṛkṣāgraṃ svalagnabhagāvacchinnaśyenasyādhāraḥ sanneva svālagnabhāgāvacchinnasya tasyaiva maryādā bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:4906: evaṃ divi sūrye hārdākāśe vā mukhye ādhāre sabrahmadivo maryadātvaṃ tadalagnākāśāvacchinnaṃ brahma prati kalpayitvā divaḥ paramityucyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4907: yadyākāśena anavacchinnaṃ brahma gṛhītvā pañcamyā divo maryādātvameva mukhyaṃ tadā gaṅgāyāṃ gheṣa itivatsaptamyā sāmīpyalakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ vyākhyeyamityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4908: sabaddhaṃ pratyādhāratvaṃ mukhyaṃ pūrvamuktaṃ divyeva saditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4909: asaṃbaddhaṃ prati maryādātvaṃ mukhyamadhunocyate divaḥ paramapīti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4915: asti kauṣītakibrāhmaṇopaniṣadīndrapratardanākhyāyikā- 'pratardano ha vai daivodāsirindrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma yuddhena ca pauruṣeṇa ca' ityārabhyāmnātā
GSP33brssgo1u:4916: tasyāṃ śrūyate- 'sa hovāca praṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4917: tathottaratrāpi 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' (ko. 1.1,2,3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4918: tathā 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4919: ante ca 'sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' (ko. 3.8) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4920: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimiha prāṇaśabdena vāyumātramabhidhīyata upa devatātmeti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4922: nanu 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' ityatra varṇitaṃ prāṇaśabdasya brahmaparatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4931: 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4933: tatra prasiddhervāyuḥ prāṇa iti prāpta ucyate-prāṇaśabdaṃ brahma vijñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4935: tathāhi- paurvāparyeṇa paryalocyamāne vākye padārthānāṃ samanvayo brahmapratipādanapara upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4937: 'varaṃ vṛṇīṣva' itīndreṇoktaḥ pratardanaḥ paramaṃ puruṣārthaṃ varamupacikṣepa- 'tvameva me vṛṇīśva yaṃ tvaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyase' iti
GSP33brssgo1u:4938: tasmai hitatamatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ paramātmā na syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4942: tathā 'sa yo māṃ veda na ha vai tasya kenacana karmaṇā loko mīyate na steyena na bhrūṇahatyayā' (kau. 3.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:4944: brahmavijñānena hi sarvakarmakṣayaḥ prasiddhaḥ- 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8)
GSP33brssgo1u:4948: tathopasaṃhāre 'pi 'ānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' ityānandatvādīni na brahmaṇo 'nyatra samyak saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4949: 'sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānbhavati no evāsādhunā karmaṇā kanīyāneṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokasya unninīṣate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4950: eṣa u bhavāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhyo 'dho ninīṣate' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4955: sa netyādinā dharmādyaspṛṣṭatvaṃ tatkārayitṛtvaṃ tadīśitṛtvaṃ ca sarvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4957: divodāsyāpatyaṃ daivodāsiḥ pratardano nāma rājā yuddhena puruṣakāreṇa ca karaṇenendrasya premāspadaṃ gṛhaṃ jagāma /
GSP33brssgo1u:4961: yaṃ tvaṃ martyāya hitatamaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvamevālocya mahyaṃ dehīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4968: prāṇasya dehadhārakatvamutthāpakatvaṃ ca prasiddhamiti vaktuṃ khalvityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4975: pūrvaṃ pradhānaprātipadikārthabalāt vibhaktyarthabādhavadvākyārthajñānaṃ prati hetutvena pradhānānekapadārthabalādekavākyatābhaṅga iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatirvāstu
GSP33brssgo1u:4979: hitatamatvakarmakṣayādipadārthānāṃ saṃbandho brahmaṇi tātparyaniścāyaka upalabhyata ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti-upakrama ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4980: yaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvameva prayacchetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4982: tasya viduṣo loko mokṣo mahatāpi pātakena na ha mīyate naiva hiṃsyate na pratibadhyate jñānāgninā karmatūlarāśerdagdhatvādityāha-sa ya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4989: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin / BBs_1,1.29 /
GSP33brssgo1u:4994: vaktā hīndro nāma kaścidvigrahavāndevatāviśeṣaḥ svamātmānaṃ pratardanāyācacakṣe- 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' ityahaṅkāravādena
GSP33brssgo1u:4995: sa eṣa vakturātmatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ brahma syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4998: tathā vigrahasaṃbandhibhireva brahmaṇyasaṃbhavadbhirdharmairātmānaṃ tuṣṭāva- 'triśīrṣāṇaṃ tvāṣṭramahanamarunmukhānyatīñśālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyaccham' ityevamādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5002: 'yā ca kācidbalakṛtirindrakarmaiva ta' diti hi vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5005: niścite caivaṃ devatātmopadeśe hitatamatvādivacanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ tadviṣayāṇyeva yojayitavyāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:5006: tasmādukturindrasyātmopadeśānna prāṇo brahmetyākṣipya pratisamādhīyate- 'adhyātmasaṃbhandhabhūmā hyasmin' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5008: 'yāvaddhyasmiñsarīre prāṇo vasati tāvadāyuḥ' iti prāṇasyaiva prajñātmanaḥ pratyagbhūtasyāyuṣyapradhānopasaṃhārayoḥ svātantryaṃ darśayati na devatāviśeṣasya parācīnasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:5009: tathāstitve ca prāṇānāṃ niḥśreyasamityadhyātmamevendriyāśrayaṃ prāṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5011: iti, 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' iti cepakramya 'tadyathā rathasyāreṣu
GSP33brssgo1u:5012: nemirarpitā nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5013: prāṇe 'rpitāḥ sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' iti viṣayondriyavyavahārānabhibhūtaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5015: 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt' iti copasaṃhāraḥ pratyagātmaparigrahe sādhurna parācīnaparigrahe /
GSP33brssgo1u:5021: arunmukhān rauti yathārthaṃ śabdayatīti rut vedāntavākyaṃ tanmukhe yeṣāṃ te runmukhāstebhyo 'nyānvedāntabahirmukhānyatīn sālāvṛkebhyo 'raṇyaśvabhyo dattavānasmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5023: nābhau cakrapiṇḍikāyāmarā arpitāḥ evaṃ bhūtāni pṛthivyādīni pañca mīyanta iti mātrā bhogyāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañceti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5027: trīṇi śīrṣāṇi yasyeti triśīrṣā tvaṣṭuḥ putro viśvarūpo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ taṃ hatavānasmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5029: tanmukhe yeṣāṃ te runmukhāstebhyo 'nyānvedāntabahirmukhān yatīnaraṇyaśvabhyo dattavānasmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5032: balavācinā prāṇaśabdena baladevatā lakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5041: astitve prāṇasthitau prāṇānāmindriyāṇāṃ sthitirityarthataḥ śrutimāha-astitva iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5046: loke prasiddhasya rathasyāreṣu neminābhyormadhyasthaśalākāsu cakropāntarūpā nemirarpitā,
GSP33brssgo1u:5048: evaṃ bhūtāni pañca pṛthivyādīni mīyanta iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:5049: mātrāḥ bhogyāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañceti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsu daśasvarpitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5050: indriyajāḥ pañca śabdādiviṣayaprajñāḥ mīyante ābhiriti mātrāḥ pañca dhīndriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5051: nemivadgrāhyaṃ grāhakeṣu areṣu kalpitamityuktvā nābhisthānīye prāṇe sarvaṃ kalpitamityāha-prāṇe 'rpitā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5052: sa prāṇo mama svarūpamityāha-sa ma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5053: tarhi pratyagātmani samanvayo na tu brahmaṇi,
GSP33brssgo1u:5058: indro nāma devatātmānaṃ svamātmānaṃ paramātmatvenāhameva paraṃ brahmetyārṣeṇa darśanena yathāśāstraṃ paśyannupadiśati sma- 'māmeva vijānīhi' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5059: yathā 'taddhaitatpaśyannṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipede 'haṃ manurabhavaṃ sūryaśca' iti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:5060: 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavat' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5061: yatpunaruktaṃ 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityuktvā vigrahadharmairindra ātmānaṃ tuṣṭāva tvāṣṭravadhādibhiriti,
GSP33brssgo1u:5063: atrocyate- na tvāṣṭravadhādīnāṃ vijñeyendrastutyarthatvenopanyāso yasmādevaṅkarmāhaṃ tasmānmāṃ vijānīhīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5067: 'tasya me tatra lobha ca na mīyate sa yo māṃ veda na ha vai tasya kena ca karmaṇā
GSP33brssgo1u:5070: yasmādīdṛśānyapi krūrāṇi karmāṇi kṛtavato mama brahmabhūtasya lomāpi na hiṃsyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5071: sa yo 'nyo 'pi māṃ veda na tasya kenacidapi karmaṇā loko hiṃsyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5072: vijñeyaṃ tu brahmaiva 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' iti vakṣyamāṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5078: vijñeyendrastutyartha upanyāso na cetkathaṃ tarhi sa iti pṛcchati-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5088: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt / BBs_1,1.31 /
GSP33brssgo1u:5089: yadyapyadhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmadarśanānna parācīnasya devatātmana upadeśaḥ tathāpi na brahmavākyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5091: jīvasya tāvadasminvākye vispaṣṭaṃ liṅgamupalabhyate 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5092: atra hi vāgādibhiḥ karaṇairvyāpṛtasya kāryakaraṇādhyakṣasya jīvasya vijñeyatvamabhidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5093: tathā mukhyaprāṇaliṅgamapi- 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5095: prāṇasaṃvāde vāgādīnprāṇānprakṛtya- 'tānvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca mā mohamāpadyathāhamevaitatpañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadprāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmi' (pra. 2.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:5097: ye tu imaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhya iti paṭhanti teṣāmimaṃ jīvamindriyagrāmaṃ vā parigṛhya śarīramutthāpayatīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5101: ca bhedanirdeśa ityubhayayā nirdeśa upapadyate- 'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vai prajñā
GSP33brssgo1u:5102: sa prāṇaḥ saha hyetāvasmiñśarīre vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5104: tasmādihajīvamukhyaprāṇayorantara ubhau vā pratīyeyātāṃ na brahmeti cet,
GSP33brssgo1u:5107: evaṃ sati trividhamupāsanaṃ prasajyeta- jīvopāsane mukhyaprāṇopāsanaṃ brahmopāsanaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5110: 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' ityuktvānte 'sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' ityekarūpāvupakramopasaṃhārau dṛśyete /
GSP33brssgo1u:5116: yattu mukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ darśitam- 'idaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' iti, tadasat /
GSP33brssgo1u:5119: itareṇa tu jīvanti yasminnetāvupāśritau' (kāṭha. 2.5.5) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5120: yadapi na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt ityādi jīvaliṅgaṃ darśitaṃ tadapi na brahmapakṣaṃ nivārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5124: buddhyādyupādhikṛtaṃ tu viśeṣamāśritya brahmaiva sañjīvaḥ kartā bhoktā cetyucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5125: tasyopādhikṛtaviśeṣaparityāgena svarūpaṃ brahma darśayituṃ 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādinā pratyagātmābhimukhīkaraṇārthamupadeśo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5127: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate //
GSP33brssgo1u:5128: ' (ke. 1.4) ityādi ca śrutyantaraṃ vacanādikriyāvyāpṛtasyaivātmano brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5129: yatpunaretaduktam- 'saha hyetāvasmiñśarīre vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti prāṇaprajñātmanorbhedadarśanaṃ brahmavāde nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5132: upādhidvayopahitasya tu pratyagātmanaḥ svarūpeṇābheda ityataḥ prāṇa eva prajñātmetyekīkaraṇamaviruddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:5133: athavā nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt ityasyāyamanyor'thaḥ- na brahmavākyo 'pi jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5135: trividhamiha brahmopāsane vivakṣitaṃ prāṇadharmeṇa prajñādharmeṇa svadharmeṇa ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:5139: 'atha yathāsyai prajñāyai sarvāṇi bhūtānyekībhavanti tadvyākhyāsyāmaḥ' ityupakramya
GSP33brssgo1u:5140: 'vāgevāsyā ekamaṅgamadūduhattasyai nāma parastātprativihitā bhūtamātrā prajñayā vācaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5141: samāruhya vācā sarvāṇi nāmānyāpnoti' ityādiḥ prajñādharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5142: tā vā etā daśaiva bhūtamātrā adhiprajñaṃ daśa prajñāmātrā adhibhūtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5143: yaddhi bhūtamātrā na syurna prajñāmātrāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5144: yaddhi prajñāmātrā na syurna bhūtamātrāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5147: 'tadyathā rathasyāreṣu nemirarpitā nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ prāṇe 'rpitāḥ sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmā' ityādirbrahmadharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5148: tasmādbrahma evaitadupādhidvayadharmeṇa svadharmeṇa caikamupāsanaṃ trividhaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5153: iti śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye śrīśaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ // 1 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:5154: FN: yathāyogaṃ kiñcidatra jīvavākyaṃ kiñcinmukhyaprāṇavākyaṃ kiñcidbrahmavākyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5155: prāṇasaṃvāde- vāgādayaḥ sarve pratyekamātmanaḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ manyamānāstannirdidhārayiṣayā prajāpatimupajagmuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5156: sa tānuvāca yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva bhavati sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5159: variṣṭhaḥ prāṇo 'bravīdahameva pañcadhā prāṇāpānādibhāvenātmānaṃ vibhajya etadbhāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśrityeti
GSP33brssgo1u:5160: pañca śabdādayaḥ pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5161: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhaya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5163: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate preryate vadanasāmarthyamāpadyate tadeva vāgāderagamyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:5171: sarve vāgādayaḥ prāṇā ahamahaṃ śreṣṭha iti vivadamānāḥ prajāpatimupajagmuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5173: yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataraṃ patiṣyati sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti tathākrameṇa vāgādipūtkrānteṣvapi mūkādibhāvena śarīraṃ svasthamasthāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5174: mukhyaprāṇasya tu uccikramiṣāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ vyākulatvāptau tānvāgādīnvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:5176: kiṃ tat, pañcadhā prāṇāpānādibhāvenātmānaṃ vibhajya etadvāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśritya dhārayāmītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5180: yadi jīvamukhyaprāṇayorliṅgādupāstatvaṃ tarhi brahmaṇo 'pi liṅgānāmuktatvādupāsanaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5182: naca svatantrapadārthabhedādvākyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5188: anyatra 'ata eva prāṇaḥ'ityādau vṛtterāśritvādihāpi tasya brahmaliṅgasya yogādbrahmapara eva prāṇaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5190: yasminnetau preryatvena sthitau tenetareṇa brahmaṇā sarve prāṇādivyāpāraṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5196: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate svakāryābhimukhyena preryate tadeva vāgādiragamyaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5197: tattvaṃpadavācyayoḥ svarūpato bhedasthābhyāmupalakṣyātmasvarūpābhedādekatvaṃ nirdiśyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5207: tasyāḥ saṃbhandhīni dṛśyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yathaikaṃ bhavantyadhiṣṭhānacidātmanā tathā vyākhyāsyāma ityupakramyoktam-'vāgeva'ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5210: arthātmakarūpaprapañcaviṣayitvamardhaṃ śarīramiti militvā viṣayitvākhyaṃ pūrṇaṃ śarīramindriyasādhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5211: tatra karmendriyeṣu vāgevāsyāḥ prajñāyā ekamaṅgaṃ dehārdhamadūduhat pūrayāmāsa /
GSP33brssgo1u:5214: tasyāḥ punarnāma kila cakṣurādinā prativihitā jñāpitābhūtamātrā rūpādyartharūpā parastādaparārdhe kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5216: evaṃ buddheḥ sarvārthadraṣṭṛtvamupapādya tanniṣṭhacitpratibimbadvārā sākṣiṇi draṣṭṛtvādhyāsamāha-prajñayeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5217: buddhidvārā cidātmā vācamindriyaṃsamāruhya tasyāḥ prerako bhūtvā vācā karaṇena sarvāṇi nāmāni vaktavyatvenāpnoti,
GSP33brssgo1u:5218: cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatītyevaṃ draṣṭā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5219: tathāca sarvadraṣṭṛtvaṃ cidātmani draṣṭṛtvādhyāsanimittatvaṃ ca buddherdharma ityuktaṃ bhavati sarvādhāratvāndatvādiḥ brahmadharma ityāha-tā vā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5221: prajñā indriyajātyā adhikṛtya grāhyā bhūtamātrā vartante,
GSP33brssgo1u:5222: prajñāmātrā indriyāṇi grāhyaṃ bhūtajātamadhikṛtya vartanta iti grāhya grāhakayormithaḥ sāpekṣatvamuktaṃ sādhayati-yaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5224: grāhyeṇa grāhyasvarūpaṃ na sidhyati kintu grāhakeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:5226: tasmātsāpekṣatvādetadgrāhyagrāhakadvayaṃ vastuto na bhinnaṃ kintu cidātmanyaropitamityāha-
GSP33brssgo1u:5246: ata upāsanāvidhilubdhena 'vaktāraṃ vidyāt' 'etadevokthamupāsīta' 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt'iti jīvaprāṇabrahmopāsanavidhayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5252: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhāyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo1u:5257: prathame pāde 'janmādyasya yataḥ' ityākāśādeḥ samastasya jagato janmādikāraṇaṃ brahmetyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5263: arthāntaraprasiddhānāṃ ca keṣāñcicchabdānāṃ brahmaviṣayatvahetupratipādanena kānicidvākyāni spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni saṃdihyamānāni brahmaparatayā nirṇītīni /
GSP33brssgo1u:5264: punarapyanyāni vākyānyaspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni saṃdihyante- kiṃ paraṃ brahma pratipādayantyāhosvidarthāntaraṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5271: idamāmnāyate- 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:5272: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta',
GSP33brssgo1u:5274: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyata āhosvitparaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5277: kutaḥ, tasya hi kāryakaraṇādhipateḥ prasiddho manaādibhiḥ saṃbandho na parasya brahmaṇaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5280: nanu 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti svaśabdenaiva brahmopāttaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5283: nedaṃ vākyaṃ brahmopāsanāvidhiparaṃ kiṃ tarhi śamavidhiparam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5284: yatkāraṇaṃ 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta' ityāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:5289: naca śamavidhiparatve satyanena vākyena brahmopāsanaṃ niyantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5290: upāsanaṃ tu 'sa kratuṃ kurvīta' ityanena vidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5292: tasya ca viṣayatvaṃna śrūyate- 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5295: 'eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye 'ṇīyānvrīhervā yavādvā' iti ca hṛdayāyatanatvamaṇīyastvaṃ cārāgramātrasya jīvasyāvakalpate nāparicchinnasya brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5297: atra brūmaḥ- na tāvadaṇīyastvaṃ jyāyastvaṃ cobhayamekasminsamāśrayituṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5304: yatsarveṣu vedānteṣu prasiddhaṃ brahmaśabdasyālambanaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃsa iha ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyopakrame śrute,
GSP33brssgo1u:5307: nanu vākyopakrame śamavidhivivakṣayā brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ na svavivakṣayetyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5308: atrocyate- yadyapi śamavidhivivakṣayā brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ tathāpi manomayatvādiṣūpadiśyamāneṣu tadeva brahma saṃnihitaṃ bhavati /
