GSP33brssgo1u:5309: jīstu na saṃnihito naca svaśabdenopātta iti vaiṣamyam // 1 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:5312: tasminnaniti ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ tajjaṃ catallaṃ ca tadanaṃ ceti tajjalān /
GSP33brssgo1u:5318: prāṇaḥ śarīramasyeti samāsagatasarvanāmnā saṃnihitārthena prakṛtaṃ brahma hitvā jīvamaprakṛtamicchataḥ prakṛtahāniraprakṛtaprakriyācetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5322: tadupajīvyottaraṃ pādadvayaṃ pravartata iti hetuhetumadvāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5331: tajjaṃ ca tallaṃ ca tadanaṃ ceti tajjalān /
GSP33brssgo1u:5350: ato jīvaliṅgaṃ balīya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-śārīra ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5356: atra prayojanābhāve 'pi yatra prayojanaṃ tatra bhavatyeva jagadviśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5369: sarvatra prasidvabrahmaṇa evātropāsyatvopadeśānna jīva upāsya iti sūtrārthamāha-sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5370: yatra phalaṃ nocyate tatra pūrvottarapakṣasidviḥ phalamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5373: 'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ karomi'iti saṃskārārthasadanasya nirākāṅkṣasyāpi 'tasminsīda'iti sākāṅkṣatacchabdena parāmarśadarśanādityāha-atrocyata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:5376: idaṃ hi liṅgadvayaṃ lokasidvaṃ jīvaṃ na saṃnidhāpayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:5385: yadyapyapauruṣeye vede vakturabhāvānneccārthaḥ saṃbhavati tathāpyupādānena phalenopacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5391: tadiha ye vivakṣitā guṇā upāsanāyāmupādeyatvenopadiṣṭāḥ satyasaṃkalpaprabhṛtayaste parasminbrahmaṇyupapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:5399: tadapi saṃbhavati sarvajagatkāraṇasya sarvātmano brahma ākāśātmatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5402: yattūktaṃ 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti jīvaliṅgaṃ na tadbrahmaṇyupapadyata iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:5404: sarvātmatvāddhi brahmaṇo jīvasaṃbandhīni manomayatvādīni brahmasaṃbandhīni bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5405: tathāca brahmaviṣaye śrutismṛtī bhavataḥ- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
GSP33brssgo1u:5406: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:5410: iyaṃ tu 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti saguṇabrahmaviṣayeti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5415: jīrṇaḥ sthaviro bhūtvā yodaṇḍena vañcati gacchati,
GSP33brssgo1u:5416: tathā yo jātaḥ bālaḥ so 'pi tvameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5418: sa ca prakṛteṣu guṇeṣvastīti vivakṣopacāra ityāha-tathāpyupādāneneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5419: nanvidaṃ grāhyamidaṃ tyājyamiti dhīrvivakṣādīnā vede kutaḥ syādityata āha-upādānānupādāne tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5426: jīrṇaḥ sthaviro yo daṇḍena vañcati gacchati so 'pi tvameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5428: sarvataḥ sarvāsu dikṣu śrutayaḥ śrotrāṇyasyeti sarvataḥ śrutimat /
GSP33brssgo1u:5442: jyāyānpṛthivyā' iti caivañjātīyakā guṇā na śārīra āñjasyenopapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:5446: śarīre bhavati natu śarīra eva bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:5451: FN: vāgeva vākaḥ so 'syāstīti vākī na vākī avākī vāgādisarvendriyarahitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5453: nanu jīvadharmaścebrahmaṇi yojyante tarhi brahmadharmā eva jīve kimiti na yojyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:5465: jyāyastvādyanupapattau śārīra iti paricchedo hetuḥ sūtroktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5472: etamiti prakṛtaṃ manomayatvādiguṇamupāsyamātmānaṃ karmatvena prāpyatvena vyapadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5486: yasmācchabdaviśeṣo bhavati samānaprakaraṇe śrutyantari- 'yathāvrīhirvā yavo vā śyamako vā śyamākataṇḍulo vaivamayamantarātmanpuruṣo hiraṇmayaḥ' (śata. brā. 10.6.3.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5487: śārīrasyatno yaḥ śabdo 'bhidhāyakaḥ saptamyanto 'ntarātmanniti tasmādviśiṣṭo 'nyaḥ prathamāntaḥ puruṣaśabdo manomayatvādiviśiṣṭasyātmano 'bhidhāyakaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5499: smṛtiśca śārīraparamātmanorbhedaṃ darśayati- 'īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśer'juna tiṣṭati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5502: atrāha- kaḥ punarayaṃ śārīro nāma paramātmano 'nyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5506: tathā smṛtirapi- 'kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata' (gī. 13.2)
GSP33brssgo1u:5509: para evātmā dehendriyamanobuddhyupādhibhiḥ paricchidyamāno bālaiḥ śārīra ityupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5511: tadapekṣayā ca karmakartṛtvādibhedavyavahāro na virudhyate prāk 'tattvamasi' ityātmaikatvopadeśaghaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5514: smṛtau hṛdisthasya jīvādbhedokterannāpi hṛdistho manomaya īśvara ityāha-smṛteśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5517: atra sūtrakṛtā satyabheda ukta iti bhrāntinirāsāyekṣatyadhikaraṇe nirastamapi codyamudbhāvya nirasyati-atrāhetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5522: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca / BBs_1,2.7 /
GSP33brssgo1u:5530: sarvagatasya tu sarvadeśeṣu vidyamānatvātparicchinnadeśavyapadeśo 'pi kayācidapekṣayā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5531: yathā samastavasudhādhipatirapi hi sannayodhyādhipatiriti vyapadiśyate kayā punarapekṣayā sarvagataḥ sannīśvaror'bhakaukā aṇīyāṃśca vyapadiśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5533: evamaṇīyastvādiguṇagaṇopeta īśvarastatra hṛdayapuṇḍarīke nicāyyo draṣṭavya upadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5540: tadevaṃ nicāyyatvāpekṣaṃ brahmaṇor'bhakaukastvamaṇīyastvaṃ ca na pāramārthikam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5542: hṛdayāyatanatvādbrahmaṇo hṛdayāyatanānāṃ ca pratiśarīraṃ bhinnatvādbhinnāyatanānāṃ ca śukādīnāmanekatvasāvayavatvānityatvādidoṣadarśanādbrahmaṇo 'pi tatprasaṅga iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:5547: arbhakamoko yasya sor'bhakaukāḥ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmādārthikamalpatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5552: paricechedatyāgaṃ vinā brahmatvāsaṃbhavāt tattyāge ca brahmaṇa evopāsyatvamāyātīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5563: saṃbhogaprāptir iti cen na vaiśeṣyāt / BBs_1,2.8 /
GSP33brssgo1u:5581: yadapyekatvādbrahmaṇa ātmāntarābhāvāccharīrasya bhogena brahṇo bhogaprasaṅga iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5585: yathāśāstraṃ tarhi śāstrīyor'thaḥ pratipattavyo na tatrārdhajaratīyaṃ labhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5586: śāstraṃ ca tattvamasi ityapahatapāpmatvādiviśeṣaṇaṃ brahma śārīrasyātmatvenopadiśacchārīrasyaiva tāvadupabhoktṛtvaṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5588: athāgṛhītaṃ śārīrasya brahmaṇaikatvaṃ tadā mithyājñānanimittaḥ śārīrasyopabhogaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5590: nahi bālaistalamalinatādibhirvyomni vikalpyamāne talamalitādiviśiṣṭameva paramārthato vyoma bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5605: ardhaṃmukhamātraṃ jaratyā buddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅāgānīti so 'yamardhajaratīnyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5606: manomayatvādiviśiṣṭasyaiveśvarasya dhyānārthaṃ hārdatve 'pi nirdeṣatvāttasminneva śāṇḍilyavidyāvidye sarvaṃ ityādivākyaṃ samanvitamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5607: brahmaṇo hārdatve 'niṣṭasaṃbhogāpatterjīva eva hārda upāsya iti śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-vyomavaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5618: kiñca vibhavo bahava ātmāna iti vādināmekasmindehe sarvātmanāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5619: svakarmārjita eva dehe bhoga iti parihāraśca tulya iti na vayaṃ paryanuyojyā ityāha-sarvagateti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5621: brahmaṇo jīvābhinnatvaṃ śrutyā niścitya tena bhoktṛtvānumāne upajīvyaśrutibādhamāha-yathāśāstramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5622: arthaṃ mukhamātraṃ jaratyā vṛddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅgānīti so 'yamardhajaratīyanyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5628: kintu tvaduktyā gṛhītamityāśaṅkya bimbapratibimbayoḥ kalpitabhedena bhoktṛtvābhoktṛtvavyavasthopapatteraprayojako heturityāha-athāgṛhītamityādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:5630: brahmaṇo hārdatve bādhakābhāvacchāṇḍilyavidyāvākyaṃ brahmaṇyupāsye samanvitamiti sidvam //8//
GSP33brssgo1u:5635: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate- 'yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5636: mṛtyūryasyopasevanaṃ ka ityā veda yatra saḥ' (1.2.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5651: iti darśanādityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- attātra paramātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5654: tādṛśasya cādyasya na paramātmano 'nyaḥ kārtsyenāttā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5668: FN: yasya paramātmano brahma kṣatraṃ cobhe jātī prasiddhānnavadodanau bhavataḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5671: taṃ nirviśeṣamātmānaṃ 'nāvirato duścaritāt' iti mantroktopāyavānyathā veda itthā itthamanyastadrahito na vedetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5681: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durvijñānatvaṃ paramātmaliṅgam // 10 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5685: so 'ttā yatra śuddhe cinmātre 'bhedakalpanayā vartate tacchudvaṃ brahma itthā itthaṃ īśvarasyāpyadhiṣṭhānabhūtaṃ ko veda /
GSP33brssgo1u:5700: guṇaścātra mṛtyūpasecanapadena saṃnidhāpitaṃ prasidvaudanagataṃ vināśyatvaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5702: tathāca sarvasya vināśyatvena bhānālliṅgādīśvaro 'ttetyāhanaiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5708: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt / BBs_1,2.11 /
GSP33brssgo1u:5709: kaṭhavallīṣveva paṭhyate- 'ṛtaṃ pibantau loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33brssgo1u:5710: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañṭagnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ' (kāṭha. 1.3.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5719: atha jīvaparamātmānau tato jīvādvilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā pratipādito bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5727: iti ca dvivacanena dvayoḥ pānaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5750: naca sati saṃbhavesarvagatasya brahmaṇo viśiṣṭadeśatvaṃ yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:5752: paramātmā tu na sukṛtasya vā duṣkṛtasya vā gocare vartate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5753: 'na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5757: kasmāt, ātmānau hi tāvubhāvapi cetanau samānasvabhāvau /
GSP33brssgo1u:5761: tadiha ṛtapānena liṅgena niścite vijñānātmani dvitīyānveṣaṇāyāṃ samānasvabhāvaścetanaḥ paramātmaiva pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5764: guhāhitatvaṃ tu śrutismṛtiṣvasakṛtparamātmana eva dṛśyate- 'guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam' (kāṭha. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssgo1u:5767: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyartho deśaviśeṣopadeśo na virudhyata ityedapyuktameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5776: bhuñjānau sukṛtasya loke samyagarjitasyādṛṣṭasya kārye dehe vartamāno parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5777: sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasminparame śreṣṭhe yā guhā nabhokṣaṇā tāṃ praviśya
GSP33brssgo1u:5781: manuṣye prete mṛtesati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5788: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5790: guhāhitaṃ buddhau sthitaṃ gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5792: parame vyoman śreṣṭhe hārdākāśe tatra guhāyāṃ buddau /
GSP33brssgo1u:5796: sukṛtasya karmaṇo loke kārye dehe parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5797: hṛdayaṃ paramaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tasminyā guhā nabhorūpā vudvirūpā vā tāṃ praviśya sthitau
GSP33brssgo1u:5798: chāyātapavat mitho virudvau tau brahmavidaḥ karmiṇaśca vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5806: manuṣye prete mṛte sati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ paraloke bhoktāstītyeke,
GSP33brssgo1u:5811: chatripadena gantāra iva pibatpadenājahallakṣaṇayā praviṣṭāvucyete ityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5814: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5823: brahmakṣatrapadasya saṃnihitamṛtyupadādanityavastuparatvavadihāpi pibatpadasya saṃnihitaguhāpadāhudvijīvaparateti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5829: na cāstu kārakatvena sajātīyā budvireva jīvasya dvitīyeti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5831: tathāca loke dvitīyasyāntaraṅgajātimattvadarśanājjīvasya dvitīyaścetana eveti sūtrārthamāha-saṃkhyāśravaṇe ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5833: gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ purāṇamanādipuruṣaṃ viditvā harṣaśokau jahāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5835: vyoman hārdākāśe yā guhā buddhiḥ tasyāṃ nihitaṃ brahma yo veda so 'śnute sarvānkāmānityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5842: ityādinā pareṇa granthena rathirathādirūpakakalpanayā vijñānātnāṃ rathinaṃ saṃsāramokṣayorgantāraṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5846: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti' (kā. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssgo1u:5849: brahmavido vadanti iti ca vaktṛviśeṣopādanaṃ paramātmaparigrahe ghaṭate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5851: eṣa eva nyāyaḥ 'dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (muṇḍa. 3.1.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:5856: anantare ca mantre tāveva draṣṭṛdraṣṭavyabhāvena viśinaṣṭi- 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagno 'nīśayā śocati muhyamānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5857: juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatyanyamīśamasya mahimānamiti vītaśokaḥ' (muṇḍa. 3.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5858: apara āha- 'dvā suparṇā' iti neyamṛgasyādhikaraṇasya siddhāntaṃ bhajate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5860: 'tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvamanaś nannanyo 'bhicākaśītītyanaś nannanyo 'bhipaśyati jñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5864: tatraiva ca vyākhyātatvāt- 'tadetatsattvaṃ yena svapnaṃ paśyati,
GSP33brssgo1u:5865: atha yo 'yaṃ śārīra upadraṣṭā sa kṣetrajñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5867: nahyatra śārīraḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādinā saṃsāradharmeṇopeto vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5873: tāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana raca ādhvaṃsate ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5874: kathaṃ punarasminpakṣe tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvam ityacetane sattve bhoktṛtvāvacanamti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5875: ucyate- neyaṃ śrutiracetanasya sattvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ vakṣyāmīti pravṛttā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5876: kiṃ tarhi cetanasya kṣetrajñasyābhoktṛtvaṃ brahmasbhāvatāṃ ca vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5878: idaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ta sattvakṣetrajñayoritaretisvabhāvāvivekakṛtaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5883: tathāca śrutiḥ- 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' ityādinā svapnadṛṣṭahastyādivyavahāravadavidyāviṣaya eva kartṛtvādivyavahāraṃ darśayati
GSP33brssgo1u:5889: tata eva gūḍhamanupraviṣṭaṃ gahanatāṃ gatamīśvaram adhyātmaprayogaḥ pratyagātmanyeva cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5892: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ pasyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5898: anyadivābhāsabhūtaṃ nānātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāttatra avidyakabuddhyādisaṃbandhādanyo bhūtvānyacakṣuṣā paśyet /
GSP33brssgo1u:5906: tatra heturgūḍhaṃ māyāvṛtaṃ māyānupraviṣṭaṃ paścādguhāhitaṃ guhādvārā gahvareṣṭhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5908: adhyātmayogaḥ sthūlasūkṣmakāraṇadehalayakrameṇa pratyagātmani cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5909: ṛtapānamatre jīvānuvādena vākyārthajñānāya tatpadārtho brahma pratipādyata ityupasaṃharati-tasmādiheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5920: anīśayā svasyeśvaratvāpratītyā dehe nimagnaḥ puruṣo jīvaḥ śocati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5923: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ śodhitacinmātraṃ pratyaktvena paśyati tadāsya mahimānaṃ svarūpameti prāpnotīva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5932: nahyatra saṃsārī vivikṣyate kintu śodhitastvamartho brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5936: nāhi jīvo buddhibhinna iti vivekamātreṇopasaṃhāro yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5938: avidyā viduṣi kimapi svakāryaṃ nādhvaṃsate na saṃpādayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:5944: vastuto jīvasyābhoktṛtve bhoktṛtvadhīḥ kathamityata āha-idaṃ hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5951: tasmāt 'ṛtaṃ pibantau'iti vākyameva guhādhikaraṇaviṣaya iti sthitam //12//
GSP33brssgo1u:5956: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5957: etadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' (chā. 4.15.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:5959: tatra saṃśayaḥ kimayaṃ pratibimbātmakṣyadhikaraṇo nirdiśyate 'thavā vijñānātmā uta devatātmendriyasyādhiṣṭhātāthaveśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5963: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti ca prasiddavadupadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5965: sa hi cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyaṃścakṣuṣi saṃnihito bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5981: 'tadyadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5983: 'etaṃ saṃyaddhāma ityācakṣate etaṃ hi sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti' /
GSP33brssgo1u:5984: 'eṣa u eva vāmanīreṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati' /
GSP33brssgo1u:5985: ' eṣa u eva bhāmānīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.2,3,4) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:5996: tadakṣisthānamasaṅgatvena brahmaṇo 'nurūpaṃ yato 'sminkṣiptaṃ vartmanī pakṣmaṇī eva gacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5999: tadvadihāpi dṛśyata iti cākṣuṣatvānusāreṇamṛtatvādayo dhyānārthaṃ kalpitatvena neyā iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-chāyātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6022: santi hyanyānyapi pṛthivyādīni sthānānyasya nirdiṣṭāni- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan' (bṛ. 3.7.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6023: teṣu hi cakṣurapi nirdiṣṭam- 'yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6024: 'sthānādivyapadeśāt' ityādigrahaṇenaitaddarśayati- na kevalaṃ sthānamevaikamanucitaṃ brahmaṇo nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:6025: kiṃ tarhi nāmarūpamityevañjātīyakamapyanāmarūpasya brahmaṇo 'nucitaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate- 'tasyoditi nāma' 'hiraṇyaśmaśruḥ' (chā. 1.6.7,6) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6026: nirguṇamapi sadbrahma nāmarūpagatairguṇaiḥ saguṇamupāsanārthaṃ tatra tatropadiśyata ityetadapyuktameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:6027: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyarthaṃ sthānaviśeṣo na virudhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:6029: FN: sthānādanyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakārāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvaṅgatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6030: sthānanāmarūpāṇāṃ dhyānārthaṃ śrutyantare 'pyupadeśādakṣisthānatvoktiratra na doṣa iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6040: sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ hi brahma yadvākyopakrame prakrāntaṃ 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti tadevehābhihitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6044: kathaṃ punarvākyopakrame sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma vijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6045: ucyate- 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' ityetadagnīnāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvopakosala uvāca- 'vijānāmyahaṃ yatprāṇo brahma kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmi' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6046: tatredaṃ prativacanam- 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kaṃ' (chā. 4.10.5)
GSP33brssgo1u:6049: yadi tasya viśeṣaṇatvena kaṃśabdaḥ sukhavācī nopādīyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:6050: tathā sati kevale bhūtākāśe brahmaśabdo nāmādiṣviva pratīkābhiprāyeṇa prayukta iti pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6051: tathā kaṃśabdasya viṣayendriyasaṃparkajanite sāmaye sukhe prasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:6054: itaretaraviśeṣatau tu kaṅkhaṃśabdau sukhātmakaṃ brahma gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6055: tatra dvitīye brahmaśabde 'nupādīyamāne kaṃ khaṃ brahmetyevocyamāne kaṃśabdasya viśeṣaṇatvenaivopayuktatvātasukhasya guṇasyādhyeyatvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:6056: tanmā bhūdityubhayoḥ kaṅkhaṃśabdayorbrahmaśabdaśirastvaṃ 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6059: pratyekaṃ ca gārhapatyādayo 'gnayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ mahimānamupadiśya 'eṣā somya te 'smadvidyātmavidyā ca' ityupasaṃharantaḥ pūrvatra brahma nirdiṣṭamiti jñāpayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6060: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6061: 'yathā puṣkarapalāśā āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā. 4.14.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:6062: iti cākṣisthānaṃ puruṣaṃ vijānataḥ pāpenānupaghātaṃ bruvannakṣisthānasya puruṣasya brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6064: tadvido gatiṃ vakṣyāmītyupakramate- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca'
GSP33brssgo1u:6070: brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoste brahmaśirasī tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6072: dhyānārthaṃ bhedakalpanayā sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtasya ya eṣa iti sarvanāmnābhidhānādantaraḥ paramātmā syāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6073: nanu prakaraṇātprabalena dṛśyatvaliṅgenopasthāpitaśchāyātmā sarvanāmārtha ityata āha-ācāryastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6079: sā ca sarvanāmnā prakṛtātmagrahe nirvahatītyekavākyatānirvāhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vākyabhedakālliṅgadbalavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6082: kaṃ viṣayasukhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśaṃ brahmatvena jñātuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6084: yatkaṃ tadeva khamiti sukhena viśeṣitasya khasya bhūtatvanirāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6086: yatkhaṃ tadeva kamiti vibhutvena viśeṣitasya kasya janyatvanirāsa iti vyatirekamukhenāha-tatra khamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6093: nanvekaṃ brahmaivātra dhyeyaṃ cedbrahmapadāntaraṃ kimarthamityata āha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6100: pṛthivyagnirannamāditya iti mama catasrastanavo vibhūtiriti gārhapatya upadideśa /
GSP33brssgo1u:6101: āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā ityanvāhāryapacana uvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:6102: prāṇa ākāśo dyaurvidyuditi svamahimānamāhavanīyo jagādeti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6112: yasmācchrutopaniṣatkasya śrutarahasyavijñānasya brahmavido yā gatirdevayānākhyā prasiddhā
GSP33brssgo1u:6116: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ' (gī. 8.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6118: 'atha yadu caivāsmiñchavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣamevābhisaṃbhavanti' ityupakramya
GSP33brssgo1u:6119: 'ādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enānbrahma gamayatyeva
GSP33brssgo1u:6120: devapatho brahmapatha etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvarte nāvartante' (chā. 4.17.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6121: tadiha brahmavidviṣayā prasiddhayā gatyākṣisthānasya brahmatvaṃ niścīyate // 16 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:6124: asminnupāsake mṛte putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃbandhi saṃskārādikarma kurvanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6127: śrutā anuṣṭhitā upaniṣat rahasyaṃ saguṇabrahmopāsanaṃ yena tasya yā gatiḥ śrutau smṛtau ca prasidvā tasyā atrābhidhānālliṅgaditi sūtrārthamāha-itaśceti
GSP33brssgo1u:6131: svadharmastapaḥ tapobrahmacaryaśraddhāvidyābhirātmānaṃ dhyātvā tayā dhyānavidyayottaraṃ devayānamārgaṃ prāpyate nottareṇa pathā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6133: etadvai brahma prāṇānāṃ vyaṣṭisamaṣṭirūpāṇāmāyatanaṃ liṅgātmakaṃ hiraṇyagarbharūpaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6135: ataḥ kāryaṃ brahma prāpya tatsvarūpaṃ nirguṇaṃ jñātvā mucyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6136: agnireva jyotirdevatā evamaharādyā devatā eva smṛtāvuktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6137: asminnupāsake mṛte sati yadi putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃskārādikaṃ kurvanti yadi ca na kurvanti ubhayathāpyupāstimahimnā arcirādidevānkrameṇa gacchanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6147: candrādvidyutaṃ gatvā tatra vidyulloke sthitānupāsakānamānavaḥ puruṣo brahmalokādāgatya kāryaṃ brahmalokaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6149: ta etatkāryaṃ brahma pratipadyamānā upāsakā imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ āvartaṃ janmamaraṇāvṛttiyuktaṃ nāvartante nāgacchantītyarthaḥ //16//
GSP33brssgo1u:6159: yadaiva hi kaścitpuruṣaścakṣurāsīdati tadā cakṣuṣi puruṣacchāyā dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:6161: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ saṃnidhānātsvacakṣuṣi dṛśyamānaṃ puruṣamupāsyatvenopadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6162: nacopāsanākāle chāyākaraṃ kañcitpuruṣaṃ cakṣuḥsamīpe saṃnidhāpyopāsta iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:6165: asaṃbhavācca tasminnamṛtatvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ na chāyātmani pratītiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6166: tathā vijñānātmano 'pi sādhāraṇe kṛtsnaśarīrendriyasaṃbandhe sati cakṣuṣyevāvasthitatvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6172: devatātmanastu 'raśmibhireṣo 'sminpratiṣṭhitaḥ' iti śruteryadyapi cakṣuṣyavasthānaṃ syāttathāpyātmatvaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6182: asmiṃśca pakṣe dṛśyata iti prasiddhavadupādānaṃ śāstrādyapekṣaṃ vidvadviṣayaṃ prarocanārthamiti vyākhyeyam // 17 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:6188: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6193: naca tasya svacakṣuṣā darśanaṃ saṃbhavatītyāha-ya eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6202: nanu 'cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata''sūryo 'stameti'iti vākyaṃ amarā devā iti prasiddhibādhitamityāśaṅkyāha-amaratvamapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6205: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6211: tathāca śāstrakaraṇako vidvadanubhava upāsanāstutyartha ucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6217: 'ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni yo 'ntaro yamayati' ityupakramya
GSP33brssgo1u:6218: śrūyate- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī
GSP33brssgo1u:6219: śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛha. 3.7.1,2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6221: sa kimadhidaivādyabhimānī devatātmā kaścitkiṃvā prāptāṇimādyaiśvaryaḥ kaścidyogī kiṃvā paramātmā kiṃvārthāntaraṃ kiñcidityapūrvasaṃjñādarśanātmasaṃśayaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6227: tathāca śrūyate- 'pṛthivyeva yasyāyatanamagnirloko mano jyotiḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6229: yogino vā kasyacitsiddhasya sarvānupraveśena yamayitṛtvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:6231: akāryakaraṇatvādityevaṃ prāpta idamucyate- yo 'ntaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu śrūyate sa paramātmaiva syānnānya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6233: tasya hi paramātmano dharmā iha nirdiśyamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:6234: pṛthivyādi tāvadadhidaivatādibhedabhinnaṃ samastaṃ vikārajātamantastiṣṭanyamayatīti paramātmano yamayitṛtvaṃ dharma upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6236: eṣa ta 'ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' iti cātmatvāmṛtatve mukhye paramātmana upapadyete /
GSP33brssgo1u:6237: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda' iti ca pṛthivīdevatāyā avijñeyamantaryāmiṇaṃ bruvandevatātmano 'nyamantaryāmiṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6254: 'yaḥ pṛthivyām'ityādinā devatāḥ pṛthivyādyā adhikṛtya yamayitā śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6284: vastutastu cetanasāṃnidhyājjaḍasya vyāpāro niyamanaṃ tacchaktimattvaṃ niyantṛtvaṃ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6286: nanu dehaniyanturjīvasyānyo niyantā cettasyāpyanya ityanavasthetyata āha-tasyāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6302: ata uttaramucyate- naca smārte pradhānamantaryāmiśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6304: yadyapyadṛṣṭatvādivyapadeśaḥ pradhānasyasaṃbhavati tathāpi na draṣṭṛtvādivyapeśaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6311: śārīro hi cetanatvāddraṣṭā śrotā mantā vijñātā ca bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6314: adṛṣṭatvādayaśca dharmāḥ śārīre parasiddhāḥ darśanādikriyāyāḥ kartari pravṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6324: pradhānaṃ mahadādikrameṇa kathaṃ pravartata iti tarkasyāviṣaya ityāha-apratarkyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6331: śarīraś cobhaye 'pi hi bhedenainam adhīyate / BBs_1,2.20 /
GSP33brssgo1u:6335: yadyapi draṣṭṛtvādayo dharmastasya saṃbhavanti tathāpi ghaṭākāśavadupādhiparicchinnatvānna kārtsyena pṛthivyādiṣvantaravasthātuṃ niyantuṃ ca śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6336: apicobhaye 'pi hi śākhinaḥ kāṇvā mādhyandinānāścāntaryāmiṇo bhedenainaṃ śārīraṃ pṛthivyādivadadhiṣṭhānatvena niyamyatvena cādhīyate- 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan' (bṛ. 3.7.22) iti kāṇvāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6338: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityasminstāvatpāṭhe bhavatyātmaśabdaḥ śārīrasya vācakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6339: 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan' ityasminnapi pāṭhe vijñānaśabdena śārīra ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6356: ekasyaiva tu bhedavyavahāra upādhikṛto yathā ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6357: tataśca jñātṛjñeyādibhedaśrutayaḥ pratyakṣādīni ca pramāṇāni saṃsārānubhavo vidhipratiṣedhaśāstraṃ ceti sarvametadupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6358: tathāca śrutiḥ 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' itvavidyāviṣaye sarve vyavahāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6359: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' iti vidyāviṣaye sarve vyavahāraṃ vārayati // 20 //
GSP33brssgo1u:6363: yathā devadattakartṛkagamanakriyāyā grāmaḥ karma na devadattaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6369: dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāramātmānaṃ tayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na viṣayīkuryā ityādiśruteścādṛṣṭatvādidharmāḥ śārīrasyetyāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6373: īśvarastvabhokteti na virodha iti śaṅkate-kā punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6382: bheda upādhikalpitaḥ śrutisūtrābhyāmanūdyata iti samādhatte-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6383: bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-eko hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6394: 'yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇamacakṣuḥśrotraṃ tadapāṇipādaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmaṃ tadavyayaṃ yadbhūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ' (muṇḍa. 1.1.5,6)
GSP33brssgo1u:6396: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimayamadreśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ pradhānaṃ syāduta śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6399: 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca yathā pṛthivyāmoṣadhaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6400: yathā sataḥ puruṣotkeśalomāni tathākṣarātsaṃbhavatīha viśvam' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6403: nahi kevalasya cetanasya tatra sūtrayonitvaṃ keśalomayonitvaṃ cāsti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6412: atrocyate- 'yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate' 'yattadadreśyam' ityakṣaraśabdenādṛśyatvādiguṇakaṃ bhūtayoniṃ śrāvayitvā punarante śrāvayiṣyati- 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6413: tatra yaḥ paro 'kṣarācchrutaḥ sa sarvajñaḥ sarvavitsaṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6415: yadā tu yoniśabdo nimittavācī tadā śārīro 'pi bhūtayoniḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:6417: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- yoyamadṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ sa parameśvara eva syānnānya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6420: parameśvarasya hi dharma ihocyamāno dṛśyate- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6421: nahi pradhānasyācetanasya śārīrasya vopādhiparicchinnadṛṣṭeḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6422: nanvakṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭādbhūtayoneḥ parasyaiva tatsarvajñatvaṃ ca na bhūtayoniviṣayamityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6424: yatkāraṇaṃ 'akṣarātsaṃbhavatīha viśvam' iti prakṛtaṃ bhūtayonimiha jāyamānaprakṛtitvena
GSP33brssgo1u:6425: nirdiśyānantaramapi jāyamānaprakṛtitvenaiva sarvajñaṃ nirdiśati- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavidyasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6426: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6427: tasmānnirdeśasāmyena pratyabhijñāyamānatvātprakṛtasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ ca dharma ucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6430: 'yenākṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ veda satyaṃ provāca tāṃ tattvato brahmavidyām' (muṇḍa. 1.2.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:6431: iti prakṛtya tasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneradṛśyatvādiguṇakasya vaktavyatvena pratijñātatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6432: kathaṃ tarhi 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' iti vyapadiśyata iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:6434: apicātra dve vidye veditavye ukte- 'parā caivāparā ca' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6435: tatrāparāmṛgvedādilakṣaṇāṃ vidyāmuktvā bravīti- 'atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6437: yadi punaḥ parameśvarādanyadadṛśyatvādiguṇakamakṣaraṃ parikalpyeta neyaṃ parā vidyā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6442: dve eva tu vidye veditavye iha nirdiṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo1u:6444: iti caikavijñānena sarvavijñānāpekṣaṇaṃ sarvātmake brahmaṇi vivakṣyamāṇe 'vakalpyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:6448: iti brahmavidyāṃ prādhānyenopakramya parāparavibhāgena parāṃ vidyāmakṣarādhigamanīṃ darśayaṃstayā brahmavidyātvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6449: sā ca brahmavidyāsamākhyā tadadhigamyasyākṣarasyābrahmatve bādhitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6451: 'plavā hyete adṛḍhā yajñarūpā aṣṭādaśoktamavaraṃ yeṣu karma /
GSP33brssgo1u:6452: etacchreyo yo 'bhinandanti mūḍhā jarāmṛtyuṃ te punarevāpiyanti' (muṇḍa. 1.2.7)
GSP33brssgo1u:6454: ninditvā cāparāṃ vidyāṃ tato viraktasya paravidyādhikāraṃ darśayati- 'parīkṣya lokānkarmacitānbrāhmaṇo nirvedamāyānnāstyakṛtaḥ kṛtena /
GSP33brssgo1u:6455: tadvijñānārthaṃ sa gurumevābhigacchetsamitpāṇiḥ śretriyaṃ brahmaniṣṭham' (muṇḍa. 1.2.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6459: apica sthūlāḥ pṛthivyādayo dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttā iti na sthūla eva dārṣṭāntiko bhūtayonirabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6466: 'aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhātī' tyatra 'tejo vai ghṛtaṃ' iti śeṣānnirṇayavadatrāpi adṛśyavādeḥ śeṣānnirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6467: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ puruṣaṃ satyaṃ veda /
GSP33brssgo1u:6473: pratyakṣādinā karmasādhyāṃllokānanityatayā jñātvā nirvedaṃ vairāgyaṃ gacchet /
GSP33brssgo1u:6474: kutaḥ, kṛtena karmaṇā akṛto mokṣo nāsti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6477: karma vidyārūpāparavidyoktyanantaraṃ yayā nirguṇaṃ jñāyate parā socyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6489: bhūtānāṃ yoniṃ prakṛtiṃ yatpaśyanti dhīrāḥ paṇḍitāstadakṣaraṃ tadvidyā paretyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6499: atra pradhāne virudhyamāno 'saṃbhāvito vākyaśeṣaḥ śruta iti śaṅkate-nanu ya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6500: pañcamyantākṣaraśrutyā bhūtaprakṛteḥ pratyabhijñānātprathamāntaparaśabdoktasya jagannimitteśvarasya sarvajñatvādikamityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6501: 'saṃdigdhe tu vākyaśeṣāt'iti nyāyena siddhāntayati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6502: cetanācetanatvena saṃdigdhe bhūtayonau 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ'iti vākyaśeṣādīśvaratvanirṇaya ityayuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6512: paravidyādhigamyatvenoktasyākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ 'akṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ vedā'ityakṣaraśrutyā vedyatvaliṅgavatyā pūrvameva brahmatvena parāmarśādityāha-yeneti
GSP33brssgo1u:6513: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ bhūtayoniṃ sarvajñaṃ puruṣaṃ veda tāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogyāya śiṣyāya
GSP33brssgo1u:6516: tarhi pañcamyantākṣaraśabdārthaḥ ka ityāśaṅkyājñānamiti vakṣyata ityāha-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6519: anityaphalatvenāparavidyāṃ ninditvā muktyarthine brahmavidyāṃ provāceti vākyaśeṣokterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6524: acetanamātrasyaikāyatanamupādānaṃ tajjñānātkāryajñāne 'pi tadakāryāṇāmātmanāṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6525: evaṃ jīve jñāte tadakāryasya bhogyasya jñānaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6527: sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ samāptibhūmiṃ brahmavidyāmuvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:6536: 'patyurno yajñasaṃyoge'iti sūtreṇa patiśabdasya nakāro 'ntādeśo yajñasaṃbandhe vihita iti patnī,
GSP33brssgo1u:6539: etadeva karma śreyo nānyadātmajñānamiti ye mūḍhāstuṣyanti te punaḥ punarjanmamaraṇamāpnuvantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6547: itaśca parameśvara eva bhūtayonirnetarau śārīraḥ pradhānaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6550: viśinaṣṭi hi prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ śārīrādvilakṣaṇatvena- ' divyo hyamūrtaḥ puruṣaḥ sabāhyābhyantaro hyajaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6554: tathā pradhānādapi prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ bhedena vyapadiśati- 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6556: sarvasmādvikārātparo yo 'vikārastasmātparataḥ para iti bhedena vyapadeśātparamātmānamiha
GSP33brssgo1u:6558: nātra pradhānaṃ nāma kiñcitsvatantraṃ tattvamabhyupagamya tasmādbhedavyapadeśa ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6559: kiṃ tarhi yadi pradhānamapi kalpyamānaṃ śrutyavirodhenāvyākṛtādiśabdavācyaṃ bhūtasūkṣmaṃ parikalpyeta parikalpyatām /
GSP33brssgo1u:6565: viśeṣaṇānna jīvo bhedokterna pradhānamiti hetudvayaṃ vibhajya vyācaṣṭe-viśinaṣṭi hītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6569: bāhyaṃ sthūlamābhyantaraṃ kāraṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tābhyāṃ sahādhiṣṭhānatvena tiṣṭhatīti sabāhyābhyantaraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6580: bhūtānāṃ sūkṣmāḥ saṃskārā yatra tadbhūtasūkṣmaṃ īśvaraścinmātra āśrayo yasya tattathā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6582: yattu īśvara āśrayo viṣayo yasyeti nānājīvavādināṃ vyākhyānaṃ tadbāṣyabahirbhūtaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6583: 'etasminkhalvakṣare gārgi ākāśa otaśca protaśca'ityotaprotabhāvenāvyākṛtasya cidāśrayatvaśruterāśrayapadalakṣaṇāyā nirmūlatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6592: ucyate-ye hyavidyānānātvamicchanti tairapi pariṇāmitvena sāṃśatvamavidyāyā aṅgīkāryaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6594: yasya jñānamantaḥkaraṇe jāyate tasyāntaḥ karaṇapariṇāmyajñānāṃśanaśo muktiriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6602: nanu sūtrakṛtā śrutau pradhānādbhedavyapadeśa uktastatra kathamajñānādbhedoktirvyākhyāyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:6611: apica 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' ityasyānantaram 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' iti prāṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6612: pṛthivīparyantānāṃ tatvānāṃ sargamuktvā tasyaiva bhūtayoneḥ sarvavikārātmakaṃ rūpamupanyasyamānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6613: paśyāmaḥ- 'agnirmūrdhā cakṣuṣī candrasūryau diśaḥ śrotre vāgvivṛtāśca vedāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6614: vāyuḥ prāṇo hṛdayaṃ viśvamasya padbhyāṃ pṛthivī hyeṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā' (muṇḍa. 2.1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6626: yathopādhyāyaṃ prakṛtyaitasmādadhīṣvaiṣa vedavedāṅgapāraga iti vacanamupādhyāyaviṣayaṃ bhavati tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6633: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' iti hi pūrvatra prāṇādipṛthivyantaṃ tattvajātaṃ jāyamānatvena niradikṣat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6634: uttaratrāpi ca 'tasmādagniḥ samidho yaśca sūryaḥ' ityevamādi,
GSP33brssgo1u:6635: 'ataśca sarvā oṣadhayo rasāśca' ityevamantaṃ jāyamānatvenaiva nirdekṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6637: sarvātmatvamapi sṛṣṭiṃ parisamāpyopadekṣyati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma' (muṇḍa. 2.1.10) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6638: śrutismṛtyośca trailokyaśarīrasya prajāpaterjanmādi nirdiśyamānamupalabhāmahe- 'hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgne bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6639: sa dādhāra pṛthivī dyāmutemāṃ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema' (ṛ.sa. 10.121.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6642: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:6645: asminpakṣe 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma' ityādi sarvarūpopanyāsaḥ parameśvarapratipattiheturiti vyākhyeyam // 23 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:6649: yaśca sūryo dyulokāgneḥ samidha iva bhāsakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6655: 'prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī'iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6663: yathā kaścibrahmavitsvasya sarvātmatvaprakaṭanārthamahamannamiti sāma gāyati na tvannatvādikamātmano vivakṣati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6667: eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā sūtrātmā etasmādbhūtayonerjāyata iti śrutyanvayena hiraṇyagarbhasyātra jāyamānatvenopanyāsādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6672: ato madhye 'pi sṛṣṭireva vācyā na rūpamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6678: sa sūtrātmā dyāmimāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca sthūlaṃ sarvamadhārayat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6679: kaśabdasya prajāpatisaṃjñātve sarvanāmatvābhāvena smā ityayogādekāralopenaikasmai devāya prāṇātmane haviṣā vidhema paricaremeti vyākhyeyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6689: karma saphalaṃ sarvaṃ śrautasmārtādikaṃ tapaśca puruṣa eveti sarvāntaratvarūpopanyāsācca bhūtayonau jñeye vākyaṃ samanvitamityarthaḥ //23//
GSP33brssgo1u:6696: iti copakramya dyusūryavāyvākāśavāripṛthivīnāṃ sutejastvādiguṇayogamekaikopāsananindayā ca vaiśvānaraṃ pratyeṣāṃ mūrdhādibhāvamupadiśyāmnāyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:6698: bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6699: prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdeho bahulo bastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādāvura eva vedirlomāni
GSP33brssgo1u:6701: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kiṃ vaiśvānaraśabdena jāṭharo 'gnirupadiśyata uta bhūtāgniratha tadabhimāninī devatā athavā śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6703: vaiśvānara iti jāṭharabhūtāgnidevatānāṃ sādhāraṇaśabdaprayogādātmeti ca śārīraparameśvarayoḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6704: tatra kasyopādānaṃ nyāyyaṃ kasya vā hānamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6708: tatra hi viśeṣaṇa kvacitprayogo dṛśyate- 'ayamagnirvaiśvānaro yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣe yenedamannaṃ pacyate yadidamadyate' (bṛha. 5.9) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6710: sāmānyenāpi prayogadarśanāt 'viśvasmā agniṃ bhuvanāya devā vaiśvānaraṃ ketumahnāmakṛṇvan' (ṛ.saṃ. 10.88.12) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6712: tasyāmapi prayogadarśanāt 'vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kaṃ bhuvanānāmabhiśrīḥ' (ṛ.saṃ. 1.18.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:6714: athātmaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyādupakrame ca 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma' iti kevalātmaśabdaprayogādātmaśabdavaśena ca vaiśvānaraśabdaḥ pariṇeya ityucyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:6718: tasmānneśvaro vaiśvānara ityevaṃ prāpte tata idamucyate- vaiśvānaraḥ paramātmā bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6725: 'tasya ha vā etasyāmātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6726: atra hi parameśvara eva dyumūrdhatvādiviśiṣṭo 'vasthāntaragataḥ pratyagātmatvenopanyasta ādhyānāyeti gamyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:6729: 'sa sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti' iti ca sarvalokādyāśrayaṃ phalaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ paramakāraṇaparigrahe saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6732: 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma' iti cātmabrahmaśabdābhyāmupakrama ityevametāni liṅgāni parameśvaramevāvagamayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6740: viśvasmai bhuvanāya vaiśvānaramagnimahnāṃ ketuṃ cihnaṃ sūryamakṛṇvandevāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6742: vaiśvānarasya devasya sumatau śobhanabuddhau vayaṃ syāma bhavema /
GSP33brssgo1u:6745: yathāgnau nikṣiptamiṣīkātūlaṃ dahyate evaṃ hāsya viduṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6748: prācīnaśālasatyayajñendradyumnajanabuḍilā militvā mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ-'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6751: so 'pi samyaṅna vedeti tenoddālakena saha ṣaḍapyaśvapatiṃ kaikeyaṃ rājānamāgatyocuḥ-ātmānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6753: rājā tu teṣāṃ bhrāntinirāsārthaṃ tānpratyekamapṛcchat-'kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥse'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6754: te ca prācīnaśālādayaḥ krameṇa pratyekamūcuḥ-divamevāhaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6761: bhavanto yadi māmapṛṣṭvā dyusūryādiṣu bhagavato vaiśvānarasyāṅgeṣveva pratyekaṃ vaiśvānaratvadṛṣṭayo
GSP33brssgo1u:6767: taṃ sarvajñaṃ sa tadupāsakaḥ sarvatra bhogaṃ bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6771: suṣṭhu tejaḥ kāntiryasya dyulokasya sa sutejāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6774: pṛthak nānāvidhaṃ vartma gamanaṃ ātmā svabhāvo yasya vāyoḥ sa nānāgatitvaguṇako 'sya prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6775: bahulatvaṃ vyāpitvaṃ tadguṇa ākāśo 'sya saṃdeho dehamadhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6776: rayitvaṃ dhanatvaṃ tadguṇā āpo yasya bastirmūtrasthānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6785: viśvasmai bhuvanāya vaiśvānaramagnimahnāṃ ketuṃ cihnaṃ sūryaṃ devā akṛṇvan kṛtavantaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6788: hi yasmātkaṃ sukhaprado bhuvanānāṃ rājā vaiśvānaro 'bhimukhā śrīrasyetyabhiśrīrīśvaraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6789: tasmāttasya vaiśvānarasya sumatau vayaṃ syāma tasyāsmadviṣayā śubhamatirbhavatvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6793: atra jāṭharo vaiśvānara iti mukhyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6795: tasya dehavyāpitvādātmatvaṃ śrutyā dyumūrdhatvādikalpanayā bṛhattvādbrahmatvamiti dhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6799: nanu nirviśeṣasya kuto viśeṣa ityata āha-atra hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6805: yathāgnau nikṣiptamiṣīkātūlaṃ dahyate evaṃ hāsya viduṣa ityarthaḥ //24//
GSP33brssgo1u:6810: yasmātparameśvarasyaivāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhetīdṛśaṃ trailokyātmakaṃ rūpaṃ smaryate- 'yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6813: etatsmaryamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ mūlabhūtāṃ śrutimanumāpayadasya vauśvānaraśabdasya parameśvaraparatve 'numānaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6817: stutitvamapi nāsati mūlabhūte vedavākye samāyagīdṛśena rūpeṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6818: 'dyāṃ mūrdhānaṃ yasya viprā vadanti khaṃ vai nābhiṃ candrasūryau ca netre /
GSP33brssgo1u:6819: diśaḥ śrotre viddhi pādau kṣitiṃ ca so 'cintyātmā sarvabhūtapraṇetā //
GSP33brssgo1u:6824: satā rūpeṇa stuti saṃbhavānnāsadāropa iti bhāvaḥ //25//
GSP33brssgo1u:6827: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād asambhavāt puruṣamapi cainam adhīyate / BBs_1,2.26 /
GSP33brssgo1u:6840: yadapyuktaṃ- mūrdhaiva sutejā ityāderviśeṣātkāraṇātparamātmā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6842: yadubhayathāpi viśeṣapratibhāne sati parameśvaraviṣaya eva viśeṣa āśrayaṇīyo na jāṭharaviṣaya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6844: tasyāpi hi dyulokādisaṃbandho mantravarṇādavagamyate- 'yo bhānunā pṛthivī dyāmutemāmātatāna rodasī antarikṣam' (ṛ.sa. 10.88.3) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6848: na śabdādibhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ parameśvarasya pratyākhyānaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6854: yadi ceha parameśvaro na vivakṣyeta kevala eva jāṭharo 'gnirvivakṣyeta tato mūrdhaiva sutejā ityādirviśeṣasyāsaṃbhava eva syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6855: yathā tu devatābhūtāgnivyapāśrayeṇāpyayaṃ viśeṣa upapādayituṃ na śakyate tathottarasūtre vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6856: yadi ca kevala eva jāṭharo vivakṣyeta,
GSP33brssgo1u:6857: puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvaṃ kevalaṃ tasya syānna tu puruṣatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6858: puruṣamapi cainamadhīyate vājasaneyinaḥ- 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaro yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' (śa.brā. 10.6.1.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6860: ye tu 'puruṣavidhamapi cainamadhīyate' iti sūtrāvayavaṃ paṭhanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:6861: teṣāmeṣor'thaḥ- kevalajāṭharaparigrahe puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvaṃ kevalaṃ syānna puruṣavidhatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6862: puruṣavidhamapi cainamadhīyate vājasaneyinaḥ- 'puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6865: FN: bhaktamannaṃ homīyaṃ homasādhanaṃ tena prāṇāgnihotraṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6866: imāṃ pṛthivīmuta dyāmapi dyāvāpṛthivyāveva rodasī yo bhānurūpeṇātatāna vyāptavān /
GSP33brssgo1u:6867: antarikṣaṃ ca tayormadhyamātatāna sa devo dyulokādyavayavo dhyeya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6872: 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaraḥ'ityagnirahasye vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ śruto 'gniśabda īśvare na saṃbhavatītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6877: vājasaneyināmagnirahasye saprapañcāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāmuktvā 'sa yo haitamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6878: puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda sa sarvatrānnamatti'ityuktaṃ dehāntaḥsthatvaṃ jāṭhare saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6880: atra sūtre ādipadenaivāntaḥpratiṣṭhānasya grahe saṃbhavati pṛthaguktiḥ sādhāraṇaliṅgatvadyotanārthā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6882: yadyapi dyumūrdhatvādiviśeṣa īśvarapakṣapātī homādhāratvādirjāṭharapakṣapātīti pratibhānaṃ samaṃ tathāpi pārameśvaro viśeṣo jāṭhare na saṃbhavatīti balavānityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6884: imāṃ pṛthivīṃ dyāmapi te eva dyāvāpṛthivyau rodasī tathormadhyamantarikṣaṃ ca yo bhūtāgnirbhānurūpeṇātatāna vyāptavān sa dhyātavya ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6895: yo veda sa sarvatra bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6896: puruṣatvaṃ pūrṇatvamacetanasya jāṭharasya netyuktvā pāṭhāntare puruṣavidhatvaṃ dehākāratvaṃ tasya netyāha-ye tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6897: nanu jāṭharasyāpi dehavyāpitvāttadvidhatvaṃ syādityata āha-puruṣavidhatvaṃ ca prakaraṇāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6902: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca / BBs_1,2.27 /
GSP33brssgo1u:6903: yatpunaruktaṃ bhūtāgnerapi mantravarṇe dyulokādisaṃbandhadarśanānmūrdhaiva sutejā ityādyavayavakalpanaṃ tasyaiva bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:6906: atrocyate- ata evoktebhyo hetubhyo na devatā vaiśvānaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6910: tathā devatāyāḥ satyapyaiśvaryayoge na dyumūrdhatvādikalpanā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6914: evaṃ jāṭharaṃ nirasya pakṣadvayaṃ nirasyati-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6925: pūrve jāṭharāgnipratīko jāṭharāgnyupādhiko vā parameśvara upāsya ityuktamantaḥpratiṣṭhitatvādyanurodhena /
GSP33brssgo1u:6926: idānīṃ tu vinaiva pratīkopādhikalpanābhyāṃ sākṣādapi parameśvaropāsanaparigrahe na kaścidvirodha iti jaiminirācāryo manyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:6927: nanu jāṭharāgnyaparigrahe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvavacanaṃ śabdadīni ca kāraṇāni virudhyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6931: kathaṃ tarhi yatprakṛtaṃ mūrdhādicubukānteṣu puruṣāvayaveṣu puruṣavidhitvaṃ kalpitaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇedamucyate- 'puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6932: yathā vṛkṣe śākhāṃ pratiṣṭhitāṃ paśyatīti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6933: athavā yaḥ prakṛtaḥ paramātmādhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca puruṣavidhitvopādhistasya yatkevalaṃ sākṣirūpaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇedamucyate- 'puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6934: niścite ca pūrvāparālocanavaśena paramātmaparigrahe tadviṣaya eva vaiśvānaraśabdaḥ kenacidyogena vartiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6945: kathaṃ punaḥ parameśvaraparigrahe prādeśamātraśrutirupapadyata iti tāṃ vyākhyātumārabhate- @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:6956: idamantasthatvamudarasthatvarūpaṃ nocyate kintu nakhādiśikhāntāvayavasamudāyātmakapuruṣaśarīre mūrdhādicibukāntāṅgāni vṛkṣe śākhāvatpratiṣṭhitāni,
GSP33brssgo1u:6958: ato yathā śākhāsthasya pakṣiṇo vṛkṣāntaḥsthatvaṃ tathā vaiśvānarasya puruṣāntaḥsthatvamityāha-na hīha puruṣavidhamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6967: viśve sarve narā jīvā asyātmatvena niyamyatvena vā santīti viśvānaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6971: aṅgayati gamayatyagraṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ prāpayatīti agniragraṇīruktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6979: abhivyajyate kila prādeśamātraparimāṇaḥ parameśvara upāsakānāṃ kṛte /
GSP33brssgo1u:6981: ataḥ parameśvare 'pi prādeśamātraśrutirabhivyakterupapadyata ityāśmarathya ācāryo manyate // 29 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:6982: FN: atikrāntā mātrāḥ parimāṇaṃ yasya tasyeti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6990: prādeśamātrahṛdayapratiṣṭhena vāyaṃ manasānusmaryate tena prādeśamātra ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6992: yadyapi ca yaveṣu svagatameva parimāṇaṃ prasthasaṃbandhādvyajyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6997: FN: prādeśena manasā mīyata iti vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7002: manaḥsthaṃ prādeśamātratvaṃ smṛtidvārā smaryamāṇe kalpitaṃ śruterālambanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7006: saṃpatter iti jaiminis tathā hi darśayati / BBs_1,2.31 /
GSP33brssgo1u:7011: parameśvarasya darśayati- 'prādeśamātramiva ha vai devāḥ suviditā abhisaṃpannāstathā
GSP33brssgo1u:7013: sa hovāca mūrdhānamupadiśannuvācaiṣa vā atiṣṭhā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7014: cakṣuṣī upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai sutejā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7015: nāsike upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai pṛthagvartmātmā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7017: mukhyā apa upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai rayirvaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7021: chāndogye punardyaiḥ sutejastvaguṇā samāmnāyata ādityaśca viśvarūpaguṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7028: aparicchinnamapīśvaraṃ prādeśamātratvena saṃpattyā kalpitaṃ samyagviditavanto devāstameveśvaramabhi pratyaktvena saṃpannāḥ prāptavantaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7032: mūrdhādyadhyātmāṅgeṣu vaiśvānaraṃ saṃpādayiṣyāmīti prācīnaśāladīnprati rājā pratijñāya
GSP33brssgo1u:7033: svakīyamūrdhānamupadiśan kareṇa darśayannuvāca-eṣa vai me mūrdhā bhūrādīṃllokānatītya
GSP33brssgo1u:7038: svakīyacakṣuṣī darśayan 'eṣa vai sutejāḥ sūryo vaiśvānarasya cakṣurityuvāca' /
GSP33brssgo1u:7039: nāsikāpadena tanniṣṭhaḥ prāṇe lakṣyate tasminnādhyātmikaprāṇe 'dhidaivaprāṇasya vāyordṛṣṭimāha-nāsika iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7041: mukhasthaṃ mukhyaṃ tasminnadhidaivaṃ bahulākaśadṛṣṭiḥ mukhasthalālārūpāsvapsu raiśabditatadīyabastisthodakadṛṣṭiḥ cibuke pratiṣṭhā pādarūpā pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7042: nanu guṇāvaiṣamyeṇa vidyayorbhedādagnirahasye śrutyanusāreṇa chāndogyasthaprādeśamātrakṣutiḥ kathaṃ vyākhyeyetyāśaṅkyāha-yadyapītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7044: śākhābhede 'pi sarvaśākhāsu pratīyamānaṃ vaiśvānarādyupāsanamekamiti nyāyasya vakṣyamāṇatvācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:7048: yadvā śākhābhedena guṇavyavasthāstu na vidyābheda iti bhāvaḥ //31//
GSP33brssgo1u:7052: āmananti cainaṃ parameśvaramasminmūrdhacubukāntarāle jābālāḥ- 'ya eṣo 'nto 'vyakta ātmā so 'vimukte pratiṣṭhita iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7054: varaṇāyāṃ nāsyāṃ ca madhye pratiṣṭhita iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7055: kā vai varaṇā kā ca nāsīti' /
GSP33brssgo1u:7056: tatra cemāmeva nāsikāṃ varaṇā nāsīti nirucya yā sarvāṇīndriyakṛtāni pāpāni vārayatīti sā varaṇā,
GSP33brssgo1u:7059: bhruvordhāraṇasya ca yaḥ saṃdhiḥ sa eṣa dyulokasya parasya ca saṃdhirbhavatīti' (jābā. 1) /
GSP33brssgo1u:7066: iti śrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // 2 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:7067: FN: avimukte avidyopādhikalpitāvacchede jīvātmi bhedakalpanayā pratiṣṭhita upāsyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7072: ya eṣo 'nanto 'paricchinnaḥ ato 'vyakto durvijñeyastaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāmityatreḥ praśne yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7073: sa īśvaro 'vimukte kāmādibhirbaddhe jīve bhedakalpanayā pratiṣṭhita upāsyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7077: tatra ca śrutau imāmeva bhrūsahitāṃ nāsikāṃ nirucyeti bhāṣyayojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7081: tayormadhye 'pi viśiṣya jīvasya sthānaṃ pṛcchati katamaditi,
GSP33brssgo1u:7084: sa eṣa saṃdhirdyulokasya svargasya parasya ca brahmalokasya saṃdhitvena dhyeya ityāha-sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7085: ābhimukhyenāhaṃ brahmeti vimīyate jñāyate ityabhivimānaḥ pratyagātmā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7092: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brssgo1u:7101: indrādivedyamakhilasya ca śāsitāraṃ jyotirnabhaḥ padamanidramajaṃ bhaje 'ham //1//
GSP33brssgo1u:7104: idaṃ śrūyate- 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7105: tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānamanyā vāco vimucyathāmṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.2.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7114: arthāntare cāyatane parigṛhyamāṇe smṛtiprasiddhaṃ pradhānaṃ parigrahītavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7117: 'vāyurvai gautama tatsūtraṃ vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti' (bṛha. 3.7.2)
GSP33brssgo1u:7120: tasyāpi bhoktṛtvādbhogyaṃ prapañcaṃ pratyāyatanatvopapatterityevaṃ prāpta idamāha- dyubhvādyāyatanamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7121: dyauśca bhūśca dyubhuvau dyubhuvāvādī yasya tadidaṃ dyubhvādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7122: yadetadasminvākye dyauḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ manaḥ prāṇā ityevamasmākaṃ jagadotatvena nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyāyatanaṃ paraṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7125: ātmaśabdo hīha bhavati- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7127: kvacicca svaśabdenaiva brahmaṇa āyatanatvaṃ śrūyate-' sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhāḥ' (chā. 6.8.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7128: svaśabdenaiva ceha purastādupariṣṭācca brahma saṃkīrtyate- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7132: yathānekātmako vṛkṣaḥ śākhā skandho mūlaṃ cetyevaṃ nānāraso vicitra ātmetyāśaṅkā saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:7133: tāṃ nivartayituṃ sāvadhāraṇamāha- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7134: etaduktaṃ bhavati- na kāryaprapañcaviśiṣṭo vicitra ātmā vijñeyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7136: yathā yasmānnāste devadattastadānayetyukta āsanamevānayati na devadattam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7138: vikārānṛtābhisaṃdhasya cāpavādaḥ śrūyate- 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (kā. 2.4.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7139: sarvaṃ brahmeti tu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prapañcapravilāpanārthaṃ nānekarasatāpratipādanārtham /
GSP33brssgo1u:7140: 'sa yathā saindhavaghano 'nantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsno rasaghana evaivaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva' (bṛha. 4.5.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:7143: yattūktaṃ, setuśruteḥ setośca pāravattvopapatterbrahmaṇor'thāntareṇa dyubhvādyāyatanena bhavitavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7144: atrocyate- vidhāraṇatvamātramatra setuśrutyā vivakṣyate na pāravattvādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7145: nahi mṛddārumayo loke seturdṛṣṭa ityatrāpi mṛddārumaya evaseturabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7146: setuśabdārtho 'pi vidhāraṇatvamātrameva na pāravattvādi ṣiño bandhanakarmaṇaḥ setuśabdavyutpatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7147: apara āha- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti yadetatsaṃkīrtitamātmajñānaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7150: 'amṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ' iti setuśrutyā saṃkīrtyate na tu dyubhvādyāyatanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7152: FN: amṛtasyeti śravaṇāt seturiti śravaṇāditi yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7159: evaṃ rūḍhipadabahulānāṃ prāyeṇa saviśeṣavākyānāṃ samanvayo dvitīyapāde darśitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7160: adhunā yaugikapadabahulānāṃ nirviśeṣapradhānānāṃ vākyānāṃ samanvayaṃ vaktuṃ tṛtīyaḥ pāda ārabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7163: tadvadatrāpyupakramasthasādhāraṇāyatanatvasya vākyaśeṣasthasetuśrutyā vastutaḥ paricchinne pradhānādau vyavastheti dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇādhikaraṇasaṃgatiḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7169: cakārādavyākṛtaṃ kāraṇamotaṃ kalpitaṃ tadapavādena tamevādhiṣṭhānātmānaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ jānatha śravaṇādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7170: anyā anātmavāco vimuñcatha viśeṣeṇa niḥśeṣaṃ tyajatha /
GSP33brssgo1u:7171: eṣa vāgvimokapūrvakātmasākṣātkāro 'mṛtasya mokṣasyāsārāpāradurvārasaṃsāravāridheḥ parapārasya seturiva setuḥ prāpaka iti mātṛvacchrutirmumukṣūnupadiśati
GSP33brssgo1u:7173: amṛtasya brahmaṇaḥ seturiti ṣaṣṭhyā brahmaṇo bhinnatvena setoḥ śrutatvādeṣaśabdaparāmṛṣṭaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamabrahmaiva seturiva seturityāha-amṛtasyeti
GSP33brssgo1u:7181: yathā loke maṇayaḥ sūtreṇa grathitā evaṃ he gautama,
GSP33brssgo1u:7182: samaṣṭiliṅgātmakavāyunā sthūlāni sarvāṇi saṃdṛbdhāni grathitāni bhavantīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7186: upādhiparicchinnasya jīvasya sarvavastu pratyekaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7191: laye pratiṣṭheti brahmavācisatpadena chāndogye brahmaṇa āyatanatvaśruteratrāpi tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7193: 'yasmin dyauḥ'iti vākyātpūrvottaravākyayoḥ puruṣabrahmādiśabdena brahmasaṃkīrtanānmadhye 'pi brahma grāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7200: yasmin sarvamotaṃ tamevaikamityevakāraikaśabdābhyāṃ nirviśeṣaṃ jñeyamityuktvā hetvantaramāha-vikārānṛteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7201: vikāre 'nṛte kalpite abhisaṃdho 'bhimāno yasya tasyānarthabhāktvena nindāśruteśca kūṭasthasatyaṃ jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7204: yaścoraḥ sa sthāṇuritivat yatsarvaṃ tadbrahmeti sarvoddeśena brahmatvavidhānādbādhanārthaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7211: yadvidhāraṇaṃ tadeva vyabhicāritve 'pi setupadārthaikadeśatvāduṇatvena grāhyaṃ natu
GSP33brssgo1u:7214: atra śrutau pareṇeti śeṣaḥ vidhāraṇasya śabdārthatvaṃ sphuṭayati-ṣiñ iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7218: yadvā dyubhvādyādhāro brahma na setuśabdārthaḥ kintvavyavahitaṃ jñānamityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7228: tatastatpūjanādau rāgastatparibhavādau dveṣastaducchedadarśanādbhayaṃ mohaścetyevamayamanantabhedo 'narthavrātaḥ saṃtataḥ sarveṣāṃ naḥ pratyakṣaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7232: ityuktvā bravīti- 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7233: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ śāstre- 'yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7237: apica 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānamanyā vāco vimuñcathāmṛtasyaiva setuḥ' iti vāgvimokapūrvakaṃ vijñeyatvamiha dyubhvādyāyatanasyocyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7238: tacca śrutyantare brahmaṇo dṛṣṭam- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvati brāhmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7243: muktairūpasṛpyaṃ pratyaktvena prāpyaṃ yadbrahma tasyātrokteriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7247: yathā nadyo gaṅgādyā nāmarūpe vihāya samudrātmanā tiṣṭhanti tathā brahmātmavidapi
GSP33brssgo1u:7248: saṃsāraṃ vihāya parātkāraṇādavyaktātparaṃ pūrṇaṃ svayañjyotirānandaṃ pratyaktvena
GSP33brssgo1u:7250: idaṃ pradhānādeḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-brahmaṇaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7255: na kevalamanarthanivṛttiḥ kintvatra dehe tiṣṭhanneva brahmānandamaśnuta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7257: dhīro vivekī tamevātmānaṃ vijñāya viśuddaṃ lakṣyapadārthaṃ jñātvā vākyārthajñānaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7261: jihvāmūlaṃ ca dantāśca nāsikoṣṭhau ca tālu ca //
GSP33brssgo1u:7267: yathā brahmaṇaḥ pratipādakaḥ vaiśeṣiko heturukto naivamarthāntarasya vaiśeṣiko hetuḥ pratipādako 'stītyāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:7274: tadviparītasya cetanasya pratipādakaśabdo 'trāsti- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' (muṇḍa.1.1.9) ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7283: yadyapi prāṇabhṛto vijñānātmana ātmatvaṃ cetanatvaṃ ca saṃbhavati tathāpyupādhiparicchinnajñānasya
GSP33brssgo1u:7290: nanu 'nānumānaprāṇabhṛtāvatacchabdāt'ityekameva sūtraṃ kimarthaṃ na kṛtaṃ ubhayanirāsahetorekatvādityata āha-pṛthagiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7297: bhedavyapadeśaśceha bhavati- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti jñeyajñātṛbhāvena /
GSP33brssgo1u:7306: paramātmani hi sarvātmake vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ syānna kevale prāṇabhṛti // 6 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7308: yadyapi viśuddhaḥ pratyagātmaivātra jñeyaḥ tathāpi jīvatvākāreṇa jñāturjñeyādbhedānna jñeyarūpatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7309: evaṃ ca jīvatvaliṅgaviśiṣṭatvena jīvasya dyubhvādivākyarthatvaṃ nirasyate na śuddharūpeṇeti mantavyam // 5 // //6//
GSP33brssgo1u:7314: dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ ca prakṛtya 'dvā supraṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (mu. 3.1.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:7319: yadi ceśvaro dyubhvādyāyatanatvena vivakṣitastatastasya prakṛtasyeśvarasya kṣetrajñātpṛthagvacanamavakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7323: kṣetrajñau hi kartṛtvena bhoktṛtvena ca pratiśarīraṃ buddhyādyupādhisaṃbaddho lokata eva prasijaddho nāsau śrutyā tātparyeṇa vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7324: īśvarastu lokato 'prasiddhatvācchrutyā tātparyeṇa vivakṣyata iti na tasyākasmikaṃ vacanaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7325: 'guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau hi' ityatrāpyetaddarśitaṃ 'dvā suparṇā' ityasyāmṛcīśvarakṣetrajñāvucyete iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7326: yadāpi paiṅgyupaniṣatkṛtena vyākhyānenāsyāmṛci sattvakṣetrajñāvucyete tadāpi na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brssgo1u:7328: prāṇabhṛddhīha ghaṭādicchidravatsattvādyupādhyabhimānitvena pratiśarīraṃ gṛhyamāṇo dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ na bhavatīti niṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7331: yathā ghaṭādicchidrāṇi ghaṭādibhirupādhibhirvinopalakṣyamāṇāni mahākāśa eva bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7336: tasyaiva hi bhūtayonivākyasya madhya idaṃ paṭhitam 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7338: nanu sthityeśvarasyādanājīvasya 'dvā suparṇā'ityatroktāvapi īśvara āyatanavākyena kimarthaṃ grāhya ityata āha-yadi ceśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7345: nanu 'dvā suparṇā'ityatra buddhijīvayorukteḥ kathamidaṃ sūtramityata iti-guhāmiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7350: adanavākyena buddhimanūdya sthitivākyena buddhyādivilakṣaṇaśuddhapratyagbrahmaṇo jñeyasyokterdyubhvādivākye tadeva grāhyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7352: nanvatrānupahito jīva ukto na paraṃ brahmetyata āha-yastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7362: idaṃ samāmananti- 'bhūmā tveva vidijñāsitavya iti bhūmānaṃ bhagavo vijijñāsa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7363: yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpam' (chā. 7.23,24) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7370: tathā 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñśokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāṃ. 7.1.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:7372: tatra kasyopādanaṃ nyāyyaṃ kasya vā hānamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7377: yathā hi 'asti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7380: mano vāva vāco bhūyaḥ' iti ca nāmādibhyo hyā prāṇādbhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanapravāhaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7381: naivaṃ prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanaṃ dṛśyate 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya ityādo vāva prāṇādbhūya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7382: prāṇameva tu nāmādibhya āśāntebhyo bhūyāsaṃ 'prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyān' ityādinā saprapañcamuktvā
GSP33brssgo1u:7384: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti prāṇavratamativāditvamanukṛṣyāparityajyaiva
GSP33brssgo1u:7385: prāṇaṃ satyādiparamparayā bhūmānamavatārayanprāṇameva bhūmānaṃ manyanta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7386: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇe bhūmani vyākhyāyamāne 'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityetadbhūmno lakṣaṇaparaṃ vacanaṃ vyākhyāyeteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7387: ucyate- suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ prāṇagrasteṣu karaṇeṣu darśanādivyavahāranivṛttidarśanātsaṃbhavati prāṇasyāpi 'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityetallakṣaṇam
GSP33brssgo1u:7388: tathāca śrutiḥ 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati' ityādinā sarvakaraṇavyāpārapratyastamayarūpāṃ suṣuptyavasthāmuktvā 'prāṇāgnaya evaitasminpure jāgrati' (pra. 4.2.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:7389: iti tasyāmevāvasthāyāṃ pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya jāgaraṇaṃ bruvatī prāṇapradhānāṃ suṣuptyavasthāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7390: yaccaitadbhūmnaḥ sukhatvaṃ śrutam- 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' (chā. 7.23)
GSP33brssgo1u:7392: 'atraiṣa devaḥ svapnānna paśyatyatha yadetasmiñśarīre sukhaṃ bhavati' (pra. 4.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:7397: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇaṃ bhūmānaṃ manyamānasya tarati śokamātmavit ityātmavividiṣayā prakaraṇasyotthānamupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7399: tathāhi-' prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo mātā prāṇo bhrātā prāṇaḥ svasā prāṇa ācāryaḥ prāṇo brāhmaṇaḥ' (chā. 7.15.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:7401: 'yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evamasminprāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam' iti ca sarvātmatvāranābhinidarśanābhyāṃ ca saṃbhavati vaipulyātmikā bhūmarūpatā prāṇasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:7403: tata idamucyate- paramātmaiveha bhūmā bhavitumarhati na prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7408: bṛhadāraṇyake ca svapnajāgaritasthānābhyāṃ saha pāṭhāt tasyāṃ ca saṃprasādāvasthāyāṃ prāṇo jāgartīti prāṇo 'tra saṃprasādo 'bhipreyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7411: nahi nāmaiva nāmno bhūya iti nāmna ūrdhvamupadiṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7412: kiṃ tarhi nāmno 'nyadarthāntaramupadiṣṭaṃ vāgākhyam- 'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7415: nanviha nāsti praśno 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7418: prāṇaviṣayameva cātivāditvāmuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ- 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7424: yathaiṣo 'gnihotrī yaḥ satyaṃ vadatītyukte na satyavadanenāgnihotritvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7428: tathā 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' ityukte na satyavadanenātivāditvam,
GSP33brssgo1u:7431: satyavadanaṃ tu prāṇavido viśeṣo vivakṣyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7434: śrutyā hyatra satyavadanenātivāditvaṃ pratīyate- 'yaḥsatyenātivadati so 'tivadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7438: prakṛtavyāvṛttyarthaśca tuśabdo na saṃgacchate 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7441: tasmādyathaikavedapraśaṃsāyāṃ prakṛtāyāmeṣa tu mahābrāhmaṇo yaścaturo vedānadhīta ityekavedebhyor'thāntarabhūtaścaturvedaḥ praśasyate tādṛgetaddraṣṭavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:7444: tatra prāṇāntamanuśāsanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇībhūtaṃ nāradaṃ svayameva sanatkumāro vyutpādayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7445: yatprāṇavijñānena vikārānṛtaviṣayeṇātivāditvamanativāditvameva tat 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7450: tathā vyutpāditāya nāradāya 'so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ satyenātivadāni' ityevaṃ pravṛttāya vijñānādisādhanaparamparayā bhūmānamupadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7451: tatra yatprāṇādadhi satyaṃ vaktavyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tadeveha bhūmetyucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7452: tasmādasti prāṇādadhi bhūmna upadeśa ityataḥ prāṇādanyaḥ paramātmā bhūmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7460: iti copakramyopasaṃharati- 'tasmai mṛditakaṣāyāya tamasaḥ pāraṃ darśayati bhagavānsanatkumāraḥ' (chā. 7.26.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7479: tasmānniratiśayasukhārthinā bhūmaiva vicārya iti nāradaṃ prati sanatkumāreṇokte sati nārado brūte-bhūmānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7483: bahorbhāva iti vigrahe 'pṛthvādibhyā imanic'itīmanpratyaye kṛte 'bahorlopo bhū ca bahoḥ'iti sūtreṇa bahoḥ parasyemanicpratyayasyāderikārasya lepaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:7484: bahoḥ sthāne bhūrityādeśaśca syādityukterbhūmanniti śabdo niṣpannaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7487: vākyopakramastha ātmāpi svapratipādanāpekṣo dharmitvena bhātīti saṃnihitavyavahitaprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7492: pūrvottarapakṣayoḥ prāṇopāstiḥ brahmajñānaṃ ca phalaṃ krameṇa mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7494: bhūmā tu prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥprakṣaṃ vinaivoktaliṅgena prāṇādabhinna ityāha-kasmādityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7495: prāṇādbhūya iti na dṛśyata iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7496: nanu 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇaprakaraṇavicchedānna prāṇo bhūmetyata āha-prāṇameveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7497: nāmādyaśāntānupāsyānatītya prāṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vadatītyativādi prāṇavid taṃ prati ativādyasīti kenacitpraśne kṛte asmīti brūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:7499: prāṇavidameṣa iti parāmṛśya satyavacanadhyānamananaśraddhādidharmaparamparāṃ vidhāya bhūmopadeśānna prakaraṇavicchedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7501: bhūmno lakṣaṇavacanaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇe praśnapūrvakaṃ yojayatikathaṃ punarityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7502: prāṇagrasteṣu prāṇe līneṣu na śṛṇoti suṣuptapuruṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7503: 'gārhapatyo ha vā eṣo 'pāno vyāno 'nvāhāryapacana āhavanīyaḥ prāṇaḥ'iti śruteḥ prāṇā agnaya iha pure śarīre jāgrati savyāpārā eva tiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7508: sarvaṃ samarpitamiti ca sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ prāṇaṃ svīkaroti śrutirityanvayaḥ ata ātmatvaṃ mukhyārthaṃ darśayati-saṃprasāda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7509: sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde sthitvā punarādravatīti prayogācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:7524: tadvato ya eṣa ityukterna pūrvānukarṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7525: ya eṣa prāṇavidativadatītyanūdya sa satyaṃ vadediti vidhānānna prāṇaprakaraṇaviccheda iti dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7528: satyavacane tvabādhitārthasaṃbandhāllākṣaṇika iti nātra lakṣyavacanavidhirityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7529: kiñca satyena brahmaṇātivadatīti tṛtīyāśrutyā brahmakaraṇakamativāditvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7530: tasya prakaraṇādbādho na yukta ityāha-śrutyā hītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7533: evaṃ satyeneti śrutyā prakaraṇaṃ bādhyamityuktvā tuśabdenāpi bādhyamāha-prakṛteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7549: imānyati śravaṇādīni jñeyasya satyasya brahmatve liṅgāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:7550: evaṃ śrutiliṅgaiḥ prāṇasyāvāntaraprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā prastutaṃ satyaṃ brahma bhūmapadoktabahutvadharmītyāha-tatra yaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7551: kiñca 'saṃnihitādapi vyavahitaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ balīyaḥ'iti nyāyena saṃnihitaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7552: prāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vākyopakramastha ātmā svapratipādanāya bhūmavākyāpekṣa iha bhūmā grāhya ityāha-evaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7559: tataḥ prāgukto bhūmā prāṇa iti śaṅkate-prakaraṇānta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7564: apica ye bhūmni śrūyante dharmāste paramātmanyupapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:7565: 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvajānāti sa bhūmā' iti darśanādivyavahārābhāvaṃ bhūmānyavagamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7569: yo 'pyasau suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ darśanādivyavahārābhāva uktaḥ so 'pyātmana evāsaṅgatvavivakṣayokto na prāṇasvabhāvavivakṣayā,
GSP33brssgo1u:7573: yata āha- 'eṣo 'sya parama ānanda etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrāmupajīvanti' (bṛ. 4.3.32) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7574: ihāpi 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukham' iti sāmayasukhanirākaraṇena brahmaiva sukhaṃ bhūmānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7575: 'yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtam' ityamṛtatvamapīha śrūyamāṇaṃ paramakāraṇaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7579: tathāca satyatvaṃ svamahimapratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvāttmatvamiti caite dharmāḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ paramātmanyevopapadyante nānyatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:7586: yaduktaṃ bhūmno lakṣaṇaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇeṣu yojyamiti tadanūdya vighaṭayati-yo 'pyasāvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7588: tadabhāve suṣuptau tadabhāva ityasaṅgatvajñānārthaṃ praśnopaniṣadi 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati'iti paramātmānaṃ prakṛtyoktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7601: sa hovācaitadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantyasthūlamanaṇu' (bṛ. 3.8.7,8)
GSP33brssgo1u:7603: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimakṣaraśabdena varṇa ucyate kiṃvā parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7604: tatrākṣarasamāmnāya ityādāvakṣaraśabdasya varṇe prasiddhatvāt prasiddhyatikramasya cāyuktatvāt 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' (chā. 2.23.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:7610: tatra hi pṛthivyādeḥ samastavikārajātasya kālatrayavibhaktasya 'ākāśa eva tadotaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7611: ca protaṃ ca' ityākāśe pratiṣṭhitatvamuktvā 'kasminnu khalvākāśa otaśca protaśca'
GSP33brssgo1u:7613: tathācopasaṃhṛtam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7615: yadapi 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' iti tadapi brahmapratipattisādhanatvātstutyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7616: tasmānna kṣaratyaśnute ceti nityatvāvyāpitatvābhyāmakṣaraṃ parameva brahma // 10 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:7620: yadbhūtaṃ bhavacca bhaviṣyacca tatsarvaṃ kasminnotamiti gārgyā pṛṣṭhena muninā yājñavalkyenāvyākṛtākāśaḥ kāryamātrāśraya uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7621: ākāśaḥ kasminnota iti dvitīyapraśne sa muniruvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:7624: yathā satyaśabdo brahmaṇi rūḍha iti brahma bhūmetyuktaṃ tathākṣaraśabdo varṇe rūḍha iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7629: varṇasya oṅkārasya sarvāśrayatvaṃ kathamityāśaṅkya dhyānārthamidaṃ yathā śrutyantare sarvātmatvamityāha-oṅkāra iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7642: praśāsanaṃ hīha śrūyate- 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' (bṛ. 3.8.9) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7645: na hyacetanānāṃ ghaṭādikāraṇānāṃ mṛdādīnāṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ praśāsanamasti // 11 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7650: bhūtākāśasya kāryantaḥpātinaḥ śrutasarvakāryāśrayatvāyogādavyākṛtamajñānamevākāśaḥ pradhānaśabdita iti tadāśrayatvāccākṣaraṃ na pradhānamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7661: vyāvartayati śrutiḥ- 'tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgyadṛṣṭaṃ daṣṭraśrutaṃ śrotramataṃ mantravijñātaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7665: tathā 'nānyadato 'sti draṣṭṛ nānyadatosti śrotṛ nānyadato 'sti mantṛ nānyadato 'sti vijñātṛ' ityātmabhedapratiṣedhāt na śārīrasyāpyupādhimato 'kṣaraśabdavācyatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7675: tarhi śodhito jīva evākṣaraṃ na para ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7683: iti prakṛtya śrūyate- 'yaḥ punaretaṃ trimātreṇomithyetenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīta' (pra. 5.2,5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7688: 'sa tejasi sūrye saṃpannaḥ'' 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' iti ca tadvido deśaparicchinnasya phalasyocyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7699: īkṣatikarmatvenāsyābhidhyātavyasya puruṣasya vākyaśeṣe vyapadeśo bhavati- 'sa etasmājjīvaghanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puraṣamīkṣate' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7702: īkṣatestu tathābhūtameva vastu loke karma dṛṣṭamityataḥ paramātmaivāyaṃ samyagdarśanaviṣayabhūta īkṣatikarmatvena vyadiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7708: nacātra jīvanaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:7713: saindhavakhilyavadyaḥ paramātmano jīvarūpaḥ khilyabhāva upādhikṛtaḥ paraśca viṣayendriyebhyaḥ so 'tra jīvaghana iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7714: apara āha- 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' ityatītānantaravākyanirdiṣṭo yo brahmalokaḥ paraśca lokāntarebhyaḥ so 'trajīvaghana ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7715: jīvānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ sarvakaraṇātmani hiraṇyagarbhe brahmalokanivāsini saṃghātopapatterbhavati brahmaloko jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7716: tasmātparo yaḥ paramātmekṣaṇakarmabhūtaḥ sa evābhidhyāne 'pi karmabhūta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7717: paraṃ puruṣamiti ca viśeṣaṇaṃ paramātmaparigraha evāvakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7718: paro hi puruṣaḥ paramātmaiva bhavati yasmātparaṃ kiñcidanyannāsti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7719: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' iti ca śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7720: 'paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāraḥ' iti ca vibhajyānantaramoṅkāreṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyātavyaṃ bruvanparameva brahmaparaṃ puruṣaṃ gamayati
GSP33brssgo1u:7721: 'yathā pādodarastvacā vinirmucyata evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmucyate' iti pāpmavinirmokaphalavacanaṃ paramātmānamihābhidhyātavyaṃ sūcayati
GSP33brssgo1u:7722: atha yaduktaṃ paramātmābhidhyāyino na deśaparicchinnaphalaṃ yujyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7723: atrocyate- trimātreṇoṅkāreṇālambanena paramātmānamabhidhyāyataḥ phalaṃ brahmalokaprāptiḥ krameṇa ca samyagdarśanotpattiriti kramamuktyabhiprāyametadbhaviṣyatītyadoṣaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7729: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7738: paraṃ nirguṇamaparaṃ saguṇaṃ brahmaitadeva yo 'yaṃ oṅkāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7741: yathādhyānaṃ paramaparaṃ vānveti prāpnotīti prakṛtya madhye ekamātradvimātroṅkārayordhyānamuktvā
GSP33brssgo1u:7745: yo hyakārādimātrātraye ekasyā mātrāyā akārasya ṛṣyādikaṃ jāgradādivibhūtiṃ ca jānāti tena samyagjñātā ekā mātrā yasyoṅkārasya sa ekamātraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7747: tamoṅkāraṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'bhidhyāyīta sa oṅkāravibhūtitvena dhyātaiḥ sāmabhiḥ sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā paramātmānaṃ puruṣamīkṣata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7750: pūrvatra pūrvapakṣatvenokte oṅkāre buddhisthaṃ dhyātavyaṃ niścīyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7751: yadvā pūrvatra varṇe rūḍhasyākṣaraśabdasya liṅgādbrahmaṇi vṛttiruktā,
GSP33brssgo1u:7752: tadvadatrāpi brahmalokaprāptiliṅgatparaśabdasya hiraṇyagarbhe vṛttiriti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tatrāparamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7755: sūrye saṃpannaḥ praviṣṭaḥ nanu vasudāna īśvara iti dhyānādvindate vasvityalpamapi phalaṃ brahmopāsakasya śrutamityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7762: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamiti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7763: sūtre saśabda īśvarapara iti pratijñatatvena taṃ vyācaṣṭe-parameveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7764: sa upāsaka etasmādviraṇyagarbhātparaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmāhamitīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7767: nanvīkṣaṇaṃ pramātvādviṣayasatyatāmapekṣata iti bhavatu satyaḥ para īkṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7768: dhyātavyastvasatyo 'paraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-sa eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7769: śrutibhyāṃ pratyabhijñānātsa evāyamiti sautraḥ saśabdo vyākhyātaḥ atraivaṃ sūtrayojanā-oṅkāre yo dhyeyaḥ sa para evātmā,
GSP33brssgo1u:7776: dhyānasya tatphalekṣaṇasya ca loke samānaviṣayatvāddhyeya evekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7778: 'sa sāmabhirūnnīyate brahmalokam''sa etasmājjīvaghanāt'ityetatpadena saṃnihitataro brahmalokasvāmī parāmṛśyata iti praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe-kastarhītyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:7781: khilyavadalpo bhāvaḥ paricchedo yasya sa khilyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7782: etatpadena brahmaloko vā parāmṛśyata ityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7784: vyaṣṭikaraṇābhimānināṃ jīvānāṃ ghanaḥ saṃghāto yasminsarvakaraṇābhimānini sa jīvaghanaḥ tatsvāmikatvātparaṃparāsaṃbandhena loko lakṣya ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7786: parapuruṣaśabdasya paramātmani mukhyatvācca sa eva dhyeya ityāha-paramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7787: yasmātparaṃ nāparamasti kiñcit sa evaṃ mukhyaḥ paraḥ na tu piṇḍātparaḥ sūtrātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7788: kiñca paraśabdenopakrame niścitaṃ paraṃ brahmaivātra vākyaśeṣe dhyātavyamityāha-paraṃ cāparaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7791: oṅkāre parabrahmopāsanayā sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā parabrahmekṣitvā tadeva śāntamabhayaṃ paraṃ prāpnotītyavirodhamāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7792: evamekavākyatāsamarthanaprakaraṇānugṛhītaparapuruṣaśrutibhyāṃ parabrahmapratyabhijñayā brahmalokaprāptiliṅgaṃ bādhitvā vākyaṃ praṇavadhyeye brahmaṇi samanvitamiti siddham //13//
GSP33brssgo1u:7797: 'atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' /
GSP33brssgo1u:7799: tatra yo 'yaṃ dahare hṛdayapuṇrīke dahara ākāśaḥ śrutaḥ sa kiṃ bhūtākāśo 'thavā vijñānātmā'thavā paramātmeti saṃśayyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7802: ākāśaśabdo hyayaṃ bhūtākāśe parasmiṃśca prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7803: tatra kiṃ bhūtākāśa eva daharaḥ syātkiṃvā para iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7804: tathā brahmapuramiti kiṃ jīvo 'tra brahmanāmā tasyedaṃ puraṃ śarīraṃ brahmapuramathavā parasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ brahmapuramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7805: tatra jīvasya parasya vānyatarasya purasvāmino daharākāśatve saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7806: tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśa eva daharaśabda iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7808: 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ' iti ca bāhyāyantarabhāvakṛtabhedasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ dyāvāpṛthivyādi ca tasminnantaḥ samāhitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7815: nahi parasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīreṇa svasvāmibhāvaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7816: tatra purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśe 'vasthānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā rājñaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7818: manaśca prāyeṇa hṛdaye pratiṣṭhitamityato jīvasyaivedaṃ hṛdaye 'ntaravasthānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7823: ata uttaraṃ brūmaḥ- parameśvara evātra daharākāśo bhavitumarhati na bhūtākāśo jīvo vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7826: tathāhi- anveṣṭavyatayā vihitasya daharasyākāśasya 'taṃ cedbrūyuḥ' ityupakramya 'kiṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7827: tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityevamākṣepapūrvakaṃ pratisamādhānavacanaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7828: 'sa brūyādyavānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite' (chā. 8.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7829: tatra puṇḍarīkadaharatvena prāptadaharatvasyākāśasya prasiddhākāśaupamyena daharatvaṃ nivartayanbhūtākāśatvaṃ daharasyākāśasya nivartayatīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7830: yadyapyākāśaśabdo bhūtākāśe rūḍhastathāpi tenaiva tasyopamā nopapadyata iti bhūtākāśaśaṅkā nivartitā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7835: apica kalpayitvāpi bhedamupamānopameyabhāvaṃ varṇayataḥ paricchinnatvādabhyantarākāśasya na bāhyākāśaparimāṇatvamupapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7842: 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyurvīśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ' iti cātmatvāpahatapāpmatvādayaśca guṇā na bhūtākāśe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7843: yadyapyātmaśabdo jīve saṃbhavati tathāpītarebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo jīvāśaṅkāpi nivartitā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7844: nahyupādhiparicchinnasyārāgropamitasya jīvasya puṇḍarīkaveṣṭhanakṛtaṃ daharatvaṃ śakyaṃ nivartayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:7846: yadātmatayā jīvasya sarvagatatvādi vivakṣyeta tasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sākṣātsarvagatatvādivivakṣyatāmiti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7847: yadapyuktaṃ brahmapuramiti jīvena parasyopalakṣitatvādrājña iva jīvasyaivedaṃ purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśavartitvamastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7848: atra brūmaḥ- parasyaivedaṃ brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ saccharīraṃ brahmapuramityucyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:7853: 'sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣu puriśayaḥ' (bṛ. 2.5.18)
GSP33brssgo1u:7856: yathā śālagrāme viṣṇaḥ saṃnihita iti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7857: 'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate' (chā. 8.1.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:7858: iti ca karmaṇāmantavatphalamuktvā 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajatyetāṃśca satyānkāmānsteṣāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7859: sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' iti prakṛtadaharākāśavijñānasyānantaphalatvaṃ vadanparamātmatvamasya sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7862: paraviśeṣaṇatvenopādānāditi atra brūmaḥ- yadyākāśo nānveṣṭavyatvenoktaḥ syāt 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ' ityādyākāśasvarūpapradarśanaṃ nopayujyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7865: kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityākṣipya parihārāvasara
GSP33brssgo1u:7868: evaṃ hi sati yadantaḥsamāhitaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādi tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ cokta syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7871: 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkāmān' iti samuccayārthena caśabdenātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7873: tasmādvākyopakrame 'pi dahara evākāśo hṛdayapuṇḍarīkādhiṣṭhānaḥ sahāntaḥsthaiḥ samāhitaiḥ pṛthivyādibhiḥ satyaiśca kāmairvijñeya ukta iti gamyate
GSP33brssgo1u:7885: puri hṛdaye vā śete iti puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7892: asmin yatprasiddhaṃ daharamalpaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ tasminhṛdaye yadantarākāśaśabditaṃ brahma tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vicārya jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7901: tathehāpyākāśapadasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśo dhyeya iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tatrākāśetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7902: daharavākyasyānantaraprajāpativākyasya ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvayokteḥ śrutyādisaṃgatayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7906: atra tasmin 'yadantastadanveṣṭavyam'ityākāśāntaḥ sthasyānveṣṭavyatvādiliṅganvayena daharākāśasya brahmatve spaṣṭaliṅgābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7910: ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca'ityādinā śrutasarvāśrayatvaṃ ca kathamityāśaṅkya krameṇa pariharati-tasyetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7914: nanu 'eṣa ātmā'ityātmaśabdo bhūte na yukta ityarūcerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7923: nanu jīvasyākāśapadārthatvamayuktamityāśaṅkya tarhi bhūtākāśa eva daharo 'stu tasminnantaḥsthaṃ kiñciddhyeyamiti pakṣāntaramāha-na cātreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7926: yadvā anveṣyatvādiliṅgāddaharasya brahmatvaniścayāt 'ākāśastalliṅgāt'ityanena gatārthatvamiti śaṅkātra nirasanīyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7927: anveṣyatvādeḥ paraviśeṇatvena grahaṇāddarahasya brahmatve liṅgaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7931: hṛdayameva tāvadalpaṃ tatratyākāśo 'lpataraḥ kiṃ tadatrālpe vidyate yadvicāryā jñeyamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7938: na abhede sādṛśyasyānanvayena yuddhasya nirūpamatve tātparyādayamananvayālaṅkāra iti kāvyavidaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7944: kiñca hārdākāśasyāntaratvātyāge alpatvena vyāpakabāhyākāśasādṛśyaṃ na yuktamityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7946: nanu hārdākāśasyālpatvanivṛttau tāvattve ca tātparyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-ubhayeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7950: vigatā jighatsā jagdhumicchā yasya so 'yaṃ vijighatsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7953: na tu brahmaṇaḥ puramiti ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ svasvāmibhāvo grāhyaḥ 'nirapekṣeṇa tatsāpekṣaṃ bādhyam'iti nyāyādityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7954: śarīrasya brahmaṇa tadupalabdhisthānatvarūpe saṃbandhe mānamāha-sa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7956: puri hṛdaye śaya iti puruṣa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7957: nanu brahmaśabdasya jīve 'pyannādinā śarīravṛddhihetau mukhyatvānna ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ kathañcinneya ityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7958: bṛṃhayati dehamiti brahma jīvaḥ tatsvāmike pure hṛdayaṃ brahmaveśma bhavatu,
