GSP33brssgo1u:7961: atha karmaphalādvaurāgyānantaramiha jīvadaśāyāmātmānaṃ daharaṃ tadāśritāṃśca satyakāmādiguṇān
GSP33brssgo1u:7962: ācāryopadeśamanuvidya dhyānenānubhūya ye paralokaṃ gacchanti teṣāṃ sarvalokeṣvanantamaiśvaryaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7964: dahare uktaliṅgānyanyathāsiddhāni teṣāṃ tadantaḥsthaguṇatvādiyuktaṃ smārayitvā dūṣayati-yadapītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7971: sarvanāmabhyāṃ daharākāśamākṛṣyātmatvādiguṇānuktvā guṇaiḥ saha tasyaiva dhyeyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣo brūte tadvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7972: 'tasmin yadantaḥ'iti tatpadena vyavahitamapi hṛdayaṃ yogyatayā grāhyamityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7976: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca / BBs_1,3.15 /
GSP33brssgo1u:7980: yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣe parameśvarasyaiva pratipādakau gatiśabdau bhavataḥ- 'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti' (chā. 8.3.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7981: tatra prakṛtaṃ daharaṃ brahmalokaśabdenābhidhāya tadviṣayā gatiḥ prajāśabdavācyānāṃ jīvānāmabhidhīyamānā daharasya brahmatāṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7982: tathā hyaharaharjīvānāṃ suṣuptavasthāyāṃ brahmaviṣayaṃ gamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutyantare- 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:7984: loke 'pi kila gāḍhaṃ suṣuptamācakṣate brahmībhūto brahmatāṃ gata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7985: tathā brahmalokaśabdo 'pi prakṛte dahare prayujyamāno jīvabhūtākāśaśaṅkāṃ nivartayanbrahmatāmasya gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7987: gamayedyadi brahmaṇo loka iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsavṛttyā vyutpādyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7988: sāmānādhikaraṇavṛttyā tu vyutpādyamāno brahmaiva loko brahmaloka iti parameva brahma gamayiṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7989: etadeva cāhararbrahmalokagamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaśabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyavṛttiparigrahe liṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7990: nahyaharaharimāḥ prajāḥ kāryabrahmalokaṃ satyalokākhyaṃ gacchantīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum // 15 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7992: prajā jīvā etaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ daharaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ lokamaharahaḥ pratyahaṃ svāpe gacchantyastadātmanā sthitā apyanṛtājñānenāvṛtāstaṃ na jānanti ataḥ punaruttiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7993: nanvetatpadaparāmṛṣṭadaharasya svāpe jīvagamyatve 'pi brahmatve kimāyātamityaśaṅkya 'tathā hi dṛṣṭam'iti vyācaṣṭe-tathā hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8002: tatra niṣādānāṃ sthapatiḥ svāmīti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena traivarṇiko grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8004: na tu niṣādaścāsau sthapatiriti karmadhārayeṇa niṣādo grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8019: tāṃ sminneva cātmaśabdaṃ prayujyāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇayogaṃ copaduśya tamevānativṛttaprakaraṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8020: nirdiśati- 'atha ya ātmā sa seturvidhṛtireṣalokānāmasaṃbhedāya' (chā. 8.4.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8025: evamiha prakṛte dahare vidhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ mahimānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8026: ayaṃ ca mahimā parameśvara eva śrutyantarādupalabhyate 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' ityādeḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8027: tathānyatrāpi niścite parameśvaravākye śrūyate- 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' iti
GSP33brssgo1u:8028: evaṃ dhṛteśca hetoḥ parameśvara evāyaṃ daharaḥ // 16 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:8031: nanvathaśabdāddaharaprakaraṇaṃ vicchidya śrutā dhṛtirna daharaliṅgamiti śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8034: sūtre tu mahimaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāddhṛtiśabdaḥ ktinnanto vidhāraṇaṃ brūte,
GSP33brssgo1u:8039: dhṛteśca daharaḥ paraḥ asya dhṛtirūpasya niyamanasya ca mahimno 'sminparamātmanyeva śrutyantara upalabdheriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8051: jīve tu na kvacidākāśaśabdaḥ prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8053: FN: ā samāntātkāśate dīpyata ityākāśaḥ svayañjyotirīśvaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8054: ā samantātkāśate dīpyata iti svayañjyotiṣi brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya vibhutvaguṇato vā prasiddhiḥ prayogaprācuryam //17//
GSP33brssgo1u:8057: itaraparāmarśāt sa iti cen nāsaṃbhavāt / BBs_1,3.18 /
GSP33brssgo1u:8058: yadi vākyaśeṣabalena dahara iti parameśvaraḥ parigṛhyetāstītarasyāpi jīvasya vākyaśeṣe
GSP33brssgo1u:8059: parāmarśaḥ - 'atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirūpasaṃpadya
GSP33brssgo1u:8060: svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca' (chā. 8.3.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8061: atra hi saṃprasādaśabdaḥ śrutyantare suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭatvāttadavasthāvantaṃ jīvaṃ śaknotyupasthāpayituṃ nārthāntaram /
GSP33brssgo1u:8064: yathā cādṛṣṭo 'pi loke parameśvaraviṣaya ākāśaśabdaḥ parameśvaradharmasamabhivyāhārāt
GSP33brssgo1u:8065: 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' ityevamādau parameśvaraviṣayo 'bhyupagata evaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8067: tasmāditaraparāmarśāt 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśa' ityatra sa eva jīva ucyate iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:8075: FN: samyakprasīdatyasmiñjīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8078: yadi 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā'ityādivākyaśeṣabalena daharaḥ parastarhi jīvo 'pītyāśaṅkya niṣedhati-itareti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8081: ya eṣa saṃprasādo jīvo 'smātkāryakaraṇasaṃghātātsamyagutthāya ātmānaṃ tasmādvivicya
GSP33brssgo1u:8082: viviktamātmānaṃ svena brahmarūpeṇābhiniṣpadya sākṣātkṛtya tadeva pratyakparaṃ jyotirūpasaṃpadyate
GSP33brssgo1u:8084: yathā mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitīti vākyaṃ suptvā mukhaṃ vyādatte iti vyākhyāyate tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8089: nanu kvāpyākāśaśabdo jīve na dṛṣṭa ityāśaṅkyoktāvasthotthānaliṅgabalātkalpya ityāha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8090: niyāmakābhāvājjīvo daharaḥ kiṃ na syāditi prāpte niyāmakamāha-naitadityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8102: athedānīṃ mṛtasyevāmṛtasekātpunaḥ samutthānaṃ jīvāśaṅkāyāḥ kriyate uttarasmātprajāpatyādvākyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8103: tatrahi 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā' ityapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānamanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca pratijñāya 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmā'
GSP33brssgo1u:8106: iti ca tameva punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśya 'ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaścaratyeṣa ātmā' (chā. 8.10.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:8107: iti 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmā' iti ca jīvamevāvasthāntaragataṃ vyācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo1u:8109: nāhaṃ khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evemāni bhūtāni' (chā. 8.11.1,2)
GSP33brssgo1u:8110: iti ca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ doṣamupalabhya 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no evānyatraitasmāt
GSP33brssgo1u:8112: paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ' iti jīvameva
GSP33brssgo1u:8115: ataḥ 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' iti jīva evokta iti cetkaścidbrūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8123: etaduktaṃ bhavati- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi ityakṣilakṣitaṃ draṣṭāraṃ nirdiśyodaśarāvabrāhmaṇenainaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8124: śarīrātmatāyā vyutthāpya 'etaṃ tveva te' iti punaḥpunastameva vyākhyāyeyatvenākṛṣya
GSP33brssgo1u:8126: yadasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ paraṃ brahma tadrūpatayainaṃ jīvaṃ vyācaṣṭe na jaivena rūpeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:8129: tadeva ca jīvasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ 'tattvamasi' ityādiśāstrebhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8131: yāvadeva hi sthāṇāviva puruṣabuddhiṃ dvaitalakṣaṇāmavidyāṃ nivartayankūṭasthanityadṛksvarūpamātmānamahaṃ brahmāsmīti na pratipadyate tāvajjīvasya jīvatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8135: kiṃ tarhi tadyatsatyaṃ sa ātmā caitanyamātrasvarūpastattvamasīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:8136: tadā kūcasthanityadṛksvarūpamātmānaṃ pratibudadhyāsmāccharīrādyabhimānātsamuttiṣṭhansa eva kūṭasthanityadṛksvarūpa ātmā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8137: 'sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (muṇḍa. 3.2.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:8139: tadeva cāsya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ yena śarīrātsamutthāya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8140: kathaṃ punaḥ svaṃ ca rūpaṃ svenaiva niṣpadyata iti saṃbhavati kūṭasthanityasya suvarṇādīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8144: natu tathātmacaitanyajyotiṣo nityasya kenacidabhibhavaḥ saṃbhavatyasaṃsargitvādvyomna iva,
GSP33brssgo1u:8147: tacca śarīrādasamutthitasyāpi jīvasya sadā niṣpannameva dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8148: sarvo hi jīvaḥ paśyanśṛṇvanmanvāno vijānanvyavaharatyanyathā vyavahārānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8153: yathā śuddhasya sphaṭikasya svācchyaṃ śauklyaṃ ca svarūpaṃ prāgvivekagrahaṇādraktanīlādyupādhibhiraviviktamiva bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8154: pramāṇajanitavivekagrahaṇāttu parācīnaḥ sphaṭikaḥ svācchyena śauklyena ca svenarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata ityucyate prāgapi tathaiva san /
GSP33brssgo1u:8155: tathā dehādyupādhyaviviktasyaiva sato jīvasya śrutikṛtaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ vivekavijñānaphalaṃ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ kevalātmasvarūpāvagatiḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8158: iti, 'śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate' (gī.13.31)
GSP33brssgo1u:8162: evaṃ mithyājñānakṛta eva jīvaparameśvarayorbhedo na vastukṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8165: yato 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' ityupadiśya 'etadamṛtamabhayametadbrahma' ityupadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8166: yo 'kṣiṇi prasiddho draṣṭā draṣṭṛtvena vibhāvyate so 'mṛtābhayalakṣaṇādbrahmaṇo 'nyaścetsyāttato 'mṛtābhayabrahmasāmānādh ikaraṇyaṃ na syāt
GSP33brssgo1u:8169: tathā dvitīye 'pi paryāye 'ya eṣaḥ svapne mahīyamānaścarati' iti na prathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭādakṣipuruṣāddraṣṭuranyo nirdiṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8171: kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamadrākṣaṃ nedānīṃ taṃ paśyāmīti dṛṣṭameva pratibuddhaḥ pratyācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo1u:8172: draṣṭāraṃ tu tameva pratyabhijānāti ya evāhaṃ svapnamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ jāgaritaṃ paśyamīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8173: tathā tṛtīye 'pi paryāye 'nahi khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti
GSP33brssgo1u:8174: no evemāni bhūtāni iti suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ viśeṣavijñānābhāvameva darśayati na vijñātāraṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8175: yattu tatra 'vināśamevāpīto bhavati' iti tadapi viśeṣavijñānavināśābhiprāyameva na vijñātṛvināśābhiprāyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8178: tathā caturthe 'pi paryāye 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no evānyatraitasmāt'
GSP33brssgo1u:8179: ityupakramya 'maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram' ityādinā prapañcena śarīrādupādhisaṃbandhapratyākhyānena
GSP33brssgo1u:8180: saṃprasādaśabdoditaṃ jīvaṃ 'svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' iti brahmasvarūpāpannaṃ darśayanna
GSP33brssgo1u:8182: kecittu paramātmavivakṣāyāṃ 'etaṃ tveva te' iti jīvākarṣaṇamanyāyyaṃ manyamānā etameva vākyopakramasūcitamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānaṃ te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmīti kalpayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8186: 'etaṃ tveva te' iti ca pratijñāya prākcaturthātparyāyādanyamanyaṃ vyācakṣāṇasya prajāpateḥ pratārakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:8188: tadvilayanena tadviparītamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ svarūpaṃ vidyayā pratipādyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:8190: apare tu vādinaḥ pāramārthikameva jaivaṃ rūpamiti manyante 'smadīyāśca kecit /
GSP33brssgo1u:8192: eka eva parameśvaraḥ kūṭasthanityo vijñānadhāturavidyayā māyayā māyāvivadanekadhā vibhāvyate nānyo vijñānadhāturastīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8193: yattvidaṃ parameśvaravākye jīvamāśaṅkhya pratiṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ - 'nāsaṃbhavāt' (bra.1.3.18) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8194: tatrāyamabhiprāyaḥ - nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāve kūṭasthanitye ekasminnasaṅge paramātmani tadviparītaṃ jaivaṃ rūpaṃ vyomnīva talamalādiparikalpitam
GSP33brssgo1u:8196: jīvasya tu na parasmādanyatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣati kiṃ tvanuvadatyevāvidyākalpitaṃ lokaprasiddhaṃ jīvabhedam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8197: evaṃ hi svābhāvikakartṛtvabhoktṛtvānuvādena pravṛttāḥ karmavidhayo na virudhyanta iti manyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8198: pratipādyaṃ tu śāstrārthamātmaikatvameva darśayati- 'śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavat' (bra. 1.1.30)
GSP33brssgo1u:8200: FN: mahīyamāno vāsanāmayairviṣayaiḥ pūjyamāna iti svapnaparyāye,
GSP33brssgo1u:8201: tadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8204: udaśarāveti udakapūrṇe śarāve pratibimbātmānaṃ dehaṃ svasyājñātaṃ yattanmahyaṃ vācyamityuktaḥ śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8230: yadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8231: tatra kāle tadetatsvapanaṃ yathā syāttathā suptaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8232: samyak asto nirastaḥ karaṇagrāmo yasya sa samastaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8234: svapnaṃ prapañcamajñānamātratvena vilāpayati ato 'jñānasattvāt muktādvilakṣaṇaḥ prājña eṣa svacaitanyena kāraṇaśarīrasākṣī tasya sākṣyasya sattāsphūrtipradatvādātmetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8235: caturthaparyāye brahmoktestasyaivāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇā ityāśaṅkya tasyāpi paryāyasya jīvatvamāha-nāheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8238: na khalu suptaḥ pumānayaṃ saṃprati suṣuptyavasthāyāmayaṃ devadatto 'hamityevamātmānaṃ jānāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8239: no eva naivemāni bhūtāni jānāti kintu vināśameva prāpto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:8240: nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti doṣamupalabhya punaḥ prajāpatimupasasāra /
GSP33brssgo1u:8242: etasmātprakṛtādātmano 'nyatrānyaṃ na vyākhyāsyāmītyupakramya 'maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram'iti nindāpūrvakaṃ jīvameva darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8249: jñānātpūrvamavidyātatkāryapratibimbitatvarūpaṃ jīvatvamabhūditi kṛtvā jñānānantaraṃ brahmarūpo 'pi jīvanāmnocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8253: udaśarāva ātmānamavekṣya yadātmano rūpaṃ na vijānīthastanme brūtamityādi brāhmaṇenetyāha-udaśarāveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8254: udakapūrṇe śarāve pratibimbātmānaṃ dehaṃ dṛṣṭvā svasyājñātaṃ yattanmahyaṃ vācyamityuktaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8258: jīvatvarūpeṇa jīvaṃ na vyācaṣṭe lokasiddhatvāt kintu tamanūdya parasparavyabhicāriṇībhyo 'vasthābhyo vivicya brahmasvarūpaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:8259: ato yadbrahma tadevāpahatapāpmatvādidharmakaṃ na jīva ityuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:8272: manaḥsaṅgino hi kriyayā malanāśādabhivyaktirna tu kūṭasthasyāsaṅgina ityāha-suvarṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8279: taccaitanyaṃ cakṣurādijanyavṛttivyaktaṃ dṛṣṭyādipadavācyaṃ sat vyavahārāṅgaṃ jīvasya svarūpaṃ bhavatīti tasyābhibhūtatve dṛṣṭo vyavahāro virudhyeta
GSP33brssgo1u:8284: svarūpaṃ cejjñānina eva vyañjyeta jñānātpūrvaṃ vyavahārocchittirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8286: sadā vṛttiṣu vyaktasya vastuto 'saṅgasyātmana āvidyakadehādyavivekarūpasya malasaṅgasya sattvāttadvivekāpekṣayā samutthānādiśrutirityuttaramāha-atreti
GSP33brssgo1u:8293: saśarīratvasya satyatvātsamutthānamutkrāntiriti vyākhyeyaṃ na viveka ityāśaṅkyāha-tathā viveketi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8297: nanu svakarmārjite śarīre bhogasyāparihāryatvātkathaṃ jīvata eva svarūpāvirbhāva ityata āha-śarīrastho 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8306: etadbhedasya satyatvameva nāstīti kuta ityanvayaḥ chāyāyāṃ brahmadṛṣṭiparamidaṃ vākyaṃ nābhedaparamityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8307: yasya jñānātkṛtakṛtyatā sarvakāmaprāptistamātmānamanvicchāva iti pravṛttayorindravirocanayoryadyanātmacchāyāṃ prajāpatirbrūyāttadā mṛṣāvādi syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8308: prathamavat dvitīyādiparyāye vyāvṛttāsvavasthāsu unusyūtātmā brahmatvenokta ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8320: tava tu upakrāntaparamātmanaścaturtha evoktestadbāda ityāha-bhūya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8325: ye tu saṃsāraṃ satyamicchanti teṣāmidaṃ śārīrakamevottaramityāha-apare tvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8329: brahmaivāvidyayā saṃsarati na tato 'nyo jīva iti śārīrakārtha ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo1u:8343: atha yo daharavākyaśeṣe jīvaparāmarśo darśitaḥ - 'atha ya eṣa saṃprasādaḥ' (chā. 8.3.4)
GSP33brssgo1u:8344: ityādi, sa dahare parameśvare vyākhyāyamāne na jīvopāsanopadeśo na prakṛtaviśeṣopadeśa ityarthakatvaṃ prāpnotīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8345: ata āha- anyārtho 'yaṃ jīvaparāmarśau na jīvasvarūpaparyavasāyī kiṃ tarhi parameśvarasvarūpaparyavasāyī /
GSP33brssgo1u:8347: saṃprasādaśabdodito jīvo jāgaritavyavahāre dehendriyapañjarādhyakṣo bhūtvā tadvāsanānirmitāṃśca
GSP33brssgo1u:8349: suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ paraṃ jyotirākāśaśabditaṃ paraṃ brahmopasaṃpadya viśeṣavijñānavattvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8351: yadasyopasaṃpattavyaṃ paraṃ jyotiryena svena rūpeṇāyamabhiniṣpadyate sa eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:8353: evaṃ prajāpativākye jīvānuvādena brahmaṇa evāpahatapāpmatvādyukterjīve tadasaṃbhavānna jīvo dahara ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8360: alpaśruter iti cet tad uktam / BBs_1,3.21 /
GSP33brssgo1u:8363: jīvasya tvārāgropanimitasyālpatvamavakalpata iti tasya parihāro vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8364: ukto hyasya parihāraḥ parameśvarasyāpekṣikamalpatvamavakalpata iti 'arbhakaukastvāttadvyapadeśācca neti cenna nicāyyatvādevaṃ vyomavacca' (bra. 1.2.7) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:8366: śrutyaiva cedamalpatvaṃ pratyuktaṃ prasiddhenākāśenopamimānayā 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ' iti // 21 //
GSP33brssgo1u:8368: evaṃ daharavākyaṃ prajāpativākyaṃ ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvitamiti siddham //21//
GSP33brssgo1u:8373: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamāgniḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8374: tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (mu. 2.210)
GSP33brssgo1u:8376: yatra yaṃ bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ yasya ca bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti sa kiṃ tejodhātuḥ kaściduta prājña ātmeti vicikitsāyāṃ tejodhāturiti tāvatprāptam
GSP33brssgo1u:8378: tejaḥsvabhāvakaṃ hi candratārakādi tejaḥsvabhāvaka eva suryo bhāsamāne 'hani na bhāsata iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:8379: tathā saha sūryeṇa sarvamidaṃ candratārakādi yasminna bhāsate so 'pi tejaḥsvabhāva eva kaścidityavagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8383: tasmāttejodhātuḥ kaścidityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prājña evātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8392: samatvācca tejodhātūnāṃ sūryādīnāṃ na tejodhātumanyaṃ pratyapekṣāsti yaṃ bhāntamanubhāyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8400: tasya ceti caturthaṃ pādamasya ślokasya sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8401: 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti tadhetukaṃ bhānaṃ sūryāderucyamānaṃ prājñamātmānaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8406: athavā na sūryādīnameva ślokaparipaṭhitānāmidaṃ taddhetukaṃ vibhānamucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8407: kiṃ tarhi 'sarvamidam' ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ sarvasyaivāsya nāmarūpakriyākārakaphalajātasya yābhivyaktiḥ sā brahmajyotiḥsattānimittā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8409: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti ca tatraśabdamāharanprakṛtagrahaṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8410: prakṛtaṃ ca brahma 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotam' (mu. 2.2.5) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8411: anantaraṃ ca 'hiraṇmaye pare kośe virajaṃ brahma niṣphalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8413: kathaṃ tajjyotiṣāṃ jyotirityata idamutthitam-'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8415: tatra tu sa eva tejodhāturanyo na saṃbhavatītyupapāditam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8418: brahma tu nānyena jyotiṣopalabhyate svayaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8424: FN: tatra tārakāntarāṇi candrādi ca na bhāti taṃ na bhāsayatīti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8433: yadā candrabhāskarādirna bhāsayati tadā alpadīpteragneḥ kā kathetyāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8436: tatreti saptamyāḥ sati viṣaye ca sādhāraṇyātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8438: tathehāpi satisaptamībalādvartamānārthatyāgena yasminsati sūryādayo na bhāsyanti sa tejoviśeṣa upāsya iti bhaviṣyadarthe vṛttirāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8439: adhunā bhāsamāne sūryādau na bhātīti virodhāditi dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tejodhāturiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8444: yasminsati yanna bhāti tadanu tadbhātīti viruddhamityata āha-anubhānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8446: mukhyasaṃbhave vivakṣānupapatteḥ mukhyānubhānaliṅgātsarvabhāsakaḥ paramātmā svaprakāśako 'tra grāhya iti siddhāntamāha-prājña iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8453: yo 'yamanukaroti sa tajjātīya iti niyamo nāstītyāha-nāyamekānta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8460: tatreti sarvanāmaśrutyā prakṛtaṃ brahma grāhyamityāha-na tatra sūrya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8462: hiraṇmaye jyotirmaye annamayādyapekṣayā pare kośe ānandamayākhye pucchaśabditaṃ brahma virajaṃ āgantukamalaśūnyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8470: satisaptamīpakṣe na bhātīti śrutaṃ vartamānatvaṃ tyaktvā tasminsati na bhāsyantītyaśrutabhaviṣyattvaṃ kalpanīyaṃ pratyakṣavirodhanirāsāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:8471: viṣayasaptamīpakṣe tu na bhāsayatītyaśrutaṇijadhyāhāramātraṃ kalpyaṃ na śrutatyāga iti lāghavaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8472: ato brahmaṇi viṣaye sūryāderbhāsakatvaniṣedhena brahmabhāsyatvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8473: yenānyābhāsyatvena hetunā sūryādayastasminbrahmaṇi viṣaye bhāsakāḥ syustathā tu brahmānyena nopalabhyate svaprakāśatvāditi yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8480: apicedṛgrūpatvaṃ prājñasyaivaitmanaḥ smaryate bhagavadgītāsu- 'na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅ ko na pāvakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8481: yadgatvā na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama' (15.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:8483: yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo viddhi māmakam' (15.12) iti ca // 23 //
GSP33brssgo1u:8492: 'aṅguṣṭamātraḥ puruṣaḥ madhya ātmani tiṣṭhati' iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8494: īśāno bhūtabhavyasya sa evādya sa u śva etadvai tat' (kā. 2.4.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8495: tatra yo 'yamaṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣaḥ śrūyate sa kiṃ vijñānātmā kiṃvā paramātmeti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8503: nahi parameśvaro balādyamena niṣkraṣṭuṃ śakyastena tatra saṃsāryaṅguṣṭhamātro niścitaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8504: sa evehāpītyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - paramātmaivāyamaṅguṣṭhamātraparimitaḥ puruṣo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8512: iti śabdādevetyabhidhānaśrutereveśāna iti parameśvaro 'yaṃ gamyata ityarthaḥ // 24 //
GSP33brssgo1u:8513: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvagatasya paramātmanaḥ parimāṇopadeśa ityatra brūmaḥ - @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:8519: puruṣaḥ pūrṇo 'pyātmani dehamadhye aṅguṣṭhamātre hṛdaye tiṣṭhatītyaṅguṣṭhamātra ityucyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:8522: yo 'ṅguṣṭhamātro jīvaḥ sa vastuto nirdhūmajyotirvannirmalaprakāśarūpa iti tamarthaṃ saṃśodhya tasya brahmatvamāha-īśāna iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8528: 'smīti dhyāyediti vidhyadhyāhareṇa dhyānaparaṃ vākyamiti pūrvapakṣayati-tatra parimāṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8539: bhūtabhavyasvetyupapadādbādhakābhāvācca īśāna itīśatvaśabdānniraṅkuśamīśitā bhātīti śrutyā liṅgaṃ bādhyāmiti siddhāntayati-paramātmaiveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8548: na cānyaḥ paramātmana iha grahaṇamarhatīśānaśabdādibhya ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8549: nanu pratiprāṇibhedaṃ hṛdayānāmanavasthitatvādapekṣamapyaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ nopapadyata ityata uttaramucyate- manuṣyādhikāratvāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8556: tatpratyucyate- 'sa ātmā tattvamasi' ityādivatsaṃsāriṇa eva sato 'ṅguṣṭhamātrasya brahmatvamidamupadiśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8560: etamevārthaṃ pareṇa sphuṭīkariṣyati- 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ntarātmā sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye saṃniviṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8572: mukhyāṅguṣṭhamātro jīvo gṛhyatāṃ kiṃ gauṇagrahaṇenetyata āha-na cānya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8574: atra tu śrutivirodhādasaṃbhava iti gauṇagraha ityartha /
GSP33brssgo1u:8581: arthitvādityanena niṣkāmānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ cādhikāro vāritaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8582: tatra mumukṣūṇāṃ śudyarthitve nityādiṣvadhikāro na kāmyeṣu /
GSP33brssgo1u:8583: śuddhacittānāṃ mokṣārthitve śravaṇādiṣu vyañjakeṣvadhikāro na karmasviti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8586: upanayīta tamadhyāpayīta iti śāstrācca na śūdrasya vaidike karmaṇyadhikāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8590: prāṇimātrasya sukhārthitvācca phalārthe karmaṇi paśvādīnāmapyadhikāra ityāśaṅkyoktarityāteṣāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8598: saṃprati tacchabdenāṅguṣṭhamātraṃ jīvamanūdyāyamīśāna iti brahmābhedo bodhya iti vaktumanuvadati-yadapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8604: dvividhetyādibhāṣyāttu jīvamuddiśya brahmatvabodhanamiti pratīyata iti sūtrārthāsparśitvādbhāṣyamanupapannamiti cet, na,
GSP33brssgo1u:8610: ata evopāsanāphalaṃ kaṭhavallyāmeva-'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ'ityādinā bodhitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8611: ata eva caturthādhyāye dvitīyacaraṇe 'tadokaḥ'iti sūtre hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti iti bhāṣyakāraiḥ prathamavākyasya upāsye brahmaṇi tātparyamiti prakaṭīkṛtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8618: taṃ viviktamātmānaṃ śuklaṃ svaprakāśamamṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahma jānīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8628: teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupariṣṭādye devādayastānapyadhikaroti śāstramiti bādarāyaṇa ācāryo manyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:8639: apicaiṣāṃ vidyāgrahaṇārthaṃ brahmacaryādi darśayati- 'ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavānprajāpatau brahmacaryamuvāsa' (chā. 8.11.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:8655: śāstrasya manuṣyādhikāratve devādīnāṃ brahmavidyāyamāpyanadhikāraḥ syādityāśaṅkyāha-taduparyapi bādarāyaṇaḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8658: atra manuṣyādhikāratvoktyā smṛtānāṃ devādināṃ vedāntaśravaṇādāvadhikāro 'sti na veti saṃdehe bhogāsaktānāṃ vairāgyādyasaṃbhavānneti prāpte siddhāntamāha-bāḍhamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:8660: atra pūrvapakṣe devādināṃ jñānānadhikārāddevatvaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalāsu daharādyupāsanāsu kramamuktyarthināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapravṛttiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8662: upāsanābhirdevatvaṃ prāptānāṃ śravaṇādinā jñānānmuktisaṃbhavāditi saphalo 'yaṃ vicāraḥ nanu bhogāsaktānāṃ teṣāṃ mokṣārthitvābhāvānnādhikāra ityata āha-arthitvaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8663: vikāratvenānṛtaviṣayasukhasya kṣayāsūyādidoṣaddaṣṭyā niratiśayasukhamokṣārthitvaṃ sattvaprakṛtīnāṃ devānāṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8664: nanvindrāya svāhetyādau caturthyantaśabdātiriktā vigrahavatī devatā nāsti,
GSP33brssgo1u:8669: nanu vigrahavattvena dṛṣṭasāmarthye satyapyupanayanābhāvācchāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāstītyata āha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8670: janmāntarādhyayanabalātsvayameva pratibhātāḥ smṛtā vedā yeṣāṃ te tathā tadbhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8671: bālādiṣu praviṣṭapiśācādīnāṃ vedodghoṣadarśanāddevayonīnāṃ janmāntarasmaraṇamastīti smṛtavedāntānāmarthavicāro yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8672: devānāmṛṣīṇāṃ ca vidyādhikāre kāraṇamarthitvādikamuktvā śrautaṃ gurukulavāsādiliṅgamāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8683: 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇām'itivākyabādho 'pyanumānasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8686: ataḥ śrutiṣu teṣāṃ nādhikāra ityata āha-devādyadhikāre 'pīti //26//
GSP33brssgo1u:8689: virodhaḥ karmaṇīti cen nānekapratipatter darśanāt / BBs_1,3.27 /
GSP33brssgo1u:8690: syādetat, yadi vigrahavattvādyabhyupagamena devādīnāṃ vidyāsvadhikāro varṇyeta vigrahavattvādṛtvigādindrādīnāmapi svarūpasaṃnidhānena karmāṅgabhāvo 'bhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:8701: tathāhi-'kati devāḥ' ityupakramya 'trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca sahasrā'
GSP33brssgo1u:8702: iti nirucya 'katama te' ityasyāṃ pṛcchāyām 'mahimāna evaiṣāmete trayastriṃśattveva
GSP33brssgo1u:8704: iti nirbruvatī śrutirekaikasya devatātmano yugapadanekarūpatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8705: tathā trayastriṃśato 'pi ṣaḍādyantarbhāvakrameṇa 'katama eko deva iti prāṇaḥ' iti prāṇaikarūpatāṃ devānāṃ darśayantī tasyaikasya prāṇasya yugapadanekarūpatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8706: tathā smṛtirapi- 'ātmano vai śarīrāṇi bahūni bharatarṣabha //
GSP33brssgo1u:8707: yogī kuryādbalaṃ prāpya taiśca sarvairmahīṃ caret //
GSP33brssgo1u:8712: anekarūpapratipattisaṃbhavāccaikaikā devatā bahubhī rūpairātmānaṃ pravibhajya bahuṣu yāgeṣu yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gacchatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8720: svaṃ svaṃ dravyaṃ yugapatparityakṣyantīti vigrahavattve 'pi devatānāṃ na kiñcitkarmaṇi virudhyate // 27 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:8722: vaiśvadevaśāstrasya hi nividi kati devā ityupakramya śākalyāya yājñavalkyena trayaścettyuttaram /
GSP33brssgo1u:8726: prākamyaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca tatra kāmāvasāyitā' ityaṇimādyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8728: nanu mantrādīnāṃ pratīyamānavigrahavattve tātparyaṃ kalpayitvā devādīnāmadhikāra uktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8730: anyaparāṇāṃ teṣāṃ pratyakṣādivirodhena svārthe tātparyakalpanānupapatterityākṣipya sūtracatuṣṭayena pariharati-virodhaḥkarmaṇītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8735: ato yogyānupalabdhyā devatāyā vigrahavatyā abhāvātsaṃpradānakārakābhāvena karmaniṣpattirna syādityāha-tadā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8736: vigrahasyāṅgatvamupalabdhibādhitaṃ yuktyā ca na saṃbhavatītyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8741: ato na karmaṇi virodha iti vyācaṣṭe-kasmādityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8742: vaiśvadevaśastre śasyamānadevāḥ katīti śākalyena pṛṣṭo yājñavalkyo nividā 'trayaśca'ityādirūpayottaraṃ dadau /
GSP33brssgo1u:8744: ṣaḍadhikāni trīṇi śatāni trīṇi sahasrāṇīti saṃkhyoktau saṃkhyeyasvarūpapraśne,
GSP33brssgo1u:8745: mahimāno vibhūtayaḥ sarve devā eṣāṃ trayastriṃśaddevānāmato 'ṣṭau vasava ekādaśa
GSP33brssgo1u:8746: rudrā dvādaśādityā indraḥ prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśadevāste 'pi ṣaṇṇāmagnipṛthivīvāyvantarikṣādityadivāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8748: ṣaṭ devāstriṣu lokeṣu trayaśca dvayorannaprāṇayordvai ca ekasminprāṇe hiraṇyagarbhe 'ntarbhavata iti darśitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8750: darśanaṃ śrautaṃ vyākhyāya smārtaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tathā smṛtiriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8764: tasya loke darśanāditi vaktuṃ vyatirekamāha-kvacideka iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8768: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām / BBs_1,3.28 /
GSP33brssgo1u:8769: mā nāma vigrahavattve devādīnāmabhyupagamyamāne karmaṇi kaścidvirodhaḥ prasañji /
GSP33brssgo1u:8772: autpattikaṃ hi śabdasyārthena saṃbandhamāśritya 'anapekṣatvāt' iti vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sthāpitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8774: havīṃṣi bhuñjīta tathāpi vigrahayogādasmadādivajjananamaraṇavatī seti nityasya śabdasya
GSP33brssgo1u:8775: nityenārthena nitye saṃbandhepratīyamāne yadvaidike śabde prāmāṇyaṃ sthitaṃ tasya
GSP33brssgo1u:8785: kathametāvatā virodhaḥ śabde parihṛtaḥ yāvatā vasavo rudrā ādityā viśvedevā maruta ityeter'thā anityā evotpattimattvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8786: tadanityatve ca tadvācināṃ vaidikānāṃ vasvādiśabdānāmanityatvaṃ kena nivāryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8787: prasiddhaṃ hi loke devadattasya putra utpanne yajñadatta iti tasya nāma kriyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8788: tasmādvirodha eva śabda iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:8795: tathā devādivyaktiprabhavābhyupagame 'pyākṛtinityatvānna kaścidvasvādiśabdeṣu virodha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8798: tataśca yo yastattatsthānamadhirohati sa sa indrādiśabdairabhidhīyata iti na doṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8800: kathaṃ tarhi sthite vācakātmanā nitye śabde nityārthasaṃbandhini śabdavyavahārayogyārthavyaktiniṣpattirataḥ prabhava ityucyate kathaṃ punaravagamyate śabdātprabhavati jagaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8807: 'ete iti vai prajāpatirdevānasṛjatāsṛgramiti manuṣyānindava iti pitṛṃstiraḥ pavitramiti grahānāśava iti stotraṃ viśvānīti śastramabhisaubhagetyanyāḥ prajāḥ' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8811: ādau vedamayī divyā yataḥ sarvā pravṛttayaḥ' //
GSP33brssgo1u:8815: tathā 'nāma rūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravartanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8818: ' sarveṣāṃ tu sa nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthakpṛthak /
GSP33brssgo1u:8821: apica cikīrṣitamarthamanutiṣṭhaṃstasya vācakaṃ śabdaṃ pūrvaṃ smṛtvā paścāttamarthamanuṣṭhatīti sarveṣāṃ naḥ pratyakṣametat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8822: tathā prajāpaterapi sraṣṭuḥ sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ vaidikāḥ śabdā manasi prādurbabhūvuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8825: ityevamādikā bhūrādiśabdebhya eva manasi prādurbhūtebhyo bhūrādilokānsṛṣṭāndarśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8828: varṇapakṣe hi teṣāmutpannapradhvaṃsitvānnityebhyaḥ śabdebhyo devādivyaktīnāṃ prabhava ityanupapannaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8831: tathāhi- adṛśyamāno 'pi puruṣaviśeṣo 'dhyayanadhvaniśravaṇādeva viśeṣato nirdhāryate devadatto 'yamadhīte yajñadatto 'yamadhīte iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8841: saṃbandhagrahaṇāpekṣo hi śabdaḥ svayaṃ pratīyamānor'thaṃ pratyāyayeddhūmādivat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8844: kāryapratyāyitaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ sahito 'ntyo varṇorthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyatīti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:8847: sa caicaikavarṇapratyayāhitasaṃskārabīje 'ntyavarṇapratyayajanitapari pāke pratyayinyekapratyayaviṣayatayā jhaṭiti pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8853: varṇā eva tu na śabdaḥ iti bhagavānupavarṣaḥ.
GSP33brssgo1u:8860: yadi hi pratyuccāraṇaṃ gavādivyaktivadanyā anyā varṇavyaktayaḥ pratīyeraṃstata ākṛtinimittaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8863: dvirgośabda uccārita iti hi pratipattirna tu dvau gośabdāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8864: nanu varṇā apyuccāraṇabhedena bhinnaḥ pratīyante devadattayajñadattayoradhyayanadhvaniśravaṇādeva bhedapratīterityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8865: atrābhidhīyate- sati varṇaviṣaye niścite pratyabhijñāne saṃyogavibhāgābhivyaṅgyatvādvarṇānāmabhivyañjakavaicitryanimitto 'yaṃ varṇaviṣayo vicitraḥ pratyayo na svarūpanimittaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8868: tadvaraṃ varṇavyaktiṣveva paropādhiko bhedapratyayaḥ svarūpanimittaṃ ca pratyabhijñānamiti kalpanālāghavam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8869: eṣa eva ca varṇaviṣayasya bhedapratyayasya bādhakaḥ pratyayo yatpratyabhijñānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8870: kathaṃ hyekasminkālaṃ bahūnāmuccārayatāmeka eva sangakāro yugapadanekarūpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8872: athavā dhvanikṛto 'yaṃ pratyayabhedo na varṇakṛta ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8879: itaradhā hi varṇānāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ nirbhedatvātsaṃyogavibhāgakṛtā udāttādiviśeṣāḥ kalperan /
GSP33brssgo1u:8880: saṃyogavibhāgānāṃ cāpratyakṣatvācca tadāśrayā viśeṣā varṇeṣvadhyavasituṃ śakyanta ityato nirālambanā evaita udāttādipratyayāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8881: apica naivaitadabhiniveṣṭavyamudāttādibhedena varṇānāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ bhedo bhavediti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8886: ekaikavarṇagrahaṇāhitasaṃskārāyāṃ buddhau jhaṭiti pratyava ūbhāsanāditi cet / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:8890: yato 'syāmapi buddhau gakārādayo varṇā anuvartante natu dakārādayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8891: yadi hyasyā buddhergakārādibhyor'thāntaraṃ sphoṭo viṣayaḥ syāttato dakārādaya iva gakārādayo 'pyasyā buddhervyāvarteran /
GSP33brssgo1u:8896: paṅ ktirvanaṃ senā daśa śataṃ sahasramityādidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8897: yā tu gaurityeko 'yaṃ śabda iti buddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8899: atrāha- yadi varṇā eva sāmastyenaikabuddhiviṣayatāmāpadyamānāḥ padaṃ syustato jārā rājā kapiḥ pikaḥ ityādiṣu padaviśeṣapratipattirna syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8900: ta eva hi varṇā itaratra cetaratra ca pratyavabhāsanta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8901: atra vadāmaḥ - satyapi samastavarṇapratyavamarśe yathā kramānurodhinya eva pipīlikāḥ paṅ ktibuddhimārohanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:8904: vṛddhavyavahāre ceme varṇāḥ kramādyanugṛhītā gṛhītārthaviśeṣasaṃbandhāḥ santaḥ svavyavahāro
GSP33brssgo1u:8908: varṇāśceme krameṇa gṛhyamāṇāḥ sphoṭaṃ vyañjayanti sa sphoṭor'thaṃ vyanaktīti garīyasī kalpanā syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8910: tathāpi pratyabhijñālambanabhāvena varṇasāmānyānāmavaśyābhyupagantavyatvādyā varṇeṣvarthapratipādanaprakriyā racitā sā sāmānyeṣu saṃcārayitavyā
GSP33brssgo1u:8911: tataśca nityebhyaḥ śabdebhyo devādivyaktīnāṃ prabhava ityaviruddham // 28 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:8913: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ cikīrṣitāṃ vyakti buddhāvālikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8919: tatra saṃnihitavācakaitacchabdo devānāṃ karaṇeṣvanugrāhakatvena saṃnihitānāṃ smārakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8922: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntavistaraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥpavitraśabdaḥ smārakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8923: ṛ.(?).ucośnuvatāṃ stotrāṇāmāśuśabdaḥ stotrānantaraṃ prayogaṃ viśatāṃ śastrāṇāṃ viśvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8927: sphuṭate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭo varṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8929: ekaiketi yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo
GSP33brssgo1u:8930: gakārādyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte
GSP33brssgo1u:8931: tasmin antyavarṇakṛtapratyayena janitaḥ paripāko 'ntyaḥ saṃskāro yasminpratyayini
GSP33brssgo1u:8932: citte ekaṃ gauriti padamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8933: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktam,
GSP33brssgo1u:8938: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8940: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8953: autpattikasūtre śabdārthayoranādyoḥ saṃbandhasyānāditvādvedasya svārthe mānāntarānapekṣatvena prāmāṇyamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8955: jñātvā śabdasya saṃketaḥ puṃsā kartavya iti mānāntarāpekṣatvātprāmāṇyasya virodhaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8963: śabdasya nimittatvena brahmasahakāritvādavirodha ityāśaṅkya dvitīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8967: naca vyaktināmanityatve 'pi ghaṭatvādijātisamavāyavacchabdasaṃbandho 'pi nityaḥ syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8969: yathā gotvādayo gavādiśabdavācyāstathā vasutvādyākṛtayo vasvādiśabdārthā na vyaktya iti pariharati-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8970: śabdānāṃ tadarthānāṃ jātīnāṃ ca nityatvāttatsaṃbandho 'pi nitya iti pratipādayati-nahītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8972: naca gotvāvacchedena vyaktiṣu śaktiḥ sugraheti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8974: gotvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakamiti grahāpekṣayā gotvaṃ śakyamiti lāghavāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8981: ata eva vākyavṛttau tattvamasyādivākye bhāgalakṣaṇoktā yujyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:8984: kevalavyaktivacanāḥ khalu ḍitthādiśabdā arthānantarabhāvinaḥ sāṃketikāḥ gavādiśabdāstu
GSP33brssgo1u:8985: vyaktiprabhavahetutvena prāgevasandhīti na vyaktimātravacanāḥ sāṃketikāḥ kintu sthūlasūkṣmabhāvenānusyūtavyaktyavinābhūtasāmānyavacanā iti mantavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:9001: asṛgrudhiraṃ tatpradhāne dehe ramanta iti asṛgrā manuṣyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9003: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntastiraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥ pavitraśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9008: sa prajāpatirmanasā vācaṃ trayīṃ mithunaṃ samabhavat manovāgrūpaṃ mithunaṃ saṃbhāvitavān /
GSP33brssgo1u:9018: tatra varṇānāmanityatvātsphoṭasya cāsattvānna jagaddhetutvamityākṣepe dvitīyapakṣaṃ vaiyākaraṇo gṛhṇāti-sphoṭamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9019: sphuṭyate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭovarṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9021: so 'yaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijñayā varṇanityatvasiddhernānupapattirityata āha-utpanneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9022: tāratvamandratvādiviruddhadharmavattvena tāro gakāro mandro gakāra iti pratīyamānagakārasya bhedānumānātpratyabhijñāgatvajātiviṣayetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9023: nanu viruddhadharmajñānaṃ dhvanyupādhikaṃ bhrama ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9024: tathāca varṇānāmanityatvānna jagaddhetutvamiti bhāvaḥ kiñca teṣāmarthabodhakatvāyogātsphoṭo 'ṅgīkārya ityāha-naca varṇebhya ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9027: tarhi varṇānāṃ samudāyo bodhaka ityāśaṅkya kṣaṇikānāṃ sa nāstītyāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9028: varṇānāṃ svataḥ sāhityābhāve 'pi saṃskāralakṣaṇāpūrvadvārā sāhityamāgneyādiyāgānāmiveti śaṅkate-pūrveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9037: dvitīye kiṃ pratyakṣeṇa jñāta uta kāryaliṅgena /
GSP33brssgo1u:9040: kāryamarthadhīstasyāṃ jātāyāṃ saṃskārapratyayaḥ tasmiñjāte seti parasparāśrayeṇa dūṣayati-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9041: padārthasmaraṇasyāpi padajñānāntarabhāvitvāttena saṃskārasahitāntyavarṇātmakapadasya jñānaṃ na yuktamityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9051: sphoṭe 'pi kiṃ mānamityāśaṅkyaikaṃ padamiti pratyakṣapramāṇamityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9052: yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo
GSP33brssgo1u:9053: gakāradyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte
GSP33brssgo1u:9055: citte ekaṃ gauritipadamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9058: yena varṇāntaravaiyarthyaṃ kintu ratnavadbahupratyayasaṃskṛte citte samyaksphoṭābhivyaktirityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9067: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9069: sa evāyaṃ varṇa iti dhīstu pramaiva,
GSP33brssgo1u:9073: yattvayā pītaṃ jalaṃ tadeva mayā pītamityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:9074: na tatheha vyaktibhedaḥ siddha iti pariharati-na /
GSP33brssgo1u:9089: nanu vāyusaṃyogāderatīndriyatvānna tadgatavaicitryasyodāttatvādervarṇeṣu pratyakṣāropaḥ saṃbhavatītyaruciṃ vadiṣyansvamatamāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9097: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9098: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣvavyakteṣu dhvanibuddhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:9099: dundubhyādidhvanau śabdatvamātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayamavyakto varṇa iti dhīḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9100: evaṃ dhvanyupādhikatve svamate guṇaṃ vadanvāyūpādhikatve pūrvoktāmaruciṃ darśayati-evañcetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9105: evaṃ viruddhadharmakadhvanīnāṃ bhede 'pi na teṣvanugatā varṇā bhidyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9107: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9110: yadvā udāttatvādibhedaviśiṣṭatayā pratyabhijñāyamānatvādvarṇānāṃ bheda ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9111: varṇānāṃ sthāyitvaṃ prasādhya teṣāmeva vācakatvaṃ vaktuṃ sphoṭaṃ vighaṭayati-varṇebhyaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9113: cakṣuṣā darpaṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau mukhavacchrotreṇa varṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau vinaiva hetvantaraṃ sphoṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityāha-jhaṭitīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9114: yasyāṃ saṃvidi yor'tho bhāsate sā tatra pramāṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9115: ekapadamiti buddhau varṇā eva sphuranti nātiriktasphoṭa iti na sā sphoṭe pramāṇamityāha--na /
GSP33brssgo1u:9117: nanu gopadabuddheḥ sphoṭo viṣayo gakārādīnāṃ tu vyañjakatvādanuvṛttirityata āha--yadi hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9128: uttamavṛddhoktānām varṇānāṃ krameṇāntyavarṇaśravaṇānantaraṃ bālasyaikasmṛtyārūḍhānāṃ madhyamavṛddhasya pravṛttyādiliṅgānumitaikārthadhīhetutvaniścaye satyekapadavākyatvaniścayāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9131: nanu nityavibhūnāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ kramaḥ kathaṃ vā padatvajñānenārthadhīhetutvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9134: etatkramaitatsaṃkhyāvanta etadarthaśaktā iti gṛhītāḥ santaḥ śrotuḥ pravṛttikāle tathaiva
GSP33brssgo1u:9140: sthirāṇi gatyādisāmānyāni kramaviśeṣavanti gṛhītasaṃgatikānyarthabodhakānīti kḷpteṣu sāmānyeṣu prakriyā saṃcārayitavyā na tvakḷptaḥ sphoṭaḥ kalpanīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9145: svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādibhiḥ sthite vedasya nityatve devādivyaktiprabhavābhyupagamena
GSP33brssgo1u:9146: tasya virodhamāśaṅkya 'ataḥ prabhavāt' iti parihṛtyedānīṃ tadeva vedanityatvaṃ sthitaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9148: ata eva niyatākṛterdevāderjagato vedaśabdaprabhavatvādvedaśabde nityatvamapi pratyetavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9153: FN: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena karmaṇā vāco vedasya padavīyaṃ mārgayogyatāṃ grahaṇayogyatāṃ āyannāptavantaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9154: tataḥstāṃ vācamṛṣiṣu praviṣṭāṃ vidyamānāṃ anvavindannanulabdhavanto yājñikā itiyāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:9158: pūrvatantrasiddhameva vedasya nityatvaṃ devādivyaktisṛṣṭau tadvācakaśabdasyāpi sṛṣṭerasiddhamityāśaṅkya
GSP33brssgo1u:9161: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena vāco vedasya lābhayogyatāṃ prāptāḥ santo yājñikāstāmṛṣiṣu sthitāṃ labdhavanta iti mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9168: yadi paśvādivyaktivaddevādivyaktayo 'pi saṃtatyaivotpadyerannirudhyeraṃśca tato 'bhidhānābhidheyābhidhātṛvyavahārāvicchedātsaṃbandhanityatvena virodhaḥ śabde parihriyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:9169: yadā tu khalu sakalaṃ trailokyaṃ parityaktanāmarūpaṃ nirlepaṃ pralīyate prabhavati cābhinavamiti śrutismṛtivādā vadanti tadā kathamavirodha iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9171: pratipādayiṣyati cācāryaḥ saṃsārasyānāditvaṃ - 'upapadyate cāpyupalabhyate' ca (bra. 2.1.36) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9172: anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpaprabodhayoḥ pralayaprabhavaśravaṇe 'pi pūrvaprabodhavaduktaprabodhe 'pi vyavahārānna kaścidvirodhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9174: svāpaprabodhayośca pralayaprabhavau śrūyete- 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:9175: evaikadhā bhavati tadenaṃ vāksarvairnābhiḥ sahāpyeti cakṣuḥ sarvai rūpaiḥ sahāpyeti
GSP33brssgo1u:9176: śrotraṃ sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sahāpyeti manaḥ sarvairdhyānaiḥ sahāphayeti sa yadā pratibudhyate
GSP33brssgo1u:9177: yathāgnerjjvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve
GSP33brssgo1u:9178: prāṇā yathātanaṃ vipratiṣṭante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9183: satyapi sarvavyavahārocchedini mahāpralaye parameśvarānugrahādīśvarāṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ kalpāntaravyavahārānusaṃdhānopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9184: yadyapi prākṛtāḥ prāṇino na janmāntaravyavahāramanusamadadhānā dṛśyanta iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:9186: tathāhi prāṇitvāviśeṣe 'pi manuṣyādistambaparyanteṣu jñānaiśvaryādipratibandhaḥ pareṇa pareṇa bhūyānbhavandṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:9187: tathā manuṣyādistambaparyanteṣu hiraṇyagarbhaparyanteṣu jñānaiśvaryādyabhivyaktirapi pareṇa pareṇa bhūyasī bhavatītyetacchrutismṛtivādeṣvasakṛdanuśrūyamāṇaṃ na śakyaṃ vaditum /
GSP33brssgo1u:9190: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yo brahmaṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai /
GSP33brssgo1u:9191: taṃ ha devamātmabuddhiprakāśaṃ mumukṣurvai śaraṇamahaṃ prapadye' (śve, 6.18) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9195: mantreṇa yajayati vādhyāpayati vā sthāṇuṃ vacrchati gartaṃ vā pratipadyate'' (sarvānu. pari.)
GSP33brssgo1u:9196: ityupakramya tasmādetāni mantre mantre vidyāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9199: dṛṣṭānuśravikasukhaduḥkhaviṣayau ca rāgadveṣau bhavato na vilakṣaṇaviṣayāvityato dharmādharmaphalabhūtottarā sṛṣṭirniṣpadyamānā pūrvasṛṣṭisadṛśyeva niṣpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9200: smṛtiśca bhavati- 'teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāksṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedire /
GSP33brssgo1u:9201: tānyeva te prapadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:9213: ataśca sarvakalpānāṃ tulyavyavahāratvātkalpāntavyavahārānusaṃdhānakṣamatvācceśvarāṇāṃ samānanāmarūpā eva pratisargaṃ viśeṣāḥ prādurbhavanti
GSP33brssgo1u:9215: samānanāmarūpatāṃ ca śrutismṛtī darśayataḥ - 'sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat /
GSP33brssgo1u:9216: divaṃ ca pṛthivī cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ' (ṛ.saṃ. 10. 190.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9217: yathā pūrvasminkalpe sūryācandramaḥprabhṛti jagatkḷptaṃ tathāsminnapi kalpe parameśvaro 'kalpayadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9220: iti nakṣatreṣṭividhau yo 'gnirniravapadyasmai vāgnaye niravapattayoḥ samānanāmarūpatāṃ darśayatītyevañjātīyakā śrutirihodāhartavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9224: dṛśyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu //
GSP33brssgo1u:9231: prāṇaḥ paramātmā tatra jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9238: ṛgvedo daśamaṇḍalātmakaḥ maṇḍalānāṃ daśatayamātrāstīti tatra bhavā ṛco dāśatayyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9258: vyavahārāvicchedājjñāyate ceti vedasyānapekṣatvena prāmāṇye na kaścidvirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9259: nirlepalaye tu saṃbandhanāśāt punaḥ sṛṣṭau kenacitpuṃsā saṃketaḥ kartavya iti puruṣabuddhisāpekṣatvena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9263: tathāca saṃskārātmanā śabdārthatatsaṃbandhānāṃ satāmeva punaḥ sṛṣṭāvabhivyakternānityatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9265: viṣamasṛṣṭau hi saṃketāpekṣā na tulyasṛṣṭāviti pariharati-tatredamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9268: nanvastvanādisaṃsāre saṃbandhasyānāditvaṃ tathāpi mahāpralayavyavadhānādasmaraṇe kathaṃ vedārthavyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9273: atha tadā suṣuptau prāṇe paramātmani jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9277: svapnavatkalpitasyājñātasattvābhāvāt darśanaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ adarśanaṃ laya iti dṛṣṭisṛṣṭipakṣaḥ śrutyabhipreta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9283: iti yadyapi tathāpi na prākṛtavaditi yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9285: bādhābhāvāditi nyāyānugṛhītaśrutyādibhiḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaṃ bādhyamityāha-yathā hītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9286: nanu tathāpi pūrvakalpeśvarāṇāṃ muktatvādasminkalpe ko 'nusaṃdhātetyata āha-tataśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9290: pūrvaṃ kalpādau sṛjati tasmai brahmaṇe prahiṇoti gamayati tasya buddhau vedānāvirbhāvayati
GSP33brssgo1u:9291: yastaṃ devaṃ svātmākāraṃ mahāvākyotthabuddhau prakāśamānaṃ śaraṇaṃ paramamabhayasthānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9293: na kevalamekasyaiva jñānātiśayaḥ kintu bahūnāṃ śākhādraṣṭṛṇāmiti viśvāsārthamāha-smarantīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9295: vedāntare 'pi kāṇḍasūktamantrāṇāṃ draṣṭāro baudhāyanādibhiḥ smṛtā ityāha-pratīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9304: tathāca jñānādhikaiḥ kalpāntaritaṃ vedaṃ smṛtvā vyavahārasya pravartitatvādvedasyānāditvamanapekṣatvaṃ cāvirūddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9324: sa eva svabhāvaḥ prakṛtirvāsaneti ca gīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9325: evaṃ karmaṇāṃ sṛṣṭisādṛśyamuktvā svopādāne līnakāryasaṃskārarūpaśaktibalādapi sādṛśyamāha-pralīyamānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9329: avidyāyāṃ līnakāryātmakasaṃskārādanyāḥ śaktayo na kalpyāḥ manābhāvādrauravācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9331: ato 'vidyātatkāryādanyāḥ śaktayo na santi ātmāvidyaiva tacchaktiriti siddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9334: yathā suptotthitasya pūrvacakṣurjātīyameva cakṣurjāyate tacca pūrvarūpajātīyameva rūpaṃ gṛhṇāti na rasādikaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9335: evaṃ bhogya lokā bhogāśrayāḥ prāṇinikāyā bhogahetukarmāṇi saṃskārabalātpūrvalokāditulyānyeveti niyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9345: bhāvidṛṣṭyā yajamāno 'gniḥ annādo 'ragnirahaṃ syāmiti kāmayitvā kṛttikānakṣatrābhimānidevāyāgnaye aṣṭasu kapāleṣu pacanīyaṃ havirniruptavānityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9347: jhrnanu yajamāno 'gnirbhāvī uddeśyāgninā samānanāmarūpaḥ kalpāntare bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9348: evaṃ 'rudro vā akāmayata''viṣṇurvā akāmayata'ityatrāpi tathā vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9358: tasmājjanmanāśavadvigrahāṅgīkāre 'pi karmaṇi śabde ca virodhābhāvāddevānāmasti vidyādhikāra iti sthitam //30//
GSP33brssgo1u:9362: iha devādīnāmapi brahmavidyāyāmastyadhikāra iti yatpratijñātaṃ tatparyāvartyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9372: punaścādityavyapāśrayāṇi pañca rohitādīnyamṛtānyupakramya vasavo rudrā ādityā marutaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9373: sādhyāśca pañca devagaṇāḥ krameṇa tattatamṛtamupajīvantītyupadiśya 'sa ya etadevamamṛtaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9374: veda vasūnāmevaiko bhūtvāgninaiva mukhenaitadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati' ityādinā vasvādyupajīvyānyamṛtāni
GSP33brssgo1u:9378: 'tathā agniḥ pādo vāyuḥ pāda ādityaḥ pādo diśaḥ pādaḥ' (chā. 3.18.2)
GSP33brssgo1u:9381: ityādiṣu devatātmopāsaneṣu na teṣāmeva devatātmānamadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9384: FN: pañceti caturvedokarmāṇi praṇavaścati pañca kusumāni tebhyaḥ somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni rohitādīni lohitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9397: dyulokākhyavaṃśadaṇḍe antarikṣarūpe madhvapūpe sthita ādityo devānāṃ modanānmadhviva madhvityāropya dhyānaṃ kāryam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9400: astu vasvādīnāṃ tatrādhikāra ityāśaṅkya teṣāmapi tatra dhyeyatvātprāpyatvācca na dhyātṛtvamityāha-punaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9402: tebhyaḥ somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaparaḥ kṛṣṇagopyākhyāni pañcāmṛtāni
GSP33brssgo1u:9411: ekā vāgiti saptasvindriyeṣu śiraścamasatīrastheṣu saptarṣidhyānaṃ kāryamityāha-tathemāveveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9422: yadidaṃ jyotirmaṇḍalaṃ dyusthānamahorātrābhyāṃ bambhramajjagadavabhāsayati tasminnādityādayo devatāvacanāḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:9424: naca jyotirmaṇḍalasya hṛdayādinā vigraheṣu cetanayārthitvādinā vā yogo 'vagantuṃ śakyate mṛtādivadacetanatvāvagamāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9430: pratyakṣādibhya eva hyavicāritaviśeṣebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ prasiddhyanartho lokātprasidhyatītyucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9433: arthavādā api vidhinaikavākyatvātstutyarthāḥ santo na pārthagarthyena devādīnāṃ vigrahādisadbhāve kāraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:9434: mantrā api śrutyādiviniyuktāḥ prayogasamavāyino 'bhidhānārthā na kasyacidarthasya pramāṇamityācakṣate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9443: kiñca vigrahābhāvāddevādīnāṃ na kvāpyadhikāra ityāha-jyotiṣi bhāvācceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9444: ādityaḥ sūryaścandraḥ śukro 'ṅgāraka ityādiśabdānāṃ jyotiḥpiṇḍeṣu prayogasya bhāvātsattvānna vigrahavāndevaḥ kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9458: vigraho haviṣāṃ bhoga aiśvaryaṃ ca prasannatā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9464: vrīhyādivadprayogavidhigṛhītā mantrāḥ prayogasaṃbanddhābhidhānārthā nājñātavigrahādiparā iti mīmāṃsakā ācakṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9471: yadyapi madhvādividyāsu devatādivyāmiśrāsvāsaṃbhavo 'dhikārasya tathāpyasti hi śuddhāyāṃ brahmavidyāyāṃ saṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9474: manuṣyāṇāmapi na sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ sarveṣu rājasūyādiṣvadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9476: brahmavidyāṃ ca prakṛtya bhavati darśanaṃ śrautaṃ devādyadhikārasya sūcakam- 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9477: 'te hocurhanta tamātmānamanvicchāmo yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9478: 'indro ha vai devānāmabhipravrāja virocana'surāṇām' (chā. 8.7.2) ityādi ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9481: atra brūmaḥ jyotirādiviṣayā api ādityādayo devatāvacanāḥ śabdāścetanāvantamaiśvaryādyupetaṃ taṃ taṃ devatātmānaṃ samarpayanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:9483: asti hyaiśvaryayogāddevatānāṃ jyotirādyātmabhiścāvasthātuṃ yatheṣṭaṃ ca taṃ taṃ vigrahaṃ grahītuṃ sāmarthyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9485: 'medhātithiṃ ha kāṇvāyanamindro meṣo bhūtvā jahāra' (ṣaḍviṃśa. brā. 1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9486: smaryate ca- 'ādityaḥ puruṣo bhūtvā kuntīmupajagāma ha' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9491: atra brūmaḥ - pratyayāpratyayau hi sadbhāvāsadbhāvayoḥ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9493: tathāhyanyārthamapi prasthitaḥ pathi patitaṃ tṛṇaparṇādyastītyeva pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9495: tatra hi tṛṇaparṇādiviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravṛttamasti yena tadastitvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9496: atra punarvidhyuddeśaikavākyabhāvena stutyarther'thavādena pārthagarthyena vṛttāntaviṣayā pravṛttiḥ śakyādhyavasātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:9497: nahi 'na surāṃ pibet' iti nañvati vākye padatrayasaṃbandhātsurāpānapratiṣedha evaikor'tho 'vagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9501: vidhyuddeśārthavādayostvarthavādasthāni padāni pṛthaganvayavṛttāntaviṣayaṃ pratipadyānantaraṃ kaimarthyavaśena kāmaṃ vidheḥ stāvakatvaṃ pratipadyante
GSP33brssgo1u:9502: yathāhi- 'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ' ityatra vidhyuddeśavartināṃ vāyavyādipadānāṃ vidhinā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9503: naivaṃ 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati' ityeṣāmarthavādagatānāṃ padānām /
GSP33brssgo1u:9504: nahi bhavati vāyurvā ālabheteti kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vā ālabhetetyādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9505: vāyusvabhāvasaṃkīrtanena tvavāntaramanvayaṃ pratipadyaivaṃ viśiṣṭadaivatyamidaṃ karmeti vidhiṃ stuvanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9506: tadyatra so 'vāntaravākyārthaḥ pramāṇāntaragocaro bhavati tatra tadanuvādenarthavādaḥ pravartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9508: yatra tu tadubhayaṃ nāsti tatra kiṃ pramāṇāntarābhāvādguṇavādaḥ syādāhosvitpramāṇāntarāvirodhādvidyamānavāda iti pratītiśaraṇairvidyamānavāda āśrayaṇīyo na guṇavādaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9512: naca cetasyanārūḍhāyai tasyai tasyai devatāyai haviḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9513: śrāvayati ca- 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan' (ai.brā. 3.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9516: tatra yādṛśaṃ mantrārthavādayorindrādīnāṃ svarūpamavagataṃ na tattādṛśaṃ śabdapramāṇakena pratyākhyatuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9517: itihāsapurāṇamapi vyākhyātena mārgeṇa saṃbhavanmantrārthavādamūlatvātprabhavati devatāvigrahādi sādhayitim /
GSP33brssgo1u:9520: tathāca vyāsādayo devādibhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavaharantīti smaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9521: yastu brūyādidānīntanānāmiva pūrveṣāmapi nāsti devādibhirvyavahartuṃ sāmarthyamiti sa jagadvaicitryaṃ pratiṣedhet /
GSP33brssgo1u:9522: idānīmiva ca nānyadapi sārvabhaumaḥ kṣatriyo 'stīti brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9528: yogo 'pyaṇimādyaiśvaryarprāptiphalaḥ smaryamāṇo na śakyate sāhasamātreṇa pratyākhyātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:9529: śrutiśca yogamāhātmyaṃ prakhyāpayati- 'pṛthivyaptejo 'nilakhe samutthite pañcātmake yogaguṇe pravṛtte /
GSP33brssgo1u:9530: na tasya rogo na jarā na mṛtyuḥ prāptasya yogāgnimayaṃ śarīram'' (śvaṃ. 2.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9531: ṛṣīṇāmapi mantrabrāhmaṇadarśināṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāsmadīyena sāmarthyenopamātuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9533: lokaprasiddhirapi na sati saṃbhave nirālambanādhyavasātuṃ yuktā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9537: FN: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9552: yatra yasyādhikāraḥ saṃbhavati sa tatrādhikārīti nyāyastulya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9553: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetatyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9554: tadbrahma yo yo devādīnāṃ madhye pratyaktvenābudhyata sa tadbrahmābhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9556: tata indravirocanau surāsurarājau prajāpatiṃ brahmavidyāpradaṃ jagmaturiti ca liṅgamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9557: kimatra brahmāmṛtamiti gandharvapraśne yājñavalkya uvāca tamiti mokṣadharmeṣu śrutaṃ devādīnāmadhikāraliṅgamityāha-smārtamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9558: yathā bālānāṃ golakeṣu cakṣurādipadaprayoge 'pi śāstrajñairgolakātiriktendriyāṇi svīkriyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:9559: yathā jyotirādau sūryādiśabdaprayoge 'pi vigrahavaddevatā svīkāryā ityāha-jyotirādīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9569: muniṃ meṣo bhūtvā jahāreti jñāpanārthaṃ meṣa,
GSP33brssgo1u:9576: mantrādikaṃ padaśaktyā bhāsamānavigrahādau svārthe na pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9579: anyaparādapi vākyādbādhābhāve svārtho grāhya ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9581: tṛṇādau pratyayo 'sti vigrahādau sa nāstīti vaiṣamyaṃ śaṅkate-atrāheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9589: nañpadamekaṃ yadā surāṃ pibediti padābhyāmanveti tadā padaikavākyamekamevārthānubhavaṃ karoti natu padadvayaṃ pṛthaksurāpānaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:9591: arthavādastu bhūtārthasaṃsargaṃ stutidvāraṃ bodhayanvidhinā vākyaikavākyatāṃ bhajata ityasti vigrahādyanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9597: yatra 'vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ'ityādau mānāntarasaṃvādavisaṃvādau na stastatra bhūtārthavāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9605: nanu kleśātmake karmaṇi vidhiḥ phalaṃ vinānupapanna iti bhavatu 'yanna duḥkhena saṃbhinnam'ityarthavādasiddhaḥ svargo vidhipramāṇakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9608: uddiśya tyāgānupapattyā cetasyāroho 'ṅgīkārya ityatra śrutimapyāha-yasyā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9612: kiñca suprasannavigrahavaddevatāṃ tyaktvā śabdamātraṃ devateti bhaktirayuktetyāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9613: na cākṛtimātraṃ śabdaśakyamastu kiṃ vigraheṇeti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9625: tathā kṣatriyābhāvaṃ varṇāśramābhāvaṃ varṇāśramādyavyavasthāṃ ca brūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:9632: pṛthivyādipañcake samutthite dhāraṇayā jite yogaguṇe cāṇimādike pravṛtte yogābhivyaktaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9633: tejomayaṃ śarīraṃ prāptasya yogino na rogādisparśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9637: ekameva devādīnāṃ brahmavidyādhikāre satyeva devatyaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalānyupāsanāni yujyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:9643: śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt sūcyate hi / BBs_1,3.34 /
GSP33brssgo1u:9644: yathā manuṣyādhikāraniyamamapodya devādīnāmapi vidyāsvadhikāra uktastathaiva dvijātyadhikāraniyamāpavādena
GSP33brssgo1u:9650: yacca karmasvanadhikārakāraṇaṃ śūdrasyānagnitvaṃ na tadvidyāsvavikārasyāpavādakaṃ liṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9653: saṃvargavidyāyāṃ hi jānaśrutiṃ pautrāyaṇaṃ śuśrūṣuṃ śūdraśabdena parāmṛśati- 'aha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhirastu' (chāṃ 4.2.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9681: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9690: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa itvāgantā ratho hāretvā saca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
GSP33brssgo1u:9697: yugvā gantrī śakaṭī tathā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brssgo1u:9700: pūrvatra devādīnāmadhikārasidhyaryaṃ mantrādīnāṃ bhūtārthe vigrahādau samanvayoktyā vedāntānāmapi bhūtārthe brahmaṇi samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9701: atrāpi śūdraśabdasya śrautasya kṣatriye samanvayoktyā sa dṛḍhīkriyata ityadhikaraṇadvayasya prāsaṅgikasyāsminsamanvayādhyāye 'ntarbhāva iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9705: sa kiṃ śūdramadhikīroti na veti saṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-tatra śūdrasyāpītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9708: jānaśrutiḥ kila ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ rathaṃ ca raikāya gurave nivedya māṃ śikṣayetyuvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9711: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa yukta itvā gantā ratho hāretvā sa ca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
GSP33brssgo1u:9716: adhyayanavidhinā saṃskṛto vedastadutthamāpātajñānaṃ ca vedārthavicāreṣu śāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tadabhāvācchūdrasyārthitvādisaṃbhavanyāyāsiddhernāsti vedāntavicārādhikāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9717: yadvādhyayanasaṃskṛtena vedena vidito niścito vedārtho yena tasya vedārtheṣu vidhiṣvadhikāro nānyasya,
GSP33brssgo1u:9731: tarhi śūdraśabdasyātra śrutasya kor'tha ityāśaṅkya sūtreṇārthamāha-śakyate cetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9732: jānaśrutirnāma rājā nidāghasamaye rātrau prāsādatale suṣvāpa,
GSP33brssgo1u:9733: tadā tadīyānnadānādiguṇagaṇatoṣitā ṛṣayo 'sya hitārthaṃ haṃsā bhūtvā mālārūpeṇa tasyoparyājagmuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9736: kiṃ na paśyasi jānaśruterasya tejaḥ svargaṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9740: sayugvānaṃ yugva gantrī śakaṭī tayā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brssgo1u:9741: raikvasya hi brahmiṣṭhasya tejo duratikramaṃ nāsyānātmajñasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9742: asmadvacanakhinno rājā śakaṭaliṅgena raikaṃ jñātvā vidyāvānbhaviṣyatīti haṃsānāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9746: sā śūdraśabdena raikveṇa sūcyate hīti sūtrānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9747: śrutayaugikārthalābhe sati ananvitarūḍhyarthastyājya iti nyāyadyotanārtho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9756: yatkāraṇaṃ prakaraṇanirūpaṇena kṣatriyatvamasyottaratra caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā kṣatriyeṇa samabhivyāhārādgamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9757: uttaratra hi saṃvargavidyāvākyaśeṣe caitrarathirabhipratārī kṣatriyaḥ saṃkīrtyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:9758: ' atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kapoyamabhipratāraṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī
GSP33brssgo1u:9761: kāpeyayogo hi citrarathasyāvagataḥ 'etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayan' (tāṇḍa.brā. 20.12.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9762: samānānvayānāṃ ca prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9764: tena kṣatriyeṇābhipratāriṇā saha samānāyāṃ vidyayāyāṃ saṃkīrtanaṃ jānaśruterapi kṣatriyatvaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9774: śunakasyāpatyaṃ kapigotraṃ purohitamabhipratārināmakaṃ rājānaṃ ca kakṣasenasyāpatyaṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau tau bhoktumupaviṣṭau baṭurbhikṣitavānityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9775: nanvasya caitrarathitvaṃ na śrutamityata āha-caitrarathitvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9776: etena dvirātreṇeti chāndogyaśrutyaiva pūrvaṃ citrarathasya kāpeyayoga uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9778: rājavaṃśyānāṃ hi prāyeṇa purohitavaṃśyā yājakā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9783: kṣattā sūtastasya raikvānveṣaṇāya preṣaṇaṃ annagodānādikaṃ ca jānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatve liṅgam //35//
GSP33brssgo1u:9790: ' brahmaparā brahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa ha vai tatsarvaṃ vakṣyatīti te ha samitpāṇayo bhagavantaṃ pippalādamupasannāḥ' (pra. 1.1) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9804: atra śūdraśabdo yaugika eveti na śūdrasyādhikāra iti sthitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9807: iha vidyāgrahaṇāṅgasyopanayanasaṃskārasya sarvatra parāmarśācchūdrasya tadabhāvānna vidyādhikāraḥ ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9812: brahmaparā vedapāragāḥ saguṇabrahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ nirguṇaṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa pippalādastajjijñāsitaṃ sarvaṃ vakṣyatīti niścitya te bharadvājādayaḥ ṣaḍ ṛṣayastamupagatā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9813: nanu vaiśvānaravidyāyāmṛṣīnrājānupanīyaiva vidyāmuvāceti śruteranupanītasyāpyasti vidyādhikāra ityata āha-tānheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9814: te ha samitpāṇayaḥ pūrvāhne praticakramira iti pūrvavākye brāhmaṇā upanayanārthamāgatā iti upanayanaprāptiṃ darśayitvā niṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9822: yatsatyavacanena śūdratvābhāve nirdhārite jābālaṃ gautama upanetumanuśāsituṃ ca pravavṛte 'naitadbrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhati samidhaṃ somyāharopa tvā neṣye na satyādagāḥ' (chā. 4.4.5)
GSP33brssgo1u:9824: FN: nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu tathoktam upanayanārthamācāryaṃ gatvā satyakāmo jābālo 'smīti brūhītyanena satyavacanena /
GSP33brssgo1u:9827: taṃ mātovāca bhartṛsevāvyagratayāhamapi tava piturgotraṃ na jānāmi,
GSP33brssgo1u:9828: jabālā tu nāmāhamasmi satyakāmo nāma tvamasīti etāvajjānāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9829: tataḥ sa jābālo gautamamāgatya tena kiṅgotro 'sīti pṛṣṭa uvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:9830: nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu me mātrā kathitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9838: tadarthaṃ samidhamāhareti gautamasya pravṛtteśca liṅgānna śūdrasyādhikāra ityāha-tadabhāveti //37//
GSP33brssgo1u:9846: 'padyu ha vā etacchmaśānaṃ yacchūdrastasmācchūdrasamīpe nādhyetavyam' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9848: yasya hi samīpe 'pi nādhyetavyaṃ bhavati sa kathamaśrutamadhīyīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:9849: bhavati ca vedoccāraṇe jihvācchedo dhāraṇe śarīrabheda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9850: ata eva cārthādarthajñānānuṣṭhānayoḥ pratiṣedho bhavati 'na śūdrasya matiṃ dadyāt' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:9852: yeṣāṃ punaḥ pūrvakṛtasaṃskāravaśādviduradharmavyādhaprabhṛtīnāṃ jñānotpattisteṣāṃ na śakyate phalaprāptiḥ pratiṣeddhuṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9861: asya śūdrasya dvijaiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ vedaṃ pramādācchṛṇvataḥ sīsalākṣābhyāṃ taptābhyāṃ śrotradvayapūraṇaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9870: siddhānāṃ siddherdurapahnavatve 'pi sādhakaiḥ śūdraiḥ kathaṃ jñānaṃ labdhavyamityata āha-śrāvayediti //38//
GSP33brssgo1u:9878: mahadbhayaṃ vajramudyataṃ ya etadviduramṛtāste bhavanti' (kā. 2.6.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9883: tatra ko 'sau prāṇaḥ kiṃ tadbhayānakaṃ vajramityapratipattervicāre kriyamāṇe prāptaṃ tāvatprasiddheḥ pañcavṛttirvāyuḥ prāṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9889: vāyau hi parjanyabhāvena vivartamāne vidyutstanayitruvṛṣṭyaśanayo vivartanta ityācakṣate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9891: tathāhi śrutyantaram- 'vāyureva vyaṣṭirvāyuḥ samaṣṭirapa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9899: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana' (kā. 2.6.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:9901: tadevehāpi saṃnidhānāt jagatsarvaṃ prāṇa ejatīti ca lokāśrayavattvapratyabhijñānānnirdiṣṭamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9906: tathācoktam- 'na prāṇena nāpānena martyo jīvati kaścana /
GSP33brssgo1u:9915: yathāhi vajramudyataṃ mamaiva śirasi nipatedyadyahamasya śāsanaṃ na kuryāmityanena
GSP33brssgo1u:9916: bhayena jano niyamena rājādiśāsane pravartata evamidamagnivāyusūryādikaṃ jagadasmādeva
GSP33brssgo1u:9917: brahmaṇo bibhyanniyamena svavyāpāre pravartata iti bhayānakaṃ vajropamitaṃ brahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:9936: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati' iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto na tu paramamṛtyuvijaya ityāpekṣikatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9941: sarvaṃ jagatprāṇānniḥsṛtaṃ utpannaṃ prāṇe cidātmani prerake sati ejati ceṣṭate,
GSP33brssgo1u:9942: tacca prāṇākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ mahadbrahma vibhetyasmāditi bhayam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9945: ya etatprāṇākhyaṃ brahma nirviśeṣaṃ viduste muktā bhavantītyāha-ya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9952: ataḥ prāṇopāstiparaṃ vākyamiti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-prasiddheḥ pañcavṛttiriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9954: atrāpi sarvaceṣṭābhayahetutvaṃ brahmaliṅgamastīti nāsti pūrvapakṣāvasaro gatārthatvāditi,
GSP33brssgo1u:9956: pratiṣṭhāya sthitiṃ labdhvā prāṇe vāyau nimitte jagaccalatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:9964: tadu nātyeti brahmānāśritaḥ ko 'pi loko nāstyevetyukārārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9967: brahmaṇi vajraśabdaḥ kathamityāśaṅkya gauṇa ityāha-vajraśabda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9969: tatraiva vāyūpāstiprakaraṇaṃ samāpya 'atha hainamuṣastaḥ papraccha'iti jñeyātmānamuktvā vāyvādernāśitvokterityāha-yattu vāyvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9978: kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaṃ cakṣurviṣayatamopahaṃ tejaḥ kiṃvā paraṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9984: 1.1.24) ityatra hi prakaraṇājyotiḥśabdaḥ svārthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi vartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9989: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameva brahma jyotiḥśabdam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10003: nahyātyantike mokṣe gatyutkrāntī sta iti vakṣyāmaḥ // 40 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:10004: FN: 'atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ' ityādi nāḍīkhaṇḍaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10009: ghaṭādiviṣayāvarakatamonāśakaṃ sauramityarthaḥ pūrvatra brahmaprakaraṇasyānugrāhakaḥ sarvaśabdasaṃkocādyayogo 'stīti prāṇaśrutirbrahmaṇi nītā
GSP33brssgo1u:10010: na tathātra 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā'iti prakaraṇasyānugrāhakaṃ paśyāma iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha-prasiddhamevetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10013: nanu jyotiradhikaraṇe jyotiḥśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛtteruktatvātkathaṃ pūrvapakṣa ityata āha-jyotiriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10017: 'tā vā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ'iti kaṇḍikayā nāḍīnāṃ raśmīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃśleṣamuktvā
GSP33brssgo1u:10018: atha saṃjñālopānantaraṃ yatra kāle etanmaraṇaṃ yathā syāttathotkrāmati atha tadā
GSP33brssgo1u:10021: tathaivātrāpi śarīrātsamutthāya mṛtvā paraṃ jyotirādityākhyamupasaṃpadya taddvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā svasvarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vaktavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:10023: ato mārgasthasūryopāstyā kramamuktiparaṃ vākyamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10024: vyākhyeyatvenopakrānta ātmaivātra jyotiḥśabdena vyākhyena iti jyotirvākyenaikavākyatāprayojakaprakaraṇānugṛhītottamarapuruṣaśrutyā vākyabhedakajyotiḥśrutirbādhyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10027: paratvena viśeṣitasya jyotiṣa eva sa uttama iti parāmarśenāśarīratvaniścayādityāha-paramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10029: nāḍīkhaṇḍe daharopāsakasya yā sūryaprāptiruktā sa na mokṣa iti yuktā sūryoktiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10031: śrutivyatyāsena svarūpaṃ sākṣātkṛtya paraṃ jyotistadevopasaṃpadyata iti vyākhyeyamiti bhāvaḥ //40 //
GSP33brssgo1u:10036: 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma tadamṛtaṃ sa ātmā' (chā. 8.14.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:10038: tatkimākāśasabdaṃ paraṃ brahma kiṃvā prasiddhameva bhūtākāśamiti vicāre bhūtaparigraho yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10042: evaṃ prāpta idamucyate- parameva brahmehākāśaśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10045: 'te yadantarā tadbrahma' iti hi nāmarūpābhyāmarthāntarabhūtamākāśaṃ vyapadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10046: naca brahmaṇo 'nyannāmarūpābhyāmarthāntaraṃ saṃbhavati' sarvasya vikārajātasya nāmarūpābhyāmeva vyākṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10047: nāmarūpayorapi nirvahaṇaṃ niraṅ kuśaṃ na brahmaṇo 'nyatra saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10058: FN: nāmarūpe śabdāthā tadantaḥpātinastadbhinnatvaṃ tatkartṛtvaṃ cāyuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10065: vai nāmeti prasiddhiliṅgasyākāśaśruteśca vākyaśeṣagatābhyāṃ brahmātmaśrutibhyāmanekaliṅgopetābhyāṃ bādho yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10066: yatra bahupramāṇasaṃvādastatra vākyasya tātparyamiti nirṇayāditi siddhāntayati-paramevetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10070: 'anena jīvena'ityatra jīvasya brahmabhedena tatkartṛtvamucyate sākṣādayogāditi pariharati-bāḍhamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10076: atrākāśaśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛttiṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatra saṃśayādipravṛtteruktatvāditi na paunaruktyamiti bhāvaḥ //41//
GSP33brssgo1u:10082: bṛhadāraṇyake ṣaṣṭe prapāṭhake 'katama ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.7)
GSP33brssgo1u:10090: upasaṃhāre ca sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssgo1u:10093: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameśvaropadeśaparamevedaṃ vākyaṃ na śārīramātrānvākhyānaparam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10096: suṣuptau tāvat 'ayaṃ puruṣaḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' (bṛ. 4.3.21)
GSP33brssgo1u:10106: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena vyapadeśātparameśvara evātra vivakṣata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10108: atra brūmaḥ - upakrametāvat 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu iti na saṃsārisvarūpaṃ vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ tarhyanūdya saṃsārisvarūpaṃ pareṇa brahmaṇāsyaikatāṃ vivakṣati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10110: tathopasaṃhāre 'pi yathopakramamevopasaṃharati- 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10111: yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu saṃsārī lakṣyate sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā parameśvara evāsmābhiḥ pratipādita ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10113: na prācīmapi diśaṃ prasthāpitaḥ pratīcīmapi diśaṃ pratiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10114: yato na buddhāntādyavasthopanyāsenāvasthāvattvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ vā vivakṣati,
GSP33brssgo1u:10117: yat 'ata ūrdhve vimokṣāyaiva brūhi' iti pade pade pṛcchati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10120: 'ananvāgataṃ puṇyenānanvāgataṃ pāpena tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñśokānhṛdayasya bhavati' (bṛ. 43.22) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10134: ahandhīgamyeṣu katama ātmeti janakapraśne yājñavalkya āha-yo 'yamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10145: siddhānte jīvānuvādena tataḥ kalpitabhedabhinnasya prājñasya paramātmanaḥ svarūpaikyapramitiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10151: puruṣaḥ śarīraṃ prājño jīva iti bhrāntiṃ vārayati-tatra puruṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10157: vastutaḥ sarvavikriyāśūnya ityukterna saṃsāriṇi tātparyamityāha-yata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10168: hi yasmādātmā suṣuptau sarvaśokātītaḥ tasmādhṛdayasyaiva sarve śokā iti śrutyarthaḥ //42//
GSP33brssgo1u:10173: yadasminvākye patyādayaḥ śabdā asaṃsārisvarūpapratipādanaparāḥ saṃsārisvabhāvapratiṣedhanāśca bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10175: 'sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānno evāsādhunā kanīyān' ityevañjātīyakāḥ saṃsārisvabhāvapratiṣedhanāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10177: iti śrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // 3 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:10188: iti śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo1u:10192: veditanyaṃ priyaṃ vande prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ param //1//
GSP33brssgo1u:10197: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca / BBs_1,4.1 /
GSP33brssgo1u:10198: brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamuktam- 'janmādyasya yataḥ' (bra. 1.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10199: tallakṣaṇaṃ pradhānasyāpi samānamityāśaṅkya tadaśabdatvena nirākṛtam- 'īkṣaternāśabdam' (bra. 1.1.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10200: gatismānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakāraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate na pradhānakāraṇavādaṃ pratīti prapañcitaṃ gatena granthena /
GSP33brssgo1u:10203: ataḥ pradhānasya kāraṇatvaṃ vedasiddhameva mahadbhiḥ paramarṣibhiḥ kapilaprabhṛtibhiḥ parigṛhītamiti prasajyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10204: tadyāvatteṣāṃ śabdānāmanyaparatvaṃ na pratipādyate tāvatsarvajñaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇamiti pratipāditamapyākulībhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10207: kāṭhake hi paṭhyate- 'mahataḥ paramavyaktamavyaktātpuruṣaḥ paraḥ' (1.3.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10208: tatra ya eva yannāmāno yatkramācca mahadavyaktapuruṣāḥ smṛtiprasiddhāsta eveha pratyabhijñāyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:10213: tadeva ca jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ śrutismṛtinyāyaprasiddhibhya iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10216: nahyatra yādṛśaṃ smṛtiprasiddhaṃ svatantraṃ kāraṇaṃ triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10218: sa ca śabdo na vyaktamavyaktamiti yaugikatvādanyasminnapi sūkṣme sudurlakṣye ca prayujyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10220: yā tu pradhānavādināṃ rūḍhiḥ sā teṣāmeva pāribhāṣikī satī na vedārthanirūpaṇe kāraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10223: prakaraṇanirūpaṇāyāṃ cātra na paraparikalpitaṃ pradhānaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10228: tathāhyanantarātīto grantha ātmaśarīravādināṃ rathirathādirūpakakḷptiṃ darśayati- 'ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu /
GSP33brssgo1u:10229: buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca //
GSP33brssgo1u:10234: saṃyataistvadhvanaḥ pāraṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamāpnoti darśayitvā,
GSP33brssgo1u:10235: kiṃ tadadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamityasyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10236: tebhya eva prakṛtebhya indriyādibhyaḥ paratvena paramātmānamadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ darśayati- 'indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10239: puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' (kā. 1.3.10,11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10240: tatra ya evendriyādayaḥ pūrvasyāṃ ratharūpakakalpanāyāmaśvādibhāvena prakṛtāsta eveha parigṛhyante prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriyāparihārāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:10242: arthā ye śabdādayo viṣayā indriyahayagocaratvena nirdiṣṭāsteṣāṃ cendriyebhyaḥ paratvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10250: yaḥ sa 'ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi' iti rathitvenopakṣiptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10257: ' iti smṛteḥ, 'yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai' (śve. /
GSP33brssgo1u:10258: 6.18) iti ca śruteryā prathamajasya hiraṇyagarbhasya buddhiḥ sā sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ parā pratiṣṭhā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10260: sā ca pūrvatra buddhigrahaṇenaiva gṛhītā satī hirugīhopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10262: etasmiṃstu pakṣe paramātmaviṣayeṇaiva pareṇa puruṣagrahaṇena rathina ātmano grahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10265: itarāṇīndriyādīni prakṛtānyeva paramapadadidarśayiṣayā samanukrāmanpariśiṣyamāṇenehāntyenāvyaktaśabdena pariśiṣyamāṇaṃ prakṛtaṃ śarīraṃ darśayatīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10266: śarīrendriyamanobuddhiviṣayavedanāsaṃyuktasya hyavidyāvato bhoktuḥ śarīrādīnāṃ rathādirūpakakalpanayā saṃsāramokṣagatinirūpaṇena pratyagātmabrahmāvagatiriha vivakṣitā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10267: tathāca 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhātmā na prakāśate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10269: (kā. 1.3.12) iti vaiṣṇavasya paramapadasya duravagamatvamuktvā tadavagamārthaṃ yogaṃ darśayati- 'yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñastadyacchejjñāna ātmani
GSP33brssgo1u:10272: etaduktaṃ bhavati- vācaṃ manasi saṃyacchet vāgādibāhyendriyavyāpāramutsṛjya manomātreṇāvatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10273: mano 'pi viṣayavikalpābhimikhaṃ vikalpadoṣadarśanena jñānaśabdoditāyāṃ buddhāvadhyavasāyasvabhāvāyāṃ dhārayet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10274: tāmapi buddhiṃ mahatyātmani bhoktaryagryāyāṃ vā buddhau sūkṣmatāpādanena niyacchet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10275: mahāntaṃ tvātmānaṃ śānta ātmani prakaraṇavati parasminpuruṣe parasyāṃ kāṣṭhāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayediti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10280: apiśabdādekaśabdācca brahmāṅgīkāreṇa pūrvapakṣo vicāraścāyaṃ kvācitka iti sūcitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10305: tenāśabdatvanirūpaṇena brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛto bhavatītyadhyāyasaṃgatirapyadhikaraṇatrayasya jñeyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10307: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ pūrvoktaśarīraparaṃ veti smṛtiprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvamaprasiddhabrahmaparatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10310: tathā ca brahmapradhānayorvikalpena kāraṇatvāt brahmaṇyeva vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti niyamāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10322: nanu śabdapratyabhijñāyāmartho 'pi pratyabhijñāyata ityāśaṅkya yaugikācchabdāsati niyāmake nārthaviśeṣadhīrityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10323: rūḍhyā taddhīrityāśaṅkya rūḍhiḥ kiṃ laukikī smārtā vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10331: pūrvajñātarūpārthasya sthāne tadviruddhārthajñāne sati tasya dhīrnāstītyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-na hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10334: tasya pūrvavākye ātmabuddhyormadhyasthānapaṭhitasyātrāpi madhyasthenāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇānna pradhānasya vaidikatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10335: smārtakramaḥ kimiti tyaktavya ityāśaṅkya śrautakramasya prakaraṇādyanugraheṇa balavattvādityāha-kuta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10340: yadyavivekī tadā manoraśanābaddhāṃstān pravartayatīti manasaḥ pragrahatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10343: nanu svataścidātmano bhogasaṃbhavāt kiṃ rathādinetyata āha-ātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10344: ātmā dehaḥ, dehādisaṅkakalpanayā bhoktṛtvaṃ na svato 'saṅgatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10346: śarīrasya prakṛtatve 'pyavyaktapadena pradhānaṃ gṛhyatāmityata āha-tatra ya eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10352: tato grahebhyaḥ śreṣṭhā atigrahā viṣayā iti bṛhadāraṇyake śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10372: taduktau ca pradhānena kimaparāddhamityata āha-sā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10374: pūrvaṃ vyaṣṭibuddhyabhedenoktātra tato bhedena paratvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10382: kiñca brahmātmaikatvaparatve granthe bhedavādināṃ pradhānasyāvakāśo nāstītyāha-śarīretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10384: kāṭhakagranthasyaikyatātparye gūḍhatvajñeyatvajñānahetuyogavidhaye liṅgāni santītyāha-tathā caiṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10394: ata uttaramucyate- sūkṣmaṃ tviha kāraṇātmanā śarīraṃ vivakṣyate sūkṣmasyāvyaktaśabdārhatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10400: itīdameva vyākṛtanāmarūpavibhinnaṃ jagatprāgavasthāyāṃ parityaktavyākṛtanāmarūpaṃ bījaśaktyavasthamavyaktaśabdayogaṃ darśayati // 2 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:10402: gobhirgovikāraiḥ payobhiḥ matsaraṃ somaṃ śrīṇīta miśritaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10403: tat ha kila tarhi prāgavasthāyāmidaṃ jagadavyākṛtaṃ avyaktamāsīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10417: sa eva tarhi pradhānakāraṇavāda evaṃ satyāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10419: atrocyate- yadi vayaṃ svatantrāṃ kāñcitprāgavasthāṃ jagataḥ kāraṇatvenābhyupagacchema,
GSP33brssgo1u:10421: parameśvarādhīnā tviyamasmābhiḥ prāgavasthā jagato 'bhyupagamyate na svatantrā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10424: nahi tayā vinā parameśvarasya sraṣṭṛtvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10429: avidyātmikā hi bījaśaktiravyaktaśabdanirdeśyā parameśvarāśrayā māyāmayī mahāsuptiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10431: tadetadavyaktaṃ kvacidākāśaśabdanirdiṣṭam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' (bṛ. 3.8.11) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10433: kvacinmāyeti sūcitam- 'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram' (śve. 4.10)
GSP33brssgo1u:10439: yadā tu jīvo mahāṃstadāpyavyaktādhīnatvājjīvabhāvasya mahataḥ paramavyaktamityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10441: avidyāvattvenaiva jīvasya sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ saṃtato vartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10445: anye tu varṇayanti- dvividhaṃ hi śarīraṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10447: sūkṣmaṃ yaduttaratra vakṣyate- 'tadantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām' (bṛ. 3.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10454: aviśeṣeṇa śarīradvayasya pūrvatra rathatvena saṃkīrtitatvātsamānayoḥ prakṛtapariśiṣṭatvayoḥ kathaṃ sūkṣmameva śarīramiha gṛhyate na punaḥ sthūlamapīti
GSP33brssgo1u:10456: āmnātaṃ cāvyaktapadaṃ sūkṣmameva pratipādayituṃ śaknoti netaradvyaktatvāttasyeti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:10458: nahīme pūrvottare āmnāte ekavākyatāmanāpadya kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayataḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10461: tatrāvaśiṣṭāyāṃ śarīradvayasya grāhyatvākāṅkṣāyāṃ yathākāṅkṣaṃ saṃbandhe 'nabhyupagamyamāna ekavākyataiva bādhitā bhavati kuta āmnātasyārthapratipattiḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10466: anantaranirdiṣṭatvāttu kiṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamitīdamiha vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10480: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10512: kathaṃ tasya mahato jīvātparatvamityāśaṅkya dvitīyasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tadadhīnatvācceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10516: avyaktapadabalāt prakṛtamapi sthūlaṃ tyajyata iti śaṅkate-āmnātasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10518: tava mate tasyā abhāvātkutor'thabodha iti samādhatte-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10519: tāṃ vināpyarthathīḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10520: śarīraśabdena rūḍhyā sthūlaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasya hāniraprakṛtasya bhūtasūkṣmasyāvyaktapadena grahaṇamanyāyyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10523: ākāṅkṣayā vākyaikavākyatve sati prakṛtaṃ śarīradvayamavyaktapadena grāhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10528: sthūlasya dṛṣṭadaurgandhyādinā laśunādivadanātmatvadhīvairāgyayoḥ sulabhatvāditi śaṅkate-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10529: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10533: kintu vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ vivakṣitamiti taddarśanārthaṃ prakṛtaṃ sthūlamevāvyaktapadena grāhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10534: kiñca sūkṣmasya liṅgāntaḥpātina indriyādigrahaṇenaiva grahaṇānna pṛthagavyaktaśarīrapadābhyāṃ grahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10542: jñeyatvena ca sāṃkhyaiḥ pradhānaṃ smaryate guṇapuruṣāntarajñānātkaivalyamitivadbhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10543: nahi guṇasvarūpamajñātvā guṇebhyaḥ puruṣasyāntaraṃ śakyaṃ jñātumiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10550: asmākaṃ tu ratharūpakakḷptaśarīrādyanusaraṇena viṣṇoreva paramaṃ padaṃ darśayitumayamupanyāsa ityanavadyam // 4 //
GSP33brssgo1u:10553: nahi śakyamiti ca vadadbhiḥ pradhānaṃ jñeyatvena smaryata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10554: na kevalaṃ bhedapratiyogitvena pradhānasya jñeyatvaṃ tairiṣṭaṃ kintu tasyopāsanayāṇimādiprāptaye 'pītyāha-kvacicceti /
