GSP33brssgo1u:10556: upadiṣṭaṃ hi jñānaṃ phalavaditi jñātuṃ śakyaṃ niṣphalasyopadeśāyogādavyaktasya ca jñānānupadeśātphalavajjñānagamyatvāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10561: asmanmate viṣṇavākhyapadasyaikasyaiva jñeyatvāttaddarśanārthamavyaktapadena śarīropanyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10562: sādhāraṇaśabdamātrānna pradhānasya pratyabhijñā smārtaliṅgasyānuktyā niyāmakābhāvāditi tātparyam //4//
GSP33brssgo1u:10565: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt / BBs_1,4.5 /
GSP33brssgo1u:10568: śrūyate hyuttaratrāvyaktaśabdoditasya pradhānasya jñeyatvavacanam- 'aśabdamasparśamarūpamavyayaṃ tathārasaṃ nityamagandhavacca yat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10569: anādyanantaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ dhruvaṃ nicāyya taṃ mṛtyumukhātpramucyate' //
GSP33brssgo1u:10571: atra hi yādṛśaṃ śabdādihīnaṃ pradhānaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ smṛtau nirūpitaṃ tādṛśameva nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10574: atra brūmaḥ - neha pradhānaṃ nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10575: prājño hīha paramātmā nicāyyatveta nirdiṣṭaṃ iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10579: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' ityādinirdeśāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:10580: 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate' iti ca durjñātatvavacanena tasyaiva jñeyatvākāṅkṣaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10581: 'yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñaḥ' iti ca tajjñānāyaiva vāgādisaṃyamasya vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10583: nahi pradhānamātraṃ nicāyya mṛtyumukhātpramucyata iti sāṃkhyairiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10593: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca / BBs_1,4.6 /
GSP33brssgo1u:10598: tatra tāvat 'sa tvamagniṃ svargyamadhyeṣi mṛtyo prabrūhi taṃ śraddadhānāya mahyam' (kā. 1.1.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:10606: prativacanamapi 'lokādimamagniṃ tamuvāca tasmai yā iṣṭakāyāvatīrvā yathā vā' (kā. 1.1.15)
GSP33brssgo1u:10608: 'hanta ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10609: yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya ātmā bhavati gautama /
GSP33brssgo1u:10617: atrāha- yo 'yamātmaviṣayaḥ praśno yeyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'stīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:10618: kiṃ sa evāyam 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' iti punaranukṛṣyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:10621: sa evāyaṃ praśnaḥ punaranukṛṣyata iti yadyucyeta,
GSP33brssgo1u:10622: dvayorātmaviṣayayoḥ praśnayorekatāpatteragniviṣaya ātmaviṣayaśca dvāveva praśnāvityato na vaktavyaṃ trayāṇāṃ praśnopanyāsāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10623: athānyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśnaḥ utthāpyata ityucyeta tato yathaiva varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnakalpanāyāmadoṣa evaṃ praśna vyatirekeṇāpi pradhānopanyāsakalpanāyāmadoṣaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10624: atrocyate- naivaṃ vayamiha varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnaṃ kañcitkalpayāmo vākyopakramasāmarthyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10625: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥsaṃvādarūpā vākyapravṛttirāsamāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10626: mṛtyuḥ kila nāciketase pitrā prahitāya trīnvarānpradadau /
GSP33brssgo1u:10627: naciketāḥ kila teṣāṃ prathamena vareṇa saumanasyaṃ vavre /
GSP33brssgo1u:10631: tatra yadyanyatra dharmādityanyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśna utthāpyeta tato varapradānavyatirekeṇāpi praśnakalpanādvākyaṃ bādhyetha /
GSP33brssgo1u:10634: yoyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'sti nāstīti vicikitsābhidhānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10645: iha cānyatra dharmādityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' iti janmamaraṇapratiṣedhena pratipādyamānaṃ śārīraparameśvarayorabhedaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10646: sati hi prasaṅge pratiṣedho bhāgī bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10647: prasaṅgaśca janmamaraṇayoḥ śarīrasaṃsparśācchārīrasya bhavati na parameśvarasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:10649: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati //
GSP33brssgo1u:10650: (kā. 2.4.4) iti svapnajāgaritadṛśo jīvasyaiva mahattvavibhutvaviśeṣaṇasya mananena śokavicchedaṃ darśayanna prājñādanyo jīva iti darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10653: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10655: tathā jīvavīṣayasyāstitvanāstitvapraśnasyānantaram 'anyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva' ityārabhya mṛtyunā taistaiḥ kāmaiḥ pralobhyamāno 'pi naciketā yadā na cacāla,
GSP33brssgo1u:10656: tadainaṃ mṛtyurabhyudayanīḥśreyasavibhāgapradarśanena vidyāvidyāvibhāgapradarśanena ca 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye na tvā kāmā bahavo 'lolupanta' (kā.1.2.4)
GSP33brssgo1u:10657: iti praśasya praśnamapi tadīyaṃ praśaṃsanyaduvāca- 'taṃ durdarśaṃ gūḍhamanupraviṣṭhaṃ guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10658: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti //
GSP33brssgo1u:10659: ' (kā.1.2.12) iti, tenāpi jīvaprājñayorabheda eveha vivakṣata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10660: yatpraśnanimittāṃ ca praśaṃsāṃ mahatīṃ mṛtyoḥ pratyapadyata naciketā yadi taṃ vihāya praśaṃsānantaramanyameva praśnamupakṣipedasthāna eva sā sarvā praśaṃsā prasāritā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10661: tasmāt 'yeyaṃ prete' ityasyaiva praśnasyaitadanukarṣaṇam 'anyatra dharmāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10664: pūrvatra hi dehādivyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvaṃ pṛṣṭamuttaratra tu tasyaivāsaṃsāritvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10665: pṛcchyata iti yāvaddhyavidyā na nivartate tāvaddharmādigocaratvaṃ jīvasya jīvatvaṃ ca na nivartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10666: tannivṛttau tu prājña eva tattvamasīti śrutyā pratyāyyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10668: yathā kaścitsaṃtamase patitāṃ kāñcidrajjumahiṃ manyamāno bhīto vepamānaḥ palāyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:10670: sa ca tadupaśrutyāhikṛtaṃ bhayamutsṛjedvepathuṃ palāyanaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10671: natvahibuddhikāle tadapagamakāle ca vastunaḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10673: tataśca 'na jāyate mriyate vā' ityevamādyapi bhavatyastitvapraśnasya prativacanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10675: ekatve 'pi hyātmaviṣayasya praśnasya prāyaṇāvasthāyāṃ dehavyatiriktāstitvamātravicikitsānātkartṛtvādisaṃsārasvabhāvānapohanācca pūrvasya paryāyasya jīvaviṣayatvamutprekṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10678: pradhānakalpanāyāṃ tu na varapradānaṃ na praśno na prativacanamiti vaiṣamyam // 6 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:10679: FN: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃprati trīnvarānavṛṇīṣvetyuktestrayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10681: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagnimadhyeṣi smarasi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10683: dehādanyo 'sti naveti saṃśayo.'sti ata etadātmatattvamasaṃdigdhaṃ jānīyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10690: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tamātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10695: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃ prati trīnvarānvṛṇīṣvetyukteḥ trayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10699: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagni smarasi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10705: yāḥ svarūpato yāvatīḥ saṃkhyāto yathā vā krameṇāgniścīyate tatsarvamuvācetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10706: hantedānīṃ brahma vakṣyāmīti brahmavākyena jīvapraśnādvyavahitanamapi 'yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya'ityādi vākyaṃ jīvaviṣayamuttaraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10708: vākyārthastu ātmā maraṇaṃ prāpya yathā bhavati tathā vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10713: evaṃ ca trayāṇāmevopanyāsaḥ praśnaśca yataḥ ato na pradhānamavyaktamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10715: ekaḥ praśnaḥ dvau praśnau veti pakṣadvaye phalitaṃ pṛcchati-kiñcāta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10718: praśnaikye sūtrāsaṃgatiḥ bhede pradhānasya śrautatvasiddhiriti pūrvavādyāha-sa evetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10724: itaḥ punaḥ martyalokaṃ prāptasya mama pitā yathāpūrvaṃ sumanāḥ syāditi prathamaṃ vavre /
GSP33brssgo1u:10725: nanu dvitīyavaro jīvavidyā tṛtīyo brahmavidyeti praśnabhedaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-yeyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10726: prete ityupakramya tṛtīyatvoktiliṅgājjīvātmavidyaiva tṛtīyo vara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10727: evaṃ vākyopakrame sati praśnāntaraṃ na yuktamityāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10728: maraṇadharmādyasparśaliṅgābhyāṃ praṣṭavyayorjīveśvarayorbhedāt praśnabhedasiddhervākyabādho yukta iti śaṅkate-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10730: na kevalaṃ praṣṭavyabhedāt praśnabhedaḥ kintu praśnavākyayoḥ sādṛśyābhāvādapītyāha-praśnacchāyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10732: kiñca brahmāpraśne janmādiniṣedhena jīvasvarūpaṃ vadan yamastayoraikyaṃ sūcayatītyāha-iha cānyatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10740: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tāmātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10742: kiñcābhedamuktvā bhedasya ninditatvādabheda eva satya ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10744: evamihākhaṇḍaikarase brahmaṇi yo nāneva mithyābhedaṃ paśyati sa bhedadarśī maraṇānmaraṇaṃ prāpnoti saṃsārabhayānna mucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10745: kiñca jīvapraśnānantaraṃ 'taṃ durdarśam'iti yaduttaramuvāca tenāpyuttareṇābhedo gamyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10747: putrādikaṃ vṛṇīṣvetyukte 'pi viṣayāṃstucchīkṛtyātmajñānānna cacāla 'nānyaṃ tasmānnaciketā vṛṇīte'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10748: tadā saṃtuṣṭo yamaḥ 'anyacchreyo 'nyadutaiva preyaḥ'iti bhogāpavargamārgayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ pratijñāya 'dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā'iti darśitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10754: yataḥ tvā tvāṃ bahavo 'pi kāmāḥ putrādayo mayā dīyamānā durlabhā api nālolupanta
GSP33brssgo1u:10755: lobhavantaṃ na kṛtavanta iti praṣṭāraṃ stutvā praśnamapi 'tvādṛṅgo bhūyānnaciketaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10757: iyaṃ praśaṃsā praśnabhedapakṣe na ghaṭata ityāha-yatpraśneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10758: yatpraśnena stutiṃ labdhavāṃstaṃ praśnaṃ vihāya yadyanyamevotthāpayet tarhyanavasare stutīḥ kṛtā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10763: avidyānāśānantaraṃ brahmatvaṃ cedāgantukamanityaṃ ca syādityata āha-na cāvidyāvattva iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10764: jīvasya brahmatve svābhāvike sati brahmapraśnasya yaduttaraṃ tajjīvapraśnasyāpi bhavatīti lābhaṃ darśayati-tataśca na jāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10771: yathā mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyaiḥ sattāmātre 'pi prathamaje prayukte na tameva vaidike 'pi prayoge 'bhidhatte /
GSP33brssgo1u:10789: 'tamasaḥ parastādi'tyādinā śokātyayatamaḥ paratvādibhyaśca mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaṃ nābhidhatta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10797: mantravarṇāt- 'ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10798: ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ' (śve. 4.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10811: tāṃ prakṛtimaja ekaḥ puruṣo juṣamāṇaḥ prīyamāṇaḥ sevamāno vānuśete /
GSP33brssgo1u:10813: anyaḥ punarajaḥ puruṣe utpannavivekajñāno virakto jahātyenāṃ prakṛtiṃ bhuktabhogāṃ kṛtabhogāpavargāṃ parityajati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10816: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nānena mantreṇa śrutimattva sāṃkhyavādasya śakyamāśrayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:10817: nahyayaṃ mantraḥ svātantryeṇa kañcidapi vādaṃ samarthayitumutsahate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10822: ityasminamantre svātantryeṇāyaṃ nāmāsau camaso 'bhipreta iti na śakyate nirūpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:10826: tatra tu 'idaṃ tacchira eṣa hyarvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ' iti vākyaśeṣāccamasaviśeṣapratipattirbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10829: FN: ajāmekāṃ- na jāyata ityajā tāṃ mulaprakṛtiṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ rajaḥsatvamoguṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10830: sarūpāstriguṇātmikāḥ prajā janayantīṃ eko 'jo jīvastāṃ śabdādiviṣayarūpatāpannāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10832: jīvena bhukto bhogo yasyāṃ yasyā vā tāṃ jīvena bhujyamānāmanyaḥ paramātmā jahāti nāsyāmāsaktiṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10833: avayavāḥ pradhānasya raja ādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayastaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10841: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ māyāparaṃ veti rūḍhyarthāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvatrāvyaktaśabdamātreṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:10848: avayavāḥ pradhānasya rajādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayaḥ tairnimittairlohitādiśabdaiḥ pradhānamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10862: viśeṣagrahahetoḥ prakaraṇāderabhāvāditi hetuṃ vyākhyāya dṛṣṭāntaṃ vyācaṣṭe-camasavaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10866: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke / BBs_1,4.9 /
GSP33brssgo1u:10867: parameśvarādutpannā jyotiḥpramukhā tejobannalakṣaṇā caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya prakṛtibhūteyamajā pratipattavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10871: tathāhyeke śākhinastejobannānāṃ parameśvarādutpattimāmnāya teṣāmeva rohitādirūpatāmāmananti- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejastadrūpaṃ yacchukraṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10873: rohitādīnāṃ ca śabdānāṃ rūpaviśeṣeṣu mukhyatvādbhāktatvācca guṇaviṣayatvasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:10874: asaṃdigdhena ca saṃdigdhasya nigamanaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:10879: vākyaśeṣe 'pi 'māyāṃ tu prakṛti vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram' iti 'yo yoniṃ yonimadhitiṣṭhatyekaḥ' (śve. 4.10,11)
GSP33brssgo1u:10880: iti ca tasyā evāvagamānna svatantrā kācitprakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ nāmajāmantreṇāmnāyata iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo1u:10881: prakaraṇāttu saiva daivī śaktiravyākṛtanāmarūpā nāmarūpayoḥ prāgavasthānenāpi mantreṇāmnāyata ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10884: te brahmavādino 'nayā rītyā vimṛśya dyānayogenānugatāḥ paramātmānamanu praviṣṭāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10885: avidyāśaktiryoniḥ sā ca pratijīvaṃ nānetyuktamato vīpsopapannā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10893: kiñca lohitādiśabdairapi dravyalakṣaṇā nyāyyā avyavadhānāt na tu rañjanīyatvādiguṇavyavahitā sattvādiguṇalakṣaṇetyāha-lohitādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10894: nanu śākhāntareṇa śākhāntarasthamantrasya nirṇayaḥ kathamityata āha-asaṃdigdheneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10896: yathā śākhāntaravākyānna pradhānagrahastathehāpi śvetāśvataropaniṣadi māyāprakaraṇānna tadbrahma ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10898: brahmavādino dhyānākhyayogena paramātmānamanupraviṣṭāḥ santaḥ tatraiva devasyātmabhūtāmaikyenādhyastāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10899: śaktiṃ paratantrāṃ māyāṃ sattvādiguṇavatīṃ brahmaṇaḥ sahāyamapaśyannityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10900: māyāyā ekatve 'pi tadaṃśānāṃ jīvopādhīnāṃ tattasaṃghātayonīnāmavidyākhyānāṃ bhedādvīpsā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10908: kathaṃ punastejobannātmanā trairūpyeṇa trirūpājā pratipattuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10917: yathāhi loke yadṛcchayā kācidajā rohitaśuklakṛṣṇaṇavarṇā syādbahubarkarā sarūpabarkarā ca tāṃ ca kaścidajo juṣamāṇo 'nuśayīta,
GSP33brssgo1u:10919: evamiyamapi tejobannalakṣaṇā bhūtaprakṛtistrivarṇā bahu sarūpaṃ carācaralakṣaṇaṃ vikārajātaṃ janayati aviduṣā ca kṣetrajñenopabhujyate viduṣā ta parityajata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10920: nacedamāśaṅkitavyamekaḥ kṣetrajño 'nuśete 'nyo jahātītyataḥ kṣetrajñabhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pareṣāmiṣṭaḥ prāpnotīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10924: 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10952: naca yogasya mukhyavṛttitvāttena pradhānagraho nyāyya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10955: tathāca rohitādiśabdasamabhivyāhārānugṛhītayā rūḍhyāśritayā guṇavṛttyā pradhāne yogaṃ bādhitvāvāntaraprakṛtirajāśabdena grāhya,
GSP33brssgo1u:10956: yathā madhvādiśabdaiḥ prasiddhamadhvādyāśritaguṇalakṣaṇaya ādityādayo gṛhyante tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10961: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvād atirekāc ca / BBs_1,4.11 /
GSP33brssgo1u:10965: asminmantre pañca pañcajanā iti pañcasaṃkhyāviṣayāparā pañcasaṃkhyā śrūyate pañcadvayaśabdadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10967: tathā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā yāvantaḥ saṃkhyeyā ākāṅkṣyantelatāvantyeva ca tattvāni sāṃkhyaiḥ saṃkhyāyante- 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtirmahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10968: ṣoḍaśakaśca vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ' (sāṃkhyakā. 3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10969: tayā śrutiprasiddhayā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā teṣāṃ smṛtiprasiddhānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahātprāptaṃ punaḥ śrutimattvameva pradhānādīnām
GSP33brssgo1u:10970: tato brūmaḥ - na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvaṃ pratyāśā kartavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10975: yena pañcaviṃśaterantarāle parāḥ pañca pañcasaṃkhyā niveśeran /
GSP33brssgo1u:10978: yathā 'pañca sapta ca varṣāṇi na vavarṣa śatakratuḥ' iti dvādaśavārṣikīmanāvṛṣṭiṃ kathayanti tadvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10981: paraścātra pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samastaḥ pañcajanā iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:10987: naca pañcasaṃkhyāyā ekasyāḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā parayā viśeṣaṇaṃ pañca pañcakā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10989: nanvāpannapañcasaṃkhyakā janā eva punaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā viśeṣyamāṇāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pratyeṣyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:10990: yathā pañca pañcapūlya iti pañcavaṃśatipūlāḥ pratīyante tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10992: yuktaṃ yatpañcapūlīśabdasya samāhārābhiprāyatvātkatīti satyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañca pañcapūlya iti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10993: iha tu pañca pañca janā ityādita eva bhedopādānātkatītyasatyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ na pañca pañcajanā iti viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:11003: sa ca pañcaviṃśatāvantargata eveti na tasyaivādhāratvamādheyatvaṃ ca yujyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11005: tathā 'ākāśaśca pratiṣṭhitaḥ' ityākāśasyāpi pañcaviṃśatavantargatasya na pṛthagupādānaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11007: kathaṃ ca saṃkhyāmātraśravaṇe satyaśrutānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11012: iti viśeṣaṇasmaraṇātsaṃjñāyāmeva pañcaśabdasya janaśabdena samāsaḥ tataśca rūḍhatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kecitpañcajanā nāma vivakṣyante na sāṃkhyatattvābhiprāyeṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:11014: pañcajanā nāma ye kecitte ca pañcaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11028: pañcajanaśabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaparo 'nyaparo veti yogarūḍhyoraniścayāt saṃśaye yathā
GSP33brssgo1u:11034: tatra catvāraḥ sūtraṃ annaṃ virāṭ tayoḥ kāraṇamavyākṛtamākāśaśca yasminnadhyastāstamevātmānamamṛtaṃ brahma manye /
GSP33brssgo1u:11036: nanvastu pañcatvaśiṣṭeṣu pañcajaneṣu punaḥ pañcatvānvayāt pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11037: tāvatā kathaṃ sāṃkhyatattvagraha ityāśaṅkya saṃkhyāyā dharmyākāṅkṣāyāṃ tattvāni grāhyāṇītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11044: pañca tanmātrāśca pañcānāṃ sthūlabhūtānāmākāśādīnāṃ prakṛtayaḥ pañca sthūlabhūtānyekādaśendriyāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāko gaṇo vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11049: pañcsu pañcasu sādhāraṇasyetarapañcakāddhyāvṛttasya dharmasyābhāvo 'tra nānātvaṃ vivakṣitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11050: yadyapi jñānakarmendriyeṣu daśasu jñānakaraṇatvaṃ karmakaraṇatvaṃ ca pañcakadvaye 'sti,
GSP33brssgo1u:11052: tathāpi yasminnityātmana ākāśasya ca pṛthagukteḥ sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāḥ pañca kartavyāḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11059: yathā dvāvaśvinau saptarṣayo 'ṣṭau vasavaśceti saptadaśetyatrāśvitvādikamādāya dvitvādayaḥ praviśantiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11061: pañcaśabdadvayena svavācyanyūnasaṃkhyādvāreṇa tadvyāpyā mahāsaṃkhyaiva lakṣyata iti sadṛṣṭāntaṃ śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11062: mukhyārthasya vakṣyamāṇatvāllakṣaṇā na yukteti pariharati-tadapi neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11069: tathāca na dvitīyapañcaśabdajanaśabdayoḥ samāsaṃ vināntyasyākārasyodāttatvaṃ pūrveṣāmanudāttatatvaṃ ca ghaṭate 'samāsasya'iti sūtreṇa samāsasyāntodāttavidhānāt
GSP33brssgo1u:11070: 'anudāttaṃ padamekavarjam'iti ca sūtreṇa yasminpade udāttaḥ svarito vā yasya varṇasya
GSP33brssgo1u:11071: vidhīyate tamekaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭaṃ tatpadamanudāttaṃ bhavatīti vidhānādeva māntrikāntodāttasvareṇaikapadatvaniścayaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11073: yo mantradaśāyāmanudāttaḥ svarito vā sa brāhmaṇadaśāyāmudātto bhavatītyapavāda āśritaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11076: tathā cāntyanakārāduparitana ākāra ākāśaścetyanena śliṣṭatayā paṭhyamāno 'nudātto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:11080: antānudāttaṃ hi samāmnātāraḥ pañcajanaśabdamadhīyata iti pāṭhakaprasiddhirasiddheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11081: tathā ca pañca pañcajanā iti māntrikāntodāttaḥ svaraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11082: yasmin pañca pañcajanā ityantānudātto brāhnasvara iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11085: ājya, tvā tvāṃ pañcānāṃ pañcajanānāṃ devaviśeṣāṇāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi ityājyagrahaṇamantraśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11086: devatānāṃ karmaṇi yantradavasthitaṃ śarīraṃ tadeva dhartraṃ ihāmitrabhogādhāraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11090: janapañcakamekaṃ pañcakānāṃ pañcakaṃ dvitīyamiti pañcakadvayaṃ tasya pañcapañceti grahaṇaṃ netyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11103: pañcānāṃ pūlānāṃ samāhārā ityatra 'saṃkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ'iti samāso vihitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11104: tato 'dvigoḥ'iti sūtreṇa ṅīpo vidhānāt samāhārapratītau samāhārāḥ katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcetipadāntarānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11105: pañcajanā ityatra tu ṅībantatvābhāvena samāhārasyāpratīteḥ janānāṃ cādita eva pañcatvopādānātsaṃkhyākāṅkṣāyā asattvātpañceti padāntaraṃ nānveti
GSP33brssgo1u:11108: nanu janānāṃ nirākāṅkṣatve 'pi tadviśeṣaṇībhūtapañcatvāni katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañcatvāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatvityāśaṅkate-bhavadapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11109: nopasarjanasyopasarjanāntareṇānvayaḥ kintu pradhānenaiveti nopasarjanyāyavirodha ukta iti pariharati-tatra ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11121: kiṃ ca pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītāvapi na sāṃkhyatattvānāṃ grahaṇamityāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11126: pañca ca te janāśceti karmadhārayādisamāsāntarātsaṃjñāsamāsasyāptoktyā balavattvaṃ tāvadāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11127: vigvācinaḥ saṃkhyāvācinaśca śabdāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ subantetottarapadena samasyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:11135: pañca nirdiṣṭāḥ - 'prāṇasya prāṇamuta cakṣuṣaścakṣuruta śrotrasya śrotramannasyānnaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:11140: samāne tu prasiddhyatikrame vākyaśeṣavaśātprāṇādaya eva gpahītavyā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11142: janavacanaśca puruṣaśabdaḥ prāṇeṣu prayuktaḥ 'te vā ete pañca brahmapuruṣāḥ' (chā. 3.13.6) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:11148: prasiddhārthasaṃnidhāne hyaprasiddhārthaḥ śabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ samabhivyāhārāttadviṣayo niyamyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:11150: tathāyamapi pañcajanaśabdaḥ samāsānvākhyānādavagatasaṃjñābhāvaḥ saṃjñyākāṅkṣī vākyaśeṣasamabhivyāhṛteṣu prāṇādiṣu vartiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11151: kaiścittu devāḥ pitaro gandharvā asurā rakṣāṃsi ca pañca pañcajanā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11156: ācāryastu na pañcaviśatestattvānamiha pratītirastītyevaṃparatayā 'prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt' iti jagāda // 12 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:11158: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11159: janavācakaḥ śabdo janaśabdaḥ pañcajanaśabda iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:11161: pañcajanaśabdasya saṃjñātvamuktvā saṃjñikathanārthaṃ sūtraṃ gṛhṇāti-ke punasta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11163: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11164: pañcajanaśabdasya prāṇādiṣu kayā vṛttyā prayoga iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11165: yathā tava tattveṣu janaśabdasya lakṣaṇaya prayogastathā mama prāṇādiṣu pañcajanaśabdasya lakṣaṇayetyāha-tattveṣviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11173: janakatvājjanaḥ pradhānamiti yogasaṃbhave kimiti rūḍhimāśritya lakṣaṇāprayāsa ityata āha-samāseti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11174: yathā aśvakarṇaśabdasya varṇasamudāyasya vṛkṣe rūḍhirevaṃ pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhireva nāvayavaśaktyātmako yoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11178: janasaṃbandhācceti pūrvabhāṣye nareṣu pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhimāśritya prāṇādiṣu lakṣaṇoktā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11179: iha tu prauḍhivādena prāṇādiṣu rūḍhirucyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11184: tataśṭodbhidetyaprasiddhasya tṛtīyāntasya yāgenetyanena prasiddhārthakena sāmānādhikaraṇyena tannāmatvaṃ niścīyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:11187: tathā chinattīti prasiddhārthacchedanayogyārthakaśabdasamabhivyāhārāddāruviśeṣo yūpaśabdārthaḥ karotīti samabhivyāhārādvediśabdārthaḥ saṃskārayogyasthaṇḍilaviśeṣa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11188: tathā prasiddhārtakaprāṇādiśabdasamabhivyāhārāt pañcajanaśabdaḥ prāṇādyarthaka iti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11192: pāñcajanyayā prajayā viśatīti viṭ tayā viśāpuruṣarūpayendrasyāhvānārthaṃ ghoṣāḥ sṛṣṭā iti yattadyuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11193: ghoṣātirekeṇendrāhvānāyogāditi śrutyanusāreṇa prajāmātragrahe 'pi na virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11199: kāṇvānāṃ tu kathaṃ prāṇādayaḥ pañcajanā bhaveyurye 'nnaṃ prāṇādiṣu nāmanantīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11202: asatyapi kāṇvānāmanne jyotiṣā teṣāṃ pañcasaṃkhyā pūryeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:11203: te 'pi hi 'yasminpañca pañcajanāḥ ityataḥ pūrvasminmantre brahmasvarūpanirūpaṇāyaiva jyotiradhīyate- 'taddevā jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11204: kathaṃ punarubhayeṣāmapi tulyavadidaṃ jyotiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ samānamantragatayā pañcasaṃkhyayā keṣāñcidgrṛhyate keṣāñcinneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11214: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ jyotistadbrahma devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11216: tatkāṇvānāṃ pañacatvapūraṇāya gṛhyate nānyeṣāmiti vikalpo na yukta iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11218: yathā atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti iti vākyabhedādvikalpastadvacchākhābhedenānnapāṭhāpāṭhābhyāṃ jyotiṣo vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11219: nanu kriyāyāṃ vikalpo yukto na vastunīti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:11221: atrāpi śākhāmedena sānnā jyotiḥsahitā vā pañca prāṇādayo yatra pratiṣṭhitāstanmanasānudraṣṭavyamiti dhyānakriyāyāṃ vikalpopapattirityanavadyam
GSP33brssgo1u:11231: tatredamaparamāśaṅkate- na janmādikaraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo brahmaviṣayaṃ vā gatisāmānyaṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ pratipattuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11241: tathā kvacidasatpūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ paṭhyate- 'asadvā idamagra āsīttato vai sadājayata' (tai. 2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11244: āsīt' ityupakramya 'kutastu khalu somyaivaṃ syāditi hovāca kathamasataḥ sajjāyeteti
GSP33brssgo1u:11246: kvacitsvayaṅkartṛkaiva vyākriyā jagato nigadyate- 'taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīttannāmarūpābhyāmeva vyākriyata' (bṛ. 1.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11247: evamanekadhā vipratipattirvastuni ca vikalpasyānupapatterna vedāntavākyānāṃ jagatkāraṇāvadhāraṇaparatā nyāyyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11249: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - satyapi prativedāntaṃ sṛjyamāneṣvākāśādiṣu kramādidvārake vigāne na sraṣṭari kiñcidvigānamasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11252: yathābhūto hyekasminvedānte sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sarvātmaiko 'dvitīyaḥ kāraṇatvena vyapadiṣṭastathābhūta eva vedāntāntareṣvapi vyapadiśyate
GSP33brssgo1u:11254: atra tāvajjñānaśabdena pareṇa ca tadviṣayeṇa kāmayitṛtvavacanena cetanaṃ brahma nyarūpayadaparaprayojyatveneśvaraṃ kāraṇamabravīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11255: tadviṣayeṇaiva pareṇātmaśabdena śarīrādikośaparaṃparayā cāntaranupraveśanena sarveṣāmantaḥ pratyagātmānaṃ niradhārayat /
GSP33brssgo1u:11257: iti cātmaviṣayeṇa bahubhavanānuśaṃsanena sṛjyamānānāṃ vikārāṇāṃ sraṣṭurabhedamabhāṣata /
GSP33brssgo1u:11260: tadatra yallakṣaṇaṃ brahma kāraṇatvena vijñātaṃ tallakṣaṇamevānyatrāpi vijñāyate- 'sadeva semyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11262: tathā 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyakiñcana miṣat /
GSP33brssgo1u:11263: sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjai' (ai.u. 4.1.1,2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11265: kāryaviṣayaṃ tu vigānaṃ dṛśyate kvacidākāśādikā sṛṣṭiḥ kvacittejādiketyevañjātīyakam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11266: naca kāryaviṣayeṇa vigānena kāraṇamapi brahma sarvavedānteṣvavigītamadhigamyamānamavivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhatīti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo1u:11271: nahi tatpratibaddhaḥ kvacitpuruṣārtho dṛśyate śrūyate vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11273: upakramopasaṃhārābhyāṃ tatra tatra brahmaviṣayairvākyaiḥ sākamekavākyatāyā gamyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11274: darśayati ca sṛṣṭyādiprapañcasya brahmapratipattyarthatām- 'annena somya śuṅgenāpo
GSP33brssgo1u:11275: mūlamanvicchadbhiḥ somya śuṅgena tejo mulamanviccha tejasā somya śuṅgena sanmūlamanviccha' (chā.6.8.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11276: mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiśca kāryasya kāraṇenābhedaṃ vadituṃ sṛṣṭyādiprapañcaḥ śrāvyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11303: adhikaraṇatrayeṇa pradhānasyāśrautatvoktyā jagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇena brahmaṇa eva buddhisthatā,
GSP33brssgo1u:11304: tasminneva buddhisthe nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti sādhitaṃ pūrvasūtrasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:11307: na cāvirodhacintāyā dvitīyādhyāye saṃgatirnāsminnadhyāya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11309: tatpadavācyajagatkāraṇavādiśrutīnāṃ mitho virodhādvācyārthānirṇayena lakṣye samanvayāsiddhau prāptāyāṃ tatsādhakāvirodhacintāyā atraiva saṃgatatvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:11310: na caivaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmapyavirodho 'traiva cintanīya iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:11314: iha tu sūkṣmadṛśāṃ vākyārthe samanvayajñānāya tatpadārthaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11315: tadyapi tvaṃpadārthaśrutivirodho 'tra parihartavyaḥ tathāpi prathamasūtreṇa bandhamithyātvasūcanādavirodhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11318: tāḥ kiṃ brahmaṇi mānaṃ na veti saṃśaye 'nnajyotiṣoḥ saṃkhyādṛṣṭikriyāyāṃ vikalpe
GSP33brssgo1u:11345: tadidaṃ jagaddha kila tarhi prākkāle 'vyākṛtaṃ kāraṇātmakāmāsīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11348: tatra sṛṣṭau virodhamaṅgīkṛtya sraṣṭari virodhaṃ pariharati-satyapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11349: ākāśādiṣu brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatve virodho naivāstīti pratijñāyāṃ hetumāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11357: yathā taittirīyake sarvajñatvādikaṃ kāraṇasya tathā chāndogyādāvapi dṛśyata ityāha-tadatra yallakṣaṇamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11360: tathāpi kārye virodhātkāraṇe 'pi virodhaḥ syādityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-kāryaviṣayaṃ tvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11361: svapnasṛṣṭīnāṃ pratyahamanyathātvena so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyamāne draṣṭaryapi nānātvaṃ prasajyetetyāha-atiprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:11369: śuṅgena kāryeṇa liṅgena kāraṇabrahmajñānārthatvaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmuktvā kāraṇasyādvayatvajñānaṃ phalāntamāha-mṛdādīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11370: evaṃ niṣphalāyāmanyārthāyāṃ sṛṣṭau tātparyābhāvādvirodho na doṣa ityatra vṛddhasaṃmatimāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11380: yatpunaḥ kāraṇaviṣayaṃ vigānaṃ darśitam- 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityādi tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11389: pratyagātmānaṃ nirdhārya 'so 'kāmayata' iti tameva prakṛtaṃ samākṛṣya saprapañcāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:11391: bhavati' iti tasminneva prakṛter'the ślokamimamudāharati- 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11393: tasmānnāmarūpavyākṛtavastuviṣayaḥ prāyeṇa sacchabdaḥ prasiddha iti tadvyākaraṇābhāvāpekṣayā prāgutpatteḥ sadeva brahmāsadivāsīdityupacaryate
GSP33brssgo1u:11403: ityatrāpi na niradhyakṣasya jagato vyākaraṇaṃ kathyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:11404: 'sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ānakhāgrebhyaḥ' ityadhyakṣasya vyākṛtakāryānupraveśitvena samākarṣāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11405: niradhyakṣe vyākaraṇābhyupagame hyanantareṇa prakṛtāvalambanā sa ityanena sarvanāmnā kaḥ kāryānupraveśitvena samākṛṣyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:11407: praviṣṭasya cetanatvaśravaṇāt 'paśyaṃścakṣuḥ śṛṇvañśrotraṃ manvāno manaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11408: apica yādṛśamidamadyatve nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākriyamāṇaṃ jagatsādhyakṣaṃ vyākriyata evamādisarge 'pīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11412: vyākriyata ityapi karmakartari lakāraḥ satyeva parameśvare vyākartari saukaryamapekṣya draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11413: yathā lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti satyeva pūrṇake lavitari /
GSP33brssgo1u:11423: evaṃ sṛṣṭidvārakaṃ virodhamutsūtraṃ samādhāya kāraṇasya sadasattvādinā sākṣācchrutivirodhanirāsārthaṃ sūtramādatte-yatpunariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11425: ato 'tra śloke nirātmakamasanna śrāvyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11426: tat tatra sadātmani śloko mantro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11436: śūnyanirāsena śrutibhiḥ sadvādasyaiveṣṭatvāttāsāṃ virodhasphūrtinirāsāya lakṣaṇā yukteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11440: nanu kartrabhāva eva parāmṛśyata ityata āha-cetanasya cāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11448: nanu karmakārakādanyasya kartuḥ sattve karmaṇa eva kartṛvācilakāro viruddha ityata āha-vyākriyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11451: vyākriyate jagatsvayameva niṣpannamiti vyākhyāya kenacidvyākṛtamiti vyācaṣṭe-yadveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11457: kauṣītakibrāhmaṇe bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde śrūyate- 'yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ kartā yasya vai tatkarma sa veditavyaḥ' (kau. brā. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11458: tatra kiṃ jīvo veditavyatvenopadiśyata uta mukhyaḥ prāṇa uta paramātmeti viśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11464: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' iti prāṇaśabdadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11466: ye caite purastāddhālākinā 'āditye puruṣaścandramasi puruṣaḥ' ityevamādayaḥ puruṣā nirdiṣṭāsteṣāmapi bhavati prāṇaḥ kartā prāṇāvasthāviśeṣatvādityādidevatātmanām
GSP33brssgo1u:11467: 'katama eko deva iti prāṇa iti sa brahma tyadityācakṣate (bṛ. 3.9.9)
GSP33brssgo1u:11470: tasyāpi dharmādharmalakṣaṇaṃ karma śakyate śrāvayitum 'yasya vaitatkarma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11473: yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālākiṃ prati bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11476: tathā parastādapi jīvaliṅgamavagamyate- 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11477: śreṣṭhina bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna etamātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:11482: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameśvara evāyameteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11485: iha hi bālākirajātaśatruṇā saha 'brahma te bravāṇi' iti saṃvaditumupacakrame /
GSP33brssgo1u:11487: tamajātaśatruḥ 'mṛṣā vai khalu mā saṃvadiṣṭā brahma te bravāṇi' ityamukhya brahmavāditayāpodya tatkartāramanyaṃ veditavyatayopacikṣepa /
GSP33brssgo1u:11490: kartṛtvaṃ caiteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na parameśvarādanyasya svātantryeṇāvakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11491: 'yasya vaitatkarma' ityapi nāyaṃ parispandalakṣaṇasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇasya vā karmaṇo nirdeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11496: liṅgavacanavigānācca nāpi puruṣaviṣayasya karotyarthasya kriyāphalasya vāyaṃ nirdeśaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11502: tathāpyasati viśeṣopādāne sādhāraṇenārthena saṃnidhānena saṃnihitavastumātrasyāyaṃ nirdeśa iti gamyate na viśiṣṭasya kasyacit /
GSP33brssgo1u:11504: pūrvatra ca jagadekadeśabhūtānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ viśeṣopādānadaviśeṣitaṃ jagadevehopādīyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11505: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ jagadekadeśabhūtānāṃ kartā,
GSP33brssgo1u:11509: ye bālākinā brahmatvābhimatāḥ puruṣāḥ kīrtitāsteṣāmabrahmatvakhyāpanāya viśeṣopādānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11510: evaṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakanyāyena sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāṃ jagataḥ kartā veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11516: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11520: balākāyā apatyaṃ bālākirbrāhmaṇastaṃ prati rājovāca-yo vā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11521: na kevalamādityādīnāṃ kartā kintu sarvasya jagata ityāha-yasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11526: iha tu vākyabhedāt 'brahma te bravāṇi'iti bālākivākyasthabrahmaśabdena prāṇādiśabdo brahmaparatvena netumāśakya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha--kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:11527: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya prāṇādyupāstiparatvādbrahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ siddhānte jñeye samanvayasiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11530: śrutaṃ puruṣakartṛtvaṃ prāṇasya kathamityata āha-ye caita iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11531: sūtrātmakaprāṇasya vikāraḥ sūryādaya ityatra mānamāha-kratama iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11532: yasya mahimānaḥ sarve devā iti pūrvavākye darśitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11538: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11540: taṃ rājā he bṛhatpāṇḍaravāsaḥ somarājannityāmantrya saṃbodhya saṃbodhanānabhijñatvāt prāṇāderanātmatvamuktvā yaṣṭhyāghātenotthāpya jīvaṃ bodhitavānityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11541: śroṣṭhī pradhānaḥ svairbhṛtyairjñātibhirupahṛtaṃ bhuṅkte svāḥ jñātayaśca tamupajīvanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:11542: evaṃ jīvo 'pi ādityādibhiḥ prakāśādinā bhogopakaraṇairbhuṅkte te ca havirgrahaṇādinā jīvamupajīvantītyuktaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11543: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo jīve kathamityata āha-prāṇabhṛttvācceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11545: sa ca bālākirbrahmatvabhrāntyā vyaṣṭiliṅgarūpānpuruṣānuktvā rājñā nirastastūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11546: tvaduktaṃ brahma mṛṣetyuktvā rājñocyamānaṃ brahmaiveti vaktavyamanyathārājño 'pi mṛṣāvāditvaprasaṅgādityāha-yadi so 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11553: atra prakaraṇopapadayorasattvātkasya grahaṇamiti saṃśaye puruṣakartṛpadasāṃnidhyāt kriyata iti yogājjagadgrahaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11556: nanu puruṣotpādakasya karturvyāpāraḥ karotyarthaṃ utpādanaṃ tasyaphalaṃ puruṣajanma tadanyataravācī karmaśabdo 'stvityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11562: atra ca saṃkocakāsattvātsarvārthakena sarvanāmnā buddhisthasya kāryamātrasya karmaśabdo vācaka ityāha-tathāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11567: brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyāḥ parivrājakāścetyatra yathā brahmaṇaśabdaḥ parivrājakānyaviṣayaḥ tathātra karmaśabdaḥ puruṣānyajagadvācītyāha-evamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:11573: ata yaduktaṃ vākyaśeṣagatājjīvaliṅgānmukhyaprāṇaliṅgācca tayorevānyatarasyeha grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ na parameśvarasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11575: yatrocyate- parihṛtaṃ caitat 'nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt' (bra. sū. 1.1.31) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:11576: trividhaṃ hyatropāsanamevaṃ sati prasajjyeta jīvopāsanaṃ mukhyaprāṇopāsanaṃ brahmopāsanaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11580: upasaṃhārasyāpi niratiśayaphalaśravaṇādbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ dṛśyate- 'sarvānpāpmano 'pahṛtya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyamādhipatyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11585: prāṇaśabdo 'pi brahmaviṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' (chā. 6.8.2) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:11595: 'saṃbhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedo hi neṣyate'ityuktaṃ cet punaruktiḥ syāditi śaṅkate-nanvevamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11596: karmapadasya rūḍhyā pūrvapakṣaprāptau tannirāsārthamasyārambho yukta ityāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11601: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke / BBs_1,4.18 /
GSP33brssgo1u:11602: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ jīvapradhānaṃ vedaṃ vākyaṃ syādbrahmapradhānaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11607: dṛśyate- 'kvaiṣa etadbālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa kva vā etadabhūtkuta etadāgāt' (kau.brā. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11608: prativacanamapi 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'
GSP33brssgo1u:11609: ityādi 'etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo
GSP33brssgo1u:11611: suṣuptikāle ca pareṇa brahmaṇā jīva ekatāṃ gacchati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11612: parasmācca brahmaṇaḥ prāṇādikaṃ jagajjāyata iti vedāntamaryādā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11613: tasmādyatrāsya jīvasya niḥsaṃbodhatāsvacchatārūpaḥ svāpa upādhijanitaviśeṣavijñānarahitaṃ svarūpaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11615: so 'tra paramātmā veditavyatayā śrāvita iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11616: apicaivameke śākhino vājasaneyino 'sminneva bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde spaṣṭaṃ vijñānamayaśabdena
GSP33brssgo1u:11617: jīvamāmnāya tadvyatiriktaṃ paramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa vijñānamayapuruṣaḥ kvaiṣa
GSP33brssgo1u:11621: 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti' iti copādhimatāmātmanāmanyato vyuccaraṇamāmanantaḥ paramātmānameva kāraṇatvenāmanantīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11628: he bālāke, etacchayanaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathaiṣa puruṣaḥ kvāśayiṣṭa /
GSP33brssgo1u:11631: etadbhavanamekībhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā eṣa puruṣaḥ kvābhūtsuptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11634: etadāgamanamaikyabhraṃśarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā puruṣaḥ kuta āgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11637: uttare prāṇokteḥ praśno 'pi prāṇaviśaya ityata āha-suṣuptikāle ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11644: nanu tatrākāśaḥ suṣuptisthānamuktaṃ na brahmetyata āha-ākāśeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11646: evaṃ jīvanirāsārthakatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya prāṇanirāsaparatvenāpi vyācaṣṭe-prāṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11649: api caike śākhina evameva prāṇātiriktaṃ jīvātmānamāmanantaḥ prāṇasya vākyārthatvaṃ vārayantīti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11656: bṛhadāraṇyake maitreyībrāhmaṇe 'dhīyate- 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya' ityupakramya 'na
GSP33brssgo1u:11657: vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmā
GSP33brssgo1u:11658: vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyyātmano vā are darśanena
GSP33brssgo1u:11660: (bṛ. 4.5.6) iti, tatraitadvicikitsyate- kiṃ vijñānātmaivāyaṃ draṣṭavyaśrotavyatvādirūpeṇopadiśyata āhosvitparamātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11667: patijāyāputravittādikaṃ hi bhogyabhūtaṃ sarvaṃ jagadātmārthatayā priyaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33brssgo1u:11670: madhye 'pi 'idaṃ mahadbhūtamanantamapāraṃ vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya
GSP33brssgo1u:11671: tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti' iti prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya
GSP33brssgo1u:11672: bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena bruvanvijñānātmanaṃ evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11673: tathā 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃharanvijñānātmānamevehopadiṣṭaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11678: vākyaṃ hīdaṃ paurvāparyeṇāvekṣyamāṇaṃ paramātmānaṃprati anvitāvayavaṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11679: kathamiti, tadupapādyate- 'amṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena' iti yājñavalkyādupaśrutya
GSP33brssgo1u:11680: 'yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tena kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavānveda tadeva me brūhi' ityamṛtatvamāśāsānāya
GSP33brssgo1u:11685: yatkāraṇamātmavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāyānantareṇa granthena tadevopapādayati- 'brahma taṃ parādādyo 'nyatrātmano brahma veda' ityādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:11686: yo hi brahmakṣatrādikaṃ jagadātmanonyatra svātantryeṇa labdhasadbhāvaṃ paśyati taṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:11687: mithyādarśinaṃ tadeva mithyādṛṣṭaṃ brahmakṣatrādikaṃ jagatparākarotīti bhedadṛṣṭimapodya
GSP33brssgo1u:11692: ityādinā ca prakṛtasyātmano nāmarūpakarmaprapañcakāraṇatāṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ paramātmānamenaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11694: saviṣayasya sendriyasya sāntaḥkaraṇasya prapañcasyaikāyanamanantaramabāhyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ prajñānaghanaṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ paramātmānamenaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11719: yathā 'brahma te bravāṇi'ityupakramabalādvākyasya brahmaparatvaṃ tathātra jīvopakramādasya vākyasya jīvaparatvamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:11721: siddhānte jñeye pratyagbrahmaṇi samanvaya iti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11727: etebhyaḥkāryakāraṇātmanā jāyamānebhyo bhūtebhayaḥ sāmyenotthāya bhūtopādhikaṃ janmānubhūya tānyeva bhūtāni nīyamānānyanusṛtya vinaśyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11737: yathā dundubhiśaṅkhavīṇāśabdasāmānyagrahaṇenaiva gṛhyamāṇāstadavāntaraviśeṣāḥ śuktigrahaṇagrāhyarajatavat sāmānye kalpitāstato na bhidyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:11743: ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11744: kiñca 'sa yathā sarvāsāmapāṃ samudra ekāyanam'iti kaṇḍikayā sarvaprapañcasya mukhyalayādhāratvamātmano brahmatve liṅgamityāha-tathaivaikāyaneti
GSP33brssgo1u:11750: astyatra pratijñā 'ātmani vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11751: tasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ siddhiṃ sūcayatyetalliṅgaṃ yatpriyasaṃsūcitasyātmano draṣṭavyatvādisaṃkīrtanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11752: yadi hi vijñānātmā paramātmano 'nyaḥ syāttataḥ paramātmavijñāne 'pi vijñānātmā na vijñāta ityekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātaṃ taddhīyeta
GSP33brssgo1u:11757: utkramiṣyata evaṃ bhāvād ity auḍulomiḥ / BBs_1,4.21 /
GSP33brssgo1u:11760: śrutiścaivaṃ bhavati- 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' (chā. 8.12.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11761: kvacicca jīvāśrayamapi nāmarūpaṃ nadīnidarśanena jñāpayati- 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudre 'staṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:11762: tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11763: yathā loke nadyaḥ svāśrayameva nāmarūpaṃ vihāya samudramupayantyevaṃ jīvo 'pi svāśrayameva
GSP33brssgo1u:11764: nāmarūpaṃ vihāya paraṃ puruṣamupaitīti hi tatrārthaḥ pratīyate dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayostulyatāyai // 21 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo1u:11770: nanu saṃsārasyaupādhikatvāt sarvadaivābheda ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntabalena saṃsārasya svābhāvikatvamityāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11771: 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudrestaṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya'iti nadinidarśanaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yathā loke iti //21//
GSP33brssgo1u:11778: mantravarṇaśca- 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste (tai.ā. 3.12.7)
GSP33brssgo1u:11780: naca tejaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ sṛṣṭau jīvasya pṛthaksṛṣṭiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11783: kāśakṛtsnasyācāryasyāvikṛtaḥ parameśvaro jīvo nānya iti matam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11785: tathāpi pratijñāsiddheriti sāpekṣatvābhidhānātkāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kiyānapyabhipreta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11786: auḍulomipakṣe punaḥ spaṣṭamevāvasthāntarāpekṣau bhedābhedau gamyete tatra kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ mataṃ śrutyanusārīti gamyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:11789: vikārātmakatve hi jīvasyābhyupagamyamāne vikārasya prakṛtisaṃbandhe pralayaprasaṅgānna tajjñānādamṛtamavakalpeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:11790: ataśca svāśrayasya nāmarūpasyāsaṃbhavādupādhyāśrayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ jīva upacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11791: ata evotpattirapi jīvasya kvacidagnivisphuliṅgodāharaṇena śrāvyamāṇopādhyāśrayaiva veditavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11792: yadapyuktaṃ prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena darśayanvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayatīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:11795: idamatra pratijñātam- 'ātmani vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati' 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11798: tasyā eva pratijñāyāḥ siddhiṃ sūcatyetalliṅgaṃ yanmahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena kathitamityāśmarathya ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11799: abhede hi satyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātamavakalpayata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11804: nanūcchedābhidhānametat 'etebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti' (bṛ. 2.4.12)
GSP33brssgo1u:11808: 'atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanna pretya saṃjñāsti' iti paryanuyujya svayameva śrutyārthāntarasya
GSP33brssgo1u:11809: darśitatvāt- 'na vā are 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmyavināśī vā are 'yamātmānucchittidharmā
GSP33brssgo1u:11811: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kūṭasthanitya evāyaṃ vijñānaghana ātmā nāsyocchedaprasaṅgo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11813: saṃsargābhāve ca prakṛtasya viśeṣavijñānasyābhāvānna pretya saṃjñāstītyuktamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11814: yadapyuktam- 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃhārādvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:11816: apica 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 2.4.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:11817: ityārabhyāvidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣajñānaṃ prapañcya 'yatra tvasya
GSP33brssgo1u:11818: sarvāmātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā vidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇasya
GSP33brssgo1u:11820: punaśca viṣayābhāve 'pi ātmānaṃ vijānīyāt ityāśaṅkya 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' ityāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:11821: tataśca viśeṣavijñānābhāvopapādānaparatvādvākyasya vijñānadhātureva kevalaḥ saṃnbhūtapūrvagatyā kartṛvacanena tṛcā nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11823: ataśca vijñānātparamātmanoravidyāpratyupasthāpitanāmarūparacitadehādyupādhinim itto bhedo na pāramārthika ityeṣor'thaḥ sarvairvedāntavādibhirabhyupagantavyaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11835: bhedadarśanāpavādācca 'anyo 'sāvanyo 'hamasmīti na sa veda yathā paśuḥ' (bṛ. 1.4.10)
GSP33brssgo1u:11836: , 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ca iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssgo1u:11845: 'tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (īśā. 7) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11847: sthite ca kṣetrajñaparamātmaikatvaviṣaya samyagdarśane kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti nāmamātrabhaidāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:11848: kṣetrajño 'yaṃ paramātmano bhinnaḥ paramātmāyaṃ kṣetrajñādbhinna ityevañjātīyaka ātmabhaidaviṣayo nirbandho nirarthakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11856: ye tu nirbandhaṃ kurvanti te vedāntārthaṃ bādhamānāḥ śreyodvāraṃ samyagdarśanameva bādhante /
GSP33brssgo1u:11861: vicitya nirmāya teṣāṃ nāmāni kṛtvā tatrānupraviśyābhivadannabhivadanādi kurvan /
GSP33brssgo1u:11867: atyantābhedajñāpanārthaṃ jīvamupakramya draṣṭavyatvādayo brahmadharmā uktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11873: jīvoddeśena brahmatvapratipādane bhedo 'pyāvaśyaka iti bhedābhedaśaṅkāprāptau kalpitabhedenoddeśyatvādikaṃ svato 'tyantābheda iti jñāpanārthamasyārambhāt
GSP33brssgo1u:11874: jñāpane cātra liṅgamātmaśabdenopakrāntasya jīvasya dharmiṇo brahmaṇo dharmyantarasya grahaṇaṃ vinaiva brahmadharmakathanaṃ bhedābhede dharmidvayagrahaḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11876: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kāryāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā teṣaṃ nāmāni ca kṛtvā teṣu buddhyādiṣu praviśyābhivadanādikaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:11877: kurvan yo vartate tadvidvānihaivāmṛto bhavatīti mantro 'pi jīvaparayoraikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-mantreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11887: kalpitasya bhedasya jñānānnivṛttiḥ saṃbhavati na satyasyetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11891: utpattiśrutyā jīvasya brahmaṇā bhedābhedāvityata āha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11893: atra pūrvapakṣe bījatrayamuktaṃ jīvenopakramaḥ parasyaiva samutthānaśrutyā jīvābhedābhidhānaṃ vijñātṛśabdaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11896: ātmajñānātsarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātaṃ tatra hetuḥ 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā'ityavyatireka uktastasya pratipādanāttadeva pratijñātamupapāditamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11901: mṛtasya saṃjñā nāstīti vākye 'traiva māṃ mohitavānasi jñānarūpasyātmano jñānābhāve nāśaprasaṅgāditi maitreyyokto munirāha-na vā are iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11907: kāśakṛtsnasya mate tvatyantābhedādvijñānasya kārakābhāvātsa yukta iti śrutyanusāritvāttanmate
GSP33brssgo1u:11908: manaḥkalpitaṃ vijñātṛtvaṃ mukte brahmātmani bhūtapūrvagatyoktamiti pariharaṇīyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11909: kiñca pūrvāparaparyālocanayā vākyasya muktātmaparatvāvagamādvijñātṛtvaṃ kalpitamevānūdyata iti na talliṅgena jīvaparatvamityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11914: hetūnāṃ bhedo na paramārthika iti pratijñayā saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11915: bhedābhedapakṣe jīvasya janmādivikāravattvāttanniṣedho na syādityāha-sa vā eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11916: bhedasya satyatve tatpramayā bādhādahaṃ brahmeti nirvādhaṃ jñānaṃ na syādityāha-anyathāceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11920: ātyantikaikatve hi prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati na bhedābhedayoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11930: nanvekasyāṃ guhāyāṃ dvau kiṃ na syātāmityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11932: nanvatyantābhede jīvasya spaṣṭabhānādbrahmāpi spaṣṭaṃ syādataḥ spaṣṭatvāspaṣṭatvābhyāṃ tayorbheda iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo1u:11933: darpaṇe pratibimbasya sphuṭatve 'pi bimbasyāsphuṭatvavat kalpitabhedena viruddhadharmavyavasthopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11935: so 'yamitivattattvamasītyakāryakāraṇadravyasāmānādhikaraṇyādatyantābhedo vedāntārthastadbodha eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ tasya bādho na yukta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11936: kiñca bhedābhadavādino jñānakarmabhyāṃ kṛtakaṃ mokṣaṃ kalpayanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:11940: asmākaṃ tvanarthadhvaṃsasya jñānasādhyatvānnityamuktātmamātratvācca nānityatvadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11949: tacca lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭarucakādīnāṃ mṛtsuvarṇādivatprakṛtitve kulālasuvarṇakārādivannimittatve ca samānamityato bhavati vimarśaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11957: īkṣāpūrvakaṃ ca kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11959: sa ca nyāya ādikartaryapi yuktaḥ saṃkramayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:11961: īśvarāṇāṃ hi rājavaivasvatādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇatvameva kevalaṃ pratīyate tadvatparameśvarasyāpi nimittakāraṇatvameva yuktaṃ pratipattum /
GSP33brssgo1u:11965: brahma ca naivaṃlakṣaṇamavagamyate 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam' (śve. 6.19)
GSP33brssgo1u:11969: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ prakṛtiścopādānakāraṇaṃ ca brahmābhyupagantavyaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11974: pratijñā tāvat- 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11975: tatra caikena vijñātena sarvamandavijñātamapi vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11979: dṛṣṭānto 'pi yathā 'somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityupādānakāraṇagocara evamāmnāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11980: tathā 'ekena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' 'ekena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' (chā. 6.1.4,5,6) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11981: tathānyatrāpi 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati (muṇḍa. 1.1.2)
GSP33brssgo1u:11985: tathā 'ātmani kalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11986: 'sa yathā dundubherhanyamānasya na bāhyāñśabdāñśaknuyādgrahaṇāya dundubhestu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ' (bṛ. 4.5.6,7)
GSP33brssgo1u:11988: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prativedāntaṃ pratijñādṛṣṭāntau prakṛtitvasādhanau pratyetavyau /
GSP33brssgo1u:11989: yata itīyaṃ pañcamī 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityatra 'janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ' (pā.sū. 1.4.30)
GSP33brssgo1u:11992: yathā hi loke mṛtsuvarṇādikamupādānakāraṇaṃ kulālasuvarṇakārādīnadhiṣṭhātṛnapekṣya pravartate naivaṃ brahmaṇa upādānakāraṇasya sato 'nyo 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣyo
GSP33brssgo1u:12004: dundubhyāghātasya janakasya janyatayā saṃbandhī vā śabdo viśeṣaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:12007: tatra hi brahmaṇo buddhisthatvārthaṃ sāmānyato jagatkāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:12008: tena buddhisthe brahmaṇi kṛtasnavedāntasamanvayaṃ pratipādya tatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ kartṛtvamātramuta prakṛtitvakartṛtvobhayarūpamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12011: yadyapi tadānantaryamasya yuktaṃ tathāpi niścitatātparyairvedāntaiḥ kartṛmātreśvaramatanirāsaḥ sukara iti samanvayānte idaṃ likhitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:12040: kartṛjñānādapi sarvakāryajñānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nimittakāraṇāvyatirekastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12042: vāgārabhyaṃ nāmamātraṃ vikāro na vastuto 'stīti satyakāraṇajñānādvikārajñānaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:12045: ghaṭaḥ sphuratītyanugatasphuraṇaṃ prakṛtistadatirikeṇa vikārā na santīti so 'yamartho yathā sphuṭaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:12046: hanyamānadundubhijanyācchabdasāmānyādbāhyān viśeṣaśabdān sāmānyagrahaṇātirikeṇa pṛthaggrahītuṃ śrotā na śaknuyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:12047: sāmānyasya tu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātajaśabdaviśeṣo gṛhīto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:12048: tasya vā grahaṇena tadavāntaraviśeṣaśabdo gṛhīto bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:12049: ataḥ śabdasāmānyagrahaṇagrahyā viśeṣāḥ sāmānye kalpitāḥ tadvadātmabhānabhāsyā ghaṭādaya ātmani kalpitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:12051: 'yato vā'ityatra śrutau yata iti pañcamī prakṛtau draṣṭavyetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:12054: evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvaṃ prasādhya kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati-nimittatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12063: abhidhyopadeśaścātmanaḥ kartṛtvaprakṛtitve gamayati 'so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:12074: yatkāraṇaṃ sākṣādbrahmaiva kāraṇamupādāyobhau prabhavapralayāvāmnāyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:12076: yaddhi yasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:12091: kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvasiddhasya sataḥ kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ śakyaṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:12093: pūrvasiddho 'pi hi sannātmā viśeṣeṇa vikārātmanā pariṇamayāmāsātmānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12098: yatkāraṇaṃ brahmaṇa eva vikārātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenāmnāyate 'sacca tyaccābhavat /
GSP33brssgo1u:12107: nanu kṛterāśrayaḥsiddhobhavati viṣayastu sādhya ityekasyobhayaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12108: yathā mṛdaḥ sādhyapariṇāmābhedena kṛtiviṣayatvaṃ tadvadātmana ityāha-pariṇāmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:12112: nanu brahmaṇa ātmānamiti dvitīyayā kāryātmanā sādhyatvaśrutyāstu prakṛtitvaṃ kartā tvanyo 'stvityata āha-svayamiti ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12113: brahmaṇaḥ kṛtikarmatvopapādanārthaṃ pariṇāmāditi padaṃ vyākhyāyānyathāpi vyācaṣṭe-pṛthaksūtramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12114: mṛdghaṭa itivadbrahma sacca tyacceti pariṇāmasāmānādhikaraṇyaśruterbrahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:12125: itaśca prakṛtirbrahma yonirityapi paṭhyate vedānteṣu 'kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim' (muṇḍa. 3.1.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:12127: yoniśabdaśca prakṛtivacanaḥ samadhigato loke 'pṛthivī yoniroṣadhivanaspatīnām' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12129: kacitsthānavacano 'pi yoniśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ - 'yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akāri' (ṛ.saṃ. 1.104.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12130: vākyaśeṣāttvatra prakṛtivacanatā parigṛhyate 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssgo1u:12133: yatpunaridamuktamīkṣāpūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu loke dṛṣṭaṃ nopādāneṣvityādi,
GSP33brssgo1u:12144: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:12152: nanvanupādāne 'pi strīyonau yoniśabdo dṛṣṭa ityata āha-strīyoneriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12154: yoniśabdasya sthānamapyartho bhavati so 'tra bhūtayonyādiśabdairna grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:12156: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:12159: nanvanumānasya śrutyanapekṣatvānna tayā bādha ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12161: yā kṛtiḥ sā śarīrajanyeti vyāptivirodhena nityakṛtimato 'numānāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:12162: ataḥ śrautamīśvaraṃ pakṣīkṛtyānupādānatvasādhane bhavatyevopajīvyayā prakṛtitvabodhakaśrutyā bādha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:12166: ata ubhayarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamiti siddhām //27//
GSP33brssgo1u:12172: ityārabhya pradhānakāraṇavādaḥ sūtraireva punaḥ punarāśaṅkya nirākṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:12173: tasya hi pakṣasyopodbalakāni kānicilliṅgābhāsāni vedānteṣvāpātena mandamatīnpratibhāntīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12179: ataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati- etena pradhānakāraṇavādapratiṣedhanyāyakalāpena sarve 'ṇvādikāraṇavādā api pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:12188: tathā hi chāndogye jagatkāraṇatvajñāpanārthaṃ pitā putramuvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:12191: punaḥ pitrā kimatra paśyasītyukte na kiñcana bhagava ityāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:12196: atrāṇvādivādāḥ śrautā na veti saṃśaye satyasadaṇvādiśabdabalācchrautā iti prāpte 'tidiśati-eteneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:12202: tasminnaiva sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti siddham //28//
GSP33brssgo1u:12204: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:12206: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya yaturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
